ba bsam yas na// ma yi gtso bo byung ba ngas dran te// drang srong chen po gzings kyis don mdzad pa// de ming dngos po med las byung zhes bya// skyes ma thag tu mkha'
la rab 'dug nas// chos rnams thams cad dngos po med par bstan// de tshe de dang mthun par mtshan btags tu// sgra ni 'jig rten kun la grags par byas// lha rnam
thams cad rab tu sgra 'byin pa// dngos po med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// skyes ma thag tu grom pa bdun boratu// rgyal bas chos rnams dngos po med par bshad//
thub pa chos rnams thams cad ston pa yi// sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal poranam 'gyur tsho// rtsi shing gal ba ri dang brag rnams las// chos rnams dngos po mad ces sgra yang
byung/ 'jig rten du na ji sAd sgra yodapa// thams cad dngos mdasu yang med pa zhes// de lta bur ni 'jig rtan 'dran pa yi// sgra dbyangs rnam pa shin tu byung bar gyur//
de'i dus na rgyal po'i bu skyes pa// mang ni rtag tu snying rje sams zhes bya// shin tu gzugs bzung blta na sdug pa zhig/ rgyal ba de yi drung du nyer 'os taM// thub pa/
khyu mchog zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// ri mo btsas pas bskor ba byas nas ni// rdul brol bla na med pa'i chos mnyan phyir// rab tu dang ba'i soms kyis der 'dug go/
rgyal ba dpa' bo dus na bsam mkhyen nas// ting 'dzin 'di ni reb tu bshad pa mdzad// dasan rdul bral ting 'dzin 'di thos nas// rgyal mchog
bstan la myur bar rab tu byung/ rab tu de byung ting 'dzin 'di yang ni// bzung zhing bklags te yongs su chudabyas pas// bskal pa bya ba nyi shutshang bar ni// lag
par ltung ba'i sar yang song ma song// da ni dge bar bya ba'i las de yis// sangs rgyus bya phrag nyi shu mnyag pa'i phyos// rgyal ba de dag kun gyi drung du yang// ting 'dzin
zhi mchog 'di na goms par byas// da phyis 'jig rtan du yang sangs rgyas gyur// ming ni don lags bsams shes rtag tu brjod// sems can bye ba mang posrid don byas
nas// phyi ma'i dus la ma bzhin mya ngan 'das// dngos po med pa las byung ba'i le'u stabargyad pa'o/// 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i
mdo// bam po gsum pa////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i
sams dpa' chen po gang ji ltar na/ bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing/ sems can thams cad sAd ba'i rgya mtsho/
pa0 las bsgral bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ chos thams
ad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ klag par bya/ rab tu bton
par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa mad par sgrom pas bsgom par bya/ mang du bya/ gzhan la yang rgyu char rab tu bstan par bya'o// da nI'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon
nu chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nga 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
skyod pa sta/ 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad byung ngo/ gzhon nu de lta bas na/ khyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas thams ca da kyis/
bsngags pa/ de bzhin grashags pa thams cad bskyod pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po gzung bar bya'o// de la 'di
skad ces bya sta// de'i phyir byang chub tu ni 'tshong rgyu zhing// srid pa'i mtsho las sems can sgrol 'dod pas// sas rgyas bsngags pa'i ma do sde 'di zung shig/ byang chub dam
[s]@#// ba rnyed par dkab mi 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na/ byang chub sams
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing myur du bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos zab mo bzod
la la mkhas par bya'o// gzhon nu ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sams
dpa' sams dpa' chen pos chos thams cad skya ma lta bur rab tu shes par bya'o// chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang/ smig rgyu lta bu dang/ brag cha lta bu dang/ mig yor lta
bu dang/ chu zla lta bu dang/ sprul pa lta bu dang/ gzugs brnyan lta bu dang/ namakha' lta bur rab tu shes par bya'o// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
nam chos thams cad skya ma lta bur yongs su shes shing/ chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang/ smig rgyu lta bu dang/ brag cha lta bu dang/ mig yor lta bu dang/ chu zla lta bu dang/
sbrul pa lta bu dang/ gzugs brnyan lta bu dang/ nam mkha'i ltakhur yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
00 chen po 'di chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// chos zab mo brjod pa dang ldan pa da/ 'dod chags par 'gyur ba'i chos lami chags/ zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba'i
chos la mi sdang/ gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos la mi rmong ngo// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos de yang dag par rdzas su mi mthong/ chos de ma dmigs/gang
'dod chags pa dang/ gang la 'dod chags pa dang/ gang gis 'dod chags pa dang/ gang zha sdang ba dang/ gang la zhe sdang ba dang/ gang gis zhe sdang ba dang/ gang gti mug pa/
dang gang la gti mug pa dang/ gang gis gti mud par 'gyur ba'i chos de dus yang dag par rdzas su ma mthong zhing chos de mi dmigs so// chos de yang dag par rdzas su mi
mthong zhing mi dmigs pas/ 'dod chags pa mad pa/ zhe sdang ba mdA pa/ gti mug pa mad pa// sams phyin ci ma log pa/ mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya'o// spros pa
mad pa zhes bya'o// rgol ba pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// skum la phyin pa zhes bya'o/ 'bad par son pa zhes bya'o// mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya'o// tshul khrims
can zhes bya'o// ya shosacan zhes bya'o// shes rab can zhes bya'o// bsod nams can zhes bya'o// rdzu 'phrul can zhes bya'o// dran pa can zhes bya'o// blo gros/
can zhes bya'o// rtog pa can zhes bya'o// ngo ma shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// brtan pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes
ka bya 'o// sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsrungs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o// ci'ang mad pa zhes bya'o// dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o//
zag pa zad pa zhes bya'o// nyon mongs pa mad pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sams shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba// cang shes da/
glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ khyad pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa// srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa// yang dag pa'i shes pas sams
shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sams kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dag sbyong zhes bya'o// bram khra zhes bya'o// khrus
byas pa zhes bya'o// kha rol tu song ba zhes bya'o// rig par byed pa zhes bya'o// gtsang sbra can zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi sras zhes bya'o// shAkya'i sras zhes
bya'o// tshor ma dkrugs pa zhes bya'o// khrims ma bral ba zhes bya'o// 'obs las rgal ba zhes bya'o// zug rngu phyung ba zhes bya'o// nad mad pa zhes bya'o//
dag slong zhes bya'o// kun nas dkris pa med pa zhes bya'o// skyes bu zhes bya'o// skyes bu dam pa zhes bya'o// skyes bu mchog ces bya'o// skyes bu chen po zhes
bya'o/ skyes bu sang ga zhes bya'o// skyes bu glang po che zhes bya'o// skyes bu cang bshas pa zhes bya'o// skyes bu lcid khyor ba zhes bya'o// skyes bu dpa' bo zhes bya'o//
skyes bu rtsal po che zhes bya'o// skyes bu mo tog ces bya'o// skyes bu pad+ma zhes bya'o// skyes bu pad+ma dkar po zhes bya'o// skyes bu 'dul ba zhas bya'o// skyes bu
zla ba zhes bya'o// rgyas bu phal pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// ma gos pa zhus bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos zab mo'i bzod pa la 'jug pa'i chos
kyi rnams grangs 'di bstan pa'i phyirje tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// nam zhig 'jig rten khams 'di 'byung ba dang// 'jig rtan thams cung nam mkhar gyur pa'i
tsho/ ji ltar ston bzhin phyis kyang de bzhin tu// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// 'jig rten 'di na ji sAd cu yod pa// chu yi phung po 'ar na 'og
tu 'gro// 'og tu ci 'drar stang du'ang de bzhin no// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar ba snang cung zad sin mad las// skad cig tu ni spyin gyi
@# @#/ dkyil 'a khor snang// thog ma ga las byung bar shes par bya// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad shes par gyis// de bzhin gshibs pa mya na/
ka 'das pa dag/ ji ltar yid la byas bzhin bgazugs brnyan snang// sngon mtha' ji bzhin phyis kyang de bzhin tu// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// nga
ltar dbu ba mang po rdos pa dag/ chu bos khyar pa skyes bus des mthong ste// de la brtags na snying po yong mi snang// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/
ji ltar char pa thogs chen bab pa na// chu yi chu bur dag ni tha dad 'byung// khyung nas zhig sbyo chu yi chu bur mod// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar
spring yig grong gzhan skur ba las// dgo dwang ma dga'i bya ba so sor 'byung/ sgra las spring yig tu yang 'phos pa mad// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis//
rgyu rdzoltar ma dag chang gis myos nas ni// sa 'di kun tu 'khor sum byed mod kyi// sa 'di 'gyel zhi g.yos pa'i ng chad pa ltar// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par
gyis ma long ngos dang 'bru mar snod rnams la// bud med kha bzhin brgyan pas bltas pa na// byis pa de ni do la chags bskyed nas// 'dod pa tshol ba'i phyir yang shin tu
ba10 rgyug/ bzhinani dor yang 'phos pa ma yin te// gzugs brnyan la ni nam yang gzhan mi rnyed// rmongs pa de dag 'a dod chags skyes pa ltar// chos rnams thams cad hU~M
bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar smig rgyu dri bra'i grong khyer dang// skya ma ji bzhin rmi lam ji lta bur// mtshan ma sgom pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin
shes par gyis// ji ltar namakha' dang bar zla shar ba// de yi gaMzugs brnyan dang ba'i 'tshor snang ste// zla ba chu yi nang du 'phos pa med// chos kun mtshan nyid du 'dAr
shes par gyis// ji ltar ma dag nags ri'i khrod 'dug nas// glu len sa dang dgod dang du ba las/ brag cha thos kyang snang ba med pa ltar// chos rnams thams cadu de bzhin
shes par gyis// glu dang rol mo de bzhin du ba yang// de la brtan nas brag cha 'byung mod kyi// sgra la'ang dbyangs de nam yang yod ma yin // chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes
par gyis// ji ltar rmi lam na yang 'dod bstan pa// skyes bu sad par gyur nas ma mthong sta// byis pa shin tu 'dod la chags shing zhan// chos rnams thams cad da
bzhin shes par gyis// sgyu ma bya ba dag gis gzugs sprul te// rta dang glang po shing rta sna tshogs byas// de la ji ltar snang ba gang yang med// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin
shes par gyis// ji ltar bu mo gzhon nu'i rmi lam na// khu po byung zhing shi ba ris mthong na// byung na dga' zhing shi na mi dga' ltar// chos rnamA/
ka thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar mtshan mo chu la zla ba dag/ dang zhing rtog pa med pa'i chu nang snang// chu zla stong ba gsog ste gzung du med// chos rnams thams
cad de bzhin shes par gyis// ji ltar sos ka'i nyi ma phyad dus na// skyes bu skom pas gdungs shing 'gro ba yis// sAg rgyu dag la chu yi phung por mthong// chos rnams
thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// smig rgyu la yang chu ni yongs mdun// sems can rmongs pa de la 'thung 'dod da// mi bdon chu ni 'thung bar yong mi nus// chos
rnams thams cad de bzhinAshes par gyis// ji ltar chu shing rlon pa'i sdong po la// snying po 'dod phyir skyes bus de gshegs kyang// nang dang phyi rol kun na sIng po med/
chos rnams thams cad de bzhinA shes par gyis// mig dang rna ba sna yang tshad ma min// lce dang lus dang sems kyang tshad ma min// dbang po 'di dag gal tu tshad yin na//
'phags pa'i lam gyis su la ci zhig bya// 'di ltar dbang po 'di dag tshad min zhing// ngo bo nyid kyis roms po lung ma bstan// de phyir mya ngan 'da' ba'i lam 'dod pa/
[z]das ni 'phags pa'i lam gyis bya ba byos// lus la ston gyi mtha' ma rang brtags na// de la lus med lus su 'du shes mod// gang la lus mad lus su shes mad pa/
da ni 'dus ma byas kyi rigs zhes bya// mya ngan 'das pa'i chos la chos mad de// gang phyir 'di bod nam yang yod mi 'gyur// rtog can dag gi yod dang med ces bya//
daltar spyod pa sdug bsngal zhi mi 'gyur// yod dang mad ces bya ba gcig mtha'// gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang mtha' yin te// da phyir gnyi ga'i mtha'ani rnam spangs
nas mkhas pa dbus la'ang gnas par yong ma khyod// yod dang mad ces bya ba brtsod pa ste/ gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang rtsod pa yin// rtso dpar gyur pa sdug
bstal zhi mi 'gyur// rtsod pa mad par gyur pa sdug bsngal 'gag/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa'i gtam byas te// byis pa bdag nyid lus la mngon sum snyam saM// lus
la mngon sum gyur pa rlom sems med// da na rlom sems mang po thams cad spangs// bsam gtan bzhi dag ga yang gtum byas nas// byis pa bdag nyid bsam gtan
spyod yul sa// bsam gtan nyon mongs med cing rom sams mad// shes pas rtogs nas drags pa rab tu song// bden pa bzhi yi gtam rnams byas nas kyang//
byis pa bdag nyade bden pa mthong zhes zer// bden pa mthong la rlom sems gang yang med// rlom sems med pa bden par rgyal bas gsungs//
ka tshul khrims bsrung zhing de yis bsnyams mi bya// chos rnams mnyan cing des ni mi bsnyams taM// gang gis shes rab chung ngu de snyams pa// rtsa ba de las de yi sdug bsngal
'phal// 'jigartan 'dran pa thams cad mkhyen pa yis// drags pa sdug bsngal rtsa ba yin par bstan// rgyugs pas drag pa sdug bsngal ba du 'phal// rlom sems
mad pa sdug bsngal 'gag par 'gyur// ji snyad chos mang yongs su chub byas nas// thos pas rgyugs shing tshul khrims mi srung na// tshul khrims 'chal pas ngan 'gror
de 'gro la// thos pa mang pos de la skyob mi nus// gal te tshul khrims drags pas de rgya gas shing// mang du thos la brtson par ma byed na// tshul khrims 'bras bu ma
lus zad nas ni// phyir yang sdug bsngal rab tu myong bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten dag na ting 'dzin sgom byed kyang// de ni bdag tu 'du shes bshig ma byed// de yi nyon
mongs phyir yang ba tu ldang// lhag spyod kyin ting 'dzin 'dir bsgoms bzhin// gal te bdag med chos la rab rtog cing// de dag brtags nas gal te sgom byed na//
'bras bu mya ngan 'das thob rgyu de yin// rgyu gzhan du dag zhi bar 'gyur mi srid// ma zhig chom rkun mang pos rab gtsos nas// lo bar 'dod pas bros shing 'gror tsal na//
de yi rkang pa 'gro zhing rgyug ma nus// chom rkun dag gis de bzung bcom pa ltar// de bzhin tshul khrims nyams ba rmongs pa'i mi// 'dus byas dag las 'bros par 'dod/
mod kyis// tshul khrims nyams pas de yang 'bros mi nus// na rga 'chi ba dag gis shin tu gzhom// ji ltar mi rgod stong phrag mang po dag/ rnam pa du ma'i sgo nas sdig/
khyad pa// de bzhin nyon mongs sgo rnams du ma nas// mi rgod bzhin du dge ba'i phyogs rnams 'joms// gang gis phung po bdag mad rab btugs te// smyos shing brgyas
kyang zhum par mi 'gyur ba// nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang du de mi 'gro/ stong pa shes pa de la 'khrug pa med// 'gro mang phung po stong pa ston mod kyi// ji ltar bdag mad de dag/
mi shes tu// ma shos de dag grazhan gyis rgyal na yang// khro ba'i zil gyis non cing tshig rtsub sa// mi dag na zhing lus ni sdug bsngal te// lo grangs mang por res 'ga'
ma thar ba// de ni yun ring nad kyis nyon mongs pas// nad rnams gso ba'i phyir yang san pa btsel// yang dang yang ni de yis btsal ba dang// sman pa mkhas shing rig
/pa des rnyed de// des kyang snying rje nye bar gzhug nas ni// sman 'di btang bar gyis shes byin pa dang/ smanamang bzang zhing yangs pa des blangs nas/
kanab 'tsho bar 'gyur pa'i sman mi 'thung// snyan pas ma lan snyan gyis ma nyos tra// nad pa de nyid kyis ni nyos pa yin// de bzhin bstan pa 'di la rab byung ste// stobs
dang bsam gtan dbang po kun rig nas// bsgom pa la ni na ra ba nam byed// rigapar me rAtshun phag la mya ngan 'da'// rtag tu chos kun rang bzhin stong pa sta//
rgyal ba'i sras rnams dngos po rnam par 'jig/ srid pa thams cad yong la stong pa sta// khri tsho'i song pa chu stags can dag gis// mkhas pa byas pa dag dang rtsod mi khyad//
byis pa dag ni ri mor byas nas slong// zhe sdang sams kyis dkI nga 'ong nas// byis pa la la rten par yong ma byed// byis pa dag gi rang bzhin rgyud drag nas
mkhas pa byis pa drag dngam 'grogs te// ji srid du ni byis pa lags bstan kyang// de dag phyire yang dgra dang 'dra bar 'gyur// mkhas pa byas pa dag la yid mi rton/
mkhas dang byis pa'i rang bzhin chos nyid ni// byis pa'i rang bzhin ngang tshul tha dad de// so so'i spyi lo la mdza' ba mad// chos dang ldan pa'i tshig tu smras na yang//
ba yid mi rdzas dang zhe sdang khro ba dang// mngon par ston pa 'dri ni byis pa'i chos// don 'di rnam par rig pas yid ma ston/ 'phyis pa dang ni byis par mthun 'byor ba//
ji ltar mi gtsang ba dang mi gtsang bzhin// mkhas pa dag ni mkhas pa skya bo dang// mthun zhing 'khyor pa mang dang snying ku bzhin// 'khor ba'i nyas la so sor ma brtag
ta3 las kyi rnam par smin la mi 'jug cing// sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshig la ma dad pas// byis pa de dag bcad cing btub par 'gyur// mi mthong rab tu chud dka'
thob nas ni// bzo yi gnas dag la ni mkhas ma gyur// dbul por gyur sring nor yang yong mod de// da nas 'tsho ba med pas rab tu byung// sangs rgyas bstan 'dir de dag
rang byung nas// lhung bzed chos gos dag la chags par 'gyur// dri dag sdig ra'i grogs pos yongs zin pas// bde bar gshags pa'i bslab pa mi spyod do// de dag
bdag gi tshul khrims ma mthong bas/ dbyis pa dag ni sams gnas mi rnyed cing// nyin mtshan rnal 'byor la yang mi brtson pas// de dag sdig pa'i lam la sod ma byed//
lus dang soms ni shin tu ma snyom pa// de ni tshig tu ma sad+maci yang med// su yis nyes pa ci byas brgal lo zhas// rtag tu gzhan gyis nyos pa tshol zhing rtog/ byis pa
dag ni zas la chags gyur nas// zas la tshod rig par ni mi byed na// sangs rgyas bsod nams kyis niwas rnyed kyang// de la byis pa byas pa gzo mi
'gyur// de dag kha zas ro zhim gsod pa dag// rnyed nas rnal 'byor ma brtson za zhing 'thung// de dag la ni zasar gdug par 'gyur// bslang phrug gus rtsa ba ma dkrugs
bzhin// mkhas shing rtogs pa blo gros ldan pa na// kha khrus bzang po gtsang mazamod kyi/ de dag la ma chags par mi 'gyur tuM/ mchags bzhin du za zhing rnal 'byor
brtson// mkhas shing rtogs pa blo gros ldan pa dag/ byis pa gang nas legs par 'ongs shes sbas// de bzhin snyan pa'i tshig gis nyar bsdus nas// de dag la ni
snying rje nye bar 'jog// byis pa la ni gang phan snying btsal// de la gnod pa byung na byis pa dga'/ da lta'i nyas phyir byis pa rnams spangs te// ri dgas bzhin dug
bu dgon par gnas// mkhas pas 'di 'dra'i chos pa rig nas ni// shes rab dman bstan bdag ni mtho ris nyams// byang chub thob par ga la 'gyur snyam ste//
byis pa rnams dang nam yang yong mi so// byams pa la ni mkhas pa gnas par 'gyur// snying rje dag la gnas shing dga' bar spyod/ srid pa kun l rtag tu btang snyoms
[re/ ]ba ting nge 'dzin bsgoms byang chub rig par gyur// mya ngan madra zhing byang chub das rtogs shing// sams nan rgasagabrir bar rig nas ni// de la snying rje rab tu nyar
gzhag sta// don dam ldan pa'i gtam rnams ston par byed// rgyal ba'i chos nyid brjod du med pa dang// bde bar gshegs pa'i bdon pa sus shes pa// de dag 'di lta bu
yi chos thos nas// 'phags pa zang zing mad pa'i bzod pa thob// chos zab mo la bzod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// sa zabam la bzod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o////do nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na/nan tan snying por bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis da ltar bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhu na/ gzhon
nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nan tan snying por byed pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par dka' ba ma yine na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di lta
ni sos/ da nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la
ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cas gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[ra ]@#// chen po rnams la gdams pa dang/ rjes su bstan pa 'di legs par bstan cing legs par bkod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams
ka cad bstan to/ legs par bshad pa dang/ legs par bkod pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te/
'tsha nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa'ang ma lags na/ mu stegs can gzhan gyi lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang nan tan sIng por bgyis to/ lus dang
srog la yang ma lta bar bgyis la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob bo/ datsa'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab par
'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bdud sdig
can shin tu gzhig par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ sdug bsngal thams cad las bsgral bar 'tshal lo// bcom
bsgra ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa bdag gi spyi bo la bzhag par gsol// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// nam mkha' 'dra zhing rdul khral gzugs bzang 'chang// shes rab sras/
po lus dang mtshan ma mnga'// yon tan rgya mtsho rab zab thugs rje can// mtshungs mod phyag ni bdag gi spyi bor zhog/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
phyag g.yas pa dag ba'i rtsa ba du ma las byung ba/ mtshan sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa// lha'i gsar gyi kha dog lta bu/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor bzhag go/ bcom
ldan 'das kyisazla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor phyag g.yas pa bzhag ma thag tu dra skad cig de nyid la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la dpa' bar 'gro ba dang/ nam mkha' mdzod
dang rdo rje lta bu dang/ yid kyi mgyogs pa dang/ gzugs thams cad ston pa dang/ sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' drang// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ston pa dang/ stong pa nyid
thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i ting nga 'dzin gyi sgo bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma brjod du mad pa'i yang brjod du/
mad pa dag mngon du gyur taM/ gzungs dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo du ma mngon du gyur to// dga' ba dang bad bar gang du 'phags pas brjod pa lha yul ba/ rgyu cho zhing dpo med pa
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yuladarig pa rab tu thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dra bas mdzes 'brel bum pa lcags kyu'i mtshan mnga' zhing/
[]// dpal ba'u 'khor la rgyal mtshan ba dan nya ris mnga'// bskal pa bya mang rin chen gtong la zhugs pa'i phyag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nu'i
spyi bor bzhag/ de nas lha yul ba rgya che zhing dpa mad pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul du rig pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang ldan par gyur
pa'i nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gabrar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas//
bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do// bla mar mi 'jigs sbyin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhan phan sems can gnyon
rtsa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs bcu bdan pa'i tshul mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bder gshogs mi mnyam mnyam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po shin tu
rgyu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo dgra bzhi rnam par btul la phyag 'tshal lo// btsun pa dam pa'i don rnams mkhyan la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi sku mchog mnga'
ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// snying rje byams 'od rgyal 'od kim mun sel ba// shes rab shin tu yang pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil du shar// don dam shin tu zab pa'i chos rnams ston
mdzad pa// wa khyod la ni rtag tu bdag kyang skyabs su mchi// de nas zla bod gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'o dus la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/
dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs rtsa ba'i slad du// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
dang dag slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ sang bdag gi sdum par bshos gsol bar thugs la gnang bar mdzad du gsol// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// bdagag
stam par gtsang ba'i bshos gsol bar// mi dbang sras dang bcas la gsol ba 'dabs// thub pa'i dbang po bdag la thugs bcu'i phyir// mgon po lha yi gtso bos
gnang bar mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang thabs cig
tu zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du ngas bshos gsol bar cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung
khar gyur pas gnang bar rig nas/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bya rgod kyi phung bo'i ri las
babs nas/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i bar du de'i bar gyis lam thams cad legs par brgyan te/ 'di ltar bcom
ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// lam yangs shing cha la/ rtswa dang/ sdong dum dang/ tshor ma dang/ rdo dang/ gyo mo dang/ gsag ma mad par gsal te/ khyo ma
gtsang mas bdal nas/ ka tsa lanaM ka ltar ba jam zhing rig ni bde ba/ dbyangs dga' bar byas te/ lha'i ma tog ut+pa la dang/ pad+madung/ ku mu dadang/ pad+ma dkar po
dang/ dri mchog dang a ti mug to dang/ mal la ka dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ skya snar dang/ kun da dang/ ti la ka dang/ ga sar dang/ mya ngan 'tshang la sogs pa/ dus
khams cad kyi ma tog bzang pos ni kun tu khebs par byas/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ rnam par rgyul ba'i ba dan dang/ rin po che'i rta babs dang/
bla ra na bris rin po cha'i bdug spos kyi snod sna tshogs ni ngos la dpas/ rin po che'i bdug spos kyi snod de dag thams cad nas na a ka ru nag pos gang ba'i du ba 'thul/ phyogs
ba06 phyogs su ni bro mkhan dang/ gar mkhan lha'i glu gar dang/ rol mo shin tu 'byor cing legs par bslabs pa rnams bkod skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo shin
tu brgyan pa dang/ khar rnga dang/ pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang/ pi wang dang/ gling bu dang/ rdza rnga dang/ rnga mukun da dung/ rdza rnga chen po thogs pa rnams bkod/ lam gyi ngos gnyis
su shing tAl mthon po lha'i rin po che sna tshogs dang/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo gsar las byas pa'i dril bu g.yar ka'i dra ba bros shing sgra 'khrol bas brgyan pa rnams dang/ na po che stsa/
tshogs kyi mkha' rten bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing sna tshogs khrun dang sboms su ldan pa sna tshogs dus thams cad kyi lo ma dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu
phun sum tshogs pa dag btsugs so// de la 'di skad ces bya sta// laman sna tshogs shin tu legs par brgyan// blar dungani gdugs dang ba dan bsgrung// sil snyan dag gi
sgra dag rab tu 'byin// glu sgra yid du 'ong ba'ang de bzhin tu// bung mad mang po bro rdung gar byed dang// gos bzang khrig khrig rnam mang sna tshogs dang// ma tog 'phreng ba bzang zhing
mdzes pa yis// lam mchog yangs pa de ni rab tu brgyan// grong mchog gtsang ma 'di ni thugs rje can// sangs rgyas thub pa'i zla 'od gshags so zhas// zla 'od gzhon
nus dad pa rab bskyod nas// rgya cha yangs pa'i lam ni shin tu brgyan// lha rdzas kyi na bya ma gtsang ma 'dul// rab tu yid 'ong ma tog mchog rnams
bkram// rin chen rta babs dag kyang legs par btsugs// lam ni lha yi grong khyer bzhin du mdzes// zla 'od gzhon nu shin tu yid dga' las// de ltar lam rnams/
'a sna tshogs legs brgyan to// lha dang lha min klu yis de mthong nas// ngo mtshar gyur cing a la la zhes sa// lam gyi g.yas g.yos 'dzam bu'i chu gsar gyi// cha la mkho
zhing bzang la zlum pa dag/ rin chen dril bu'i dra bas g.yogs shing dkrigs// sgra 'khrol rnam pa dum mang po btsugs// de bzhin rin chen sdong po khrag khrig na// dus kun
gyi yang ma tog rgyas pa btsugs// de yi yangs pa'i lam brgyun mdzes gyur pa// mtho ris na ni dga' ba'i tshal bu bzhin// rin po che las byas pa'i med pa' rtan ni// dra
ba'i chun po 'od 'bar shin tu mdzes// dpa madra mtho zhing cha la rgyas pa dag/ lam gyi g.yas g.yos 'gram du btsugs shing bkod// sangs rgyas 'jig rtan gsum dbang gang
nas ni// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong du gshegs pa yi// lam chen de ni de dag rab rgyan pas// rnam pa thams cad du yang mdzes par gyur// g.yas g.yon du ni rin chon pog por
dpyangs// de dag a ga ru yang nag pos bkang// pog par kun nas du ba sprin bzhin 'khrigs// lha yi dri zhim rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung// ji srid grong khyer chu dron sgo bar dang
ri rgyul bya rgod phung po ji srid bar// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas rgyal ba'i phyir// lha rdzas dpa mad angs pa brgyan par byas// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur bas lam de rin
po che bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan pa byas nasazla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs to/ rgyal po'i khabakyi grong khyer chen po gang na ba dang/ rang
gi lha'i khyim mtho zhing cha la yangs pa gang na yod pa der song sku phyin nas/ rang gi khyim du zhugs so// zhugs nas batra' ba dang/ bca' ba dang/ myang ba mang zhing bzang ba
g.yor bcug sta/ zhal zas ro sna brgya pa sbyar nus/ de'i mtshan mo 'dus pa dang/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po chag chag legs par btab/ byi dor legs par byas
nas ma tog sil ma ni bkram/ bdug spos kyis ni bdugs/ zla ras ni bras/ dar gyi lda ldi dang chun po ni dpyangs/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan ni bsgang sku/
da ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i lam srang dang/ grong bar du bcas pa rdo dang/ gyo mo dang/ gsag ma med par byas/ ma tog sna tshogs ni bkram/ tsan dan gyi phyi mas
ni gtor/ skar khung dang/ rta babs dang/ sgo gang dang/ ba gam dang/ skar khung dra ba ris dang/ zla ba khams pa lta bu s ni brgyan cing tsan dan gyis
ka byug pa byas te/ de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po dpagatu mad pa'i bkod pas rab tu brgyan nas/ rang gi khyim gang rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa du mas brgyan taM/ rin po
cho'i 'phrang ba rnam pa du ma ni rab tudapangs/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i gos kyis ni brgyan cing nyon 'khor yang mdzes par byas/ pAng ba dang lnga lha rnam pa tha dad pa du mas ni
brgyan pa khyod du bcug/ rin po cha'i stan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni 'ding du bcug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ 'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyi
lha rdzas kyi sang ga'i khri lha'i dang mi'i las 'das pa bshams so/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi pog por ni phyogs bzhir dpyangs tu/ de dag nas a ka ru 'ba' shig gis du ba
'thul bar byas so// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas khyim mchog da yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir/ lha'i glu gar dang/ sil snyan ni bsgrags/
gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan ni bsgrung/ lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ kho dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po
zam/ dang/mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong gis ni gang zhing rnam par bltas/ rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs rnam pa du mas ni grang bar byas so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// zla bod kyis
na khyim mchog yangs pa yang// rgya cher thams cad shin tu brgyan par byas// gang la 'jig rten sgron ma bzhug pa yi// lha rdzas sang ga'i khri ni de bus su btsugs// 'jig rten
sgron mdzad rgyal ba'i gtso bo yi// dge 'dun dag ni gang la 'dug 'gyur ba// rin chen shin tu rnam par bkra ba'i stan// bya ba stong phrag 'thu' yas lags par bting// ni
chan sna tshogs kun gyi bdug spos snod// a ga ru yis shin tu gang byas te// phyogs rnams thams cad du yang rnam par dbyas/ 'di dag nus na yid 'ong drin+d+rims 'thul// zla 'o
kyis ni stobs bcu gshegs pa'i phyir// rin chen ma tog mdzes pa sna tshogs dang// ma tog dri mchog bzang po rnam mang gis// khyim gyi sa gzhi bzang po kun tu bkram// gar
byad glu len sil snyan sgra dag gas// khyim mchog thams cad kun tu sgra yis gang// gdugs dang bden dag kyang shin tu bsgrung// khyim kun lam mer mdzes pa lha yi bzhin//
zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim mchog chen po yang// skyes bu na chung tshogs kyis rgyas gyur cing// klu dang gnod sbyin lha min mang pos gang// brgya phrag mang po'i lha yis rnam par bltas//
du nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po yang brgyan/ bdag gi khyim yang legs par brgyan nas/ de'i mtshan mo 'das/
pa dang/ nAng par sta rab kyi dus kyi/ sil snyan sna tshogs brgya dag na rab tu dkrol/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bya ba du ma ni bsgang sku/ byang chub samasadapa'/
[= ]bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu thams cad kyang/ lha'i ma tog man ras snyim pa bkang ste/ da dag la la ni sku ba gcig gs thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
chen po 'di lta ste/ spyan ras gags dbang phyug dang/ mthu chen thob rung/ sngos kyi glang po chu dang/ rin po che'i tog dang d mngon par 'byung dka' dang/ 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ dpa' bo'i sde dang dolags bawang dang/ rin chen ma tog dang/ mthong ba don yod pa dang byams pa la sogs pa byung chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen
pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ rta dang ba lang du ma shin tu brgyan cing/ ma zhon par khrid pa mang po dang 'dras pas gzhan yang yul gyi mi dpag tu med pa'i tshogs dang/
bdag nyid kyang lha'i ma tor ga man ras snyim pa bkang sta/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul
chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la la zhes lha'i ga zha'i sgra yid du 'thad cing/ yid du 'ong ba yid 'phrog pa dag sgrog cing/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i chu dron
gyi sgo nas phyir byung ste/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba derasong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ lha'i ma tog man+da ras sIm pa gang khas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/ phyogs gcage tu 'khod do// khyams pa
la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
byas te/ so so'i snyom pa dang ma tog mnar yod pas des/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gcig tu dug
bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/
gdugs tshod phab pa/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gtsangasbyar lags te/ da di'i dus la bab par bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen na (byang chub sams dpa'i dge 'dun dang/ dag
@#// slong gi dge 'dun du bsus pa dang/ dbang chab/ dbangachab r ba grags pa/ rgya che zhing rlabs che ba'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri' dang/
lha ma yin dang/ drang srong dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen bo dang/ grul bum dang/ yi dgas dang/ srul po dang/ ma dang mi ma yin pa dag dang
dkaM ang thabs gcig tu rgyal po'i khabakyi grong khyer chen por gshegs shinge ba dug gi snyam par yang gdugs tshod gsol ba'i dus la bab bo// bde bar gshegs pa gdugs tshod la bab
ma bo de la 'di skad ces bya sta/ bdag gagrong khyara mchog kun legs par brgyunaM/ mgon po bdag gi snyam pa'i ng de bzhin te// lha yi zhal zas ro brgya bshams shing sbyar//
gdugs tshod bab kyis bde gshegs bzhengs su gsol// drang srong mchog gis phyag bgyis stobs bcu yon tan 'chang// sras kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing grong du
zla gshogs// snang byed nyi ma mun pa'i tshogs sal bzhungs su gsol// bcom ldan bdag gi snyam par bashos gsol gdugs tshod bab// sras dang thabs cig bdag gi
lasnyam par gshegs su gsol// 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs kyi don kyang bgyis par 'gyur// ji ltar mar ma mdzad kyis khyod la lung bstan pa// de bzhin bdag kyang 'jig rten
mngon sum lung ston cig/ bdag 'dare lung bstan 'jig rten thos nas ni// sams kyang mchog tu rgya che bar bskyod de// 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyus 'gyur//
'di na snod min sems can gang yang mahA// bzhangs shig bzhengs shig stobs bcu mnga' ba'i lha// bdag la rjes su phan mdzod snyam par gshegs// ji ltar bdag gi
snum par khyod gshegs pa// de bzhin byang chub shing dbang drung bdag 'chi// byang chub shing dbang da drung bdag mchis nas// mi g.yo ma 'gul bar ni gnas bsus te//
byams pas stor bcas bdud rnams pham bgyis nas// khyod kyis brnyas bzhin byang chub thob par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas gsol
pa mkhyen nas// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pas slar bka' stsal ba/ longs shig zla 'od rgyal ba'i sras// langs shig sbyin dga' sems can mchog/
longs shig snying rje tshul khrims brtan// zan la de ni khyim du 'dong// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs nas/ star gdan las
bzhangs te/ sham thabs gsol/ chos gos dang/ lhung khrod bsnams nas/ dag slong 'bum du tshang ba'i dag slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu byang chub sems ]
dpa' sams dpa' chen po shin tshumang pos bskor cing mdun du bdar taM/ lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ drang srong dang
nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ grul bum dang/ ma dogs dang/ srul po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong du mas mchod cing mngon par
bstod nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam gyis/ 'od zer bya/
ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu gtong/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong na rab tu dkrol/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bya ba khral gi khrig brgya stong du ma ni mngon
par ba sgrung/ gzugs dang kha dog drags pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngang pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ ngur pa dang/ gzhad dang/ tsa go ra dang/ rma bya dang/ tsasha dang/ ri
skags dang/ khu byug dang ka la bde dang/ kun la la sogs pa bya'i khyom po dum sgra snyan cing 'jam la yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma 'byin pas ni/ bar snang la lha bzhin du soso'i
patshang sa rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin/ lha'i rin po chas tshogs kyi kha dug pos kyi sod yongs shinge cha ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad kyang/ ba d+madang/ in+d+ra ni la
dang shal dang/ phyag gi yu ba can dag gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gzugs bzang dang/ dbang po'i tog dang/ rad rod can dang/ ba ku la dang/ lta tshun dang/ shAkya 'phal
la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gi lag pa gnyis na gtun 'dzin pa bzhin du thogs te/ sngos sbrul gyi snying po dang/ gor shire sha dang/ rma na lo dang daha ri dang
ma la ya dang/ tsan dan dmar po dang/ a ga ru la sogs pas bkang ba'i du ba ni 'thul/ phyogs so so nas lhags pa'i rgyal po dbang cha ba 3dbang rgya bar grags pa rnams
rta dang ba lang rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan cing ma zhon par khrid pa'i tshogs du ma dang/ shing rta dang/ dpung bu chung gis yongs su bskor cing/ 'phrang ba dang lda ldi mang po dang/ rin po tsho'i
'phrang ba lag na thogs shing sngon legasanas rkang gis 'gro'o// rta dang glang po cha lags par brgyan pa ma zhon pa khrid pa dag kyang rang gi stabs kyis mngon par 'gro zhing skad
yid du 'ong la snyan pa 'byin to// tshangs pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yas phyogs nas chod pa dang/ rim gro bsnyan bkur byed cing 'gro'o// g.yon phyogs nas ni lha'i
dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu dbang che ba/ dbang cha bar grags pa/ rgya che zhing rlabs che ba/ bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams lha'i cod pan bzang po dang/ gdu bu rgyan can dang/
0 @#/ rna cha dang/ gdu bu dang/ ma tog rna rgyan dang/ rin po che'i tsong tsong dang/ ma tog gi 'phrang bas lus brgyan cing gzugs ma ngon par snang bas/ lha'i
ma tog man+dA ra wa dang/ mdog mdzes dang/ ko pa da ra dang/ sku la ka dang/ kur pa ka dang/ tsam paka dang/ dong ka'i ma tog dang/ mya ngan 'tshang dang/ skya sar dang/ a ti
'tshoT lulag tu dang/ utu la dang/ba ku la dang/ mal la ka dang kun da dang/ ge sar dang/ pad+madang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkarapo dang/ dri mchog dang/ rin po che'i 'phrang ba
dang lta rin po che'i a ga ru dang/ shing rin po cha'i 'bras bu can dag lag na thogs shing sil snyan sna tshogs brgya stong ni shin tu drakrol/ gos bya ba ni g.yob cing a la la zhes ga
zha'i sgra dag ni 'byin/ mo tog gi char chen po ni rab tu 'babs shing/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ namakha'i ngos thams cad bar mtshams mad par gang bar 'khod/
rda ma tog dang/ sngos dang/ 'phreng ba dang 1 byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ rin po cha'i cha re rab tu 'bebs shing/ bcom ldan 'das chu dron yod pa'i sgo nas/ rgyal po'i khab/
la kyi grong khyer chen por gdugs tshod la gshegs so// de'i chos nyid 'di yin te// de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshags pas dus mkhyen nas// dpa' bo
a yon tan kun gyis ra ba brgyan pa// zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab snang mdzad cing// bcom ldan mi yi seng ge gshags par gyur// spyan ras gzigs dang mthu chen
don yod dang// spos kyi ba glang rin chen lag bzangs dang// rin chen tog dang 'byung dka'i dpa' bo dang// da dang gzhan dag rgyal ba'i zham ring byed// g.yas phyogs
na ni mi 'pham 'dug gyur to// de ming byams pa yon tan mtha' yas phyug/ khar du ma chod sangs rgyas 'gyur ba sta// bsod nams ya shas tshogs kyang rab tu rdzogs//
byams drang btang snyoms dga' bas lus bsgoms zhing// chos kyi bdag 'od chen po snying rje bskyed// yon tan mtha' yas thub dbang yon tan sams// bde gshegs thugs
rje can gyi zham ming byed// de yi rjes la bskal pa bzang po yis// blo gros chen po ldan pa ji snyed pa'i// sangs rgyas stong du bzhis ma tshang ba dag/ de dag gis kyang byams
pa mdun du brdar// gang ston rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir// bskal pa dag la rgyal ba mtha' yas mchod// zla ba mdzes pa'i 'od 'dra wa yi lus// zla 'od dpa'
bo yang ni mdun na 'dug snying rnga mchog gi g.yon phyogs 'dug pa ni// 'jam dpal bya ba brgya phrag mang po dang// dpa' bo rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mngon 'phags pa//

chen nyer la khor ma 'gags pa// ral pa can ni stong tshang ba dag/ nyan thos dge 'dun 'og tu thams cad kyang// dka' thub drag mchog rig byed chog shes// dmod pa 'dor
rgyadang phan 'dogs nus pa a// drang srong dul ba la sbyar 'dug par byed// zhi ba 'i yid dang dul ba'i yid rnams kyis// sangs rgyas 'jig rten skyon ma ma dun bdar to/

por bcas pa'i sa ang g.yos// lha dang lha min lto 'phya'i tshogs rnams kyang// ma tog bzang po dri mchog 'thor bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs

dma' na mthar mtho bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung ngo// ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul grangs man/ dpag tu mad pa gzhan dag kyang snang ngo//

'thor bar byed// la la gdu bu bzang po de 'thor te// khacig rin chen spus pa'i dpung rgyan 'thor// kha cig bdag cag sangs rgyas gyur/

dad gtsug gi nor bu mchog kyang 'thor// la la rin chen dra ba 'thor bar byed// sems can shin tu mi bzad sdug bsngal zhing// gtso ba rnam mang zug rngus zug pa/
yang 'dren pa skyes bu gtso bo dpal gyis ni// thams cad bde dang yang ldan par gyur// khu byug dang ni risags rma bya dang// de bzhin khrung khrung dang ni mtsho bya

ba'i sgra byung sa// gang gis snyan pa'i sgra skad de thob pa// de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi// sems can bya bas dga' ba'i sgra thos nas// thums cad/
rjes su mthun pa'i bzod thob ste// ma 'ongs dus na rgyal bar khyad 'gyur zhes// de dag kun la bder gshags lung yang ston// de yi dus na nyon mongs ma 'byung ste
chos kyi rgya la la thams cad ri mor bcas// de tsho 'dran pa'i sku khyad mthong nas ni// sangs rgyas la shas mchog la mos bskyed dwa// bdag cag nam zhig 'di 'dra'i/
mkhyan thob snyam// bsam pa mkhyen nas rgyal ba lung ston tu// bad bar gshags pa'i ba spu'i khung ra nas// 'od zer da ni stong phrag brgya yang byung// de las
lhags par gang+gA'i bya snyad de// de dag gi yang mtshan ma bzung mi nus// da tsho ldema'i 'od kyang mo snang skye// ma dang nor bu lha kun 'od kyang med// rgyulo ba grong khag

par/ sa las pad+mad+madag na stong phrag brgya// mdab ma bye ba stong ldan gtsang ma byung// 'dren pa grong khyar mchog tu gshags pa'i tsho// da na nyal nyil mgatsong mad
par gyur// grong khyer thams cad dri mchog bdug pa yi// spos ngad yid du 'ong ba kun nas ldang// grong dang srang rnams yongs su dag gyur tu// rdo dang gsog ma mad
cing spos chus btab// stobs bcu ldan pa'i bsod nams de 'dra ste// rnam pa sna tshogs ma rtog sil ma bkram// gnod sbyin brgya stong gtum por sams pa dag/

sams bdu rangs par gyur// nam tsho skyes bu mchog gi sku mthong nas// sems can thams cad dga' mgu rangs gyur pas// lha yi ma tog la yang yod mi sams//
de dag la ni ngo mtshar 'dzin pa mad// stobs bcu'i g.yas phyogs na ni tshongs pa ste// de bzhin g.yon na brgya byin lha yi rgyal// nam mkha'i dkyil na sgyu mas bya 'khod

a 'khyen bzhin du// grong khyer du ni bcom ldan spyan drangs gshags// sku lus dpe byad bzang pos rgyas pa ni// nam mkha' skar ma dag gis gang ba bzhin// nam mkha'/
la ni zla ba nya ba ltar// rgyal po'i lam na sangs rgyas lam ma bzhugs// nor bu rin chen rnam dag bzang po ni// nyes pa'i skyon bral rab tu sbyang bar byad// phyogs dang
phyogs mtshoms su 'ang 'od gtsang 'byung// de bzhin rgyal ba 'jig rten kun snang mdzad// lha dang lha min dag gis rgyal babaskor// mi yi gtso bo rgyal po'i khab tu gag
zhabs mthil sa la ra mo 'byin bzhin du// zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim du sangs rgyas gshegs// grong khyer mchog ni kun tu legs brgyan tu// rgyal mtshan bya ba phrag stong
rab tu bsgrung// da pha sa kun sos bzang rnam par byugs// yid 'od da bzhin dbyar gyi ma tog gtor// gang tshe bdar gshags gtam rnams ston pa na// mgon po grang
ba zhud ma la thugs brtswa 'i phyir// rgyal bas dar ni 'phrul pa rnam sprul te// de dag la yang sangs rgyas chos bzang ston// srog chags brgya stong dag gis da thos nas//
sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la son lam 'dabs/ gnam bdag 'di 'dra'i ya shas thob snyams// bsam pa mkhyen nas rgyal ba lung yang ston// gang gi rgyal ba mi dbang
spyan drangs pa// sbyin pa da ni mu mtha' med 'gyur ta// rAn mchog bsam gyis mi khyab des nyid ces// la la dag ni de la mos pa bskyed// la khor
ka ba dag na shin tu mthong dka' ba// skye dgu dag la phan mdzad thugs kyang brtsa// thugs rje can de bdag ga gis sang la yang// spyan drang snyam du la la soms kyang bskyod//
gal ba gam cog ga song 'dug cing// lus ni shin tu sdug cing mdzes par gyur// byang chub sems mchog dam pa brgyad nas ni// stobs khacu ldan la lha mi ma tog
'thor// la la zla mad sams mchog rab bskyod nas// ma tog tsam pa mdzes pa'i phrang ba dang// ati mug Da da bzhin dbyar gyi smos// dar gyi lda ldi drag kyang la la 'ad/

skul la pad+ma dang ni ku mu da// ut+pal gsar gyi ma tog bzang po 'thor// la la rin chen ma tog das 'thor to// la la tsan dan phya ma 'bor bar khyad// 'don pa grong
tsar mchog tu gshigs pa'i tshe// ngo mtshar dpag tu med pa rnams kyang 'byung// mtshungs mod de dag brjod par mi nus te// sangs rgyas ye shes skya bo du mas bkod/

bzang// yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyas soms dga' ste// de kun mi dbang nga ston cing zho bar lhags// gnod sbyin rgyal po mthu lhan ir/

de dag mchod pa khyen/ lha dang lha min klu dang gnod sbyin rgyal// lta bas rtag tu chog par yong mi 'gyur// sngon gyi srid par 'jig rtan mgon po yis// sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la
mchod mchog byas// bsod nams 'bras bu smin pa de 'dra sku// skyes bu mi dbang lta bas ngoms mi myong// rgyal bas sangs rgyas zhing du 'od btang ste// lhun po de bzhinarab
lhan khor yug ra , ]/kha ba can gyi ri dang sbos ngar ldan// dag rgyal ba'i 'od la sgrib pa mad// sangs rgyas zhing 'di'i rgya mtsho ji yod pa// de dag de tshe sa dang 'dra bar gyur//
sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad kun tu yang// ma tog dag kha gas gtor cing mnyam par gyur// bod bar brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag/ chos kyi rgyal po'i zhabs kyi mthil nas byung//
sems can dmyal ba thams cad bsal bar gyur// sdug bsngal mad par byas nas bad ba myong// dar ni stobs bcu ldan pas chos bshad pas// lha dang mi
ma mag kyang rnam par dag/ srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa rnams// thams cad sangs rgyas shes nges par gyur// 'dran pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa na// bdar/
gshags cho 'phrul mang po bdag gis ni// bskal pa bya bar brjod du mi sla ste// rgyal ba bder gshegs 'gro ba thams cad dga'// bder gshags yon tan de dag dang ga med
da/mi mchog yon tan rab kyi pha rol phyin// yon tan khyad par kun gyi pha rol son// sangs rgyas bsod nams zhing la mgos phyag 'tshal/ 'grong khyer du gshags pa'i
la bu ste bcu pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim gyi srung du byung ste// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du gshegs so///
rgyu gshogs nas gdan bshams pa labazhugs so// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun drang/ rag slong gi dge 'dun kyang so sor gar 'os pa'i stan la 'khod do// de nas zla 'od gzhon
nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dag bdun dang/ dag slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas/ mchon yon chen po rims kyis gsol tu/ zhal zas
ro brgya dang ldan pa bzang zhing mang ba'i bza' pa dang/ bca' ba dang/ ldag pa dang/ bzhib pa dang/ btung ba rnams bdag nyid kyis gsol cing bdar ta/ bcom ldan 'das bshos
gsol nas/ lhung bashrad bzhag ste/ phyag bcabs par rig nas/ ras bcos bu phrugs bya ba stong phrag brgya ri ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol to// byang chub sems
dpa' de dag dang/ dag slong ba dge 'dun la yang so sor chos gos sum phrugs su phul nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
lha'i ma tog man rdzas gtor ta/ mchod cing mngon par bsod nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'drab 'i
tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod do// skyas pa mad cing 'gag med pa// sku lus mi mnga' bsam mi khyab// gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs// yon tan/
rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo shes rab mchog gas bskud// thabs dang stobasakyi snul kyang mnga'// sangs rgyas nam mkha' 'dra ba stsa/ 'bazod mthar phyin la phyag
'tshal lo// dran pa nye bar gzhug pa bzhugs pa'i spyod yul taM// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzim mal rab tu dga' dang bde// btung bar ting nge 'dzin te bshos su bsam
gtan mchog/ stong nyid dgon par gnas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal bas thugs rje bstan pas na// gzugs kyi sku yang ston par mdzad//
[F ]sems can dag la thugs brtswa 'i phyir// btung dang bshos kyang gsol bar gda'// a ma sangs rgyas khas ma ma khyag/ 'jig rtan kun gyi 'dren pa ste// 'jig rtan ba da na
zlo khyon mchod nas// mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu mchi// ma mnyamamanyam pa'i mgon gcig pa la da skad bstod// gzhon nu yid kyang rab tu dga' gyur tshig sas pa// sangs rgyas
mtshungs med bsam yas sku mnga' bshos gsol bras// lha yi lha khyod bzhin du bdag cag sangs rgyas gyur// da ltar zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'a das la lha'i
zhal zas ro brgya pa ni bzhes par gsol/ lharin bza' rin gtang mad pa phrugs kyis ni sku la gsol/ lha'i ma tog mnA ras ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod/ tshul dang 'dra
rgyu ba'i tshigs su bcad pas ni mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thol mo sbyar to/ bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas zhu ba zhus pa/
byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas ca spyad na// rtag tu chos rnams rang bzhin rab tu 'tshal// mkhas pa bgyi ba dag la ji ltar 'jug/ bgyi bar 'jug pa 'dren pas bstan
ba ba du gsol// 'dren pa skye ba dran pa ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar mang la dag tu yang yong mi skye// ji lta buran la khor rnams mi phyad 'gyur// de la ji ltar spobs pa mtha' yas 'gyur//
samasacan kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen// chos rnams kun la mngon par mkhyen pa 'jug/ rkang gnyis gtso bo brel gyis mi non pa/ gzhu ba zhu yi bdag la lung ston cig/ chos
kyi rang bzhin dngos mad rab mkhyen la// brjod du mad pa tshig tu brjod pa mdzad// sang gis rtsa rnams ji ltar 'pham bgyis pa// mu stags can la'ang sangs rgyas de bzhin te/
sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab mkhyen cing// chos rnams kun la'angs shas rjes su 'jug/ 5shas chags mad spyod yul yongs su dag/ chos kyi mnga' bdag bdag la de lung ston//
'das pa mkhyen cing ma 'ongs de bzhin te// da ltar 'di na ci mchis pa yang mkhyen// dusagasum la ni ya nas thogs mar 'jug/ de phyir bdag zhu shAkya sang ga la// dus gsum
ldan pa'i rgyal ba'i chod nyid na// chos kyi rgyal pos chos nyid rab tu mkhyen// rang byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas// de phyir bdag zhu ya shas rgya mtsho la// khyod la 'khrul pa'i chos
ni ci yang mad// de bas khyod kyi sems pa ma lus spangs// bdud spangs thab gti mug rab tu bsud// mi dbang bdag la byang chub spyod pa ston// chos kyi mtshan nyid ci 'drar rgyal
[p]/ 'bas mkhyen// chos kyi mtshan nyid de 'dra bdag la ston// bdag gis mtshan nyid de 'dra'i chos rtogs nas// mtshan nyid de 'dra'i byang chub spyod pa spyad//
sems can sbyod pa mi mthun mtha' yas pa// ji ltar spyod pa spyad pa 'jug pa lags// gang thos sems can spyod pa 'tshal 'gyur pa// spyod la 'jug pa bdag de la bshad du gsol
lci mtshan nyid mi mthun chos kyi rang bzhin ma tshon ngo bo nyid stong rang bzhin rnam dag pa// byang chub sams dpas ji ltar mngon sum 'gyur// chos kyi tshul rnams bdag la bstan du
gsol// 'di la chos rnams kun gyi pha rol phyin// bstan pa'i tshig kun la yang shin tu ma khas// the tsom ma ma nga' nam nur thatsom chod// bdag la sangs rgyas byang chub bstan du
gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i soms kyi rtog pa sems kyis mkhyen nas/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu
byang chub sems dpagasams dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na/ yon tan 'di dag rab tu 'thob// myur du bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs
par 'tshang rgya'o// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyide shes pa yin no// gzhon nu ji ltar na byang
ba chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes shi na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thams cad ming med cing ming dang bral
bar rab tushas so// chos thams can sgra mad pa// tshig gi lam dang bralab/ yi ga dang bral ba skya ba dang bral ba/'gog pa dang bral ba/ rgyu dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa/ rgyan dang mtshan nyid
mi mthun ba/ dban pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ltasta/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa// mtshan nyid dang bal te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa// bsam pa dang bral ba/ yid dang
khral bar rab tu shes so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// chos rnams bstan pa gcig po ni// chos rnams thams cad mtshan
nyi de med// yang dag ji bzhin rab mkhyen pa// shes rab mchog gis bshad pa yin/ 'di lta bur ni chos bstan rnams// byang chub sems dpa' sus shes pa// mdo
snga bya ba bab ston kyang// de la byang chub rgyun 'char mad// 'dren pas byin gyis brlabasapas na// yang dag nyid kyi tha' ang shas// yang dag mtha' de rangashas na//
ra la ci 'ang bshad pa mad// gcig gis kyang ni thams cad shes// gcig gis kyang ni thams cad mthong// ji snyad mang por bshad na yang// de la drags pa sku ba med/
[v]// chos rnams thams cad bdag mad par// de ltar samasakyis das brtags shing// mang du bstan pa bslabs pa na// yang dag nyid du tshoge kyangs///
[r ]sgra dbyangs gang dag ci b+bos pa// de la sngon gyi mtha' shos te// sgra ya sngon gyi mtha' shes nas// sgra dgags na de ma 'phrogs// sgra a sngon mtha' ji 'dra bar// chos rnamA
blo mtshan nyid de bzhin te// chos rnams de ltar rab shes na// mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// chos rnams thams cad mi skya zhing// 'byung ba mad par rab tu shus// bstan pa
'di ni rab shes na// rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur// nam zhig skye ba dran gyur na// da tshe bya ba dag la 'jug/ cu ba dag la zhugs pa yo de/ 'khor rnams shin tu mi phyad 'gyur//
doltar chos rnams stong par ni// byang chub sems dpa' sus shes pa// des ni gang yang mi shes mad// 'di ni ci 'ang mad pa'i mtha'// tsi yang med pa'i mtha' la yang/
byas pa dag gis ci dag brtagis// bskal pa byabar de dag ra// yang dang yang du 'khor bar gyur// ji ltar 'dren pas mkhyen pa bzhin// gal te de dag rtog rig na// dra la/
sdug bsngal ma spyi sa// ngan 'gro rnams su 'ang da ma 'gro// so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis// de ltar tshul 'di ma shes pas// gang du chos rnams 'gag pa yi// 'di 'dra'i
chos rnams spong bar byed// chos kun chud pa med par ni// chos kyi 'du shes gang byung ba// de lta bu yi 'du shes de// 'du shes de ltar rig par gyis// rnam par shes
dang 'du shus su// byis pa drag gis 'di brtags te// brtags pa yi ni chos rnams la// mkhas pa 'di ni rmongs mi 'gyur// stong pa rtog pa mad pa'i chos// 'di ni
mkhas pa'i sa yin te// 'di la byis pa'i spyod la med// sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod yul lo// zhi ba stong pa 'babastan pa// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa// 'di ni sangs
rgyas sras spyod pa// sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyan yin no// 'di ltar byang chub sams dang ba dag/ bag chags rab tu sbyangs gyur pa// da dag gzugs kyis mi 'phrog gas te///
sangs rgyas rigs la de dag gnas// chos rnams thams cad gnas med de// de dag la ni gnas yod min// gang gis de ltar gnas shes pa// de la byang chub rnyed mi dka'
sbyin dang tshul khrims thos rang bzod// bshes gnyen bzang po bstan byas nas// bya ba 'di dag rnam rig na// byang chub myur nu de 'tshang rgyu// da la lha klu rtag tu bkur ste byad[']
gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phya driwa dang// nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po thams cad dang// mi 'am ci dang srin pos mchod pa khyod// sangs rgyas bya ba de yi snyan pa brjod// bskal pa/
@#// bya ba mang por mi chad par// chos bshad pa a bsngags pa brjod na yang// de yi mu mtha' brad bar nus mi 'gyur// khyung chub sems dpa' gang gis
[R ]stong shes pa// de ni srog chags bya ba'i don mang byed// shin tu das pa bakhor la chos ston te// thos nas dga' zhing ri mor bya ba spyod// de dag gis ni ye shes angs pa 'byung/
de phyir rgyal ba mi mchog mthong bar 'gyur// zhing rnams na yang bkod pa bzang po mthong// 'jig rten mgon po de la chos rnams ston// chos kun sgyu ma lta bur shes par gyis// ji
ltar bar snang rang bzhin stong pa ltar// de dag gi yang rang bzhin de 'drar shes// de ltar sbyod pa ci la'ang chags mi 'gyur// ma shes chags pa mad cing don byed cing// 'jig
rten na yang byang chub spyad mchog spyod// shes pas chos kun la'ang ra ba brtags te// de dag zhing rnams gzhan du sprul pa 'gyid// sprul pa de dag sangasargyus don byas nas//
ji ltar chos nyid bzhin du rang bzhin 'gyur// byang chub sams la mi gang gnas pa rnams// bsam pa ji bzhin don rnams chud par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rigs ni gnas par gang brtson
tshel pad ni rtag tu sangs rgyas byas pa gzo// rnam par 'bar ba'i lus dngarab ldan zhing// mtshan bcos sum cu rtsa gnyis de la 'byung// phan yon gzhan yang mang po mtha' mas pa
ting 'dzin mchog la spyod pas thob par 'gyur// rtag tu mi sprul stobs kyang che bar 'gyur/ da ya gzi brjid rgyal pos mi bzod de// mkhas pa su dag sogs sangs rgyas chos spyod pa/ ]/byad/
bzhin bzang zhing shin tu mdzes par 'gyur// bsod nams gzi brjid dpal gyis mngon 'phags te// lhas kyang de yi gzi brjid babod mi 'gyur// su dag byang chub soms la brtan
gnas pa// da ni rtag tu srog chags kun gyi bshus// sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni rab ston pa// de la nam yang mun pa med par 'gyur// sgra dang tshig lam bral brjod du mar//
nam ma khab tu bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin te// 'di lta bu yi tshul mchog rnam gi na/ de yi spobs pa dag kyang mi zad 'gyur// mdo sde dag ni brgya stong rab bshad kyang// sngon gyi
mtha' ma phra zhib rab tu shes// chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu phra shes pas// mkhas pa'i tshig ni rtag tu thogs pa med// rtag par tshul brgya dag la mkhas gyur cing// sgra dang ngas tshig
rnam pa mang la mkhas// las dang 'bras bu rnam smi nAngs pa ste// khyad par 'phags pa'i bye brag de 'drar 'gyur// mkhas pa bdag nyid chen po stobs bcu'i sras// ma tshong mad pa'i
stobs kyi shugs 'chang zhing// shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// da yodran pa rtag par yongs dag/ shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// yid du mi 'ong sku ni thos ma
ba// 'gyur// rtag tu snyan cing yid 'ong sgra song thos// de yi tshig ni rtag tu yid 'ong 'gyur// shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// dran dang blo gros shes
da rab rtogs dang ldan// de bzhin sams kyang rnyog ma da dang pa ra 'gyur// mdo sde brgya phrag du ma rab tu 'chad// yon tan 'di 'dra'i rang bzhin chos shes pas/
a go dang ni tshig rnams 'khyod la mkhas// tha dad pa yi sgra mang du ma shes// don dang tshig 'bru la yang mkhas par 'gyur// shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes
pas// lha dang mi dang klu 'brug stan pa dang// lha min lto 'phya mi 'am ci la yang// rtag tu sdug cing sad du bong bar gyur// shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas// 'khyung po
ya dgas srin po'i tshogs rnams ni// sha la khra ba shin tu mi bkrod pa// de dag nam yang do tshigs 'gas mi rgyan// mkhas pa de dag yangs pa'i gtam thos nas// shin tu dga'
zhing ba sku zing zhus khyod// sangs rgyas la yang dga' ba rgya cher sbyar// na dag bsam gyis ma khyab don chan 'thob da khad bar gshags pa'i chos mdzod 'di bzung ba'i/ bskal
a7 pa stong mang da yi bsod nams stobs// rab tu brjod kyang rdzogs par mi nus te// dpag tu mdang mtha' yas tshad med do// ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di bzung ba yis//
'das pa'i rgyal ba dpag chod thams cad dang// sangs rgyas ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu na// sangs rgyas gang bzhugs de dag de yis mchod// skyes bu la la bsod nams 'dod pas/
'dir// stobs bcu ldan pa'i thugs rjecan dag la// dga' ba dpag tu med pa bskyed nas ni// bskal pa mthu'i yas dpag med rim gro byas// skyes bu gnyis pa bsod
nams 'dod pa yis// don dam tshul 'di las ni tshigs bcad gracig/ phyi ma'i dus su gyur tsho'adzin pa ni// ra la snga ma'i bsod nams char ma phod// 'di ni sangs rgyas mchod/
pa rab mchog sa// phyi ma mi bzad dus su gyur pa'i tshe// 'di las tshigs bzhi'i tshigs bcad gcig thosanas/ 'dzin pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad mchod// de dag
rtag tu nad mchog legs pa rad// de dag grong gi khrus mchog legs pa zos// stobs bcu'i sras kyi thu bo dam pa ste// de yis rgyal ba mang po yun ring mchod// bya rgod phung
po'i ri 'a dir nga yang mthong// da drag sangs rgyas mkhyen la ngas lung bstan// mya ngan nga 'das nas ni byams pa yang// da tshod la lung yang ston par 'gyur// de bzhin sangs
rgyas tshe dpag med pa yang// nga yi bad btsand kun 'dong zhes// phan yon rnam pa du ma de la 'chad// mngon dga' der song sangs rgyas ma 'khrugs mthong/ khaskal ba brgya stong
dpag tu med pa yang// log par ltung ba la jigs pa yong ma 'byung// byang chub spyad pa mchog 'di spyod pa ni// rtag chu yid rab bde bar myong bar 'gyur//
[ ]/de phyir bya khrag 'di 'phags de 'dra ste// 'di ni rab tu bshad pa phan yon mchog/ so so'i tshig la nga yi rjes slobs la// phyi ma'i dus la mdo snga 'di zung shig/ mdo sde 'dzin
pa'i le'u ste bcu gcige pa'o////gzhon nu de la byang chub samasadapa' sams dpa lan pa gang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa de'i yon tan dang phan yon/
ra lta bur 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshags pa'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par snya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa ma yin pa rang/ mad pas mi skur to// de ci'i
phyir na na/ chos gang gis de bzhin gshags par rab tu dbye ba'i chos nyid de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shang/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas po rab tu shas so//
dbya'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ni mtha' yas ta/ bsam gyis mi khyab cung bsam pa dang bral bas na/ de dag bsam pa 'am dpag par mi nus so// dasu'o/
phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu sems kyi ngo bo nyide ni gzugs med pa bstan du mad pa sta/ gzhon nu de ltar sems kyi ngo ngo de gang yin pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid kyang da yin no//
ba sangs rgya sa kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang de yin no// de bzhin gshags pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyang//
yin te/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar yon tan thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid don cig tu bstan pa/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ni//
gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po yid kyis nges par brtag pa zhes bya ste/ 'byung ba la mkhas shing khams gsum las byung ba yang dag pa ji ltab bzhin du rab tu
shas so// ji lta ba bzhin du lta zhing log par me sba/ rnam pa gzhan dum s+sa/ ji skad sA ba de bzhin byed/ khams gsum la yang ma chags shing khams gsum las yang
dag par 'das te/ 'dod pa'is dang/ gzugs kyi sa dang/ gzugs med pa'i sa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sa dang/ mang gi sa dang/ sgra yi sa las 'das shing yi gra dang chos kyi
tshul la mkhas pa ya shas mi zad par bsgoms pas/ brjod du mar pa'i chos rtog pa yi ge la mkhas pa// yi ga dang tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ yig dang tshig
rab tu dbye ba rgyas pa shes pa la mkhas pa// chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa la mkhas pa yin te/ gtan la phab pa'i blo
dang ldan zhing/ bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi ris kyi la rnams kyis zil gyis mi non to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i/ lha dang mi'i sku dgu ston//
ka yongs su byang ba byas pa// khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bya ba brgya stong 'khyil ba'i gzungs dang/ sgrub pa med pa dang/ chos rnam par mthong ba'i bzod pa so sore thob nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag thams cad la/ bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
[ ]'tshang rgya ste/ thams cad kyang ming ni tha dad/ tsho'i tshad ni gsug par sangs rgyas kyi zhing so sor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes
lung bstan to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// byang chub sams dpa'i blo dang ldan pa gang// bla na med pa'i byang chub rang tshol zhing/ 'chos dang de bzhin don la mkhas pa ru//
chos kyi ngo bo nyid la spyod pa yin// yang dag ma yin pa yi tshig mi sA// sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag ci 'dra ba// rgyal ba rnams kyi chos ni da yin te// dpa' bo tha tsom
khral bas shin tu rig/ chos kun don gcig par ni rab shes te/ mgo gcig tu ni stong pa nyid yin pas// de dag la ni tha dad gyur pa mad// don gcig la ni shin tu
ma bslabs pa yin// rtag pa mad cing rnam rtog med pa dang// dmigs pa mad pas blo gros ldan par shes// zad pa dang ni mi zang 'a ru shasakyang// ma lus par ni thams cud rab
tu sbyangs// da ni chos sku mi yi seng ge la// stobs bcu ldan pa gzugs su mi lta zhing// da ni phyin ci log kun rab spangs pas// mtshan rnams su 'ang lta bar yong mi 'gyur
chos rnams 'di dag bsam mi khyab// bsam dang bral zhing rang bzhin zhi// de lta bu ni rab shes nas// rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas mthong// ji ltar bdag gi 'du shes/
rig/ de bzhin kun tu blo yang gtong// chos kun de yi rang bzhin te// rnam par dag pa nam mkha' bzhin// yid la bsams kyang 'byung ba madra// chos rnams thams cad
shas pas na// khams gsum las ni rnam par grol// da la smon lam 'debs pa mad// yang dag ji bzhin du ni mthong gyur cing// ma leg tshig sa rnam pa gzhan mi sa//
na yi tshig dang brjod pa thams cad kyang// rgyal ba dag gi mthu yis 'byung bar gyur// 'dod pa'i sa dang nyon mongs sa rnams dang// gzugs dang gzugs mar lasakyang
shin tu 'da'// chos rnams la ni yid kyang ma chags shing// rab tu dga' bas 'gro la phan par spyod// ming gis las 'das shing sgra yang bshos// ngo bo nyid kyis gsog
wa @#// tu gyur pa sta/ ji sade tsam du yun ring brjod na yang// de la gnas par byed pa lodam yin// 'du shes rab tu rgyu ba med// lta ba log pa kun nas/
[n ]zar blo yang shin tu gtan la bab// brtan pa nam mkha' 'dra bar spyod// gal tu bdud bya khral khrag rnams/ das sams dkrugs phyar 'ongs kyang// bdud rnams
thams cad zil mnan te// de yi dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur// bdud kyi rgya mo rnam spangs te// tshul khrims yongs dag gdung ba mad// bsam gtan dag na bad la mos// 'dra/
rtan stong par rab tu shes// 'jig rten phung por smras pa yang// da drag stong par rab tu rig/ skya ba mad cung 'gag mad pas// chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' bzhin//
de dag bdag nyid gtong byed kyi// stobs bcu'i tshul khrims thos mi gtong// da ni tshul khrims pha rol phyin// gar son par yang skyo bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par
'gro// sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po mthong// mtho ris dag ni mi 'dod de// smon lam rnams ni yong mi gtong// chos nyid dag ni da spyod tshe// skad cig brtson 'grus nyams
ma byan// phyogs bcu yan sangs rgyas kyis// da ni shin tu bstod pa yin// de phyir gzhon nu ting 'dzin las// chos 'di dag ni rab thob nas/ (shis kyi kha ni rnam sbyong la/
skya bo khang la chos rab ston// sangs rgyas yon tan mang ldan pa// rang 'byung 'gyur bar gang 'dod pa// dag pa 'di la rab bslabs nas// stobs bcu 'chang ba sangs rgyas
gyur// ting nga 'dzin rjes su slob pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o////ra nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na/
gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ ting nga 'dzin nges par bstan pa/
la mkhas par bya'o// gzhon nu de la ting nga 'dzin nges par bstan pa gang zha na/ gang chos thams cad kyi ji lta ba bzhin nyid dang mnyam pa nyid mi mnyam pa mad pa dang/ mi rtog
pa rnam par mi rtog pa/ rnam par ma bsgrubs pa// kun nas slong ba mad pa/ skya ba mad pa/ 'gog pa mad pa// rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang/ kun tu rtog pa yongs su chad pa
sams kyi dmigs pa med pa// yid la byed pa mad pa/ rnam par rig pa yongs su chad pa/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug yongs su chad pa// mtha' mar pa/ mthar yar
la khyad pa dang bral ba/ yid la byed pa yongs su chadad// phung po dang khams dang/ skya mchad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa/ dran pa dang/ blo gros dang// rtogs pa dang/ khrel yod pa dang/
brtan pa dang/ cho ga dang/ spyod yul dang/ nan tan gyi gnas su gyur pa// nyon mongs pa med pa'i sa/ zhi ba'i sa/ sbyos pa thams tsad yongs su chad pa/ byang/
chub sams dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa/ ra bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ni/ gzhon nu ting ga lar bstan
(pa zhes bya sta/ byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po ting nga 'dzin ngas par bstan pa 'di la gnas pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin dang ma bral ba yin// sam ni 'khrub mad pa yin/
snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing/ sems can drapag tu med pa'i don byed pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// ting 'dzin mnyam pa
[% ]mad pa'i sa// shin tu mthong dka' phra zhing zhi/ 'du shes thams cad bcom pa sta/ da phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya// rtog pa med cing rnam rtog med// gzung ba mad tsang
bstan du med// sams kyang dmigs pa mad pa ste// da phyir ting nga 'dzin cas bya// nam zhig mnyam par gzhag gyur te// chos kun la ni rlom sams mad// rlom sams
@# mad pa ji bzhin pa// da ni ting nge 'dzin cas bsgrags// chos ni rdul tsam yong mad de// rdul nas bya ba'ang yong ma yin// chos rnams dmigs su mad pa sta// na phyir
ting nge 'dzin ces bya// sams kyi dmigs pa med pa yang// de ni rnam par rtog ces bya// chos da rnam par ma brtags pa// de ltar ting 'dzin shes par gyis// sgra yis
don rnams rab bstan te// sgra de nyid kyang dngos po mar// sgra ni brag cha lta bu ste// bar snang dag gis nam mkha' bzhin// chos 'di rnams ni mi gnas te/ 'di dag la ni
gnas mi dmags// ma gnas pa ni gnas kyi sgrar// ngo bo nyid kyis mi rAd do// 'gro zhing 'chi'aphor brjod pa yi// dalta bu yi 'gro ba mad// 'gro ba mad pa 'gro ba'i
gas// ting nge 'dzin du da phyir gsungs// mnyam gzhag ma yin de ni rlom sems brjod// mnyam gzhag 'di ang rlom sams gnyis pa ste// rlom sams madra par byang chub
rig par spyod// dran pa rlom samasamad pa byung chub mchog/ mnyam dang mi mnyam zhi ba sangs rgyas sa// zhi gnas lhag mthong mtshan mad 'di yin te/ 'azhi ba sangs rgyas
sa 'di bstan byas nus// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la da brtson yin// don gyi rnam pa rig pa 'jug pa la// yi ga dwag gis 'jug par mi nus te// sgra dbyangs thamasanyid rnam
par spangs nas na// mnyam par gzhag 'gyur de la rlom sams med// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ting 'dzin 'ad// ji ltar bshad bzhin gnas shing brtson byed na/
gal te zhing 'di bskal pas tshig gyur kyang// re mchog dbus su zhugs pas mas ma tshig/ bskal pa brgya phrag mang por rab bsragasakyang// nam mkha'
sngan chad nam yang ma tshig bzhin// chos rnams nam mkha' mtshungs par rnam rig pas// de ni ma yi nang du yong mi 'tshir// gal tu sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'bar gyur la// 'bar
ba 'di dag ma lus zhi shig ces// ting 'dzin gnas nas smon lam 'di btab na// sa rnams zhig kyang de la 'gyur ba med/ 'di na rdzu 'phrul stobs kyang mtha' yas 'gyur//
'tsha nam mkha' la yang thogs pa mad par 'gro/ rdzas su bstan bzhin ting 'dzin gnas pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'di dag myong// skya zhing 'chi'aphor de 'gyur yang//
skya ba med cing 'chi ba po mad// gang gis de ltar rnam rig pa// de la ting 'dzin rlud mi dga'/ 'chi 'pho skya ba mad par na// 'jig rten mgon pos rab tu bshad// da ltar
'jig rten mgon rig nas// da phyir ting nga 'dzin kyang rig/ 'jig rten gyis ni mgos shing// 'jig rten chos la mi chags te// lus ni thogs pa med par yang// sangs rgyas
zhing du 'gro bar khyad// zhing dag na ni 'jig rtan 'dren// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu mthong// sangs rgyas dag gis zhing bshad pa// chos rnams de dag dar yang nyan//
sad la mi shes long mad de// chos kyi dbyings kyang rab tu 'chad// chos kyi rnam par rtag tu reg/ ra ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul// bskalapa bya bar 'chad ston kyang// de yi slobs/
ba zad mi 'gyur// byang chub sams dpa'o khazhan mang ngo// mkhas pa dag kyang sprul par byed// byang chub sams dpas sbal pa ni// pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa la// dkyil
mo krung bcas 'dug pa dag/ zhing nas zhing du 'gro bar byed// ting 'dzin zhi ba bsgoms nas ni// gzugs dang mdo sde bzang po dang// ma do sta gzhan yang bya ba dang// sangs
rgyas byang chub rab tu ston// sems can mang po bsam mi khyab// phyir mi ldog pa 'god par byed// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ston kyang// spobs pa dag ni zad mi 'gyur// rin
chen rnam par brgyan pa yi// khang pa brtsigs zhugs du 'gro ste// dri dang ldan pa'i ma tog gis// 'dren pa la yang mngon par 'thor/ dadri dang ldan pa'i phya mas kyang//
'dren pa la ni rab tu 'thor// da dag thams cad byang chub phyir// rgya che ba yi mchod pa byad// byang chub sams dpal skyob pa yi// yon tan dpag med de dag ni/ nam zhig/
nyon mongs mad gyur pa// de tshe rdzu 'phrul de dag 'thob// nyon mongs dag ni mi skya zhing// dag pa dang ba 'od gsal ba// mi 'khrugs 'dus ma byas pa ni// byang chub sems
[s ]// dpa'i spyod yul lo// rab tu zhi zhing chab r zhi// nyon mongs med cing mya ngan bral// spros mar rnam par ma spros pa// sngos pa dag las shin tu 'dres//
mi ga'i spyod pa mad pa ni// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid de// dbyangs kyis rig par dka' bas na// de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya// zad mi shes shang nya bar zhi// lhun gyis/
'grub cing bstan mad pa// rtog med yang dag nyid kyi mtha'// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul 'a// 'ong dang 'gro ba mad pa dang// spros med lhun gyisagrub pa yi// chos rnams kun/
gyis rang bzhin ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bslab pa ste// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bod bslabs nas// yon tan dag ga pha rol phyin// tshu rol dang ni pha rol mar// sngon mtha'
rnam par ma brtags te// de phyir sangs rgyas de dag kun// yon tan dag gi pha rol phyin// 'ong dang 'gro nga mad pa dang// sngos mad lhun gyis 'grub pa yi// chos kyi rang
bzhin macan nas ni// da dag de las pha rol phyin// ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// klo'ags pa ting nga 'dzin gyi
rgyal po'i mdo// bam po lnga pa/// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
gtsugs ta/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das
da bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid/ byang chub sams dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i ting nga
'dzin bstan pa legs par bshad pa ni ngo mtshar to// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring por bslab pa 'di la bslabs nas/ bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
yang dag par bsgrubs pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs so// bdAbar gshogs pa bdag stobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu da'i dus la
dbab par shas na khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la skabs phya nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du tshul dang 'dra ba'i gA
su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do// 'dod dang khro bas rtag tu zil non cing// sdug bsngal gtsos pa'i sems can gakhrigs nas ni// skye dgu thar byed sangs rgyas gyur cig ces//
byang chub phyir ni khyod kyis sams kyang bskyad// dpa' bos bskal pa bye ba mang spyad de// sbyin dang dul dang lags sdom rtag tu gnas// bzod dang tshul khrims de bzhin brtson 'grus ngas
sbyin pa dag kyang mtha' yas rgya cher byin// rkang lag dngan srog kyang rab gtong zhing// khyod kyi yid la nam yang skyon med do// gsar dngul de bzhin bu dang/
chung ma dang// chags mad gyur nas rgyal po srid kyang gtong// khyod kyi tshul khrims dri mar rnam dag ste// bdag nyidagatong zhing tshul khrims yong mi 'dral// lus dang ngag dang yir
(kyang rab tu bsdams// bder gshegs sams dul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bzod la dgyes shing bzod pa'i lam la gnas// lus ni dum bur byas kyang 'khrugs mad da/ khyams
ba bsgoms pas de las 'o ma 'gas// bdar gshags ngo mtshar khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs bcu dag gi stobs dang ldan gyur zhing// chags mar ya shos gnas pas chos kun
rtogs// thugs rjes 'jig rten phran mdzad chos kyi rje// skye dgu 'di yi don bzhed thugs brtse ba// stong par mkhyen cing 'di na sems can mar// de bzhin 'jig rtan lam stor
gzigs nas ni// da dag rang bzhin bdag mad chos rtogs bgyis// rnam grol skyes kyang gang na'ang rnam grol mad// so sor rtogs te bag mar thams cad sbyangs// bdud sde
@#/mtha' yas stobs dang ldan pa bcom// ye shes mtha' yas byang chub rgya cher mkhyen// mchog tu rnam par zhi ba'i chos kyang ston// zla ba skar mar bcas pa'i gnam lhung zhing//
ba ra dang grong du bcas pa'i sa gzhigs la// nam mkha' 'ams ni rnam par gzhan gyur kyang// khyod bden pa ya tshigs mi gsung// skya dgu dmigs pa dag la dga' ba dang// sams
can sdug bsngal khyod kyis gzigs nas ni// stong pa nyid dang zab cing zhi ba yi// dmigs pa med pa dag ni ston par mdzad// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// mi dmigs pa
mi bslob pa la// dpa' bo chen pos bslabs pas na// khyod la 'khrul pa yod mi mnga'// ji lta bu yi chos bslabs pa// de lta bu yi chos ston tra// mu stags gzhan
dag ji snyad dang// byis pa drug gi sa 'di min// bdag tu 'du shesagang gnas pa// mi mkhas de dag 'khrul par 'gyur// chos rnams bdag mad rig pas na// khyod la 'khrul
ba yong mi mnga'// dpa' bo chen po ang da gar/sungs// yang dag chos la rab tu gnas// mgon po yang dag bden gnas te// yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung// khyod kyis
son lam btab pa bzhin// khyod kyi yang dag spyod pa byung// yang dag na yi rgyu 'dra bas// yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung// yang dag spyod pa phun sum tshogs// yang dag
mtha' la shin tu bslabs// yang dag bsam pa ang dge spyod/ yang dag mkhyon la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyi shes rab mnyam pa mad// ya shos gsung ba 'od mdzad pa//
ya shis khyad par rab bar s shing// ye shes gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis byams pa rab bsgomasate// sems can kun gyi ba shas gnyan khyor/ seb
bzhin du ma skul to// mi g.yo rab tu gnas pa po// ston pa'i 'khor skyogs rgya chayang// tshogs mangs dag kyang sdud pa mdzad// shes rab zab mo bad bar gshags//
'khor gyi nang gi shags sgra yang sgrog/ sangs rgyas song ga'i sgra sgrogs shing/ gsang ga'i skabs su rnam par gshags// khyod kyis mu stags kun btul ba/ sang ga yis ni wa
rnams bzhin// dpa' bo ma dul dul mdzad pa// ma dul ba dag khyod kyis btul/ de dag mdza' sdug brtan gyur to// dbyer mi phyed nying legs par gnas// lta ba sna tshog
gnas pa yi// sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni// sdug dang mi sdug mad pa yi// bdag mad chos ni khyod ston Ni// ma bslabs pa yi byis pa dag/ leg pa'i lam la
spyod pa rnams// 'dren pa gang nasagshegs pa yi// lam yaMng khyod kyis rab tu bstan// bdag tu 'dzin la su gnas pa// de dag sdug bsngal nyid la gnas// gang la sdug
@#khasngal med pa yi// bdag mod de dag mi shas so// 'khrul pa med pa'i chos tshig khyod ston to// khyod la 'khrul pa mi rAd 'jig rten mgon// khyod ni ma log pa yi tshig gsung stad
ba sdug bsngal mang bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// lha klu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig phrag/ brgya stong mang po mkha' la bkod pa rnams// bcom ldan 'das kyi don ldan gsung thos nas
thams khung 'dran la rab tu dga' ba skya// tshig ni rab tu snyan cing bzang la 'thad// mnyan zhing 'jam la yid 'ong dus dang 'byor// gsung gi yan lag dpag tu mar dang ldan//
phan bya da skya bo mang po thar byed pa// sal snyan brgya stong dpag tu med pa drang// lha yi dbyangs sgra dga' bar 'gyur ba'i mchog/ shin tu snyan pa dus cig 'byor gyur kyang// kha
gshags gsung cig gis ni zil gyis non// khu byug bya mang badzam pa'i sgra 'byin dang// ku nal shin tu yid 'thad dbyangs snyan dag bya tshogs mang po thams cad sgra 'byin pa//
sangs rgyas gsung gi char yang des mi phod// lha yi bu mo sgra dbyangs snyan pa dag/ sil snyan rol mo glu dbyangs 'jam pa dang// pi wang rdza ra rnga chan dung gi sgra// da dag sangs
rgya sa gsung gi char mi phod// khu byug ni tsi ri skags sgra rnams dang// khrung khrung rma bya mi 'am cu yi sgra// sgra dbyangs yid 'ong snyan pa su yod pa/ de dag sangs rgyas gsung gi
char mi phod// snyan ngamanyan la yid 'ong dga' ba dang// shin tu mnyan la ra' bsngags zhi ba'i tshig/ dbyangs rnams thams cad dus gcig bsgrags pa bas// de bzhin gnag
kha'i gsung mchog dag gyur yin// lha mi mi dbang lha ma yin rnams dang// srid gsum sems can mtha' dag u yod pa// 'od byad rnams kyi 'od snang/
da dag ni// bar gshwags 'od zer gcig gis zil gyis gnon// bad ga gas skun ma tog rgyas pa bzhin// mtshan rnams kun gyis sna tshogs spras shing brgyan// bsod
