(nams rgyas 'grub dag cing rnam par dang// rgyal ba'i sku ni 'jig rten kun tu lhan/ dung gi sgra dang 'khar rnga sgra snyan dang// rnga sgra de bzhin kim pa la yi sgra// rab tu 'jam zhing
la 'thad pa'i sgra de kun// sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod// sil snyan bya ba khrag khrig stong gi sgra// sgra skad gsal zhing mnyan pa lha yi 'dra// lha dang lha mo'i sgra dbyangs
dgar 'gyur de// sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya ma char ma bod// khrung khrung bya dur pa khu byug dang// dang pa kun l rnam mang bya yi tshogs// de dag sgra gnyan dus gcig tshogs pas
kyang/ sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya char mi khod/ klu dang gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye dang// lha dbang tshangs pa lha yi bdag po'i sgra// srid gsum yid 'ong 'thad pa'i yo da kha/
ri dag sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char mi bod// tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha yi dbang po dang// rtim dang ni nor bu rin chen 'od kun gyi 'od ni rnam pa du ma dag/ 'od kun rgyul bo'i
'od kyis khril gyi non// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang shin tu rnam par dag/ ma nas dag pa srid pa gsum na gros pa med// mi dbang yon tanadabyig tshogs yon tan rin chan mnga'//
rang 'byung yon tan thams cad kyis ni mnyam med mnyam// de ltar stobs bcu bdan pa gsung la bsod nas ni// gzhon nu yid kyang rab tu dga' bas tshig sbas pa// sangs rgyas
gzhal med dpag yas la ni mchod pa yis// shAkya thub bzhin bdag kyang sangs rgyas gyur cig swA/ badra bar gdags pa de yi spyod pa mchog mkhyan nas/ mi dbang chags mod/
ya shas mnga' ba 'a dzum pa mdzod// stobs bcu sras kyi thu bo byams pas da zhus te// 'dran nges gang gi slad du 'di ltar 'dzum pa mdzad// sa 'di dag kyang rnam pa drug tu yongs su
g.yos// lha dang klu rnams mkha' la 'a dug byang ra ba dag la sku// shin tu sams rang mgu bas sangs rgyas lta zhing mchis// bde gshegs zil gyis mnon de dag lung bstan gsol//
skyes bu mchog gi ya shos gang la zhugs pa ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag gis ma lags// rgyal ba khyod kyis gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad pa// ye shes rnam dag dpa
mad ya shas ma lus gsungs// shAkya'i sang ga stobs bcu mnga' zhing rnam 'dren pa/ rkang gnyis gtso ngo sa ya nas kyi 'ang pha rol phyin// 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang tha ba gti mug
sal du rab tu 'od snang mdzad pa khyod la zhu ba lags// byang chub dam pa mchog 'di rab tu tshol ba'i phyir// 'dran pas bskal pa gang+gA ya na bya sAd dang// de las
lhag par yang ni spyad pa rab tu spyad// gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di mdzad bstan du gsol// ma shes dam pa mchog 'di rab tu tshol ba'i phyir// ston pas phyag dang zhabs kyang/
yongs su gtang ba mdzad// sras dang btsun mo gzhon bshes rtsa lag yangs pa btang// sgrub pa 'dzum pa bstan pa 'a dii rgyu gang lags// rta dang ba glang dang ni shing rta rkang thang drang//
'a khran dang nor bu dngul dang mu tig khyod kyis btung// spyod pa mchog spyod tsho ni khyod kyis ma btang ba// rin po che dang nor rdzas dag ni ba gang Ang mad// srid pa gsum na yo shas dag ni
mchog tu gyur// sems can thams cad kyi ni spyod pa rab tu mkhyan// sams dang khams dang mos pa dag la'ang mkhas shing rir// gang ga don du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan pa mdzad/
mi yi gtso bo lan gang gis mchod// gang gi don du rgyu cha yangs par 'gyur// spyod pa 'di yang su dag rab tu 'dzin// khrub pa gang yi don du 'dzum 'di bstan// sa yang rnam
pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// pad+ma bya ba 'dab ma bya bar ldan 3/ gsar gyi pad+ma shin tu 'od gsal ba// mngos shang yid du 'thad pa sa la sa khyung// byang chub sems dpa' rdzu
mtha'aphrul rab rib// rgyal ba'i thugs kyi sras po dra la mchis// chos sla ba yang mang po 'ding mchis te// 'dren pa la ni ra yi slad du zhu// rnga dung dung dang khar rdzasgyu chen dang// sal
snyan bya pa khrag khrig brdungs pa yi/ du dug sgra ni nam mkha' 'di las gde'i bde bar gshags pa'i dbyangs ni bsam mi khyab// khrung khrung ngang pa ka la ping+ka dang// khu byug
bya tshogs mang po 'dus pa yi// sgra dbyangs rab tu snyan pa khyung ba yang// de dag sangs rgyas dbyang sakyi char ma yod// gang gis sbyin dang dul dang legs sdom rnams// sngon
gyi bskal pa mang por bstan pa bgyis// gang gis ma yi gtso bo rab mchod na// su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan// ri mo lus pa mchog kyang bskyed nas ni// sangs
rgyas byang chub dzaltar thob 'gyur zhes// gang gis rkang gnyis gtso la sngon chad zhus// su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan// stobs bcu ldan pa ji snyad 'das pa dang//
da ltar byung dang ma byon bdagashogs dang// ma yi gtso bo thams cad rab tu mkhyan// ra phyir skye dgu'i don du zhu ba lags// srog chags kun gyi spyod yul mtha' yas dang//
mi rnams gang gi bsam pa ci 'dra dang// skya dgu'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyan// de phyi'i mi yi gtso bo zhu ba lags/ rgyu dang rigs pa 'dul la mkhas pa dag/ sangs rgyas ya
shas ji ltar thob snyam pa// spyod pa mchog la su dag spyod pa rnams// de phyir bdag na rkang gnyis gtso bo zhu// gang gis phra zhing shin tu blta dka'i chos//
stong pa zhi ba mtshungs med bsam mi khyab// stobs bcu ldan pa'i spyod yul bsgom pa rnams// de dag sur du 'dren pa bdag zhu'o// srog chags 'gro ba bsam yas kun gyi
phyir[Y, ](gang gis byams sam snying rje rab bsgomashing// rang la sems can 'du shes med pa dang/ gad phyir nang la nyis gtso la bdag zhu'o// gang dag ya shos mtshungs mod
yaM bsam mi khyab// de dag la ni bo lhung ba yang mad de// sams dang spyod yul dag gi pha rol phyin// de phyir mgon po la ni bdag zhu'o// tshul khrims ye shes yon tan pha rol phyin
dus gsum la ni ya shes mtshungs mod 'jug/ khyod la 'khrul pa rAg ni mi mnga' na// su i slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan// shA ri'i bu dang ma 'a la gags mo'u 'gal bu//
zla bad ga shogs nyan thos gzhan dag su mchis pa// 'di la da dag ya shas mi 'jug ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas spyod yul bla na med// chos rnams kun la dbang ba'i pha rol phyin//
bslab pa'i spyod pa kun gyis mngon par 'phags// 'dren pa thugs rje dag kyang rab brgyad la// don dam ma byon pa gsung sgra dbyung bar gsol// sngon gang bskal pa bya ba mang
ma por yang// skyabs dang dpung gnyi na mchog tu gyur snyam ste// de 'dra'i sams kyis rkang gnyis gtso dras pa// 'dren pas de a 'bras bu dang gsung shig/ gangazag chen pos/
lung bstan mnyan pa'i phyir// gnod sbyin srin po grul bum gsang pa po// rkang gnyis gtso bo la ni rab rtog cing// thams cad thal mo sbyar te gus par 'khod// sangs rgyas
zhing ni bya ba mang po nas// byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul ldan mang po mchis// bde gshegs sras kyi gtso bo thugs las skyas// thams cad thal mo sbyar tsang gus par 'khod//
shAkya sang ga ma mchog dra pa'i phyir// mi 'khrugs zhing phyogs 'jig rnon rnam grags pa// shar phyogs nas ra sbos kyi glang po yang// byang chub sems dpa'i khrag khrig mdun
ba der mchis// shAkya sang gi ma mchog dra ba'i phyir// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams mchog nas// mthu chen thob dang spyan ras gzigs dbang ang// byang chub sams dpa'
khrag khrig lhan cig mchis// gang dag stan chad bskal pa bya mang sAd// ya shas dam pa mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir// rgya mtsho kun gyi bya ma mnyam pa yi// bad gshags
dpar tu mad pa bstan bkur bgyis// sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod cing rab bsngags pa// chos rnams kun gyi yon tan pha rol phyin// 'a jig rten phyogs rnams kun tu rab
grags pa// 'jam dbyangs legs par thal mo sbyar te mchis// sa ngas rgyas zhing du khrag khril spyad bgyis kyang// 'a da bar rnams ni mthong ba na dka' ste//
lags bslabs sa ngas rgyas sras po yon tan can// thams cad thal mo rab sbyar gus par 'bod// ston pa kun gyi chos la sngon 'dzin la// mkhas pa 'dir mchis ci 'dra de lta
pa/ bu// snod du gyur pa 'di na gzhan ma mchis// 'a dran pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa gsungs// rgyal ba rnam 'dren gling gzhi ma mchis par// gang zag dam pa 'dzum pa mi
ston na// gang gi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan pa// rnga mchog sgra ldan gsung dbyangs 'byung du gsol// ngang pa khu khyug rma bya sa ras// 'brug gi sgra skud khyu mchog sgra 'byin bzhin//
zo lha yi rol mo snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa// sems can grol mdzad gsung gis lung ston cig/ byams pa bskyod cing dga' ba 'bal bar bgyid// ma shes ston cing ma rig sal bas//
don la rtog cing shes rab 'phag bgyid cing// bskal pa khralag khrig bya bar rnam sbyong ba// rtogs pas des bgyis dngos bo rnam par bshig/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i tshig don
ngas par ston// mu snyags kun gyi sa ba rnam par 'jom// stong pa srog med sems can mad pa sgom// bsod nams stong phrag brgya yis legs par brgyan// sangs
rgyas stong phrag brgya yis 'dir spyad do// lha rnams stong phrag brgya yis rab tu bstod/ tshangs pa stong phrag brgya yis phyag kyang bgyis/ gnod sbyin srin po grul bum
dad bgyid da/ klu dang lto 'phya 'dab bzangs grol bar bgyid// rtag tu ma chags shin tu ldan pa ste// las draga'i 'bras bus 'phags pa gsung phyung shig/ rgyal ba jisnyad
mya ngan 'a ras pa dang// gang dag ma byon pa dag bzhugs pa rnams// thams cad khyod kyis mkhyan tsang thogs mi mnga'// 'dren pa yon tan kun gyis shin tu 'phags// 'byung
po 'dzin pa ri dang rgya mtshor bcas// sa 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos// lha yi tshogs rnams mkha' las ma tog 'thor/ la yi spos ngad yid du 'ong ba ldang//
'dod chags zhe sdang rab rab ma lus bsal// tshul khrims yongs dag yid kyang yongs su dag/ mtshan med rab tu zhi ba'i stong la dbyas// sang ka'i sgra skad sgrogs shig thugs rje/
can sngobs dang ldan zhing shin tu snyan pa yangs/ rgyal ba'i shes rab rdzogs shing a shas rdzogs// thugs rje ldan pa khyod 'dra 'jig rten mad// gang gi don du 'dzum pa//
ma ]@#// char ni das ma bod// rnga dang rdza rnga bar ja da pa zhin te// dung dang gling bu de bzhin pa la nga dang// sil snyan stong gi sgra rnams gcig tu 'dus/ ra dag pa
gshegs sgra yi char mi phod// lha'i sil snyan dam pa stong gi sgra// lha yi bu mo glu dbyangs snyan pa dang// rol mo'i sgra rnams dga' ba skyed bgyid pa// de dag bde gshegs gsung
gi char mi yod// 'jig rtanu phan pa khyod kyi gsung gcig las// mos pa tha dad bzhin du sgra 'byung sta// rgyal ba bdag la ston sAm so so sams// gang gi slad du khyod kyis 'dzum
ya mdzad ston// lha yi sgra dang de bzhin klu yi skad// mi 'am ci mi sgra snyan tsa ma chis pa// de dag nam yang nyon mongs zhi mi bgyid// sangs rgyas gsung ni rtag tu nyon mongs sal//
dga' ba spyad cing 'dod chags dga' ma lags// khyams pa skyed cing zhe sdang blo ma lags// shes rab skyed cing gti mug blo ma lags/ sangs rgyas gsung gis dri ma thams cad sa la
'khor las slad rol tu ni sgra mi 'byung// thoms cadra kyi yang nam nur brgya mang gcod// mtho ba ma lags dma' ba ma lags pa// thub pa'i gsung ni snyoms shing bde ba son// ri
dang nags bcas sa 'di gas gyur cing// rgya mtsho'i chu dag de bzhin gas gyur la// klu ba nyi ma sa la lhung gyur kyang// rgyal bas bshad pa rnam pa gzhan mi 'gyur/ tshig gi yan
lag thams cad dag pa'i gsung// sang ga'i sgra skad 'jam zhing mnyan pa'i dbyangs// tshangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' bar gshags thugs rje can// gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad bstan du/
gsol// 'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi// 'jig rtan sems can ji snyad kun gyi yang// sams dang spyod pa kun la rab tu mkhas// gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan bshad du
gsol// rgyal ba ji sAd su dag thugs rje can// dbang dang/ shes kun gyi pha rol phyin// dri mar zla zhal rgyal ba de dag ni// rtag tu rgyu mad 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// bskal pa bya bar
brjod kyang mtshungs med pa// gang+gA'i bya snyad on tan brjod bgyis kyang// yon tan dag gi tshad brjod mi nus pa// gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan bshad du gsol// 'dzum pa bstan pa'i
le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// de nas dang tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar bka sul
pa zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid kyis// mtshungs pa med pa'i dga' bas sangs rgyas bstod// sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag 'phags brjod pas// rtag tu khor mor shin tu bsngag
dris/ byang chub spyod pa mchog 'di spyod pa na// 'di ni kun tu nga yi bur gyur te// thams cad du yang spobs dang ldan par gyur// kun tu rtag par tshangs par
ka spyod pa sbyar// ran phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po la// 'a di la ma lam khyod nyid nga la dpang// rtag tu tshongs spyod gtsad la gnas nas ni// ting nge 'dzin shin tu rgya la byed 'gyur// ting
rtsa 'dzin dam pa 'di ni rab tshol zhing// lam 'dir zhugs pas byang chub das thob 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bya ba mang pos yongs bzung ste/ 'dren pa rnams la mchod pa mchog bya da gyur/
nga na yi shes la yang rab gnas te// zla 'od spyod pa khyad zhugs lung bstan cing// 'di yi srog dang tshangs par spyod pa dag// phyi ma'i dus la bar chad med par bya// log ma thig skya
ru 'bru lta bkod pa bzhin// ma 'ongs pa na gang la mchod 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas bya ba dag ni phrag stong dang// de las lhag par gang+gA'i bya snyad shes// lha dang klu rnams bya ba brgyad/
rgyacu dang// gnod sbyin bya ba sbyong phrag bdun cu dang// phyi ma'i dus la brtson pa byed par 'gyur// rkang gnyis gtso bo la yang mchod pa byed// rkang gnyis gtso la achod pa mchog
byas te/ mi shes bla med 'di ni rab bsgrubs nas// phyi dus lus la de ni 'jig rtan mgon// rgyal ba dri med 'od ces bya bar 'gyur// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bdag nyid kyi
lung bstan 'a ra bros dga' bas rgyas myur te// ta la bdun srid du ni mngon 'phags nas// mkha' la 'dug sta chad du brjod pa brjod// a ma rgyal ba chos mchog ston mdzad pa//
rnam grol ma shas bdag po stobs la gnas// shin tu nges pa'i ya nas mchog gnas pa pha rol rgol ba dag gis zil ma non// chags pa spangs shing rnam par grol kha rag/
dngos po rnam bshig srid par chags mi mdzad// khyod la spros pa mtha' dag kun mi mnga'// srid pa gsum la chags med ye shes 'jul// spros pa thams cad kyis kyang mi gos shing/
lta ba spros pa mtha' dag rab tu sbyangs// lam yang shin tu bsgoms sha nge gnas med pa// zil gyis ma non su dang mi 'phror med// khyod ni khams gsum dag la gnas mad da// chubo
dang ni ma dud pa thams cad spangs// srid pa'i khri shing 'ching ba mtha' dag bcad// srid pa spangs shing srid par mtshams sbyor med// chos kyi rang bzhin dngos med rab ma byon cing//
brjod du med pa'i tshogs kyang thugs su chud// mu stags phyin ci log la gnas pa dag/ mi mkhas de kun sangags wa bzhin bshig/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos kyi
gter// gter mchog dam pa bo dag gis dang 'thob ste// ngan 'gro log par ltung bo thams cad spangs// 'dren par mi 'gyur snyam du tha tsom mad/ gsar gyi kha dog mdzes shing
'od gsal ba/ khyug kyang de yi mgro la rab bzhag nas// lhar bcas 'jig rten dag kyang dbang bkod de// g.yi khyu mchog byang chub dbang bskur mdzad//
ka 'dzum pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// skadanas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na khyang chub
sams dpa' sams dpa' chen pos/ sems can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya bar 'dod pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' zhing bde ba bla na mad pa/
'phags pa 'di la sems can rnams rob tu dgod par 'dod pas/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'a de mnyan par bya/ gzung
bar bya/ kun chub par s+ya/ bcang bar bya/bklags par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod par bya/ kha ton bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgom pas sgom par bya/ mang du bya//
gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal pa 'di ni ngan
song thams cad las bda' bar byan pa/ nad thams cad las rab tu thar par byed pa yin te/ gzhon nu nam byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos thams cad kyi rang
bzhin mnyam pa nya de rnam par sos pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di thos shing bzung sku/ ba sgoms par gyur pa da'i tsho/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po de sems can
thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar byas shing ting nga 'dzin gyi dga' ba bde ba bla na med pa 'phags pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god da/ ting nge 'dzin 'di yang myur du
ba thob bo// bla na med pa mang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la don 'di
nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad do// sngon chad spyod pa spyad pa dran pa ni// bde gshegs
sang ga rgyal mtshan bstan pa la// dge slong mkhas pa chos sna byung ba yang// de yi ming ni tshangs pas byin zhes bya// nga ni blo gros zhes bya rgyal po'i bu// na bar gyur du mi
bzad sdug bsngal tshor// de tshe tshangs pas byin pa mos sa drub// nga yi slob dpon du nagyur pa yin// nga yi snyan pa la brgya mi nyung ba// brtson pa'i yid kyis nad dpyad gso ba
khyad gang yi nad ni gso bar ma nus nas// nga ya gnyan bshas kun kyang sdug bsngal gyur// nga yang na bar dge slong des thos nas// nad 'dri bar ni nga yi drung du 'os// tshangs
na nga la rtsa ba rab bskyed nas// ting 'dzin mchog bad ra tsha bshad par gyur// ngan ting 'dzin dam pa 'di thos nas// 'phags pa'i dga' ba zang zing mar
ka pa skus// chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab shes pas/ nga yang da a dus na nad las sos// mar ma mdzad na spyad pa spyod pa na// dag slong chos su mkhas par gyur pa yin//
nga ni blo gros rgyal po'i bur gyur traka/ ting 'dzin ye shes kyis ni nad las thar// dbas gzhon nu khyod kyis phyi dus na// yongs su nyams pa 'di dag rjes dran zhing// byis pas
chos par brjod pa'i tshig bzod kyis// ting 'dzin 'di ang zung la legs par wegs// phyi ma'i dus la dpag slong mang po dag/ brkam zhing gtum la ma bsdams 'byung bar 'gyur//
sdig la dga' zhing lhung bzed chos gos chags// dang 'dzin 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur// rgod cing dbang po g.yangs pa phrag dog can// grong la chags shing rnyed pa 'dod pa dag/
sbyor ba byed pa'i skabs la rtag tu gnas// ting 'dzin 'di ni rab chu spong bar 'gyur// lag pa dang ni nang pa rnam par rdob/ rtsa 'jo dgod la rtag par rab tu zhugs/ gcig la
gcig ni mgul 'khyud lag kyang sbrul// grong du spyod lam gzhan du sgyur bar byed// mi rigs sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid 'di dag ste// gzhan gyi bu mo la yang rtag tu chags// gzugs
kyis rgya gas shing bo dud pa bor ba yin// grong dang grong khyer yul 'khor kun tu rgyu// de dag bza' dang btung la rab tu zhugs// glu dang gro gar de bzhin rol mo dang/ 'anyo 'tshong lhag/
par byed cing rtag tu brtson/ btud pa dag la chags shing ngo tsha bor// mi rigs brtson pa sbring yig skur bar byed// tshul khrims de bzhin spyod lam btang nas ni// khyim pa
dag dang bstan cing khrims dral nas// da dal tshul zhig log par shin tu gnas// las gang sangs rgyas kyis ni rtag sad pa// srung dang tshad la g.yo sgyu bya da par zhugs// de 'dra'i/
sdig pa nyon mongs las byas pas// las ngan byad pa da rag ngan song 'gro// rang rang gsar dang nor bu nor mang dang// khyim dang gnyen bshes rnam tsongs ra ba byung ste// sangs
rgyus bstan pa 'di la rab byung nas// sdig pa'i las rnams shan tu spyod par byed// nor dang 'bru la snying por 'du shes shing// bzhon dang ba lang shing rta rnams la chags// gang
la bslabs pa'i nan tan med pa rnams// de dag gis kyang ba phyir mgo bo brags// ngas ni sngon tshe spyod pa spyad pa na// bskal pa stong du shin tu dka' spyad de// nga yis ting 'dzin
zhi ba 'a de btsal na// de dag de tshe 'di thos gad mos 'debs// de dag yun ring btsun skya tshangs mi spyod// rtag tu rnyed la dga' zhing ngan song gal// tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyal
[~ ]@#// mtshan thogs nus na// tshul khrims 'chal ba de ni chos mi smra// de dag phan tshun dbya ba'i phyir 'jug ste// rigs pa ma yin pas ni rnam pa rdzol// gcig
lagacig ni mi snyan ra ba brjod de// sha de phos nas ni ngan song sar yang 'gro// de dag brgya dang stong gi nang na yang// de tshe brjod pa'i stobs ldan shin tu dkon// de phyir 'thol la
( brtson pa mang bo 'byung// bzod pa spangs nas rab tu spros pa byad// byang chub sems dpa' red yin tshig tu s+sa// de yi sgra yang phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro// mi bden sgra yi
drags pas de rgyugs te/ tshul khrims nyams la byang chub ga la yod// gang la bsam pa rnam par dag mad cing// chos 'a di la yang bzod pa mad pa dang// chos rnams sbyong
byed byang chub 'di thob pa// des ni ma thos nam yang yod ma mthong/ da dag 'jigs shing skrag nas khyim sngangs tu// rab tu byung nas shin tu dam du 'dzin// skyes bu ram pa'i phyag
pa sangs byas nas// bye brag lhag par 'dod par brlag par 'gyur// shes rab dman zhing yon tan rnam sngangs pa// thag pa mchog gi nyis pa rtag tu brjod// gang gi skyabasu ra
dag rab khul gas pa// de nyid la'ang rgas pa brgya dag brjod/ 'tsho ba med pa mang po rab byung ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rnam pa kun ma 'dod// byis pa de dag bdag tu lta la gnas
stong pa nyid ni thos nas skrag par 'gyur// phan tshun du rang rtsod pa byas nas ni// gnod sams long khro tha ba rab tu skyor// phan tshun du'ang bskur pa mngon 'dabs shing// sdig pa/
byas nas shin tu dga' ba rnyed// gang dag tshul khrims gnas shing yon tan ldan// khyams la gnas shing rtag tu bzod rtogs pa// gnyan zhing das la shin tu bsdams pa rnams//
de dag ru tshe yongs su bar s par 'gyur// gang yang shin tu gtum sams ldan 'byung dang// mi bzad ma rungs ngan pa'i las byed pa// chos ma yin pa spyod cing 'thab la dga' na/
dag da yi dus na mchod par 'gyur// bsgo bar bya zhing rab tu go bar bya// gzhon nu nga la dad pa'i phyir 'brang na// bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa 'ad dran nas// da rag la ni nam
yang yid mi ston// de dag 'dod chags che zhing zhe sdang che// gti mug cha zhing nga rgyal dwags pas rgya gas// lus kyang ma dul ngag kyang m dul zhing// sems kyang ma dul na song
gzhol ba yan// nga na yon tan dag gi bsngags brjod na// dag song yon tan dag la mi spyod de// tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi 'gyur// nan tan lhur khyad byang chub rnyed ma raka'
sngon byung ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o/// da nas gtam 'di mthar phyin par gyur pa dang/ da'i tshe byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa de ltar 'a dug
bzhin du// bcom ldan 'das la yid kyi tshigs su bcad pas zhus pa/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod phung po ste// rtag tu sangs rgyas gnas par bde gshegs bzhud
ka 'jig rten sgron ma der yang gshags nas ni// khyod la bsam gyis mi khyab mchod par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyams pa'i san
kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhananas/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po byams pa la yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas btang ba/ ri yi rgyal po rgyal bar mngon gnas pa// ma
pham bdud rnams pham byas khyod song shig/ dar ni 'gro ba kun gyi don chen yang// bla na mad pa myur du grub par gyur// de nas byang chub sems dang bsams dpa' chen po khyams
pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas btang ba dang// bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
'khor de nas byung sta/ sangs rgyas mu mad pa rgya mtsho'i bye ma snyad kyi gnas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po mchod rten chen po gang na yod pa der song ste phyin nas 'di la so/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis yo ngas su longs spyad pa'i phyir de'i mod la/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po mnyam zhing yang pa rgya che ba/ sdong dum dang/ tsher ma dang/ rdodang/ gsog ma dang/ gyo mo dag mad cing kho ra/
ba0/ khor yug kun rin po che sna bdun du byin gyis brlabs te/ sa gzhi rin po che in+d+ra nI la 'bar ba bsam gyis mi khyab la dalo chod pa'i la'i rgyan thams cad dwang/ rin po ches rgyan pa/ rin po
cha rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa du ma'i bkod pas rab tu sdus pa/ dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i na ra lngas khyim gyi rkun 'khor brgyan cing spyad de/ bdug spos kyi snod sna tshogs nas ni b.rug pa
'thul bar byas/ phreng ba dang/ lda ldis ni brgyun/ ma tog sna tshogs ni bkrum/ lha'i rol mo'i sgra dbyangs ni bsgrags/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ lhab lhub bsgrung pas ni gang/
khyams kyi dkyil 'khor du ni bla ra bras/ 'khor gyi khyamasakyi dbus su rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i wa'i sang ga'i khri mngon par sprul te// rgyu sbyin las ma byas pa'i gos ni bting/ ka tsa
lin ltar 'jam zhing rag na bde ba dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'in bkris ni g.yogs/ stang du snying po bag tshor na bting gsam rten mtha' gnyis dmar po ni bshams/ chu zhangs dang 'phang
du da pa ga tshad tsam yod pa btsugs te/ zhabs rten ni lha dang mi las 'das pa/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsar las byas pa/ mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa// ras rin po che bcos bus/
g.yogs pa/ sang ge'i khri la btags ra 'i lha'i rin po che'i dril bu 'a sa ni sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba gsal ba 'khyung/ phyogs kun tu ninor bu rin po chachen po snang bar gyur/
rin po che'i gdugs chen po rtsa ba ni ba zur dri ma med pa'i rin po cha chen po las byas cha ra mngon par sngal to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
byams pa sa ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po khor yug dang bcas pa thams cad na po che sna tshogs du ma'i bkod pa rgyan bsamagyis mi khyab pas brgyan pa mngon par sngal nas/ skad cig de
nyid la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du zhugs par gyur to// zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
stan la 'dug go/ de la 'dra skad cas bya sta// ri nga lha rdzas yang shing rgya che ba// rin chen rdo stangs bzangs zhing dga' ba dang// bsam gyis mi khyab lha rdzas yid kyi khyams//
dbus su rin chen sang ga' khri gang tsugs// lha rdzas gdugs las yid 'ong sgra 'byung zhing// phyogs su nor bu rin chan 'od cher 'byung// rtsa ba yid du 'thad pa'i ba chu// ma pham
rgyal ba'i sras pos da ltar sprul// ri ang rin chen sna tshogs rnam par bkra// rin chen gdan mchog rgyang grags tshad tsam du// byams pa dpa' bos de dag rab sprul nas// skad
kyig na nyid la ni khyim du zhugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das la khor chen po rgya mtsho lta bu la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan te/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang
dag par rab tu dga' bar byas/ yang dag par btsud de/ gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs so// de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i khab kyis grong cur chen po'i chu
don gyi sgor byung nas/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po gang na yor pa der gshags te byon pa dang/ byams pas snga la pa'i khyams gang na yod pa dar gshags tu/ byon nas byams pas mngon
bar sprul pa 'i sang ba'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ dag slong gi dge 'dun gyis ni yongs su bskorang byang chub sams dpa'i dge 'dun gyis ni mdun gyis bltas/ lha dang/ klu dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ driT dang/ lha ma yin dang/ drang srob dang/ nam mkha' lding dwang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chan pa dang/ mi dang mi ma yin bas ni phyag byas pa/ 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu'i
nang na chos ston to// da nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa srog chags bya pa khrag khrig brgya stong thams dalcagasapar gyur ba rnams dang/ 'jig rtan gyi khams gzhan nas lcags pa'i byang chub
sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po khrag khrig mang po dang lhan cig tu me tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ stug pa dang/ rol mo ni khyod/ phag ni rdo/ gdul gas dang/
rgyal mtshan dang/ lha'i ba dan ning+gesgang/ phrang ba chen po dbul ba na thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po zhi ba'i sgo nas byung//
bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga na yod pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to/ bcom/
ka ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ phrang pa dang/ byug pa dang/ bya ma dang/ nabaza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan
dang sil snyan dang/ phag rdob pas mchod pa chen po byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gus pa dang ldan/ ri mo dang ldan par chos dri ba'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ zla 'or
gzhon nur gyur pa pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhu
nas zhu ba lungabastan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la skabs phyi na/ ba dgag phyogs bga'/
rgyu zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu da razhin gshags pas rtag tu khyod la skadwa
byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas latsi dang ni 'dod pa dris shig/ de skad ces bka'astsal te/ go skabs phyi nas/ bcom ldan 'das la//
zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad cas gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ chos thams ca da kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid
rnam par sos pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'a de thob par 'gyur kar skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu chos
bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/
gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po ras shing 'grogs na bde ba yin/ dul zhing rul bas thob pa yin ta 3de la pha rol gyis ga sha sa sam/ smyos pa'i tshig
nyas par sa zhing/ nyes par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam bod kying mi wa bal a un yin/ las la lta zhing nga rgyal bcom pa dang chos 'dod pa yin te/ gzhon nu tshos dang po
'de dang ldan na/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting 'dzin 'a de thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims dang/
ldan pa in/ tshul khrims yongs su dag cing tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang/ tshul khrims la skyon med pa dang/ tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin pa dang/ tshul khrims sra srar ma gyur pa dang//
rnatshul khrims ma nyams pa dang/ tshul khrims mi cha gnas pa dang/ tshul khrims ma 'bags pa dang/ tshul khrims mi dmigs pa dang/ 'phags pas bstod pa'i/
ka tshul khrims dang/ mkhas pas bstod pa'i tshul khrims pa yin te/ gzhon nu chos gnyis po 'di dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'a di thob par
rgyu 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems da pa' sams dpa' chen po khams gsum la soms skrag pa dang/ sams pas la dang sems skyo ba dang/ don tu ma gtor
nang mngon par mi dga' ba dang/ ma chags ma zhan pa dang/ khams gsum la a de skyo bas khams gsum las gzhan du soms can sdug bsngal ba rnams thar bar bya'o zhes brtson
zhing/ bla nA mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par sgrub pa yin te/ gzhon nu chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
ting 'a tshani ba da thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sams nopa' sams dpa' chen po nad tsang chos yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa yin/ mang du thos shing 'jigs pa med
pa yin/ chos 'dod cing chos lhur byed pa yin taM rad pa dang bkur bsti lhung byed pa ma yin/ shes kyi 'i sbyar byed pa ma yin/phan pa'i dngos po sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kyis chos ji skad

00 ]ru thos pa dang/ ji ltar khong du chud pa la zhan la rgya cher 'chad cing rab tu ston pa yin te/ shas kyi khe 'dod pas ni ma yin gyi/ i nas sems can ba ri rnams rmongs 'di dag thos nas bla na mad/
ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur snyam ste rta gzhon nu chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sams rwapa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob
par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sams dpa' sems rang 'a chen pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par smyos pa'i ting nge 'a yin
'thob par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gzhon nu rnam grangs 'dis nga dra 'dzin 'a dig di ltar sangs rgyas
mang pos bshad pa// sangs rgyas mang pos bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bstan pa yin te/ gzhon nu sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'a das mang po'i drung du nga rab tu byung nas/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rgya cher mnyan te bzung ngo// dris shing bcad so// khaklag/
so// bton to// nyon mongs pa med pa'i sgom pas bsgoms shing mang du byas so// gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mang
po sa pa rab rjod pa'i ting nga 'dzin gyi sgo sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di ro'i tshe/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag
par rab tu bstan pa// dran pa bskal pa gzhal mad dpag yas na// rgyal ba dbyangs kyi an lag sgra byung ste// bad gshogs dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra da yi/ tshe tshad lo yang
lcabargya phrag drug cur chu ra// de yi pha rol sangs rgyas gzhan byung ba// ma mchog mtshan ni ya shis dbang phyug ste// rkang gnyis gtso bo ya shes dbang phyug gi/ tshe tshad lograngs
stong phrag bcu gnyis so// ya shis dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// gzi brjid dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung/ ]rkang gnyis gtso bo gzi brjid dbang phyug gri/ tshe tshad lo ni stod
phrag drug cu bdun// gzi brjid dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// blo gros dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung// rlung gnyis gtso bo blo gros dbang phyug gi/ tshe yi tshad ni lo grangs bye
bar yang// blo gros dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshangs pa'i dbang phyug ces byargyal ba khyung// rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i dbang phyug gi/ tshe yi tshad ni lo khri bzhi stong
[@ ]gyur/ tshangs pa'i dbang phyug pa rol sangs rgyas na// ma yi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba khyung/ de dang gnyis gtso bo ma yi dbang phyug gi/ tshe tshad lo grangs bdun khri drug stong gyur//
ma i dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshangs pa'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung// rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal ngo yi// tshe yi tshad ni nyin zhag bdun du gyur// tshangs pa'i
zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshogs kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung/ rkang gnyis gtso bo tshogs kyi nAbang phyug gi 'tsho yi tshan ni lo grangs bye bar tshangs/ tshogs kyi dbang phyug pha
la sangs rgyas ni// dbyangs kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung// rkang gnyis gtso bo dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi/ tshe tshad lo grangs bye ba phrag dgur tshangs// dbyangs kyi dbang phyug pha rol
sangs rgya sa ni// dbyangs kyi zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung// rkang gnyis gtso bo dbyangs kyi zhal gyi yang// tshe tshad lo grangs bya ba phrag bcur tshangs// dbyangs kyi zhal gyi pha rol
sangs rgyas ni// zla pa'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung// rkang gnyis gtso bo zla ba'i zhal gyis ni// rtsi yi tshad kyang nyin zhag gcig tu 'gyur// zla ba'i zhal gyis pha rol sangs rgyas ni
nyi ma'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung// rkang gnyis gtso bo zhwa ma'i zhal gyi ang// tshitshad la ni stong phrag bco brgyad do// nyi ma'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshangs pa'i zhal zhes

bya ba'i rgyal ba byang// rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal gyi yang// tshe tshad lo ni stong phrag nyi shu'o// tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni// tshangs pa 'i snyan pa zhes bya rgyal ba
tha0 @#/ byung/ rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i snyan pa yi// tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag bco brgyur gyur// bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas 'di dag dang// 'jig
ka rtan rnam par 'dren pa nyis brgya byung// zil gyi ma non re bzhin gshegs pa yi// mtshan rnams 'dir yang brjod gyis mnyan par gyis// mtha' yas dbyangs dang rnam par gragasala'i
dbyangs// rnam par bsgrags pa'i gzi brjid rnam grogs sgra// sgra skad rnam gragasgra dbyangs mchod pa dang// dbyangs kyi an lag dpa'i dang dbyangs dag dang// ye shes stobs dang
'tsho a shas bya brag 'go/ bril gyis ma non la shes yang dag 'phags// yoshes 'od 'phro ya shes mngon par 'phags// ye shes rnam grangs de bzhin ya shas dma'// tshangs pa'i stobs
dang tshangs nor tshangs pa'i mchog/ tshangs pa'i lhar bcas de bzhin tshangs pa'i dbyas// tshangs pa'i dbang phyug tshangs pa'i mi dbang spyan/tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yan lag tshangs pas
byin/ (gzi brjid stobs dang gzi ldan gzi brjin mchog/ gzi brjid dbang phyugagazi brjid mngon par 'phagasaM kA/ gzi brjid khyab dang gzi brjid shin tu dus// gabri brjid sgra dbang
shin tu rnam grangs gany+dzi// 'jigs btsan stobs dang 'jigs btsan blo grosaM dang// shin tu 'jigs brtsan 'jigs zhal 'jigs btsan 'phags// 'jigs btsan 'od 'phro 'jigs ]
[m ]/ mchog 'jigs pa'i dbyangs// 'jig rten rnam 'dren rgyal ba 'di dag byung// sgra dbyangs zab mo dang ni dpal 'dzin dang// rnam dag sgra yi dbang phyug la/tsang ma'i dbyangs// mtha' yas/
dbyangs dang shin tu rnam grol dbyangs// bdud kyi stobs dwang bdun rnams skrag byed dang// spyan bzangs dang ni zhal gtsang spyan dag dang/ rnam par dag pa'i spyan dang mgra' yas spyan//
kun nas spyan dang rnam par grags pa'i spyan// spyan gyis zil gyis gnon dang ma smad spyan// dul mchog dul dang shin tu dul ba'i sems// dul rab zhi ba'i dbang po zhi ba'i ir//
zhi ba'i bla ma zhi dpal rab tu zhi// zhi ba'i pha rol phyin dang zhi bar dpa'// bla mar gnas pa zhi ba dul bar sems// shin tu rul dang zhi dbang zhi ba'i yid// zhi ba'i bla ma zhi ba'i
dar la 'bar kha// zhi ba rab zhi dbang phyug zhi bar dpa'// tshog sarapang tshogs gtso tshogs kyi rangang phyug dang// tshogs rnams zil gnon tshogs bzang ye shes gtsang// tshogs
kyi dbang chen tshogs dbang dpa' bo dang// gzhan yang tshogs bzang rab tu rnam par 'byed// chos kyi rgyal mtshan de bzhin chos gyi tog/ chos kyi bla ma chos kyi rang bzhin 'phags//
chos kyi stobs ldan chos dbang dpa' bo dang// rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges pa byung// rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges par ni// mtshan gcig rang yang bya phrag brgyad cu sta/ bskal pa
[@#// gnyis la 'dren pa 'di dag byung/ byang chur phyare ni 'ad de ngas mchod de// rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma ngos la yi ge/ rgyal ba'i mtshan rnams gang dag nyan byad/
[rt/ ]cang// thos nas rnam par grags pa'i mtshan 'dzin na// de dag myur du ting 'dzin 'di thob 'gyur/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mngo//
bam po drug pa////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgya samang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sngon byung ba'i le'u bdo zla 'od gzhon nur gyur ba la rgya cher rgyas pa ra rab tu bstanato/
sangs rgyas 'di dag gi yang pha rol na// bskal pa bsam las dpag tu med pa'i// lha mas mchod pa sangs rgyas gzhan zhig byung/ da ma mtshan ni mo dbang dbyangs zhes bya//
de bzhin gshags ba mi dbang dbyangs kyis na// tshe tshad lo grangs bdun khri drug stong// nyan thos dag ni bya ba brgya phrag gsum// du 'dus pa dang bor gyur pa yin// mngon
shes drug ldan gasum rig dpang bo cul// mthu yang che zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po ste/ zag pa zad pa tha ma'i lug 'dzin pa// 'od mdzad kyi na dge 'dun de tsho byung// bya ba khrug khrig
rdzong stong phralo brgyad cu yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs byung ngo// blo gros zab cing grags pa shin tu che// mthu yang chazhing rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur[ ]/mngon par shes pa
sa thob cing spobs par ldan// stong pa thams cad rtogs par khong du chud// zhing ni ci bar de las lhag pa yang// gda'i bye ma snyad du 'phrul gyis 'gro// rkang gnyis gtso la dri ba dris nas/
ni phyir yang rgyal ba ra ya drung du 'ong// mdo sde sgrub pa nges pa'i tshig la mkhas// snang bar gyur pa sa yi stonganargyu3/ sems can don phyir spyad pa rnam sbyor de// bde bar gshagab
ba'i sras po mthu chen ni// 'dod pa'i rgyan gyis sdig pa mi byed de// de dag la ni lha yang smon pa skyed// srid pa'i 'gro bar mi gnas don mi gter// mnyam gzhag bsam gtan
gnas pa'i spyod yul can// rnam par nges pa'i don ldan 'jigs med pa/ 'dris med par rtag tu tshangs par spyon// tshig kyang rgyun mi 'chad cing spobs pa ldan// nges tshig bstan pa'i
tshig gi don la mkhas// sangs rgyas sras po kun tu yang dag ston// dge ba'i las rnams kyis kyang yongs su bzung// bskal ba mtha' yas par ni spyod pas 'phags/ 'a dran pa nag gis
rtag tu bston cing bsngags// rnam par thar dang don tshigs yang dag ston// tshul khrims shin tu dag cing nyon mongs med// chu ya bar bzhin du mi chags te// khams gsum las ni rnam
grol bag yod ba// 'jig rtan chos brgyad dag gis mi gos shing// lus kyang rnam dag las kyang yongs su dag/ 'dod pa chung zhing chos shes mthu a nga che// chags pa med cing sangs
rgyas yon tan gnas// sems can kun gyi rten dang dpung gnyan te/ tshig tsam ma yin nan tan snying por byed// gang la gnas pa ra nyid gzhan la ston// sangs/
ka rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongs su bzung// rgyalab rnams kyi mdzod 'dzin thugs brtan pa// khams gsum thams cad la yang skag pa'i yid// rab tu sams zhi rtag tu dgon par spyad/
'jig rtan 'dran pa rnams kyis byin rlabs ra sa// mdo sta bya ba phrag stong 'chad par byon// 'chad pa de yang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags/ 'bartan dag gi tshig kun rnam snangs taM//
'a7 stong pa nyid la mos shing don dam ston// bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho bzhin// mang du thos shing mkhas pa shes rab ldan// gzhon nu ngaskal pa bya ba mang por ni// rgyun chad
med par sngags ba rab brjod kyang/ ra ni cung zad tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur// rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs gcig pa bzhin// da tsho mi yi dbang po'i dbyangs de ni// ting 'dzin zhi ba mthong
dga' 'di ston te// stong gsum chan po'i 'jig rten khams 'di ang// lha dang klu rnams kyis ni gang bar gyur// ra yis ting 'dzin zhi baban bo shad tsho/ sa yang rnam pa drug tu gsI/
lharang mi rnams gna'i bya ma snyad// sangs rgyas ye shes la ni mi ldegaka gnas // dar yang mi dbang rgyal po byung ba ni// dpal gyi stobs zhes bya ba mthu che ba// dal bu yang
'a brgya phrag lta yod da// khyad pazhin bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug/ rgyal po de yi btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ni// bud med bya ba brgya phrag brgyad cu yod// sa bdag rgyal bo da ya bu mo/
yang// bya ba stong phrag bcu bzhir tshang bar byung/ de yang ston zla ba rlung lha ba la/ yan lag brgyad ldan gso sbyong bzung nas ni// bya ba khrag khrig brgyad cu lhan cig tu// 'jig
rten gtso bo'i drung du chu bar 'ongs// rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// rgyal ba da ya spyan sngar rgyal po 'dug/ rgyal po ra yi lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas// ting
'dzan 'ad ni rkang gnyis dbang pos bshad// ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyal po des thos nas// rgyal srid mtshal ma bzhin du kun spangs te// gnyen dang rtsa lag sdug pa yongs btang nas/
rgyul ba de yi drung du rab tu byung// khu ang brgya phrag lnga dag rab byung ste// de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor dang sras mo dang// gnyen bshes rtsa lag mang po gzhan dag kyang// bya ba khrag
khrig bdun cu rtsa drug byung// bu dang chung mar ba cas pa rab byung nas// khazas bsgrub pa'i sa yang bor nas ni// rgyun mi chad par lo brgyad bar du bcags// 'chag cing 'greng bzhin
'chi ba'i dus kyang byas// rgyal po'i glang po shing 'dzin sams dpa' da// rtag par rab tu mnyam gzhag dus byas pas// de yang rgyal po'i pho brang dar skyas te// mngal gyi dri mas ma
'gos rdzus te byung// de yi pha ni brtan pa'i stobs zhes bya// blo go cha zhes bya ba mar gyurataM// gzhon nu btsas ma thag tu tshig sla ba// 'jig rten mgon po ri nyid
bzhugs sam la// 'jig rten mgon pos bdag gis sams mkhyen nas// de phyir bdag la zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bshad// rgyan rnams med cing rgyan dang bral ba yang// srid pa'i 'grob
rnams ni gcig tu bstan// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin phyug rgya gang// mdo sde bya ba khrag khrig byung ba gang// byang chub sems dpa'i nor ni bu mad pa/ ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyal
bas bshad mdzad dam// lus kyang gtsang zhing de bzhin ngag gtsang ba// sams gtsang de bzhin lta ba gtsang ma dang// dmigs pa rnams las yang dag 'da' ba yi// ting 'dzin da ni
rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// chud mi za ba'i 'bras bu chos bstan pa/// lam mchog yan la go brgyad ldan bsgom pa ste/ de bzhin gshags dang phrad cing shes rab no// ba dan la 'jug
dang rtag tu chos shes pa// phung po longs shas khams rnams mnyam pa nyid// skye mched rnam pa kun tu bsal ba sto/ 1skya ba mad pa mngon gsum 'jug pa dag/ ting 'dzin de ni rgyal
ba'i bshad mdzad dam// so so yang dag rig pa bzhi la 'jug/ yi ga thams cad dbye ba'i ya shos dang/ nangos por 'jug pa las ni 'da' ba ni// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad
ba[@ mdzad dam// dbyangs rnams yongs su shes shing dga' ba thob// bde gshegs bstags pa la'ang dgar gyur pang// 'phags pa dag gi tshul 'jam drang po yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas
bshad mdzad dam// ris pa nam yang khro gnya' ma khyod cing// mnyan zhing 'jam la bzhin yang 'dzum pa sta// soms can mthong na sngon du sku pa yi// ting 'dzin ri ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad
nAm// le lo med cing bla ma'iri mo khyod// sra zhu che bas phyag 'tshul sdug par lta// skye ba drag gis chos shes dgar ba yi/ ting 'dzin do ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// 'tsho ba dag
cing de bzhin dgon gnas dang// sbyangs pa dag la gnas shing dran mi nyams// phung po dang ni khams la mkhas pa yi// ting 'dzin da ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// skya mched mkhas
shing mngon shes ma nas dang// nyon mongs bsal ba dul ba'i sa rnams dang// gsang sngags mang po thams cad 'chun pa yi// ting 'dzin re ni rgyal bas bshar mdzad dam// sred pa'i
gro ba kun las 'da' ba dang// skye ba dran zhing chos lanamanur mar// chos la sams shing thos pa tshol ba yi// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// khyad par 'gro shing rtag tu sgom
la 'jug/ ltung ba dag la mkhas shang 'byung bar gnas// ra la gnas pas bag la nyal ba sol// ting 'dzin da ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// gang la la shes rno ba'i mchog 'byung ba//
mi g.yo ri bo bzhin du mi sgul la// phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan dang gzungs kyi sgo// ting 'dzin du ni rgyal ba sa bshad mdzad nam// rtag tu dkar po'i chos rnams yongs tshol
zhing// sdig pa'i chos rnams ka khor mor rnam par song// rtag tu nyon mongs phyogs rnams rgyu ba mad// ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas ba shad mdzad dam/ khaslab pa kun la rtogs par khong du chud//
mkhas pa ting 'dzin gnas pa rtogs par rig gsoms can dag gi bsam pa mkhyen pas bskul/ sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu chos kyang ston// khyad par gasapa skya ba shes pa dang//
mtha' yas shes pa shin tu rdzogs par shas// 'gro ba kun tu mtshams sbyor shes pa yis// ting 'dzin da ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam// khyim gyi gnas spangs rab tu 'byung ba'i sams//
khams gsum la yang ma dga' mi 'dzin cing/ sams rnams rab tu 'dzin cing dga' byed pa// chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad// skyob pa chos rnams la yang ma chags shing//
rtag tu chos kyi mchog kyang yongs su 'dzin// las kyi rnam par smin la brtan mos pa// chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad// 'dul ba la yang mkhas shing rnam smin shes/ 'ad/
bzhin 'thab cing rtsod pa che bar zhige 'thab pa mad cing rtsod pa med ma yis/// chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad// bzod pa yang dag 'dzin cing khro mor gnas// chos la rnam par
nga rtag tu bsrung ba mi dang// byang chub dam pa mchogar mdzad// khrel yod ngo cha gang du sgyur cing rtogs par byed/ ston pa thams
ngas shing rtag tu ma bas/ tshig rnams rab tukhyod la yi shes mthong// thugs rje bskyod nas rmos rnams ston pa mdzad// sngon gyi mtha' shas phyi ma'i mtha' shasato// bdagags bstan/
la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid/ 'khor gsum dag ni yongs su chad par gsungs// rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po na skad ston/ sams kyang rab tu gnas shing rtsa gcig dang// lus kyang
rnam par gnas dang 'phags pa'i sa// spyod lam dag kyang rtag tu bsrung ba yi// chos ni skyas bu khyu mchog thub pa ston// khrel yod ngo tsha shes shing mdzes pa dang// 'jig rtan shas ra
rigs pa'i tshig rnams gsung// chos rnams 'byung ba srog chags rang bzhin dang// byang chub dam pa mchog gi chos kyang ston// rdzas su phan gdags pa dang khrel yod dang/ mi ragab yi
sams la sad pa dang// sbyangs ra rjes su mi gtong bsod snyoms spyod// chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad/ khral yod ngo tsha shes pa rtag tu spyon// bla ma la yang gus su ldang
ba dang// thog ma nyid nas nga rgyal tshar bcad par// chos rnams rgyal ba chos rje da ltar ston// sams ni ldang ba nas kyang sams dag ste/ ashes khong du chud cing rtogs par byed// mi shes phyogs
4// cad rtag tu rnam par spangs// rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po da ltar ston// skyes bu dam pa rtag tu yang dag bstan/ skyes bu ngan pa dag ni rnam par sngangs/ rgyal
ba la yang rtag tu dad cing dga'// chos mchog rgyal ba de ltar ston par mdzad// brtags pa dang ni brda dang tha snyad dang/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams na rnam par spangs// da
dang ma rnyed pa la zhum pa mar// chos kyi ram ra rgyal bas de ltar bstan// bkur ste chud kyang mtshar du mi bzung zhing// bkur ste ma byas na yang btang snyoms bzhag/ ung dag
rgyu bsngags pas nam yang rlom sems mad// 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// gshe zhing skyod pa thams cad bzod par bya// khyim pa kun dang lhan cig ma bstan cing//
rab tu byung ba dang yang 'grogs mi bya// rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po da skad skyon// spyod yul ma yin thams cad rnams spangs nas/ sangs rgyas spyod yul la ni rab tu gnas// spyod pa
ba phun sum tshogs shang dul ba'i sams// chos kyi tshul 'di bar par gshags pas bshad// byis pa'i chos rnams rtag tu rnam par spangs// rigs sun pa ang thams cad sngang bar bya/
sangs rgyas bstan pa rtag par yongs su srung// chos kyi bdag po rgyal ba de skad ston// smra ba nyung shing rab tu 'brel la snyan// gzhan dag la yang tshig 'jam dag bar sna// phas kyi rgol ba
[d chos dang ldan pas 'dul// rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// dus su 'gro sta dus la ma bab min// so so'i skya bo kun la yid mi bstan// sdug bsngal rig kyang yi mug mar par bya
rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// dbul po mthong na nor dang ldan par bya// tshul khrims 'chal pa mthong na bcu ba bskyed// phan pa'i dngos la rtag tu gdams par bya// rgyal ba'i
rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// chos kyis sems can rnams la phan gdags shing// 'jig rtan ra zing rnag tu gtang bar bya// bsags par mi bya sbyong bar mi bya ste// rgyal ba'i rjes/
su bstan pa ya dwa 'dra'o// tshul khrims bsngags shing tshul khrims 'chal pa du// g.yo sgyu mad cung tshul khrims ldan la sta// nor la mi gnas bdog pa thams cad gtong// rgyal ba'i rjes
su ba stan pa 'di 'dra'o// lhag pa'i bsam pas bla ma gtar ba dang// ji skad smras pa de bzhin thams cad bya/ chos smra ba yang mi 'chad bstan par bya// rgyal ba'i rjes su
bstan pa 'a di 'dra'o// ri mor bsus shing rtag tu yid dga' bya// zhi ba'i skabs khor mor gnas par bya// sngon sbyang rnams l rtag par shin tu ngos// rgyal ba'i rdzas su bstan pa 'di
badra'o// dge ba'i spyod par rtag tu sngon du 'gro/ 'dushas bzlog dang dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang// mtshan mo srung ba la yang thabs mkhas pa// rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa/
kha de 'dra'o// mdo sde ba sgrub pa'i tshig la mkhas pa dang// bden pa bstan pa'i tshig la gdon mi za// rnam par grol ba'i shes mngon du byed// rgyal
ka ba'i rdzas su bstan pa la da badra'o// mgo gcig tu na tshig rnams brjod pakhya// ji lta bzhin du mthong zhing rtogs par mkhas// rtag tu tshig la thatsom mad par bya// rgyal ba'i
sbyo rdzas su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// stong pa nyid kyi chos kyang rtag tu bstan// 'jigs pa med cing tshul khrims stobs la gnas// ting 'dzin gnas kyis mnyam par 'jug par bya//
rgyal ba'i rdzas su bstan pa la de 'dra'o// shas kyi khe 'dod phyir ni yong mi bstan// sams kyang bya rgyu can du mi bya sta// lta bar byas pa thams car rnam par spangs// rgyal
ba'i rdzas su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// spobs pa mchog dang gzungs kyang dam pa ste// yanas snang ba pha rol mtha'am mod// gsang sngags byin rlabs rig par spobs pa ni/ rgyal
ba'i rdzas su bstan pa 'a di 'dra'o// lam 'di bsgom pa dag ni tshul gyi sgo// bstan pa 'di la spyad nas nan tan dang// tshul dang gdams po rjes subastan pa bzang/ rgyal ba'i rdzas
su bstan pa 'a de 'dra'o// rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa sangs rgyas bsngags// babor la gnas pas nyes pa rnam par spangs// ma shes las yang gnas nas mi shes sbyangs//
rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra 'o/ e shis rten yin de bzhin rnal 'byoras/ byang chub zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor du bang phyug ste// skyes bu dam pa rtag par bstan pa ni// rgyal/
ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// ma gas brtson par khor mor rnam par spangs// sangs rgyas sa nar bzhin gshegs pas bshad// mkhas pa kun gyis rjes su yi rang ba/
rgyal kha'i rdzas su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// byis pa mi shes pas ni spangs pa ste// 'di ni nyan thos mang po'i sa ma yin// byang chub sams dpa' dag gis rtag tu badrung/ rgyal ba'i
rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o// 'di ni da bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su 'brang// lha rnams kyis kyang mchod cing rimor byas// tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong yi rang ba// ting 'dzin da ni
rgyal ba ston mdzad dam// nam mkha' lding dang gnod sbyin ma 'am// klu yang stong gis rtag tu phyag byas pa// byang chub dam pa rgyal bas gsungs pa yi// ting 'dzin du ni rgyal
bas bshad mdzad dam// shin tu mkhas pas rtag tu yongs thob sta// nor mchog dam pa yang ni legs par da// zang zing mad pa'i ya shas gso ba mchog/ ting 'dzin na ni rgyal
bas bshad mdzad dam/ 03 shisamadzod yin spobs pa mi zad pa// 'di ni mdo sde bya bar 'jug pa ste// khams gsum yongs shes yang dag shes pa yi// ting 'dzin ra ni rgyal bas
b+ha @#/ khashad mdzad dam// gang la ting 'dzin zhib ba bshad pa// 'di ni pha rol 'gro ba'i gzings su bstan// 'di ni chu bo rgal ba'i rgyu yin te// 'di ni snyan
grags pa sngags 'phrang 'phel bar byed/ khang gas ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad pa/ da bzhin gshags pa rnams la bstod pa yin// skyes bu khyu mchog la yang bsngags pa ste// byang
chub sems dpa' mi zad yon tan tshul// gang dag la ni ting 'dzin 'bad pa// 'di ni zhe sdang zhi bar byams pa bstan// 'di nisnying sdon gyi btang snyoms sa// 'di'i grags pa/
'khaM chen pa dbugs 'byin pa// sang ga'i sgra sgrogs rnams kyis nan tan tu// 'di las sangs rgyas yanas mchog kyang 'byung// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin phyag rgyu sa// ting 'dzin
'di ni 'dren pa dag gis bshad// ting 'dzin zhi brgyal bas bshad pa 'di// thams cad macan pa'i ya shas thob par byed// badrinibyang chub rab zhugs spyod pa ste// bdud kyi sde
rnams shin tu skrag par byed// rgyal bas ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad pa// skyob pa chos la gnas pa'i rig sngags 'di// dgra yi nang du srung ba dam pa sa// phas kyi rgol ba chos
kyi tshar gcod pa// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la brtan byas na// 'di ni spobs pa'i sar yang rab tu bstan// stobs dang rnam thar de bzhin dbang po dang// sangs rgyas chos rnams
bcob rgyud bye brag 'phags// stobs bcu rnams kyang yo ngas su tshol ba ste// sangs rgyas ye shes kyi yang sngas so// skyasa mchog 'jig rten phan zhing thugs brtswa bas// sangs
rgyas chos rnams rab tu bstan pa'i ng yin/ 1sangs rgyas dag gi sras kyis 'di bzung ste// 'di ni rnam thar 'dod pa'i lam du bstan// ting 'dzin zhi ba mthong dka' 'di thos nas//
da la bar gshags sras po dwaga' bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas la shes yongs su rdzogs pa dang// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa tshol ba 'di// rnam dag sams gtsang chon mongs
mar pa yis// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la bstan par gyis// rgyal ba bzhin du da yi lus dag ste// rnam par thar dang yushas rnam grol mthong// 'dod chags 'ching bas rtag tu nyon mi
mongs// ting 'dzin bzang bo 'di la brtan par gyis// zhe sdang sa min gti mug bral ba sta/ bad ba 'dod pa'i ya shas 'byung ba yin// rig pa rgya zhi ma rig 'jig pa ste// ting
'dzin zhi ba 'di la brtan par gyis// rnam grol snying por khyad pa ngoms par bshad// bsam gtan pa la ting 'dzin zhu 'di bstan// sangs rgyas ma slad pa yi spun yin te// ting
'dzin zhi ba 'di la bstan par gyis// 'di ni zhing mang ston pa'i mngon par shas// sangs rgyas mtha' yas ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul to// ting 'dzin 'di nyid sgom par byed pa la// gzungs
da rnams kyang rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur// byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi ba'i gnas// bad na byin rlabs mtha' yas ston pa ste// ting 'dzin ba da na ba snyan par/
khyad pa ni// ya shas phra zhing yangs pa rnam par dag// gang gis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ma thos/ mi rigs brtson pas 'di ni rtogs mi 'gyur yig thams cad rnam par bzlog pa/
sgyu// dbyangs kyis rnam par go bar nus ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' rig pas 'dishos te/ 'chos kyi bdag pos ji ltar gang bshad pa// ting 'dzin 'ad la bstan par byed pa
zhi pa dbag dang sman pa mad pas rtogs// brtson 'grus brtsams pas rang zhu bdi bzung ste// bstan bkur byas shing rtag tu legs par bcangs// ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyan par
byed pa ni// sdug bsngal zad cing skye ba 'gog pa shas// chos rnams kun gyi skya ba mad par bstan// da ltar srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad na// sangs rgyas grags chen dag gi yo shes
mchog ting 'dzin ra ni rgyal pas bshad mdzad dam// gzhonanu da gis tshigs bcad 'di thos nas// khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad rnams// dbyangs kyi rdzas 'gro babod
pa dar thob ste// sangs rgyas ya shas lasan mi ldog gnas// brtan pa'i stobs kyis gzhon nu de la snus// da dung 'jig rten mgon po ra bzhugs so// khye'u khyod la ni
'a00 don 'di 'dra bar bya// ting 'dzin 'di ni khyod kyis su las thos// gzhon nus snyas pa rgyal po gsan du gsol// bdag gis bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas ni/ bya ba khrag
khrib mthong ste ri mor bgyis// ting 'a dzin zhi ba 'a di yang ba dag gis dris// gzhan yang bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang// bskal pabya ba khrag khrig phrag stong du// da dang dar
ba dal gasku ba dran par gyur// nam Ang mngal du skyes par ma gyur to// de nas bdag gis ting 'dzin bani bsgoms te// rgyal ba da dag 'chad pa dag par thos// thos nas bar
pa la mang mos spyad de// nam nur med pas byang chub rag bar bgyi/ dge slong su dag bdag la kun 'dra zhing// ting 'dzin 'di la yongs su chub bgyid pa// da la bdag ni gus
par ri mor bgyi do// 'jig rten don mdzad dag la brtse ba bzhin// su las bdag gi tshigs bcad gcig tsam yang// lung mnos rdzas mthun spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gad dag la yang
bdapa/na ston pa snyam// sangs rgyas bzhin du gus par ri mo bgyid// ting 'dzin yongs su chub par bgyid pa 'di// su dag la la bdag la 'dri ba yang// 'jig rtan 'dran pa rgyal
ra mi 'gyur bar// rmi lam na yang bdag la the tshom med// dag slong rgan rabs bar ma gzhon nu la// bdag ni ri mo gus dang ldan par bgyid// ri mor ldan pas bdag gi snyan pa//
ku// dang Da Da da bzhin bsod nams grags pa yon tan 'phel/ 'thab cing rtsod pa dag la brtson mi bgyid/ 'tsho ba dag ni brtson pa chung bar 'gyur// sdug/
pa bgyis pas 'gro ba gzhan du 'gyur// dag ba bgyis pas 'gro ba gzhan du 'gyur// mi ges brtson par sbyor zhing ma bsdams pa// na dag gzhi mi snyan tshig thos nas/ de tsha
ts+tsa bdag gire ba ba las su 'dzin// las rnams bgyis pa rnam par chud mi'/ da la khro ba'i dbang du mi 'gyur ta/ sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i bzod pa'i stobs 'dzin//
'dren pa dag gis rtag tu bzod pa bsngags// bzod pa bsgoms na byang chub rlud mi dka'// bdag kyang rtag tu tshul khrims ldan par 'gyur// tshul khrims la yang gzhan dag
rang du 'god// tshul khrims bsngags pa rtag tu bdag brjod d// da na bdag gi tshig kyang btsun par gyur// dben pa'i bsngags pa dag kyang rtang ]tu brjod// tshul khrims
la ni rtag par rab gnas te// rtag tu gso sbyong dag kyang 'dzin du stsol// de dag byang chub la yang yang dag btsur// de dag tshangs pa'i spyod la yang dag bstabs// chos
dang dono rnams la yang rab tu gnas// gang la mtha' dang chags pa 'di med pa// byang chub lam la de dag sad par bgyis// bdag dran bskal ba 'das pa'i dus shig na//
rgyal ba sgra yi yan lag dbyangs byung ste/ du I spyan sngar bdag gis dam bcas pa// ba dag ni rtag tu bakhrod pa'i stobs ldan bgyi// yi dam bcas pa de la gnas nas ni// le/
grangs bye ba brgyad cu phrag bzhir yang// bdag la bdud kyis shin tu snyan cingasbyos// 'on kyang bdag gi sams ni yong ma 'khrugs// darani bdud kyis bgams shing sad na yang//
bdag gi byams bzod brtan par 'tshol nas ni// sams dad bdag gi rkang la phyag 'tshal te// lnga brgya byang chub mchog la rab tu zhugs// bdag ni rtag tu sar sna med par gyur//
gtong ba'i bsngags pa dag kyang khor mor 'chad/ phyugatsang nor ldan bdag nyid chen por gyur// mu ga'i tshalung bdag nyid sbyin bdag gyur// nag slong su dag ting 'dzin 'di 'dzin cing
su dgag klog byang su dag lung nod dang// de dag la ni bdag kyang bsAn bkur bgyid// de dag thams cad mi yi mchog tu 'gyur// bdag ni bla namad pa'i las de yis// sangs rgyas
'jig rtan magon po mang po mthong// rgyal ba'i bstan pa la yang rab byung sta// rtag tu chos slab ni mkhas pa ragyur// sbyangs pa la yang rtag tu bdag brtson te/ bsamatha'
dgon pa la yang kho mor gnas// kha zas phyire na tshul 'chos mi bgyid do// nangon tsam dag gis kyang chog shosagyur// bdagan rta tshu phrag dog ma mchis te// bdag ni khyim la'ang
ka/ chags par mi 'gyur ro// khyim la chags pa dag ni phrag dog skya// phrag dog ma mchis nags dgon dga' bar bgyid// bdag ni rtag tu byams la gnas par/
ka gyur/ gshe zhing sdigs kyang khro ba mi spyad de/ byams pa la yang gnas pa des pa yi// snyan pa'i phrang ba phyogs bzhir rab tu mchod// rtag chu chog shes 'dod pa nyung bar gyur//
dgon par gnas shing sbyangs pa'i yon tan brtson// bsod snyoms len pa dag kyang mi gtong ste// sbyangs pa la yang yi dam brtan par gyur// rtag tu dang par bcas shing dad par gyur
kho mor sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa mang// dad pa mang pa' phan yon 'di lags tu// byed bzhin bzang zhing dbang po ma nyams gyur// gang dag 'chad pa rwa la bdag gnas 1 2
bdag ni rtag tu nan tan snying por bgyid// nan tan snying por bgyid la lha klu yang// rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ra mor bgyid// yon tan ji sAd brjod pa 'a de dag dang// gzhan yang/
rnam pa dum mang po yod// sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs par su 'a dod pa// mkhas pa 'di dbad rtag tu bslab par bgyi// 'a di bas chos mang dka' ba spyad pa ni// sngon gyi bskal pa
[ ]du mar mang spyad dran// da ltar de dag brjod par mi nus kyis// bde bar gshegs pa'i drung du na mchi'o// byang chub sams dpa' shes rab rno mkhas das// de yi mod la mngon shes/

ba[d/]lnga thos nas// de yang srog chags bya ba brgyad cu dang// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rgyal ba'i drung du song// brtan pa'i stobs kyang mchog tu dga' rangs nas// da tshe bya ba brgya phrag drug cu dang/
da bzhin gshags pa'i drung du nyaralhags ta// zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas ni spyan sngar 'dug/ rgyal po de la lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas// rkangaganyis dpang pos ting 'dzin M 'di
bshad do// rgyal poras kyang ting 'a dzin bad thos nas// rgyal srid btang sta ma chags rab tu byung// rab tu byung nas ting 'dzin 'di la sgom// klog cing 'chad de rab tu ston par byed
bskal pa drug tu 'das pa'i 'og tu da// parma bla ma zhes bya rgyal bar gyur// rgyal po lhan cig rgyal ba'i srung 'ongs pa// bya ba brgya phrag drug cu mi nyung ba// de dag kyang ni ting 'dzin 'di
thos nas// de tshe dga' zhing mgu bas rab tu byung// de dag rab tu byung nas ting 'dzin 'di// bzung zhing bklags te rab tu ston par khyod// bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu 'das nas ni//
bsal pa gcig la byang chub mchog rag ste// mtshan ni ya shas bla ma many+dza' yas pa// lha mis mchod pa sangs rgyas rnams su gyur// de la rlung gnyis gtso bo ra ros kyang// samA
can d+hA'i bya sAd grol bar byas/ byang chub spyod pa mchog 'di spyod pa na// nga ni rgyal po dpal gyi stobs su gyur/ gang gi bu dag lnga brgya yod pa yang// rjes su chos rnams skyong ba
ba de dag yin// de tsho gang su nga yi mar gyur pa// da ni lha mo sgyu 'phrul nyid can te/ dbye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir tshang ba yi// nga yi bu mo de kun mya ngan 'a dus//
ka stobs brtan zhes bya rgyal po gang byung ba// rab tu mdzod mang 'khor los sbyar ba'i mchog/ de tshe rgyal po zas gtsang du yin te// da dang der yang nga yi yab tu gyur/ da ltar ngas ni/
bskal pa bye stong du// le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa yis// byang chub mchog 'di yang dag sgrub pa na// ting 'dzin yongs sutshol ba rnam par dag/ gzhon nu da phyir byang chub
sams dpa' gang// ting 'dzin 'di la sgom par 'dod pa dag/ brtson 'grus brtsams shing srog la mi lta bar// gzhon nu rtag par nga yi rjes su slobs// sangs rgyas mang po lo ting
'dzin gyi sgo'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu bdun pa'o/// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu de lta bas na 'byung chung
zlasams dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting du 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ rab tu 'don pa dang/ lung nod pa dang/ kha ton byad
pa dang/ gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de la/ yon tan gyi phan yon bzhir rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams bril gyi mi non par 'gyur/ phas kyi
[2/ ]rgol ba rnams kyis mi rje bar 'gyur/ ya shas dang ga chu med par 'gyur// spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la
ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ rab tu 'don pa dang/ lung nod pa dang/ kha tonapyad pa dang/ gzhan la yang rgya char
rab tu ston pa de la/ yon tan gyi phan yon 'di bzhi yod par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis da'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi
spyod yul ba/ ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzungan// rtag da yi dus su bsod nams kyang/ shin tu zil gyis ma non 'gyur// byang chub spyod pa bya brag 'phags// mchog tu dag pa
spyod pa na// dpa' bo rtag pa'i dus su yang// bsod nams dag gis bsrung bar 'gyur/ de la phas kyi rgol ba dag/ su yang 'tsho bar yong mi byed// rtag pa'i dus su sangs
rgyas kyis// yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba yin// rtag pa'i dus su o shes kyang// dpag tu mad par 'gyur ba yin// zhi ba'i rtan 'di 'dzin pa ni// spobs pa dag kyang mtha' yas/
'gyur// ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'daM rab bzung nas// rtag tu bsod nams phung po zil ma non// byang chub spyad pa dam pa spyod pa na// phas kyi rgol ba med cing mi tshugs 'gyur//
da a ya shas yangs shing rna bar 'gyur// de bzhin slobs pa dag kyang mtha' yas 'gyur// mig kyang dag 'gyur rtag tu mkhas pa de// dran pa'i stobs dang gzungs/
da kyi stobs kyang 'byung// don gyi tshig rnams rab tu ston byed na// mkhas pa dag gis shin tu yid 'ong 'gyur// ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di ni rab bshad na// shes rab ldan pa skye bo mang pos
tsa rig/ ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na// chos gos dam pa mchog dang mal cha dang// mgron du gnyer dang bza' zhing bca' ba 'ang rnyed// shin tu gzhon zhing blta na sdug par
'khaM/ 'gyur// ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab tshol na// sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po mang po mthong// 'dren pa dpag la mtshungs med mchod pa byed// de la bar chad dag kyang 'byung
mi 'gyur// ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na// sams dag 'a tshigs bcad snyan pa brgya dag gis// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar bstod 'gyur te// dani nyams par
nam yang yong mi 'gyur// ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na// de yi mdun du 'jig rten mgon po ni// mtshan dang dpa khyad mdzes ba'i sku bzhugs te/ yi nas nyams
patshe da pa yong mi 'gyur// ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'darab bzung na// nam yang zhum pa'i sams sum 'gyur te// rtag tu phyug cing dbul po ma yin gyur// sams kyang 'dzin cing chags
ba[4]]par yong mi 'gyur// ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog la de rab bzung na// mi khom par yang gnas par mi 'gyur te// sa bdag 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// de yi rgyal srid rtag tu bar
bar 'ong/ bskal pa brgyar ni bshad kyang mi zad de/ gal shas angs pa de la the tshom mad// ting 'dzin zhi ba'i sa 'di thos nas ni// brtan pa ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin gnas/ bskal/
ba bya ba mtha' yas dpag med du// stobs bcu de gi phan yon brjod na yang// cha tsam du ni yongs su brjod mi 'gyur// rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs blangs pa bzhin// de tshe gzhon nu de yang rang
dga' bas// langs nas rab tu thal sbyar phyag 'tshal te// mgu rang stobs bcu a ni mngon sum 'dug/ tshig rab mchog gis ched du rjod pa brjod// 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa//
mi btsos 'di dag jitsam du// phan yon legs par rab bshad pa// dpa' bo chen po bsam mi khyab// phyi ma'i dus na su dag ni// mdo sde 'di la zhan par 'gyur// phan par dgongs shing/
thugs brtsab// dpa' bo chen po bdag la gsungs// ka la bde'i sgra dbyangs kyis// ston pas ra la bshar mdzad de// bcom ldan chags mar e shes can// tshig kyang 'di skad rab
tugasung// su dag chos kyi rdzas slob cing// mdo sde 'di ni nyan 'gyur pa// nan tan bla na mad pa yang// gzhon nu bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// sangs rgyas ye shes rab tshol bas//
ma dbang dag la mchod byed tsang/ khyams ra'isams la bstan byed pa// mdo sde 'di ni nyan par 'gyur// sbyangs pa'i yon tan o khyad bsAngs// yon tan
ka mchog la bsnyan byas shing// nan tan la yang gnas nas su// mdo sde 'di ni nyan par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po'i bstan pa la/ gang gis tshul khrims bshog pa dang/ sdig pa/
khyad pa'i lag nas ni// mdo sde 'di yang thos ma 'gyur// dpa' bo tshangs par spyod pa dang// gang gi sams kyang mi bskum zhing// sangs rgyas dag gis byin rlabs ra// na rag 'ag
yaM nas thos par 'gyur// gang gi sngon gyi sangs rgyas nas// 'jig rten mgon po ri mor byas/ de dag lag nas mdo sde 'di// phyi ma'i nus na thos par gyur// gang dag tshe rab snga ma la//
'alaM mu stags gzhan du gyur pa ni// de dag mdo sde 'di thos na// yide ni dga' zhing bdaram 'gyur// nga yi bstan pa 'di la ni// 'tsho ba 'dod phyir rab byung nas/ nod dang bkur stis zil
gyis non// gcig la gcig kyang gnod par byed// dag slong mang po ma bsdams pa// gzhan gyi bud mad rab snyags shing// tshul khrims 'chal pa non pa 'don// mdo sde 'di la dad mi
byan// sangs rgyas banas pa'i bsod nams dang// bsam gtan thob pa mi 'dod cing// bdag tu 'du shes gnas pa dag/ mdo sde 'di la dad mi khyon// phyima'i dus na 'byung ba ni/
'a 'jig rtan bsam gtan 'bras bu 'dzin// dgra bcom bsod snyoms bros nas kyang// sangs rgyas byang chub smod par byed// 'dzam bu yi ni gling 'di ni// mchod rtan ci yod kun bshig
pas (gong gas ma do rtsa la de spangs na// sdig pa 'di'i khyad par cha// gang gis gang+ga'i bya sAr kyi/ dgra bcom dag ni bsad pa bas// gang gis mdo sde 'di spangs na// sdig ra/
'di ni khyad par cha// mi bzad pa yi phyi dus la// dam pa'i chos ni 'jig pa'i tshe// mdo sde 'di ni rab bshar ra ra// khyon la su dag spro ba yod// da tsho gzhon nu langs nas ni// du
zhing rgyal la 'a de skad gsol/ sangs rgyas thugs kyi sras pa yis// 'di skad sang ga'i sgra yang bsgrub sa// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan 'a das// mi zad ra i phyi dus la// lus
dang srog kyang rab btang ste// bdag gis ma do sde rgyas par bgyi// byis pa rnams kyi mi bden pa// brgyad ring sbyos pa bzod par bgyi/ gsho ba dang ni bsdigs pa yang// 'a drin
pa dang du blang bar bgyi// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la// ngan sams bdag ni bskyed pa 'am// gang ston bdag gis sdig pa yi// lasa rnams bgyis pa byang bar bgyi// spyi bo
lan phyag bzhag ste// sangs rgyas gsar gyi mdog 'dra ba// de bzhin gshags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs// zla 'od la ni ston pa gsung// gzhon nu phyi ma'i dus dag la// khyod kyi tshas/
par spyod pa dang// srog gi bar chad mi 'byung bar// khyod la byin gyis brlabs par bya// chos smra ba ni gzhan dag kyang// brgyad brgyu po dag langs nasasu// phyi/
dus la bdag cag kyang// mdo sde ba de ni 'dzin pa lags/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin yang// bya ba brgya bcu nyar lhags te// gzhan yang khrag khrige drug cu rnams/ 'jig
rten mgon la 'di skad sa// dag slong dag ni bod rnams las/ da ring su dag langs pa rnams// phyi dus detsho bdag cag gis// 'dren pa rab tu bsrung bar bgyi// mdo sde
'di no bshad pa'i// ston pa yin phyin bas kyis// gang+gA'i bya ma mnyam pa yi// sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// zhing rnams ji sAd rab g.yos pa/ kun tu
sangs rgyas sgra la pa dang// 'jig rten mgon pos rab btso sku ni dag gis kyang chos rab bstan// zhing ra so so ra rar yang// sems can bya bas mi khyab// na tsha ra'i 'dra'i
tshos thos nas// sangs rgyas kyi ni cha shos bkono// sangs rgyas kyi yang zhing 'di nas// soms can bya ba dgu bcu rnams/ byang chub kyi ni sams bskyod de// sangs rgyas
la'angal tog 'ar/ bskal pa bya ba brgyadazhu na// kha skal pa gcig la thams cad kyang// rnam par 'dren pa nyid 'gyur zhes// ra dag mi gtsos lung bstan to//
wa dag slong dang ni de'i slong la/ dag pa snyan pa dang dag bsnyan ma// srog chags bye ba bdun cu drug gang dag mdo sde 'di thos pa// da dmag mi gtsos lung bstan to// byang chub spyod/
ba rab spyod cing// gang+gA'i bya ma mnyam pa yi// 'jig rtan 'a dran pa mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas ya shes rab tshol bas// thams cad la yang mchod pa byan// mdo sdaklan
tshadar 'di// de dang der yang thos par 'gyur// byams pa yi ni sangs rgyas la// bla na med pa'i mchod byas te// dam pa'i chos mchog gzung nas ni// bde ba can du 'grobar
'gyur// gang na sangs rgyas rdul bral ba// tshonar ga med pa da bzhin gshegs// de la byang chub mchog gi phyir// mchod pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur// mdo sde dam pa 'di thos na///
ma 'ongs pa yi bskal par ni// grangs med bdun cu rtsa gsum du// ngan 'gro rnams su yongs mi 'gro// phyi ma'i dus la su dag ni// mdo sde dam pa nyan 'gyur zhing// mchimaklog
par byed pa yang// de dag kun gyis nga la mchod// ji snyadamadun na 'dug pa rnams// thams cad la yang bsgo bya ste// ngas ni dga' bas thob pa yin/ byang chub 'di yang yongs su
gtad// ting nge 'dzin rjes su gtad pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad do// skadi nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu de lta bsan/
byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshos sgom cad rang bzhin mnyam pa nyide rnam par spros pa'i nying de 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab cing/
ka dang khag tu mad pa thos nas/ mi skrag par bkod pa dang/ mi dngang bar 'dod pa dang/ rangang bar mi 'gyur bar 'dod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas
par bya'o sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par bya'o/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su dri ba la ma bas par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam
gyis mi khyab pa yongs su btsal ba la mkhas par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas/ mi skrag mi dang nga/ rangang bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o// de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
da ltar ji lta bur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sams na pa'i chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis ma khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas ra lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi bya ba
ba la chos pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dri ba la mkhas pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos na/ mi skrag ma rangang da ngang par mi 'gyur
[o/]lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad cas bka' stsal to// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sa/
thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spos pa ni ting nge 'dzin pa ni nan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang/ kun chung par spyad pa dang/ bcang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ rab tu 'don ra dang
nyon mongs pa med par snyoms pas sgom par byed pa dang/ mang du byan pa dang/ gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rang gzhu ston n gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sams rar ba chen po// sangs
rgyas kyi chos bsam gyisa'i khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dri ba la
ma khas ba dang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos pa// mi skrag mi rang nga dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// yang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyir rnam par sbos ra'i tingang
'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon ba sgrub pa'i tshig 'di/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la nges par bstan pan/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
mnyam ba nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i tshig dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa// bcom ldan nas las thos nas/ de'i tsha zla 'od gzhon nur
gyur pas/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par sos pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di rab tu thob bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
ka grangs mad dpag tu med pa yang mngon la bshas pa thob par gyur to// sems can dpag tu med pa yang snying rje chen por 'jug pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i sams skyas so// stong gsum gyi stong
chan po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu la os/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul kaldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu
ltel/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu ba zhugs 'chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu bur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu bur 'ur/ shar phyogs
dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' nabyang phyogs mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho/ dbus dma'an

zla mtha'i mtho zhing snang ba da ra ga tu med pa yang 'jig rten du byung/ lha'i sbosakyi char chen pa yang mngon par bab go/ lha dang lha'i bu ji snyad chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus taM/ lhags pa de dag namakha'
la mngon par 'phags nas/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon gyi tshigs dpag tu ma da ra 'di dag thos nas/
[e ]lha rang lha'i bu de dag thams cad dga' mgu yid rangs taM/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ tshim pa dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas/ a la la zhes ga zha sgrogs pa'i sgra byed do// lha'i ma tog
rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ma tog gi char chen po 'babaso// lha'i sil snyan bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang rab tu brdung ngo// brjod pa gcig pa'i dbyangs kyis tshig 'di skad ces 'dzam
to// a la la ba dag cag gis ni rnyid pa legs par nad ra/ 'ani ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das las yon tan gyi phan yon bsgrub ra 'i tshig dar ga tu mad pa 'di dag thos na
bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad kyang cig char mthun par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla'od gzhon nur gyur pas ji ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa
nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa da bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin
'di thob par bgyi'o// de nas rang tsho bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das 'khor rgya mtsho'i nang na chos ston pa la dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can zhes bya ba rim gro dang/
bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ sil snyan lnga brgya dang bcas te/ nam mkha' las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ ra nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lta can 'di snyam
ru sams te bdag bas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi lha'i bdun sa chos bzang na ji lta ba bzhin du rim gro dang/ bsnyan
ka bkur bya'o// glu dbyangs dag ji ltar len pa de bzhin du/ dang lha'i lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yang mchod pa'i phyir glu dbyangs
rab tu sbyor ro// de nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can sil snyan thogs pa lnga brgya po de dag dang/ sgra gcig tu sbyar te/ pi wang gi khog pa ba rgyun las byas pa dag kyang thogs nas//
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'a dag 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ra ji lta bu mngon par 'du byed pas/ zla 'od
gzhon nur gyur pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa des par rtogs pa la mkhas pa 'thob pa dang/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge
'dzin las mi g.yo ba dang/ dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga kun la yang rgyud kyi sgra rang/ gru'i sgra la mkhas pa bstan par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ngas bya'o snyam mo//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi many+tsasaM silaM stan lnga brgya pa shin tu legs par sbyar ba
[a]]legs par blangs pa na dag las bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don dang ldan pa chos nyid dang ldan pa'i sgra byang ngo// sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nges par rtogs pa'i tshigs subasur/
pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo// sku yi khyon la sangs rgyas mang po ni// gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma dzi yod snyadaM// rgyal ba de dag zhing yang ra spur de/ de dag mtshan nyid mi 'dra skal mi mnyam/ sku
ya khyon la 'gro ba lnga rnams te/ sems can dmyal dang dud 'gror 'gro ba dang// ga shin rje'i 'jig rten lha dang mi rnams zhugs// badres pa mdacing gnon par 'gyur ba'ang mar//
ra yi gnas su mtsho dang rgya mtshor bcas// chu klung de bzhin nga tsho 'u lteng ka rnams// 'dres pa med cing gnod par mi 'gyur te// de ltar rgyal ba'i chos ni bsam mi khyab// rnami gnas
su ri bo du ma ste// khor yul rang lhun po rab lhunaM dang// btang bzung dang na btang bzung chan rapo dang// 'a bags khyod bya rgod phung po gangs kyi raM// gnas rir sems can dmyal ba
mi bzad pa// tsha dang rab tu tsha ba nyams mi dga'/ du na sems can dmyal skyes tshor ba yi// sdug bsngal de dag rjes su myong bar byed// ra yi gnas na lha yi gzhal med khang
da dag dang ga tshad bcu gnyis dbyangs dga' ba// lha rnams stong phrag mang ro de dag kyang// lha yi dga' ba shin tu bde ba myong// de yi gnas su sangs rgyas rnams sku zhing// 'jig
nyis brgya
rtan rig pa'i bstan pa 'bar ba snang// gang gas rnam dag spyod pa ma sbyangs pa// a shes bral ba dag gis de mi mthong// de yi gnas nyid na yang chos nubacing
'dran ra mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra yang thos/ 'dra yi gnas nyid na yang la la las// 'dren pa bzhugs te chos kyang ston byas thos/ da yi gnas nyur na yang la la dag/ tshe tshad lo na
bsam yas bzhugs snyam 'dzin// de yi gnas na 'ang 'chi ba'i dusakhyadacing/ ring du mi 'tsho zhes ni sgra yang thos// gnas dar la la 'di snyam 'du shes te// yid kyi 'du shas
dang ni 'dzin pa yis// bar ga shags mthong mchod sa sa rgyus ma nas dus snyam/ skyes ra mad cing mchod pa byas pa'i ng med// mi dag bdag gis khyim n rmi lam bzhin// 'dod
T+Tha pa'i yon tan dag la dga' myong nas// phyir sad nas kyang da yis gdod ma mthong/ de ni rmi lam yin par re yis shes// de bzhin mthong thos rig dang bya brag phyed// 'di dag thamA
cad ma bdan rmi lam bzhin// gang gis ting 'dzin 'di ang thobagyur pa// rasan chos kyi rang bzhin 'di dag shes// su la'ang sdug dang mi sdug mad pa ni// mir 'jig rten na yang
khas ru bzhin du 'jig rtan 'di na gnas// nam mkha' la ni rlung dag rgyu ba bzhin// lam rnams sgom shing lo shas rab tu zhugs// chos rnams thams cad stong pa bdag med par
chos rnams 'di dag gang gis rab bsgoms pa// de yi spobs pa dag no mtha' yas 'gyur// su dag 'jig rtan n na yid chags med// nanag sems zhi rtag tu rlung dang 'dra// sdug
