yang dag rig pa myur du mngon sum byed// tshig gi rgyun mi 'chad rnying slebs ngar ldan// mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig ston par byed// sangs rgyas byang chub myur du de 'dzin de// 'dren pa dag gi bstan pa yong
susrung// des ni pha rol rgol ba kun bcom ste// sangs rgyas kyi yang byang chub rgyas par byed// byang chub sems dpa' deni shi 'phos nas// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams su 'gro/ 'tshodapag med
[7s/ ]las chos bzang mchog thos nas// skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa 'thob// nga' gas nga ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo// bam po dgu pa/
gzhon nu byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po dgon par gnas pa lhur byed pa dag gi phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste 1 bya ba nyung bar gnas pa dang/ 'du 'dzi ring banas
kyang ring du song ba dang/ de la rtsod pa med par 'gyur ba dang/ gnod pa med par gnas pa dang 2 zag pa 'phel bar mi byed pa dang/ rtsod pa'i gzhir mi byed pa dang/ shin tu zhi bar spyod pa dang
shin tu bsn gnas par gnas pa dang/ thar pa mthun pa'i sems kyi rgyud du 'gyur ba dang/ myur du rnam par grol ba mngon sum du byed pa ste/ gzhon nu bcu po 'di dag ni byung chub sems dngapo'asem/
dpa' chen po dgon par gnas pa lhur byed ra'i phan yon no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// rtag tu bya ba nyung bar 'gyur// 'du 'dzi dag kyang ring du spong// nags khrod gcig du gnas pa ni//
rtsod pa dag kyang de la med// gnod pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// zag pa rnam par 'phel mi byed// de la rtsod gzhi mi 'byung ste// dgon par gnas pa'i yon tan 'di// lus dang ngag yid rab
bsdamasato// den bar zhi bar spyod// thar pa dang ni mthun gyur cing// rnam par grol ba myur du reg/ rnal 'byor pa ni rtag tu bya ba nyung// 'du 'dzi mang po'i nyes pa kun sdongs te/ de
rnal 'byor pa dag nam yang rtsod ma byed// dgon par gnas pa'i phan yon 'di dag go/ nam zhig de ni 'dus byas skyo gyur cing// 'jig rten du rigang la'ang gnod pa
byad zag pa drag kyang phel bar mi byed pa// nags khrod gnas pa de yi phan yon yin// de la rtsod gzhi nam yang mi 'byung ste// rtagatu zhi la dga' zhing rabenupar spyon//lus dang ngag dang yid
rgyu kyang bsdams pa ste// dgon par gnas pa de la yon tanamang// de ni thur pa dang yang mthun gyur te// nags khrod gnas shing rnam grol de ston pas// rnam grol zhi ba myur du des rtogs 'gyur//
'di kun dgon par gnas pa'i yon tan yin// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod snyoms sbyod pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byadabasnyungs pa la gnas pa'i phan yonan 'di
bcu ste/bcu gang zhan/ 'di lta stegade shas kyi khe'adod pa ma yin pa dang/ de snyan pa 'dod pa ma yin pa dang/ de rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pa ma yin pa dang/ de 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la
gnas pa dang// de tshul 'chos pa dang/ khagagags med bar 'gyur pa dang/ de bdag la mi bstod gzhan la mi smod pa dang/ de rjes su chags pa dang/ de khong khro ba sbyangs pas gzhan gyi khyim
du spyod pa dang/ zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang desbyangs pa'i yon tan yopyad bsungs pa lags shing chos bstan pa bzung bar 'gyur ba yin te/ gzhon nu bcu po 'di
dgazhi byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po bsod snyoms spyod ba sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bskungs pa la gnas apa'i phan yon no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sbyangs pa dag la gang gnas pa//
shes kyi khe yang mi 'dod cing// snyan pa la yang mi ston to// rod dang ma red mtshungs pa'i yid/ sbyangs pa dag la gang phanas nga// 'phags pa'i rigs ni mi gtong zhing// tshul 'chos pa dang
kha gsag rnams// thams cad ring du rnam par spong// bdag nyid la ni mi bstod cing// gzhan dag yang stod mi byed// khong khro rjes su chagasamed cing// zang zing mer par chos ston to//
de yi tshig kyang gzung bar 'gyur// bsod snyoms yon tan 'di dag go/ shes kyi khe dang snyan dang rnyed mi tshor/ ko'aphags pa'i rigs bzhi la ni gnas gyur te// mkhas pa tshula' chos kha bas
med pa yin// srungs la brtson pa'i yon tan 'di 'dra'o// bdag la mi stod gzhan la mi smod cing/ nub mor gas kyang 'khrug par yong mi 'gyur// bsngags pa thos kyang dga' ba
mi skyed de// den bsod snyoms dag gis mgu bar 'gyur// chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing med par sbyin// do ni red dang bkur stimi tshol te// de yisa bshad pa dag kyang gzung bar 'gyur//
sbyangs par brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin// gzhon nu de lta bu'i tshos kyi yon tan la gnas pa'i byang chupho sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgon pa la gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gar ren par 'gyur
/@#// chos kyi gter med par 'gyur/ ye shes kyi gter rnyed par 'gyur/ sngon gyi na tha' dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang/ da ltar byung ba shes pa'i gter rnyed par 'gyur 'o// gzhon nu ji ltar/
[n ]na byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyigater rnyed par 'gyur zhen/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dben pa na spyod cing/ dgon par gnasas
(mngon par shes pa lnga 'thobaste/lta gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i mig dang/ la'i rna ba dang/ pha rol gyi se nus zhes pa dang/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul te/
pa/gzhon nu mngon par shes pa 'ad lnga thob par 'gyur ro// da mi'i las 'das pa'i lha'i mig gis[]shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasagrangs med dang ga tu med pa rnams mthong ngo//nga bzhin/
dulho dang/ nubadang/ byang phyogasakyisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grongs pa dang ga tu med pa rnams mthong ste/ des ngas rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// gzhon nu de ltar na/ byang chub
nyims dpa' sems dpa' chen posangs rgyas kyi gter rud pa yin no// gzho skyu ji ltar nabyung chub snyams dang las dpa' chen po chos kyi gtar rnyed pa yin na na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad/
de dag phyogs bcu na chos ci ston pa de yang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen pos lha'irnaba'i khams kyis thos te de chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// gzhonanu de ltar na byang chub semA
da pa 'a sems dpa' chen po tshes kyi gter red pa yin no// gzhon nu ji ltar n byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi gter rnyed pa yin zhan/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po ye shes de dang ldan pas/ chos thams cad 'dzin te/ kun bzung nas mibarjod cing sems can rnams la chos ston te/ gang gi don gang yin pa de yang rab tu 'os so// gzhon nu de lta
na byang chub sems dang bsams dpa' chen po ye shes kyi gter rnyed pa yin no// gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi ma'imatha' dang/ da ltar byung ba
shes pa'i gter rud pa yin zhe na/ de mngon par shes pas 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa shes pa la 'jugaste/ gzhonanudo ltar

na byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po sngon gyimatha' dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang/ de ltar byung ba shes pa'i gter red pa yin no// gzhon nu mngon byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i
chos la gnas pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur te/den thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dngam yin na/ pha rol rgol ba thams cad lta ci smos/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste
mkhas pa rtag tu dgon gnas te// sangs rgyas gter dang chos kyi gter// ye shes gter dang sngon mtha' gter// mngon shes lnga yang myur du 'thob// phan yon bcu'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa lasaka' stsal pa/gzhonanu de lta bas na/ lha'i 'khor los sgyurapa'i rgyalasrid kyi bad
ba yang spangs te/ rab tu byung ngo zhes gzhonanu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya// gzhon nu rab tu byung nas kyang spungs pa yon tan yo byad bsrungs pa la gnas shing dben lor gnas pa dang/
blobazod pa dang des ra phun sum tshogs par bya'o// gzhon namago dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus brtsomasatwA/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhinamanyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge
'dzin 'di mnyam par bya/gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya bcang par bya/ bklags par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya lung mnod cing kha ton du/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i sgom pas bsgom par bya/
mang du bya/ gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// gzhon nu bse ru lta bur gyur pas gnyis su med par dgon par nags la ba chu rtag tu gnas par bya'o// gzhon nu bdag nyid
yongs su gtong bas kyang sems can de dag gi don bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe don de nyir brjod pa'i phyir zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung pa'i le'u'adi gas su na
pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan to// 'das pa'i bskal pa brgya mang kha dran te// grags pa mtha' yasa'adren pagang byung ba// lha mikru yitshigs kyis mtshon pa ste// mtshan ni gaN+Di/

[zj]brjid tshogs rgyal rgyal ba yin// rtagaslong bye ba phrag bcu drug mngon bshegayang dag rig dang dbangagi pha rol phyin// spungs tshul yo byad bskyangs pa zhiba'i yid// de yi dus na de yi tshogs rnams byung//

grong khyer bye ba brgya phrag bdun cu drug/ dpag tshad lnga yi tshod dang mnyam pa ste// rin chen sna bdun bye brag 'phags pa'i mchog/ de tsho 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir byung bar gyur// de tshagrong mchog dam pa/
kun kyang// bskyed mos tshal brgya mang pos rab tu brgyan// bskyodamos tshal kun stug pa'i sprin bzhin du// ma tog 'bras bus brgyan cing shing rnams rgyas// bza' shing rigs kyang sna tshog
mdzes pa dag/ la a mu dzam bu banas dkrigs// kar ni tsamo pa punan brgya yis kyang// bskyed mos tshala mchog de dag rab tu brgyan// n+ya gro da 'as bya mang sgra 'byin te// khu byug ka la pid

rma bya brgya// shang shang te'u dang kun l sgra 'byin pa// byatshogs mang ngo de tshosnyan par sgrog/ ngang pa'i rgyal po dang sku 'drab rung/ khung ba ku nal sgra dbyangs mchog sgrog sta//yan lag bkra zhing tsho

tsho kha dog 'bar// shin tu yid 'ong sgra 'dzin dga' kha 'byin// de'i dus bya mang de dag 'dus gyur to// ka la bid rma bya ne tso dang/ khu byugari skegs bya rnams sna tshogs pa// bya mang de dag sna tshogi
sgra yang 'byin// skyed mos tshal brgya dgan de dag gnas// gtang thung mya ngan 'tshang dngabaraMshaka/ a ti gtame tog 'dab ma dang// pad+ma ut+pal ku mud pad+madakor// pad+ma 'dab
nu@#// stong brgya yis rab tu brgyan// me togade dag rdzing bu mdzes par byed// srin 'gos mchog dam pas so sor brgyan// rdzing bu sdug cing shin tu mdzes par gyur// de

ka 'dzam bu gling 'dir rgyal po ni// mi dbang brtan mas byin zhes bya ba byung// de yi bu yang brgya phrag lnga yodade// byad bzhin bzang zhing shin tu blta na sdugaM/ de tshe rgyal srid zhi zhing bde bar gyur
sbyo gtsob mdatung dbyangs dga' rnal du bab// 'dzam bu'i gling yang lo tog mang pos brgyan// lha yi gnas dang mtshungs shing bye brag med// detsho sdogamid stobs bcu ldan pa yi// rgyal ba'i
ni ting 'dzin mchog 'di'achar// srid pa'i 'gro ba rmi lam lta bu ste// 'di la su yang mi skye 'chi ba med// sems can ming dang srog kyang mi snyan de// chos 'di rnams ni rmi lam chu shing 'dra//
sgyu ma lta bu nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste// chu yi zla ba 'dra zhing smig rgyu bzhin// mig 'jig rten der yang hU~M nas nii// 'jig rten gzhan du 'pho zhing 'gro med kyang// las byas rnams nam yang
med mi 'gyur// 'khor ban yang dkar gnag 'khrus bu smin// rtago pa ma yin chud par mi 'gyur te// las drasags med cing gnas pa dag kyang med// de yang byas nas reg par mi 'gyur min//
gan gyis byas pa dbar 'gyur ba'ang med// 'pho ba med cing phyir yang 'ong ba med// thams ca na yod pa'i ng ma yin med pa min// 'dzin lta gnas 'jug pa dag pa man// sems can spyod pa rab tu 'jug
ramed/ bde gshegs spyod yul rgyal ba'i yon tan ni// skye med zhi ba mtshan ma med pa'i gnas// stobs dang gzungs rnams dang ni stobs bcu'i stobs// 'di ni sangs rgyas khyu mtshog gyur pa'i
mchog/ dkar po'i chos mchog yon tan bsags pa ste// yon tan ye shes gzungs dang stobs rnams dang// sgyu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bya ba'i mchog/ mngon shes mchog lnga 'thob padamara'i
tshul 'dar ni rang zhin gang na'ang shes pa med// 'gro rang 'jugamed mkhas pachos kyis 'gros//chos kyidabyings ni gar yang mi 'go ste// de 'dra'i 'gro ba 'gro mad chos kyi 'gros// dbyangs kyi tshogs
med ngo bo nyidakyi 'gros/ 'gro ba'i rang bzhin gang du'ang mi gnas te// mi gnas mi rtan rang bzhin 'jug pa ni// rgyal ba'i spyod yul rdul bral zhi ba'i gnas// zhi ba rab zhi dbar zhi ba'i 'gros//
'gro ba de ni gar yang mi gnas te// rtag tu dngos po'i rang bzhin rjes su song// mkhas shing mig la mthong dka 'a shin tu gnas// de ni mi g.yo bdag nyid gnas pa ste// mi gnas ma 'ongs rang
bzhin gnas pa yin/ rang bzhin gnas pa bshad par mi nus te// den stong pa mi g.yo chos kyi gnas// dbyangs kyis bshad kyang dpyangs kyi 'jug pa med// dbyangs kyi rang bzhin 'jug mchog
kyi 'gros// dbyangs kyi tshogs gnas nang na'ang yod ma yin// de ltar rang bzhin 'jug pa chos kyi 'gros// 'gros kyi sgrar gsungs sems can 'gro ba mor// mos kyi rang bzhin mkhas
don 'gro ba pa// dungs kyang brjod du sa nag can 'gro ba med// dbyang sa rnams ma red soms can 'gro ba yod// mtha' dang mtha' med ma yin dbus 'azo yod// yod da ma
ka yazhi phyogs su'agro ba med// rang bzhin 'grub ci 'dra shes pa// rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa 'dirig mnyam// rdul bra' rnam par dag pa don dam gnas// zhi zhing rab zhi rdul mad rdul bral//
sgyu rtog dang rlom soms mdab rab zhi nas// rgyal bathugs rje'i mchog ldan snyon par mdzad// 'di la yi ge spyod pa yod ma yin// 'gro ba ya dras shing yangs dog 'gro ba ste//sangs rgyas dag gas
bsnyan cing rgyal bas bstod// snang ba'i chos kyi tshulani 'jug pa phra/ de la gnas nas bde gshegs mtshungs med pa// chos kyi gter ni rdul bral gdwapa dang// rin chen chos rnams rdul bral

don dam stong// zhi ba'i don la 'jug pa ston bar mad// rkang gnyis gtso bas ting 'dzin 'du bshad nga// rgyal po brtan byin gyis nadi tsho thos/ de ni bya ba khrag khrig brgyad cu dang// rgyal ba snying rje
sgyu na drung rtag tu 'ong// rgyal ba stobs ldan gus ba rab skyed de// zhabs la ma ye bdag po phyag 'tshal nas// da cha stobs bcu ldan pa'i spyan sngar 'dug/ rab tu dga' zhing sor bcu thal mo sbyag/
de yi spyod nga yosasu dga'i gnas// dbang po dag la dbangag pha rol phyin// ma mchog rgyal ba mos pa mkhyen pa yis// de la ting 'dzin dam pa 'di bshad do// rgyal po de ni don dam 'di thosatsho
'di 'dra'i dga' ba mtshungs med skyes nas su// gling bzhi dag kyang thums cad rnam spangs te// 'dod pa bor nas khyim nas mngon bar byung// rgyal bar 'gyur zhig byang chub ton tu yang// nam tsA
rgyal bos sa bor rab byung tshe// 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan bad yi mi kun gyis// 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam sbyangs rab tu byung// de tshe stobs bcu'i yon tan rgyu cha sta// brtson 'di dag slong ma dang
dag slong mang// de tshe ma rmos ma btab ci 'khrungs te// lha rnams kyang n g.yog dang bsnyen bkur byed// dur smige chos gos gsum dag byung bar gyur// dra ba mnyam zhing grub legs dpa mad la//
dri ma med cing rdul bral gsar brgyan pa// sangs rgyas yon tan bsod nams stobs las byung// gzhon nu ltos shig rgyal mchog de lungani// sa rnams thams cad nams rab byung na// zad
ba'i dus na sems can mang po dag/ shin tu longs spyod chung yang khyim mi gtong/ shing sgrog dang na bcing ba mad pa mang// gshazhing spyi'i sdug bsngal mi dga' dang// bla ma'i chad pa mang po bzod
nga ra byed// longs spyod chung ba khyim na bza' ba mad// shin tu tshe mang thung la nor yang med// rab tu bag chung bsod nams stobs kyang yod// ma mkhas bzo yigenas kyang mnges te//
dbul po'i gyur cing khyim na nor yang mad// dri ma ma dag gzhan gyis budachod chags// phrag dog byed cade shin tu btsam pa mad// nyon mongs chos ldan tshul la ma nas kyang// da ni sangs rgyas/
nyid du 'gyur zhes skya// gsug gse sku zhange bab chol byed pa dag/ ngani phyug po 'jig rten chos nor sbyin// gnod ba byed cing tshul 'chos sgyu ma dag/ da nisangs rgyas nyid/
du 'gyur zhes smra// gzhan dag bsad tsang bcing dang gtsal dga'// tshul khrims 'chal pa ma rung zhe sdang yid// byas pa mgazodabyen byed 'tsho ba' gnag/ btsani byang chub spyod pa ston ces/

grang las des na byang chub spyod thos pa// de nyid lan khong khro rab bskyed nas// mkhas pas 'khrul pa'i tshig 'ga' thos nas gang// de la mi snyan brgyadag sgrog bar byed/ gzhon nu nga yi tshig ni thog nas
ni de dag dang ni ston bar ma byed cil/ (byang chub dam pareg par 'dod na ni// rmi lam du yang de la yid ma rten/ sbyangs tshul bsus pa yon tan du ma brjod// yon tan bskal pa mang bo
brgyar bshad kyang// de yis yon tan dag la mi gnas ni// byang chub zhi ba mchog na rtogs ma 'gyur// khor mor yang ni dag zhing 'jam pa ba gyis// tshul khrims dag cing rtag tu dad pa'i yid//
kho'o mor tshul khrims yongs su dag par gyig ring bor mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog thob 'gyug/ nga rgyal ma byed tha ba ma spyod pas// rtag tu yaden yongs su dag bgyig/ nga rgyal rgyags dang
'chab pa tshun spos la/ ting 'dzin mchog 'di rab tu thob par rgyas// rtag tu yon tan las ni rgyal ba dran// gsol mchogamadog 'dra tu 'od mdzad/ mtshan mo gnam la skar mas gang ba stag

khub pa'i sku ni mtshan gyis yongs su rgyag/ 'chag tsange 'dug dang 'greng zhing nyal ba na// tshigang thub pa'i zla ba dran byed pa// de yi mdun na rtag tu ston pa bzhugs// den rgya cher mya ngan 'das pa/
brgyug/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bla'i ba dan mchog/ byam byug pa mang bo kun thogs la/ rtag tubade bar gshegs la mchod pa rgyus/ ring bor mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di thog/ gos
mchog phreng ba ma tog sdug pa dang/ 'ol mo sil snyan mang po rab thogs la// rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la mchod pa gyis// ring bor ma thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di thog rgyugs bzang bo sbags

mang po dang// yid btsang bzhad gda'ol mo bzang po dang// rtag par mal ma'i 'phreng sdug bzang po yis// mtshungs pa chad la mchodabazang rab tu rgyas// 'khar rnga dang ni sgra snyan rdzob// dang kyi bu'i

sgra mchog snyatshogs dang// sgrasnyan 'ol mo'i yon tan sna tshogs kyis// dang ba'i dad ldan 'dren pa mchod par gyis// sangs rgyas sku gzugs shin tu mdzes pa dag/ naman gyi don legs par byas pa yang//
bstan sdug cing shin tu bzang po gyi// ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di thog/ de bzhin gsar dag dang nAdingul dag dang// tsan dan gyi sku gzugs kha zang bo dag/ mdzes shing shin tu
blta na sdug ba rgyas// 'di bor mi thogs ting 'dzin mchoga'adi thog/ 'jim pa dang ni de bzhi rdo ba dang/ shing dang 'a mo bris pa'i sku gzugs dang// mdzes shing shin tu bstan sdug pa gyis//
/ 'di bor mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di thob// rtag tu nags khrod dben bar bstan bar gyis// grong dang khyer dga' ba rnams sbyongs la// bas ru lta bur gnyis su med par gyis//
'ang bor mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'thob// ngani chos rje khyod ni nga yabu// nga ya ting 'dzin spyod pa rjes su slobs// nad phyogs su grags ba ya ]/mi dbang bstan pas byin zhes bya bar gyur//

T+Tha ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir// ngas sngonas nigs rgyas mtha' yang mchod pa byas// rtag par ngas ni tshul khrims rnam dag bsrungs// nga yis stobs bcu dag la ri mor byas// ting 'dzin zhi
ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyi// ngas sngon bu dang chungam yongs btang ste// mgo dang rkang lag mig mchog bzang po byon// zhum pa'i sagasasunam yang yong ma byas// ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di

tshol ba'i phyir// nor 'bru bran pho bran mo brgya mang dang// rin chen mang po ngas ni yongs btang ste// slong ba mang po shin tu tshim par byas// ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir// ngas/
sngon gsar dang mu tig shel mang dang// dung dang man shel dang ni bzum// nor bu gzugs gtsang bya ru 'bru rnams btang// ting 'dzin zhu ba mchog 'ditshol ba'i phyir// ngasan rnam pa sna tshogs
rgyan rnams dang// mu tig phrang mchog de bzhin sang ge can// ni chen drab bzang zhing mang po btang// ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir// ngas sngon gos mchog phra mo bye ba dag/

[yongs su gtsang bkag shig du gu la mchog/ gson gyis smras ba mang po yongs su btang// ting 'dzin zhib mchog 'di tsholapa'i phyir// rta dang ba lang shing rta sna tshogs dang// bu dang chung ma rab sdug/
ngas btang ste// yid mi bde ba nam yang ma byung ngo// ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir// tsholabs sdug bsngal nyon mongs gyur pa yi// shin tu dbul ba'i mi dag pas mthong nag

de dag ngas ni dbul ba mad par byas// ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir// rta dang ba la'ang shing rta khrag khrig dgo/ nor bu rinican brgyan pa'i dra bas g.yogs// ngas sngon slobab dag la sbyin
bar bya// ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'ditshol ba'i phyir// ngas sngonabaskyod mo'i chol ni mang po dag bya ba khrag khrig lags par brgyan byas te// yid kyang dga' zhing snying rje bskyod nas byin//
ting 'dzin khri ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir// grong dang grong khyer yul 'khor grong 'dab kyang// sa sngon legs par brgyan nas yongs su btang// byin nas rtag tu dga' ba myong bar byas//
ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir// rin chen phung bo ri rab mnyam pa dang// de bzhin gos dang rgyan rnams mang po yang// ngas sngon slong ba dag la sbyin ma byas// ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog
de tshol ba'i phyir// shin tu dbul ba san phyug por byas// rab tu nyon mongs gyur pa ngas bskyabs te// sdug bsngal gtses pa mang po bde bar byas// ngas ni sa stong dbang phyug
[pi/ ]@#/ gyur pa'i tshe// skye bo'i tshogs rnams sdug bsngal mkhong nas ni// snying rje bskyed nas bde bar gyur cig ces// de dag lani nga yis rgyal srid btang// gzhon nu ngas ni/

[n ]ngo mtshar byas pa dang//bskal pa brgya mang dka' ba ci spyad ng// ngas nibaskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu// de dag bshad kyang zad par mi nus so// ting 'dzin zhi ba mchoga'adi tshol ba'i phyir// sanango
mtshar dka' baspyad pa ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i da la ma dad pa// mi rnams sems ni mas shing bsad par 'gyur// gzhon nu khyod la shin tu bsgo bar bya// dad par gyis shig nga la
mi bden med// bde gshegs rdzun gyi tshigani mi gsung ste// thugs rje rgyal ba rtag tu bden bar gsung// ji ltar ting 'dzin mchog kyang 'thob 'gyur zhing// sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal
thar bya zhes// bskal pa mang por spyod pa 'di dag dang// gzhan yang ngas ni rnam pa mang po sbyangs// skad cig gang la ting 'dzin 'di yang ni// nga yis rab tu thob par gyur pa'i tshe// ting 'dzin
zla a pa e shes chen po'i lam// sa thobasangs rgyas khrag khrigamang po mthong// rdzu 'phru'adag kyang mtha' yas ngas thob ste// zhing brgya dag tu rnam par sprul pas 'gro// song nas ngasani
snying rje ldan pa la// dri ba bye ba khrag khrig mang bo dris// bde gshegs dag gis nga la co bstan pa// de tshe dri ba bye ba khrag khrig bzung// nga yis ma lus thoms cad bzung byas te// tshig
gcig tsam yang nga la nyams pa med// dri ba bye ba khrag khrig mang po yi// yang dag pa yi tshul de ngas shes nas// rdul bral zhi ba'i gnas de ngas bshad de//sems can mang po yong shes lam la//
bkon/ gangasan ting 'dzin 'di la gnas nas su// bskal pa brgyar yang yang dag tshulo bslabs te/ ngas sngon sems can bye ba khrag khrig rnams// rdul dang bral ba'i lam mchog dam par
kon/ gang gis sngon gyi bde bar gshegs pa dag/ rdul dang bral ba'i tshul 'di ston pa rnams// ma mgrong bsani don dam stong pa yi// ting 'dzin mchog la dad par mi nus so// mi gang
dad cing mkhas la chog shes// yang dag tshul zab tshul rnams thob pa ni// de dag mi skrag rangar bar mi 'gyur te// thos nas rtag tu yid kyang rangs par 'gyur// de dang de dag byang chub 'di 'a
te dedag rjes su skyes pa nga yigu/ de dag udum wA ra'i ma tog 'dra// de phyir bskal pa brgyar yang ngas spyad do// ting 'dzin mchog 'di mi gang 'dzin pa ni// de dag log par ltung ba'i
'jigs pa med//rtag tu mi khom brgyad dang de bral te//sangs rgyas khrag khrig shin tu mang po man+dong// gang gi lag na ting 'dzin mchog yod pa/ rgyal ba byams pa grags pa mtha' yas bzhin//
sems can rnams kyi don mang byed 'gyur zhes// blo gros mtha' yas des ni nga lung bstan// ting 'dzin mchog 'dimigang 'dzin pan// de dag dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan/ rtogs ldan
[p ]@#// bshes 'phags pa thos pa 'dzin// de yi spobs pa dag kyang rgya cher 'gyur// ma u0f7a gang ting 'dzin manog 'di 'dzin pa ni// nams kyis kyang mchod par bya ba/
ka yin mis kyang rtag tu phyag byar 'os pa ste// khor mor 'byung ba'i tshogs kyis mngon par bsrung// mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa'i// de dgamo dang churayang mi 'chi zhing// de la
dug dang mtshonagyis mi tshugs te// dgra dag gis kyang brgal bar mi nus 'gyur// mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// de dag nags khrod gshong gnas rtag par yang// lha dag khor mor
bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur// gnod sbyin mang po de yi g.yog kyang byed// ma gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pani// ye shes dag kyang rtsamatsho'adra bar 'gyur/ thub pa'i yon tan brjod la thogs
ba med// sangs rgyas yon tan yang dag brjod par byed// mi gang ting 'dzin mchoga' 'dzin pa ni// de yi shes pa mtha' yas mu med de// tshod snyad mi 'gyur dzilhan m mkha' bzhin// ya shas
sgronam 'dzin cing rab rib sel// mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// rtag par 'jam zhing rigs pa'i tshig smra ste// 'khor gyi nang du dga' bar 'gyurab ston/ sang ga bzhin du de ni sgra
! rnams sgrog/ mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pani// de dag sman pa dpyad mkhan 'dra bar yang// mang po'i rten dang dpung gnyen skyabs su 'gyur/ 'jig rten dag na snakhar gyugatsing spyod//
0 mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// 'khrig pa dag la yid kyang dga' mi byed// zhi gnas dga' zhing bsam gtan bde ba reg/ rab tu zhi ba'i dbyas su zhi bkas// migang ting 'dzin/
mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// de yid mtshan ma dag la mi dga'/// mchonam mang po thams cad rnam par bshig/ mkhas pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag cing spyod// mi gangating 'dzin mchog 'di
'dzin pa 'di// de'i mig kyang spo ma ma yin 'thob// des ni rgyal ba mtha' yas mthong bar 'gyur// mtha' yas mig ldan de ni khyu mchog 'gyur// mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni//

khrung khrung sgra dbyangs 'jam zhingamanyenAdang ldan//kal bid dra yi dpyangs su 'gyur// glu dbyangs ldan zhing sgra skad 'jam paga'agyur// mi gung ting 'dzana mchog 'di'adzin pa ni// sprin gyi 'brug
sgrags pa yi skang rnams dang// ngang ba'i sgra dbyangs bzhinadu'ajam pas sgrog/ dbyangs kyi yan lag lnga brgya ldan pa'i sgra// mi gang ting 'dzanA mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// bskal pa bye ba mang po
khrag khrig tu// dbyangs kyi yan lag smatshogs ldan pa yi// sgra dbyangs snyan pa ngasamagyesami khyab 'byung// mi gangating 'dzin mchog 'di'adzin pa'i// bras la yid byar chags par mi 'gyur te//
lhung bzedachos gos dag la dga' m yi// 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes mo byadabaskungs// mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// bdag nyid la yang stong pa'i m 'gyur zhing// gar yang
gzhan la mi snyan mi brjod de// rtag tu bsam gtan dga' zhing phra ba'i sams// mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di'adzinapa ni// rtag tu bdag nyid la yang rtogs 'gyur te//
gzhan gyi 'khrul pa dag ni da tshatshol// 'jig rten kun dang de na mi 'phrodayod// mi gang tiba'adzina mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// spyod pa yongs dag sems la nyon mongs med// rtag tu g.yo yang med cing
'drid pa yod// kho'amor 'jam zhing rnam par thar la dga'// migang ting 'dzin mchog 'di'adzin pa'i// rtag tu gtong lashin tumos par 'agyur// ngan sarasna'i sems la dga' mi byed//
khor chog tshul khrims dang yang ldan par 'gyur// mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di'adzin pa ni// byad bzhin bzang zhing blta sdug mdzes pa ste// mdog kyang gsaramadog 'dra bar snang bar khyod//
sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams 'chang bar 'gyur// mi gangating 'dzin mchog 'di'adzin pa ni// de dag rtag pagarab t+tamadzes par 'gyur// khor mor rtog cing skye bo mang po la// phangs shing sdug/
lta bas mi ngoms 'gyur// mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pani// lha dang klu dang de bzhin gnod sbyin nams// rtag tu yid rangs dga' zhing mgunas ni// grong du zhugs nas de yi bsngags
ba mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// tshangs pa brgya byin dabang sgyur mang po dag/ rtag par de la rim gro rab tu khyad// de yi yid kyang khengs pa'i yong mi 'gyur// mi gang ting 'dzin
[59s/] mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// dal ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ste// mi khomamadacing log ltung 'jigs pa med// log ltaba'ajigs pa kun las yongasashasu grol// mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di/
'dzin pa ni// sangs rgyas chos mchog zhibamathog nas kyang// da lanem nur yid gnyis 'byung ste// ye shes zab mo'i rjes susong ba yin// mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// sruba'i chos
rnams gang dag ci bas kyang// mas cad la nadabang gi pha rol song// gtan tshegs zhib cing stobs dang ldan pa 'gyur// migang ting 'dzin mchog 'di'adzin pa'i// rgyal bas gsungs na de skad rab
bshad de// rtag bar dag ni de ltar bya snyam na// gzungs ni bye brag 'phags pa mchog thob 'gyur// mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// nam tshe de yang 'chiba'i dus khyedapa// 'od dpag med
ba sdugs rjer ldan bani// dge slong tshogs bcas de A mdunanabazhugs// mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// dedag gzungs rnams rab tu thob par 'gyur// chos kyi gter la dbang ba'i pha
la phyin// slobs dang ldan zhing tshig kyang rgyanami 'chad// mi gang ting 'dzana mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// chos 'dzin de dag gang dusong ba yang/ 'gro ba dag la kutusnang bar 'gyur// shin tuspyod pa

zhi zhing yid zhi// rang khudag 'o dang drimad 'od byed dang// 'od 'phro shin tu sbyang dka' mngon gyur dang// ring du song dang mi g.yo legs pa'i blo// chos sprinas bcu po yang thob par 'gyur/ tshodang las dang
yo khyadamos pa dang// smon lam rdzu 'phrul skya pa'i stobs rnams dang/ ches rang gnas dang de bzhin la shes che// dbang bcu 'di dag dpa 'bos thob par 'gyur// mi gang ting
'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// mkhas pa chos kyi mdzod mchog rnam 'byed cing// chos kyi sku la dbang ba'i rol phyin// de 'gro ba kun gyi tshom gcod// sems can thams cad bcom ldan snying
rjecan// srid pa'i mthar phyin bde gshegs gyur pa la// bskal pa mang po bskya'am gang+gAyi// bye ma snyad dang lhag par mchod byas pas// zad pa'i dusanam gang 'gal yi// 'dirayang ting 'dza/

'tha'adi thos nas su// yi rang zhes nitshig gcig smras na yang// sngama'i bsod nams phung posacha mi phod// gzhonan su dag zhi ba'i spyod pa 'di// don dam stong pa ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog/ rab tu 'don
dang de bzhin glags bam byas// chos smra blo gros dam pa gnas pa yin// gabri brjid tshogs kyi rgyal po'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o////den yang bcom ldan 'das kyis//
zla 'od gzhonanur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhonanu de lta bsazha/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang can s bdag sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang skad sheg pa rtogs shing dbang po
mchog dang mchog ma yin pa rnam par rig nas chos bstan to snyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ gzhon nu chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i/
ting 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung ba bya/ kun chub par ng/ nga cung/ bklags par byar tugadon pa bya/ lunganodacing kha ton du bya/ tonamos ba med pa'i sgom pas bsgom/
par bya// mngadu bya/ gzhan la yang rgya cherarab tu bstan par bya'o// de nas de'i chu bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// thar pa 'dod pa'i ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di
'dzin n// des na 'das pa'i 'drenab tshadamad rnams kyang mthong// sngonagyi srid bar brtson byas 'jig rten mgon po'i dris// byang nubasems dpa' dage ba'i rtswa ba mchog la gnas//
thar pa 'dod pa'i ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin na// lha dang mi yi bde ba gya nom redapa 'gyur// lha dang mi yi mchod pa dam pa des 'thob ste// bsam gtan bde dang 'phags pa bde ba
mchog kyang 'thob// thorapa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul brag 'di 'dzin n// bsngags pa rgya cher thos kyang de nyid ga' mi 'gyur// mi snyan pa dag thos kyang zhum par mi 'gyur te// 'jig rten chos brgyad
dag gis ma skul ri bo bzhin// thar pa 'dod pa'i ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin nA// dag zhingamanyenapar smra la 'jamaba'i tshig dang ldan// khro gnyer mdacing rtag tu gsong bor smra bar 'gyur//
bzhin yang 'dzum zhing 'dren pa dag gi rjes su slob// thar pa 'dod pa'i ka'adzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin n// des shing 'grogs na bde la mdza' ba'i sems su 'gyur// rtag par rab tudul zhing
dul ba'i sa la gnas// 'jam zhing dga' ba'i tshig smashin tu bde bar brel// thar pa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di'adzinan// dan gtam byed 'gyur yang rtsod cing 'thab
[YI ]pa med// zhe sdang tha ba de dag ma lus rnam spangs te// rtag par rab tu dga' zhing des la mnyen pa yin// zla ba 'dod pa'iting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin// mkhas partag tugatong lamos par rab

'gyur te// shin tu sdug bsngal skya bo mthong nas kha bras sbyin// gtong l shin tu dga' zhing bdag nyid spyod mi dga'// thar pa 'dod pa tang 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin na// lha yang brgya stong de la smon

pa shin tu skye// klu dang lha min gnod sbyin rtag tu g.yog pyod da// nags dnganags 'dab gnas pa de la bsrungabar byed// tshig ni thogs pa med cing tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs te// ngang pa'i sgra skad mi
'am ciyi glu yi dbyings// ngabyangs kyi yan lag lnga brgya dga' ba'i sgra skad de// sgra sgrags shin tu grags pa'i sgra yi mchog tu 'gyur// ji stong zhing rnams de dag skyes bu la la yis// phra ba'i
rdul du byas pa shes par nus kyang na// ting 'dzin rdul brala mchog 'di mi gang 'dzin pa dag/ de yi dbyangs sgra de bas shin tumang bar 'gyur// ting 'dzan rdul bral 'di yang mi gang 'dzon pa na//
dbang bachu 'thob cing sa yang brgyad dang gas 'thob// mkhas pas sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam yas theb par 'gyur// bdud rnams thams cad btulaMnas byang chub dam pa rag/ phan yon
gyi le'u staum cu rtsa gcig pa'o/// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po/ gang ji ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin shes par bya snyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyegab nyid rnam par spros
pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dimanyan pa bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklags pa bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha totubya/nyon mongs pa med pa'i sgom pas bsgom
par bya/ ma du bya/ gzhan la yang yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshatshugs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// chos kyi rang bzhin
shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa// de la 'dod chags ldang ba med cing zhe sdang med// khyu mchog 'di nam yang gti mug ldang bamed// des ni+en mongs ma lus thams cad spangs pa yin// chos kyi
rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa// de ni bde gshegs thugs sras bslab pa yong mi 'dor// dpa' bo bud med dbang du nam yang mi 'groste// de dang der ni bde gshegs bstan pa'i dga'
ba myong// chos kyi rang bzhin tshul khrims rigs pa gangashes pa// de ni mkhas pa blo ldan ye shes tshog shes// de dang de ni sangs rgyas mtha' yas mu med mthong// de ni gzugs dang ye shesamatha'
las rab tu shes// chos kyi rang bzhinAshin tu zhi ba gang shes pa// de ni ring po ma thogs rkang gnyis gtso bor 'gyur// de ni sman pa dpyadashes bde ba sbyin par 'gyur//
[n ]de'i sdug bsngal zug rngu thams cad 'byin par byed// chos kyi rang bzhin shin tuzhi bgangashes pa// de ni samasacan 'di dag sdug bsngal n ri gnas // de rtag tu bdud rtsi dag gi rnga dag
brdung// de dang de ni ring po mi thogs 'dren par 'gyur// de ni sman gyi tshul la mkhas pa sman pa'i mchog/ thams cad nad kyi gzhi dang gang gis 'jar pa shes// de ni yang dag tshul la
ba slangs pa bla gros ldan// bslabs nas shin tu 'khyams pa'i sems can mang po 'brel// chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa// de ni stong pa nyidakyi tshul mkhas blo gros dpa 'a// don
'jig rten rtag tu mchags bsod snyoms lnga// dogisam can mang po byang chub mchog la 'god// chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa// nganam yi zla ba bzed pa stobs kyis 'phags//

rgyu dranirdo dang dbyig pas brdegs kyang mi khro ste// de'i lus dang yan lag ga cad kyang 'khrug pa med// chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhibagang shes pa// de ni brjod pa'i stobs la gnas pa stobs ldan yin//
danarab tu zha ba'i bzod pa'i dngos mi mthong// de ni blo dpa' bzod pa'i stobs la rlom sems med// chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi bgang shes pa// don bdag cag snyam du nams kyang sems m 'gyur/
[p ]de yis srid pa thams cad rnam bshig rtagatustob/ de yi 'du shes thams cad ma lus 'a ba tu spangs// de dang dedagachos kyi rang bzhin dam pa ston// de dag ri mor mi thogs bla med byang chub reg/
gang dag chos kyi rang bzhin spyod yul rjes rtogs pa// de dag 'dis ni sbyin pa mtha' yas mu med byin// chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa// dani mdo sde bya ba mtha' yas 'chad par

byed de las lhag par gang+gA'i klung gi bye masnyad// bshad kyang de yi skyobs pa'i rgyun ni'achadapa med// chos kyirang bzhinashin tu zhib gong shes pa// de ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du yang//
ye shes dga'i rtag tu 'phags pa lo rab bzhin// chos rnams ston pa dag gi zad par yongo mi 'gyur// chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa// spobs pa yangs shing rgya che bsam gyis mi khyab

'gyur// byang chub dam pa rtag tu khor mor tshol ba na// mdo sde dag kyang bya ba ma Da' las rab tu 'chad// chos 'di skams cad dngos bo med pa 'gabashes la// rkang gnyis gtso bos chos gang bshad cig bstan
ba yang// de dag thams cad thos nas yongs su rdzogs par 'dzin// de'i tshig gcig la yang rtsom 'byung mi 'gyur// chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu stong pa gang shes pa// de ni rtag tu bye brag 'phags
shing gatong ldan 'gyur// sdug bsngal dag la bde ba sbyin pa'i sbyin bdag yin// sems can sdug bsngal maklong nas rin chen tshim par byed// chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu stong par gang shes
[s// ] ]/pa du rtag tu 'dzam bu rgyal mtshan rgyal por 'gyur// dus kun tu yang srog chagasa rnams la byams ldan te// rtag tumatha' yas pa yi bde ba byed par 'gyur//

chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu stong par gang shes pa// dpa' bo bu dang bu mo bran dag gtong bar byed// mgo dang lag pa de bzhin rgyal srid yongs su gtong// khyu mchog de yi yid ni zhum par yong gi 'gyur//
chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu stong pa gang shes pa// de yi lus dang yan lag gal te bcad gyurakyang// rmi laman yang de yi yid la khong khro med// des ni 'dren pa rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod pa yin//
chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu stong par gang shes pa// des ni 'dus pa'i 'dren pa Thams cad mchod pa yin// de bzhin mkhyen pa yi rkang gnyis gtso bamachod// des ni 'drenapa bzhugs pa thams cayi mor

byas// gang dag mdo sde 'di thos khad pa'i dus la 'dzin// de'imakhas pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mdzod 'chad yin// danagazungs mchog dag la rang zhu gnas pa ste// danaring por mi thogs 'jigarten 'drenapar/
gyur gang gis mdo sde 'di dag rab bshad mi brjed pa// mkhas pa de ni long ba gnas kyang mi 'gyur te// bskal pa mang por yan lagam[]nga yo mi 'gyur// de ni mi khom brgyad po dag kyang rtag tu spangs//
da ni ngan 'groranam yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur te//rtag tumatsho rnams 'chang zhing byad bzhin bzang por 'gyur// mngon shes lnga po de dag rtag pa des bsgoms te// dpa' bo de'i rtag tu bde gshegs/
00 spyan snga'a gnas // ma shes can de 'phrul mang bo sprul byas nas// zhing rnams bye ba mang por 'dul ba'i don phyin gtong// sangs rgyas sprul ba mang po gang gisa mthong 'gyurang// de yis sems
can mang bo byang nuba mchog tu btsud// gang dgamad sde 'di thos zad pa'i dus la 'dzin// de ni dran ldan blo gros ldan zhing shes rab can// don rtag tu mthu dang brtson 'grus stobs kyis brtan// gzi

brjid chen po chos kyi pha rol phyin par 'gyur// khrid pa'i dus la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'dzin pa ni// dpa' bo dan tshongs pa'i gnas la shin tu gnas// des ni myur dus yang brgyad dang gnyis dag thob// de ni
myur zhing mgyogs par bdud rnams pashin tu 'dul// gang gis mdo sde zhi ba 'di ni rtag bsgoms pa// dang nga dang ldan zhing mngon par 'phags pa stobs dang ldan// donasems can dam pa sems
tshongon phyir brtson// de ni byang chub shing drung bya chu ba mchog rtogs 'gyur// gang gis chos 'di rnams stong par goms byas pa// de dag 'od zad bye ba stong rnams rtag tu 'gyed// nyima'i dkyil
'khor dag kyang thams cad gzi mad byas// dpa' bo de dag mi ring 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur// ngas sngon spyod yul zhi ba 'di ni rab tu bsgoms// bskal pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig stong du yang//
lan 'di'i ngas ni nam yang brtson 'grus rgyun ma bcad// de tshamar me mdzad kyis rgyal ba lung yang bstan// mdo sde 'di la khyed kyang nga yirjes su slobs// tshul 'di zab cing dam pa'i don rnams
bstan pa ste// 'di la mu stegs log pa mang po 'di dag 'khyams// byang chub lan smad byas n gnas ong 'jigs pa lhung// bskal pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig stong du yang//
de dag sdug bsngal mi bzad rmo ba dmyong nas// bskal nga khrag khrig mang po dag ni 'das nas yang// don de dag mi 'chi 'thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// gang dag phyi dus 'jigs la bde bar gshegs
ba yi// mdo sde rab tu zhi ba 'din srung byed pa// de dag byang chub mchog rab 'di ni dam dkag/ da dung de dag phyi dus chos 'tshan lung bstan yin// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges pas
bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// klu'aphags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo// bam po banug// danas yang bcom ldan
'das kyis/ bla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na byang nub nyams dpa' sems dpa' chen po/chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa chen po'i byi dor bya ba yongs su
sbyang ba 'dod pas/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dimanyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklags par bya/ rab tu

! gdon bar bya/lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa mdaba'ing sgom pas bsgom par bya ba dang/ gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tubastan par bya'o// gzhon nu chos thams cad la mngon bar

ma[;]shes ba chen po'i byi dor bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste 3chog thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa mdartsing tshul khrims kyi phung po mchog tu ma 'dzin pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po mos sems med pa/ shes

rab kyi phung po rgyu bamed pa/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po dben par mthong ba rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mtho ba'i phung po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po mngon par shes pa de dang ldan pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par sprul pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'di ni/ gzhon nu chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa chen/

po 'i byi dor bya ba yin no/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad la mngon pa la shis pachan po'i byi dor bya ba bstan pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pa'i

dbyug kyis rgya cher yang dag par ba tu bstan to// mngon shes chen po yongs sbyangs pa// rtsod pa med par bstan ba ste// brtsod pa dag la gang spyodacing// 'dzin pa la byed pa de yi mthar// mngon shes
de yi shes ra ba ste// sangs rgyas yabashes khas mi khyab// 'dzin pa la gang gnas pa// de la shes yod mi 'gyur// gang dag sgra yis bstan pa ya/ chos rnams mad po bsam mi khyab// sgra de la yang
gang chags pa// dgongs pa'i bshad pa mi shes so// cing la dgongs te bshad pa yi// dgongs pa dag mi shes pa// chos nyidalam bslabs pas// chos ma yin pa chos su 'chad// 'jig rten
khams ni stong dag tu// gzhi mdo sde gang bshad pa// tshig 'bru tha dad don cig ste// thams cad brjod bganus ma yin// tshig gcig rnam par bsgoms nani// dedag thams
cad khasgoms par 'gyur// sangs rgyas ji snyed thams cad kyis// chos rnams mang por ba bshad pa// chos rnams thams cad stongab nyid// ma gang don lamakhas pa dag/ tshig 'di bgrabs ba'agyur
pa la/ sangs rgyas chos rnams dkon ma yin// chos kun gangs rgyas chos yin te// chos nyid la yang gang bslabs pa// chos nyid rab tu shes pan// chos nyid dang yang 'galami byed// tshegakun kyang
nas sa skyasatshig/ sgra kun dngos po med pa ste// phyogs bcu dag tu btsal na yang// sangs rgyas g ni mi rnyed do// tshig 'di sangs rgyas chig inate// phyogs bcu dag gyurab btsal kyang// blamad
'dig mi rnyed de// mnyid snyad pa mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas tshigan bla mad// ltaganamed pa sangs rgyas tsheg de la rdul tsam mi rnyed pas// de tshabla named ces brjod// chos ni rdul tsam skya ste//

rgyu rdulatsam sgra'an bshad ng yin// rdul tsam rnyed par ma gyur kyang// 'jig rten du ni sgra yis bshad// chos rnams rnyed med red pa lta// rnyed pa yang 'od pa med// de ltar chos rnams gang shes pa//
byang chub dam pa rtogs par 'gyur// byang chub bla med des rtogs nas// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskye// chos rnams 'khor lo rab bskor nas// sas rgyas chos rnams ston par byed// sangs
0 rgyas bla na med pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' rtogs par byed// sangs rgyas ye shes rtogs byed pas// sangs rgyas shes kyang de phyir brjod// dngos med smon pa med pa dang// mtshan ma med dang stong
pa nyid// rnam thar smon 'di dag gis// sgo dag sangs rgyas rab tu ston// mig dang rna ba sna dag dang// lce dang lus dang bzhin yid// de dag rang bzhin stong ba ni// sas rgyas dag gis rab tu bshad//
da lta bu yi chos rnams kyi// rang bzhin dag ni sus shes pa// chos kyi mtshan nyidashes bsan// de ni brtsod pa mi byed do// 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' dag/ dpa' bo skyob pa'i spyod yul te//
chos rnams stong par shes pa'i// de dag nam yang nem nur med// chos kyi rang bzhin shes pas na// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ste// sems can bsam gyis mi khyab cing// dpag tu med pa' byang chub
'dul// sangs rgyas sgras ni gang byas pa// tshul khrims sgras kyang de byas te// sangs rgyas sgra dang tshul khrims sgra// de dag gnyi ga'i mtshan nyid gcig/ ji snyed sgra dag brjod pani// rab
dang 'bring dang bla ma rnams// mnyam par gzhag pa'isgragatsag la// sangs rgyas sgras ni bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas sgra ni yul mi gnas// phyogs la'ang gnas pa ma yin brjod// skyes dang
'gags pa ma yin te// de bzhin gcig dang tha dad min// de dab gsar 'am rnying ma yin// de dag 'ge rlom sems med// sor po ma yin sngon po min// dkar po ma yin dmar po min// brjod//
0 @#// du med cing bzungamed par// de ltar dbyangs kyis bstan mod kyi// de'idabyangs kyis sam yin// thub dag gi cho 'phrul 'di// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das pa yin// sangs/
rgyas sku gzugs snang 'gyur te// de gnas yid la byas pa ni// tshe 'phrul rnams kyang de yis mthong// gangagis mya ngan 'das pa leg/ sems cand mi rnyed de// de bzhin chos rnams rab bstan cing
sems can mang po grol bar byas// jiltar nyi ma zla ba dag/ 2bar pa'i snod du snang ba yang// rang gi gzugasami 'pho ltar// chos kyi mtshan nyid de 'dra'o/ chos rnams mig yo lta bur yang// gang
gis ngo bo nyidashes pa// de dag gzugs kyi lus su// sangs rgyas sku lam lta'o// chos 'di lus gzugs mdab sta// 'di la lus gzugs gang yang med// chos gang lus gzugs med pa ni//

dan sangs rgyas sku lus su// su dag chos kyi skur lta ba// de dag gis ni 'dren pa mthong// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// de ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong// brtan cing so sor bstan pa ste// so
som yin so sor bshad// dge sbyong nyidan su 'dod pa// 'jug pa 'di rigs par gyis// gang dag bdag gis thabasnyam pa// daphyi ma thob pa zhes bya// gang gis dag sbyong nyidam thob// de phyir dag
sbyong zhes kyang bya// su dag bslabs par ma gyur pa// zab mo'i chos 'di ga la smra// de dag zab mo'i ming du yang// yongs su brjod par mi nus so// phung po ldani dngos medade// med pa las 'di
dag byung// su yi phung po byung ba yang// de la slong bar byed pa mi da// phung mchan nyid gangayin pa// chos kun de yi mtshan nyid yin// de lemtshan nyid yod bshad de// mtshan nyidakyang n yod ma
min ji lta bar snang nam mkha' bzhin// chos kyi mchan nyid de 'dra pa/ sngon gyi na Da' dang phyi ma'i mtha'// da ltar byung ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur// nam mkha'agazung ba med par bshad// de
la gzung ba ma rnyed de// chos kyi rang bzhin 'di nyid yin// gzung ba mang po kha' 'dra// de lta bur ni chos bstan te// de la gang yang mthong mad// su dag ches 'di mi mthong nga// de yi chos rnams
bsam mi khyab// chos 'di rnams rang bzhin med// 'di dag dang zhin pa sa rgyas byang chung su brtson pa// rnal 'byor pa yi spyod yul 'di// de lta bu n sus shes pa// danachos 'aichags te//
chos rnams la yang mi chags pas// chos kyi 'du shes rab tu rtogs// byang sems dang 'askyob pa yi// chos rnams thams cad rnam par shig/ chos kyi 'du shesa rnam bshi gnas // sangs rgyas chos la
rlom sems med/ mtha'ade rlom sems ma byas pa// brtags nas mthar la nas/da pa na// de ltar mtho na de// bskal pa byed bar rlom sems med// byis pas sngon gyi mtha'abartags pas//
'khorab rnams su 'khor 'gyur te// phyogs bcu dag tu btsalan yang// de yaM sa ni mi rnyed do// 'khor ba stong par rig nas ni// rgyal ba thugs sras chags mi 'gyur// byabachub don phyir spyod mos kyi//
@#// de dag spyod pa mi rnyed do// nam mkha' lan bya rjes bzhin// de dag rnyed par mi 'gyur te// de 'dra'i rang bzhin bya chub de// byang chub sems dpas rtogs par 'gyur// sgyu
ma byed pa rab slabs pa// sgyu ma dag ni ston pa ltar// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyang// gzugs ni dmigs pa'i m 'gyur ro// rnyed dngami rnyedarlom sems med// rnyed pa la yang med rnyed de//
ye shes de ni sgyu ma 'dra// sgyu ma de la gnas pa min// de bzhin chos rnams stong pa la// byis pa'i blo yi rnam brtags pas// rnam par rtog la spyod pa dag/ 'gro ba drug tu gzhol bar 'agyur//

phung po skye dga' nyer 'gro ste// de dgaskya ba zangami 'gyur// skye zhing 'chi ba'i phung po rnams// de dag sdug bsngal mtha' yas so// skye zhing 'khor ba sdug bsngal te// byis pa'i blo yis brtags pas
na de dag rtog pa mi khrid de// de dag bskal pa bye bar 'khor// mi sbyor ba dang rab sbyoradang// las kyi sbyoral gang gnas dang// las rnams len pa gang dga' ba// de dag las las mi 'thar ro// las
kyi chungos khyer ba de// las ni rtag tu zad mi 'gyur// bdud kyi phyogs la gang gnas pa// yang dang yang na 'chi bar 'gyur// bdud kyi zil gnon shes rab 'chal// nyon mongs pa yi las
rnams kyis// skye ba de dang de dag tu// skye zhing 'chib myong bar 'gyur/ so so'i skye bo long ba yi// byis pa de dag 'chi bar 'gyur// de dag rtag cing rnam par zhom// de dag 'gro ba mi bzad
'gyur// byis pa'i blo can mtshon tshayi// gcig la gcig gsod par byed// de lta bu s ni sbyor ba dag/ de dag sbyor ba rab tu 'phal// nga yi bu yinomasnyam du/ byis pa'i blo yis rab ba rtags ta
'khor ba dag ni phyir shing 'phel// 'khor ba dag ni'apha' byed cing// so so'i skya bo de dga' khor/ so so tha dad 'gro pas na// soso'i skye bor brjod pa yin// sangs rgyas bstan pa thob
nas ni// chen+d+ha rnams mang po rab tu 'chad// bdud kyi dbabadu song bas na// de dag thar pa rnyed mi 'gyur// 'dod pa'i phyir ni byis pa rnams// budamad rdul la ston byed de// 'gro ba rul par
'gro 'gyur zhing// des ni ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur// 'jigs pa chen po'i zhags pa ni// bud med zhags pa mi bzad pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'dod pa dang// bud med bstan pa'i ng
ma bsngags so// lam 'di byang chub m 'gyurang sa// bud mda rnams la ma rtan par// sbrul gdug shin tu khro ba ltar/ mkhas pas de ni rnam par spong// sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan pa yi/
byang chub lam la sgom par byed// lam de goms par bsgoms byas na// blam da sangs rgyas grub par 'gyur// de dag bla na med 'gyur te// 'jig rten gyi mchodarten 'gyur// bla na med pa'i
yashes kyis// sangs rgyas bla na med pa 'gyur// gso sbyong dag la bstan byed cing// tshul khrims phung por yang dag 'dzud// sems can bye ba bsam mi khyab// byang chub tu yang yang dag
ba dzud// dadag sems can rnams kyisan// bsam yas dpag med don byed de// dpa' bo shes rab chen po de// bdud rtsi yi rnayang brdung// bdud kyi gnas rnams
g.yo byed cing// bdud kyi ris khyad g.yo bar byas// bdud rnams bya ba bsamam khyab// byang chub laman yang dag 'dzud// pha rol rgol ba tshar gcod cing// mu stegs can n pham par byed// ri dang
wA rgya mtshor bcas pa yi// sa yang rab tu g.yo bar byed// khyum gyur ba dum yis/ lus kyi rnam par 'phrul byed cing// shesa'ab chen po dedugan ]/rmob phrul bsam gyis mkhyab ston// zhing

da rnams bye ba g.yo byed de// gang+gA yi ni bya ma snyed// de dag bdudo rnams pham byas nas// sangs rgyas grags pa chen por 'gyur// dodag zhing rnams sprul byed de// na bo chu yis rnam par rgyan// me tog
babras bu phun sum tshogs// dridad ldan zhing yid du 'ongs// khang pa dang ni gzhal med khang// khang pa brtsigs pa du shor bcas// dpa' bo do dag sprul ba byed// rdzing bu yid du 'ong ba dag/
yan lag brgyad ldan chu yis gang// dang zhing bsil la rtog pa med// delasarnyanAsu 'thudas pa/ srid pa gsum yang spong ba'agyur// blanamed pa'i rgyabathunas// de dag phyir yang mi ldog
pa 'gyug/ rlan med pa'i ye shes kyis// sangs rgyas bla na mid par bgyug/ bla med zhi ba'i 'jug pa ni// 'gro bshon du rig par gyis// 'jug pa 'di mi shes pas// dmigs pa can dag ni
du brlag/ su dag de la rtan gyur cing// de dag skal mnyam sems can de// mnar med pa ni de 'gro ste// mi bzad panachen por lhung// de yi sdug bsngal drag po ni/ brjod par nus ma yin te/
byad chub sems dpa' skyob ba dang// ngas nId dag rab tu shes// 'di 'dra'i zab mo mthong dka' yi// chos la su dag nem nur byed// su dag dmigs la gnas pa yi// byis pa dag gi sam
bstan// bla medasangs rgyas zhing du na/ gang gis de dag la grol gyur pa// gzugs ston pa ni dum yi// bkod pa dgan sbyal par byed// sangs rgyas zhingan ji snyed kyi// gzugs bgrubaphun sum
tshogs yodapa// de dag thams cad bdir yang// byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul cha ston// chos chen gyin go bgos te// dpa' chen stobs kyang che ba dag/ stong pa'i don chen rdo rnayis// gdabs
pa dag kyang dedag 'debs// 'od zer bye ba phrag stong dag/ gang+g+hayi ni phyi ma snyad// de yi lus las 'byung bar 'gyur// des nib jig rten rang du snang/ de dag bud mad mi chags te// de dag
yid 'byung ma khyad// bud med 'du shes rang bzhin gyis/ 3bdu shes de dag rnam bar ba shig/ dbang po de dag gar gnas pa// sangs rgyas zhi de mi stong ste// do dgalan sdig can bdud//
bar chad byed par ga la 'gyur// lta ba dag la de gnas pas// sangs rgyas mang ba mnyos ma byas// gnod sems kyis nyi brtan cing// 'dod dang chags la rab tu gnas// lta la gnas pa de
dag kun// bdud yin pan rig bar bya// del sdig can bdud rnams kyang// bar chad byed par mi 'jug go/ sangs rgyas ye shes bsamam khyag/ ya shos de/
ltar sus shes pa// bdu shes thams cad rnam bshig nas// 'du shes dgan mi ldog gnas// ston gyi mthu' dang phyi ma'i mthug/ daltar m yang mthong abar 'gyur// dalta chos rnams
b+hU bstan mod kyi// da bcud zad bstan du med// ye shes kyis kyang shes pa med/ ma shes pas kyang zhum mi 'gyur// ye shesamishas rnam brtags naas// sangs rgyas shes brjod pa
yin// rnamarig tshag dbarda rnams// byang chub sems dpa' rab tu shes// dan sems can don rnams kyad/ dpag med bsam yas byed par 'gyur// 'dus kun tu shes pa'i
phyir/ rdu'adzun par yadanadi bstan to// 'du shesad na mi 'dzin pa// dbanapa'i don du rab du bstan// dben pa gang yin 'du shos te/ 'du shes gang yin bastan pa de// 'du shes rang
bzhin yo shasati// de ltar 'du shes med par 'gyur// 'du shes 'dIn lAngs snyam du// gang gi'adu shes 'byung ngan// 'du shes sgros laspyod pa ste// 'du shes lasan dam mthar//
su yi'adu shos de dag byug/ su yis 'du shes 'a de bskyod byas// sun bdu shes rig par byas// susan bdu shaso bkag bar gyur// gang gi 'du shes 'byung ba na// sangs rgyas kyis kyang chos
ba/ na bsnyes// 'di'i ni don de bsam par gyis// danas 'du shes med par 'gyur// namatshe'adu shes skyes pa na// su yi 'du shes yin zhes brjod// sems kyi rgyud kyis rnam thar yang// de la
ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// gang tshe rna mthar reg ban// bsam pa thams cad bsam pa med// gangatsho bsam pa bsam med pa// da tshobasam du med par 'gyur// bsaMm pa'i sa la gnas nas//
mthar gyis rnam par bsam byas te// bsam pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// danas bsam dumadapar 'gyug/ 'dinadakar chos rnam smin te// bdubyed med pas mthong bar 'gyur// sems can
kun gyis rnam bsam pa// skad cig gcig la rab tu shes// sems can ci 'dra de bzhin bsam// bsam bzhin rgyal ba de 'dra ste// sangs rgyas bsam du med pa yis// bsams pa 'din rab tu bstan//
gcig pu dbon song gang sems pa// nam zhig sems pamed par bgyur// bsam ba dag ni mi sems na// bsam pa thams cad med par 'gyur// sha' bo 'du byas shi ba'i tshe// gang gi bsam pa'i b
'jug pa// bsam pa'i rjes su rnam shes 'brang/ bsam las don mi mthAr to// su dag bud med 'du shes gnas// de dag 'dod chags rab tu 'phel// bdu shes dgan rnam bshig na/
'dod chags kyis na gos mi 'gyur// bsam pa 'din bsam pacho// chos kyi bsam pa dran med// chos kyi bsam pa 'di yis ni// yang dag bsam pa rab tu 'byung// tshul ma yin pa rnams
@#/[ ]bsam pas// bsam pa bsam yasamad bo drag/ yun ring dus su rnams bsam kyang// bsam pa dgan zad m gyur// gang dag ming la sems pa yang// brag
pa la ni yi shes med// sa zhes pa la zad pa med// zad pa'i chos nyid du yin no// sgra dang rnam rig tshig gi lam// zad pa'i sgra'i bstan pa ste// chos de rnams ni bye brag med// shes
bzhin zad pa de bzhin te// ma skyes shing ni ma 'gags pa// mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyidamade// bskal pa bya bar bshad kyang ni// mtshan ma med par bstan pa yin// dngos po thams cad rnam bshig
nas cad ngos po med la rab gnas pa// dngos po gzhan du ma bstan te// dngos med pa'i ng gzhan mi bstan// dngos med sgraran rig byas te// dngos po med pa rab tu bstan// sangs rgyas dag ni
kun gyis kyang// dngos po med par bltar mnus// dngos po kun gyi dngos po ni// dngos po med pa dbastan te// de ltar dngos po rnam rigan// dngos po med par 'gyur zhes bstan// dngos
rgyung med pa de yang/sus kyang nam du reg mi nus// dngos po med par reg pa yis// kun rdzob dun de bstan to// 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag ba gyur snyam// de ltar gang gi blo 'gyur ba/ srid
ja 'i srid pas yod mgazir// mkhas pa byang chub rtogs par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' mnyam bzhag pa// chos ni gang la'ang smon mi byed// ci yang med cing dmigs be med// de ni byang
nub brjod yin// byang chub tunangodazhugs shes// mang du da skad sna mod kyi// 'jug pa 'di'i mi shes pas// de dag sangs rgyas byang nub ring// 'du byed thams cad stong pas na// sgra yiwatshes
rnams rab tu bshad// sgra yi rang bzhin gang yin pa/// zab med phra ste mthong ba dka'// mngon shes che la mdo sde 'di// des par bstan ces bya ba yin// byang chub sems dpa'i don phyir// sangs
rgyus rnams kyis bstan mdzad do// kun nas nyon mongasaji snyed pa// nyon mongs thams cad de yis bcom// mngon par shes la rab gnas shing// de dag rdzu ba phrul shin du bgoms//
bsam nas shos la do gnas te// shes pa de yang rnam par bshog/ bsam gyis mi khyab dpag med kyi// ye shes thob pas ngoms pa med// ting nge 'dzin dang rdzu 'phrul phyir// de dag
mngon par 'du byed med// dpa' bo'i rnam smin da yin te// dus kun tu yang mnyam par bzhag/ rnam smon skyes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis// zhing ni bya bar de 'gro ste// 'jig rten sgronam
mthong nagi/ gang+gA dag gi phyi ma ste// de dag 'chi ba la skye pa yang// soms bzhin du ni sgyur bar byed// sems la dbang yang thob pas na/ du dag lus n 'od gsalal// sangs rgyas dag gi
nyan thos gang/ de bsgoms pa'i rdzu 'phrul gnas pa ni// 'du byed med pa'i rdzu 'phrul la// dodag bcu drugachar mi yod// lha rnams kyis kyang de dag gi/ bsam pa shes par minusas//
0 ka/ ba jig rten gyi nam gon po dang// de dag mtshungs gnas ma gtogs so// de dag spyi ram 'gyur te// mgo la skra dkar mi 'byung zhing// rags pa'i rga ba mi'i byung
ka ste rtad bzhin sdug bsngal 'a chi ba med// thatshom yid gnyis ma ba byung ste// de dag la ni ma nur med// mdo sde bya brgya rnams ni// nyin mtshan du yad de dag tshol// ji snyed kun s
mongs kyi// bag la nyalani rab tu spangs// de dag sems can thams cad '// rtagatumanyam pa'i sems su 'gyur// ting 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig rnams// phyogs bcu dag tu nges par ston//
wA dris pa bye ba stong rnams kyang// mi gnas par n lung bstan to// pho dang mor na 'du shes dang// 'du shes thams cad rnam bar bshig/ dngos med du gos gnas nas ni// yang dag nges
par ston par byed// yongs su dag pa'i ye shes kyis// ji bzhin du chos ston te// chos rnams yang dag bstan la brtson// ting 'dzin ye shes spyod yul ldan// de yi ting 'dzin spyodab/
yang cad ngos po dag lam gnas te// de yi tshig kyang don med min// chos bstan pa yang 'bras bu yod// mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba// des nami 'gyur logs pa thob// mi khom thams cad rab
du sngangs// sangs rgyas kun la byas pa gzo/ gang gis rin chanamado 'dilas// tshig ba'i tshogs cad bzung ba yang// des ni 'khor ba gang bor ba// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ( mdo
sde 'di la su dgabab// de dag sangs rgyas kun gyis gzigs// des n sangs rgyas rimar byas// myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur// mdo 'di la su dga' ba// dudag chos rnams thams cad
la[;]the tshom dang ni nam nur med// de dgamya ngan 'das dang nya// bya rgod phung por de bzhinagashogs// dpa' bo chen po de yis mthong// thamasacad sangs rgyas lung bstan to// rgyal khams
pa mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas byams pa mthong nas ni/ bzod pa bzang bo thob par 'gyur// gang su zad pa'i dus la yang// mdo sde'adi la 'ba gnas pa// de dag yang dag mtha' la
gnas// yang dag mtha' na bsamamakhyab// bsam gyis mi khyab mthu lan// dedaganamanur yod ma yin// rdul phran tsam yang rnam pa kun// dodag la yang the tshom med// rdul
tsam rab tu spangs pa ni// da dag byang chub rnyed mi dkab// zad dus shin tu 'jigs pa la// dka' ba dgan spyad byas te// mdo sde rin chen 'di bslabasan// spobs pa dag kyang mi zad 'gyur// mdo sde'ani
rab ston na// sangs rgyas rnams kyimadzod bsrung ste// 'di'i sangs rgyas kun mchod pa// chos kyi mchod pa bsam mi khyab// ma rungs zad pa'i dus la ni// mdo sde 'di dag gang 'dzin pa/ de
dag yo shes rnyed ma dka[R]// sangs rgyas ye shes bsamam khyab/ gang gis sngon gyi sangs rgyas la// mdo sde ba de dag bzungab na// dadag lus 'bamang gyur te// zad pa'i dus la rab tu bag
sangs rgyas zhing na bye bar yang// 'jig rtenamagon po'i spyan sngar yang// shAkya seng ga'i spyod pa rnams// de dag sgra yang sgrog par 'gyur// de dag sangs rgyas spyan snga na/
kyi// rtag tu song gi sgra sgrogs te// mtha' yas pa yi spobasad yis// sangs rgyas byang chub 'di yang sna/ zad dus 'jigs pachen po'i tshi// byang chub 'di ni gang srung ba// bu ram shing gi rigs
skyes rnams// sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan yin// de dag gzugs ni phun sum tshogs// mtshan rnams kyis kyang rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas bya lo phyag 'tshal du// rnam par
'phrul pas 'gro bar 'gyur// sgyu ma yin me tog dag/ gser gyi mdog 'drar snang ba dang// ba zurla dngashol dag dang// dngul gyi yang zhim tog rnams// rin chen rigs rnams thams cad
kyang rtade yi lag nas 'byung b.ro'agyur// byang chub lam rnams tshol ba'i phyir// de dag sangs rgyas rnams la 'thor// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang// rolam bsgrub pa phun sum tshogs

gad+hA yin bya ma snyed// ba spu'i khung nas 'byung bar 'gyur// sems can bya ba bsam mi khyab// gang dag sgra 'di thos pa ni// sangs rgyas ye shesabla med las// da dag phyir yang mi ldog 'gyur// sangs
rgyu rgyas bya bdedag gi/ bsngags pa bsam gyisami khyab brjod// bsam gyisami khyab zhinga rnams su// de dag sgra yang thos bar 'gyur// gang gis sgra de thos pa ni// de dag 'du shes 'gag par
'gyur// 'du shes dgan 'ga gzhus su// sangs rgyas mtha' yang mthong bar 'gyur// du 'dra ba yi yeshas kyis// byang chub spyod pa spyad n sa na// sems can kun gyis don byas nas// don byed pa
yi rgyalabar 'gyur// gangags ting 'dzin bzung ba yi// mkhas pas bden gang 'thob pa// yon tan phan yon 'di dag ste// gzhan yang dbag tu med par 'gyur// bud med kyis kyamado sde 'di//
thos nas tshigs bcad gcig bzung na// budamed dngos po rnams sgyur nas// chos stsa bar yang de 'gyur ro// deni phyis kyang budamed kyi// dngos po'i dzazhi ba'am 'gyur/ mtshan rnams kyisan legs
brgyanatsari// rtag tu byad bzhin bzang por 'gyur// mdo sde mchogirab 'di yin ni// yon tan dag kyang mchog bshad b// de la de dag thums cad 'byung// byang chub nyid kyang myur du 'thob// sangs
rgyas kun gyi spyod yul te// mdo sde 'di ni bzung nas su// de dag skye ba thams cad du// rtag tu 'jigs pamed par 'gyur// ting 'dzin zhib bshad pani/ byang chub sems dpa' skyed pa ste//
byang chub rtogs par su 'dod pa// mdo sde 'din brjod bar gyis// de dag thub dbang bstan pa ste// sangs rgyas byang chub ta bar gyur// de dag ring bar mi thogs par// mnyam bzhag zhi ba'i sa 'di

'thob// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dag/ byang chub rdo la rtag gnas nas// sangs rgyas dga'i bya ba rnams// gang+gA'i phyi snyada mthong bar 'gyur// ting 'dzin rdul bral zhi ba 'di ni des tho bzhi g/
sa bdag ba khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal par de 'gyur to// sangs rgyas rdul bral shan tu sems zhi rnams mthong anas/ 'jig rten mgon po de dag tshigs bcad brgyas bstod 'gyur/ shin tu grags

bod pa chen po lha dang ma yi mchog/ 'dren pa dag la mchod pa mtshungs med des byas te// des n rgyal srid mchil ma bzhin du yongs spangs nas// gtsang zhung rnam par dag pas tshangs par spyad pa spyod// dan thub pa

wA mchog gi bstan la rab byung nas/ ting 'a dzan rdul bral zhi bo 'di yang rab thob ste// de yang tshig dge ngag kyang shin tu 'jam gyur nas// blo ldan byin gyis brlabs kyis mdo sde bye ba 'chad// stod pa mtshan med

'a mchog tu gya nom zhi ba'i mchog/ rab tu zhi chos spyad pa zhib cing thogs pa med// shin tu zhi ba rtag tu rdul bral rang bzhin ste// ting 'dzin 'di bskya bo mang la rab tu ston// blo ni rtag tu zab cing blo yang mtha'

yas te// blo yang rgya che dpag tu med pa'i don ldan blo// zab cing zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob nas ni// 'a jig rten thams cad du'ang snang ba thob par 'gyur// rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'dirnyedan/

de ni tshangs par spyod pa rtag tu gtsang bar 'gyur// dri nga med nyid rtag du kun nas nyon medas med// sems can bya ba gzhan yang de la 'god par 'gyur// rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'a dzin zhi ba 'di bzung

na d+ha shes rab shin tu rno zhing shes rab mchog tu bgyur/ da thos rgya mtshor 'gyur zhing rtag tu blo mtha' yas// ngag dag blo gros mkhas shing cho ga shos par 'gyur// rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba
'di bzung na// las kyi gnas dang de bzhin bzo yi gnas rnams dang// sman gyi gnas rnams dang de bzhin rtsi yi gnas// bstan pa de ni thams cad kyi yang pha rol phyin// rdul dang bral ba'i ting
'dzin zhi ba 'di bzungan// snyan dngags bstan bcos bzhad gad glu dung rol mo dang// glu dang gar la shin tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin// 'jig rten na yang rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur ba yin// rduld/

khral ba'i ting ba dzin zhu ba 'di bzungan// byang chub spyod pa zhi ba dam pa mchog spyodacing// da ni rtag par g.yog dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur// phyogs kyang rtag tu ma phyed mthun shang 'cham par 'gyur
rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'a dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na// mkhas pas de la mya ngan dag gi zug rdudung/ mkhas pa'i sems lanam yang ganod bam 'byung ste// thamasacad dus su rtag par nd kyang
med par 'gyur// rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na// lus kyind dang de bzhin sems kyi nad rnams dang// sa yind dang de bzhin mgo yi nad rnams kyang// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten
dgan de la nad mi 'byung// rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzungan// mi yi 'jig rten nad rnams mang bo ru yod pa/ lus kyi nad dang de bzhin sems kyi nad rnams dang// da'ad/
kyang d dag rtag tu yong mi 'byung// rdul dang bral ba'i ting ba dzin zhi ba 'di bzungan// sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa ni gang yod dang// lus la yang nand kyi rnam pa gang yod pa/
kun nas nyon mongasamang po de dag de la med// rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhwa ba 'dra bzungan// bar snang nam mkha' dag lags pa med pa ltar// rnam par dag ca
rgya cher rab tu 'od gsal to// de bzhin de yi sems kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur// rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na// zla ba'i 'od dang de bzhin nyi ma'i 'od rnams ni// dag/
bzung du med la rab du 'od gsal ba// de bzhin dra yi sems kyang shin tu 'od gsal 'gyur// ji ltar tshon rtsi thogs nas bar snang nam mkha' la// rnam pa mang po ngu na 'i gzugs rna
dkab// de bzhin rdul bral zhi ba'i ting 'dzin 'di bsgoms na// de yi sems la ra mar bro ba sum yin//rang ni ji ltar phyogs bzhi dag nas langs nga dang// thogs ma med par phyogs rnam
kun du 'gro bar 'gyur// da pa sems kyi rgyud kyang rlung dang 'drar 'gyur te// de ni 'jig rten dag na thogs med mchags 'gro/ rlung langs pa ni rgya mis gzung du rung yang srid// rlung na zhags
dag gis ngas bar nus gyur kyang// rdul dang bral bzhi ba'i ting 'dzin 'di bsgrimasan// de yi sems n rab tu shes bar sum yin// gzugs bar n dag ni chu yaMnang du gzung ba'i rung/ [' ]3
mar gang ba'i snod dang nu yind du 'byung/ de bzhin rdul bral zhi ba'i tang 'dzan bde bsgomasan// de yi sems n rab tu shes par sla ma yin/ sngon pas 'brug zer glog gi 'khri shing bya []
na dag gi zhi 'ag nga sa gzung bar nus gyur kyang// rdul dang bral ba zhiba'i ting 'dzin bde sgoman// de yi sems kyin sa ra dza sa ma yin// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas twaMngan sems can ci/
yod pa// sems can de dag gi sgra skad ba zung nus kyang// byang chub sems dang 'a nam zhig ting 'dzin 'di thob na// du ya shes kyi mtha' ni shes par sla ma yin// des ni rdul la zhi ba'i ting
'dzin 'dra des bas klob nas/ kun nas nyon mongs med rung shes pa me dpar 'gyur// nam zhig des n ting 'dzin zhi ba thob pa'i tshe// phyir yang srid pa gsum la nam yang chags me byed/ mam
ga rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin bde thob// 'dod pa dag la mi srid gzugs la mi srid de// bud med dag la ma sred sems kyang 'khrul pa med// zhi zhing rab du zhibags pamed par 'gyur/
nam zhig rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin 'di thob na// bu la mi sred bu ma dag la'ang srid mi 'gyur// chung ma dag la'ang mi sridag.yog la'ong sred pa med// rab tu zhi bar spyod cing gos pa med par
'gyur// gser la ma sridanor rnams la'ang srid med de// mtho risim srid rin chen rdzas la chagasami 'gyur// sems kyang shin du rnam par dug cing mi rtog pa/ 'dar ting 'dzin rnams
thob pa'i bya brag yin// rgyal srid 'dod phyir tshangs par spyod pa de mi spyod// mkhas pa mtho ris sred pos rtag tu sbyin ma byed// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas 'byed d
'di ni ting nga'adzin dag thob ba bye brag go/ rgyal po'i srid phyir dka'athub brtul zhugs ma spyod de// srid pa gsum du dbang phyug 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin// skye bo mngal/
phan phyir byang nub sred pa yis// den rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin 'di grub bo// glu la ma srid garala'ong srid pa ma yin te// sngas la ma srid bdung ba dag la'ang srid ma yin// zas la'ang mi
srid gos la yang n srid mi 'gyur// 'din tong de ba dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag yin// mig lami srid rna ba la yang sridam yin// sna la mi sred lce la sred pa ma yin zhing// lus la mi srid sems
la yang na srid mi 'gyur// 'don ting nge 'dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag yin// khyim lam srid dgon par srid pas yin te// gtsug lag khang la ma srid grong la' dam srid 'gyur// yulal khom sregyong
khyer la yang ma sridado// 'di ni ting de 'dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag yin// sbyin la mi sredatshul khrims dag la rtsed mi 'gyur// bzodalam srid brtson 'grusal yang srid ma yin// bsam gtan
mi sred shes rab la yang mi srid do// 'din ting nge 'dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag yin// sems can la yang mi srid srog la mi sred cing// sangs rgyus dag la mi sred chos l srid mi byed//
dge 'dun ma srid byang chub l yang sridama'agyur// 'dan ting nge 'dzin dag thob ba'i bya brag yin// yod la ma srid med pa la yang srid ma yin// dbus lam sridamathala'ang srid par mi 'gyur
zhing / kun la mi srid sred pab nga ma yin te// 'di ni ting nge 'dzin dag thob pa'i phyi brag yin// rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'a dikloban// de la 'dod chags nam yang gnod pa skyed de//
su dag bud mad sed pa de na sems 'khrul 'gyur// 'di ltar don 'dod chags rang bzhin yongs su shes// rdul dang bral ba'i zho pa ting 'dzin 'di thoban// de lanam yang zhe sdang gnod pas spyod
da[;]mkhas pas 'di ltar gnod sems rab du bshig pa'i phyir// byams par byed cing zhe sdang thams cad shin tu bcom// de la nam yang gti mug gnod pa mi skyed de// shes rab kyisan gte
mug ma rig nges par bsal// ye shes rab rib med pa dpag tu med pa thob// ting 'dzin thob pa'i yon tan 'dri dag dpag tu med// mgatsang bas 'dod chags rtag tu tshar bcad de//
byams pa yid kyang zhe sdang khor mor ma lus bcom// shes rab kyisan gti mug nyon mongs dra ba gsal// ting 'dzin thob pa 'jig zhakun n ra ba dumadzes// der nam yang gnyidan gnod pa mi
skyed de// dus ni nye ba'i nyon mongs rnam mang rnam par bshag dra ni gos ba med cing shin tu bral bar 'gyur// ting 'dzin thob pa'i yon tan 'di dag dpag tu med// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dang
'dzin 'di 'dzin pa// de la nam yang nags pa gnod pa/ra ma 'gyur te// 'di ltar don dus kun du yang gdong la dga'//bdog pa thams cad gtong zhing bde ba sngon ra 'gyur// byang chub
@#// sems dpa'i gung dug ting 'a zhi' da 'dzin pa// da na dpe med pa yi mthu dang ldan bar 'gyur// de ni rtag pa'i stobs dang rjes su ldan gyur de// 'jig rten na nad dang
mnyam pa su yang med// nam tsho'ajig rtan du yang 'khor los sgyur ba yi// ma yi rgyal par de 'gyur ba dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs// da ni skye bo mang shos shin du mchod par 'gyur// khyad par thob
pa/ pas rab rib med cing shes rab mchog/ su dang gtso bor gyur cing rigs che rin chen mchog/ longs spyod che zhing g.yog bran mang la dbang yang che// gang la rta dang ba glang shing rta bzhon mchog/
yod rdogaser dang nor bu rin chen mgron bu rab tu mang// sangs rgyas ye shes dam pa 'di la su dad pa// de dag 'dzam gling rin chen rigs zhes bya ba yin// de ni rin chen rigs mchog
ru skyes nas kyang// gnyen bshes shin dumang po'i tshogs kyi don kyang byed// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dgan mdad gang yod pa// de dag bag yod pas ni dad pa skyed bar byed// sems can tshos
rnams byang chub sems dpa' gang bkod pa// de dag sangs rgyas rab byung rgyal ba mchog du 'gyur// de dag mtshungs bamed pa'i byang chub mchog thobanas// sangs rgyas zhing du tshungs ma g.yel
rab tu bskor// de tshe chos kyi 'khor lo 'di ni sus shes pa// de dag mo lus mi skya'i chos la gnas par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' de dag shin tu mang byed do// de dag rtag du sems
rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur// de dag dus kun tu yang mtshungs med don byed de// de dag sems can mig ni rab rib med par byed// byang chub sems dpa' gang dgarab dga' byams pa'i sems
gos pa med pa de dag de tshe sangs rgyas 'gyur// de tsho byang chub sems dpa' de dgagar gnas pa// sems can dag gi don kyang tshadamed byed par 'gyur// tshangs sbyodamatshungasamed tshul khrims
rnam dag rang du srung/ bskal pa mtha' yasamang por ting 'dzin sgom par byed// rtag tu bsam gtan rnam par thar 'a shin tu nges// de tshe byang chub sams dpa' de dag sangs rgyas sras// de dag
rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rtag tu bstan byed cing/ de zhing rnams mtha' yas rnam pa mang por de song nas// bde bar gshegs pas rab tu bshad pa'i chos nyan te// gzungs la rab tu gnas pas thams cad
'dzin par byed// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gzungs la gnas pa ni// mdo sde dpag tu med pa mtha' yas rab tu ston// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gzugs la gnas pa'i//
sems can dag gi don kyang dpag tu med pa byed/ sems can 'chi ba po skye ba dang// 'gro ba dang ni 'o nga bshas// des ni ci 'dra'i las byas pa// rnam par smin ba de 'drar 'gyur// las
rnams la pho bar 'gyur ba yang// rdul tsam yang na mi rnyed de// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen ni// de dag gi yang de shes so// stong pa bdag nyid chen po yi// gnas pa dag gi dam pa yin/
sems can bye ba bsam yas kyang// thogapa che la rab tu'agod// dal ston par byed pan// sems can 'du shasami 'jug ste// chos rnams 'jug pa med par//
kyi byang chub sems dpa' rab du ston// chos rnams rab tu ston pa na// dmigs pa dag ni ma 'byung ste// ye shes brtan la rab gnas shing// stong pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur// ston pa kun gyi/
gnas pa yi// ting 'dzin ba drani bstan byas na// bud med 'du shes rang bzhin gyis// de la 'du shes ma 'byung ngo// bud med 'du shes rnam bshi gnas // byang chub snying por 'dug par 'gyur//
byang chub snying por 'dug nas// bdud kyi 'du shes rnam par ldeg/ mkhas ba des na bdud rnams dang// bdud kyi sde yang ma mthong ste// bdud kyi bumo gsum po yang// des na mthong bar mi 'gyur//
byang nub snying por 'dug nas ni// 'du shes thams cad rab du spong// 'du shes thams cad rab spangs nas// sa 'di thams cad g.yos par gyur// rarab rgya mtshor bcas pa dgo/ phyogs brnyan
yang ci yod g.yos/ phyogs bcu dgan sems can rnams// kun gyi don mi shes so// sa dag rab tu g.yos pa 'di// byang chub sems dpa'i rtsa ba phrul yin// byang chub dam ba 'dargya ba/
da tshe sa yang lan drug g.yos// 'dus byas chos ni ji snyed dang// chos gang 'dus ma byas pa yang// chos d thams cad rang rtogs de// chos kyi sgyur na bstan pa yin// 'di la rtog byed gang
[% ]yang med// seng ge 'i sgra na 'byung med kyi// 'byung ba dag kyang rnam rig nas// 'od byed sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// rten cing chos rnams 'byungabar 'gyur// rten cing chos rnams rab du skye/
chos rnams kyin rten pa yang// mkhas pa de dag thams cad nas// chos kun gyin cho ga shes// stong nyid rtogs par khong du chud// de dag 'gro ba rab shis te// chos kun rtogs par khong du
chud cad yi 'gro ba btsal na yang// byang chub sems dpasam rnyed de// 'di ltar sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi// 'gro ba bsam yas de yis rig/ 'gro ba thams cad shes pa gang// don
'gro ba der 'gro ste// dam chos mtshan nyid rig pas na// ngan song thams cad rmad ba yin// dam chos mtshan nyid rig nas ni// zhing rnams thams cad rnam par lta// zhing kun la yang/
rnam bltas nas// byang chub snying por ba dug par 'gyur// byang chub snying bor ba du gnas su// seng ge yin sgra sgrogs te// de bzhin zhing rnams bye ba snyed// bsam yas dpag med grags par byed/
shing de rnams kyang g.yo byed cing// sangs rgyas dpa' bo grags chen dag/ sems can ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin// sems can kha lo sgyur zhing 'dul// byang nub dam pa rig nas ni// byang chub snying pa de las
langs// dpag med bsam gyis ma khyab pa// sems can gdul ba'i nga rnam par 'dul// de nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// sangs rgyas sprul pa mthas yas 'phrul// zhing rnams bya ba stong
du yang// sangs rgyas sprul ba'agrobar 'gyur// sems can bya ba bsam sa yas rnams// byang chub mchog la rab tu 'god// srog chags kun 'dus pa'i
chos kyi mchog kyang ston par byed// ye shes chen po de 'dra ste// sangs rgyas ye shes bsam mi khyab// de phyir 'dun pa rab skyed cig/ byang chub 'dun pa bla na med// sangs rgyas
chos rnams dang// 'dus pa'i dam pa dge 'dun la// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo rnams// byang chub mchog tshol gus pa skyed// zhum pa med pa'i sams kyis kyang/ g.yol
ba med par ram gyis// de nas 'od byed sangs rgyas su// rid par ma thogs thob bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag kyang// zhing rnams stong nas lhags pa rnams// 'jig
sgron ma rab mthong ste// chos kyi mchog kyang 'chad par mdzad// dpa' bo chen po 'dren pa lo// rin chen chen pos 'thor bar byed// man+tar ba'i me tog dug byang nub phyir mi 'thor bar byed
bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing// zhing 'di rab tu brgyan par byed// phyogs dang phyogs na kun tu yang// rin po che yi dra bas g.yogs// ba dan dag kyang gdags byas shing// rgyal
mtshan bya ba mngon par bsgreng// du ma yi ni brgyan rnams kyis// zhing 'di shin du legs par brgyan// khang pa brtsigs pa byed bar 'gyur// rin chen kun gyis rnam par spras// khang
pa du shu stegs bu dag/ yid du 'o dab grangs med rnams// zhal med khang dang zla gam dang// skar khung de bzhin bya rgya bres// rin chen sna tshogs brgyan pa yi// bdug pa'i snod du
bdug pas bdug/ bdug pa dag ni bdugs pa yis// sangs rgyas zhing 'di rab tu gang// de yi drin yid 'ong ba// zhing yadabye ba stong du ldang// de dag kun tu khyab byas nas/[]
sbos kyi char yang rab tu 'babs// gang gis dri de bsnams pa yang/ dadag sangs rgyas 'dren par 'gyur// de dag 'dod chags zug rngu spangs// zhe sdang srid pa yong mdud//
rgyum chan pa rnam par dral// mun pa kun kyang med par 'gyur// der ni rdzu 'phrul thob gyur to// dbang stobs byang chub yan lag dang// bsam gtan thar pa rnam par reg/ da rag/
sbyin par 'os par 'gyur// stan yang yid du 'ong ba rnams// bya ba phrag lnga rab bshams to// rin chen dra bas brgyan pa yi// gos rnams bya ba rab tu bting// de la dpa' bo grags pa
che[;]byang chub sems dpa' de dag bdu// mtshan dang de bzhin dpo byud kyis// de dag shin tu rnam par 'bar// sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad kyang// rin chen shing gis legs brgyan te// yan/
lag brgyad ldan chus gang ba/ rdzing bu dag ni rnam par sprul// rdzing bu'i 'gram na gnas pa rnams// de dag de las chu 'thungs nas// thams cad sred pa bsal nas ni// 'jig rten gyi
yang mchod rtan 'gyur// thu dad pa yi zhing nas kyang// byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa rnams// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi// sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod
sa par byed// sgra de su dag thos pa na// de dag 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur// phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab pa// mdo sde 'di ni nges rab bshad// pad+ma bye ba bsam mi khyab// 'dwab ma/
dag ni gser las byas// snying po sbrul gyi snying po ste// der ni de dag rab tu sprul// yal ga dag kyang brtun// khog pa dag ni shil yin te// ze ba dpal gyi snying po can// der ni mdzes
pa rnams kyang sprul// de dag dri yang bsamami khyab// rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba yis// zhing rnams bya ba kun tu gang// pad+ma'i drin bsam mi khyab// yid du 'ong bar 'byung ba yi// dridi
su yis bsnams pa yang// de dag rab tu sems dga' zhing// nad rnams thamaMs cad zhi bar 'gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// ma lus par n zad 'gyur te/ de dag nyes la/
gsum brad nas/ sangs rgyas bde ba sbyin par 'gyur// de dag lasan sgra 'byung ste// sangs rgyas skrun bsam mi khyab/ dam pa'i chos dang dga' dun sgra// rnam pa kun mo 'byur bar gyur/
pa stod pa 'di dang mtshan med dang// ston pa med pa'i sgra 'byung ste// da thos soms can bye ba mang// phyir mi ldog par rab tu 'gyur// sgra de dgazhi 'byung ba yang/ zhing rnams byi bar 'gro ba
kug[ ]/sems can bye ba bsam yas rnams// sangs rgyas ye shes 'god par byed// rma bya ka la bid dang// shang shad du'u dang bya rnams kyang// de dag rab du smra 'byin pa//
ngesaM rgyas sgra ni bla na med// ku lan ri skyegs khrung khrung dang// khu byug dang na bya rnams te// de dag sgra ni 'byin pa yang// bsam gyis mi khyab chos sgra 'byin/ na tsho ngang pa kA ran 'da'
dur pa dang ni sa ra sa// de dag sgra rnams 'byin pa ni// bla med dge 'dun sgra yang 'byin// lha dag gi dang mi yi ni// bya rnams ji snyed gang yod nga// dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa
rnams// de dag kun tu sgra yang 'a byon// rin pa che yi shing rnams ni// bye brag 'phags shing blta na sdug/ yid 'o nga nor bu'i shing rnams kyang// zhing 'di nyid du rnam par sprul// shing 'di
