kun la rgyan rnams kyi// chun po thams cad rab du 'phyang// sangs rgyas dag gi mthu yisan// zhing 'di nyid du mngon par sbyab// zhing 'di nyid ni ma snang ba// de lta bu yi bkod pa ni// zhing

kun na yang yong med de// de tshe shin du bye brag 'phags// gongam bzhin du 'di dag rnamu// shAkya seng ge skyob pas bshad// byang nub saAdapa'i grag chen rnamA// ye shesad 'dzem nur med// gang gis mazla'/
'ang chags pa ni// de dag 'jug pa bsams yas de/ ya shos kyisan rnam par 'phel// 'bab nu dag gis rgya mtsho bzhin// de dag la yang mtha' mi rnyed// rgya mtsho ngag na 'thung ba bzhin/[}]
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul// bsam gyis mi khyab ba de dag bshad// dpa' bo mtha'a'adir gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa'i grags ldan rnams// dbyangs//
ba kyi yan lag rnams 'byin ba/ gad+ma yin bye ma snyad// de bas dbyang kyang bsam yas do// byang chub sems dpa' rlom sems med// rlom sems rab tu sbyangs pa na// byang nub tu yang
nyabar 'gyur// de dag srog gi phyir yang ni// tshul khrims 'bral bar mi byed dra// byung chub sems dpa' dka' thub ba rtan/ de ni mi 'bral spyod par byed// 'dod pa yi ni 'du shes kyi//
do kun phyir yang mi 'bral to// 'du shes thams cad sbyangs pa la// ting 'dzin dgran dpag du med// mnyam par bzhag pas de spyod de// ting 'dzin la yang chags ba med// chags
pa med cing bag yod pas// da ni 'jig rten chags mi byed// 'jig rten khams nibadas nas kyang// bde ba can du de 'gro ste// der song nas ni da yis kyang// sangs rgyas 'od dpag med
pa mthong/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo gang// mtshan rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan// mngon shes lnga ldan shes rab che// gzungs rnams spyod yul gyur pa dag/ zhing rnams
bya bar rab ba gro zhing// sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal// sangs rgyas shing ni bsam yas su// snang bar byed cing 'gro bar 'gyur// skyon rnams thams cad rab sngangs shing// nyon
mongs thams cad rnam par sbyangs// nyon mongs thams cad rgyun bcad do// rgyal bar skye ba gcig gis gnas// zhing de nas ni mi rnams kyang/ ngan song du yang mi 'gro ste// zhing
dor ngan song thams cad kyang// ma 'dus par ni chad par 'gyur// skyob pa 'od ni dpag med pa// 'jig rten mgon pas bshad pa ste// de la nem nur ma byed cig/ bdu dra can du 'gro bar
'gyur// mdo sde na chen 'di yis bsngags pa rnams// bud med gang shos sems kyang dad 'gyur pa// skyes bu mkhas pa mchod du myur 'gyur te// rdzu 'phrul gyis na zhing steng bye bar
bgro rdumachod pa tshad med rnams mang ji snyed pa// zhing na bye ba khrag khrig gtams snyed du// skyes bu mchog la mchod pa de byas pa/ byams pa'i sems la grangs dang char ma yodatshul
khrims ting 'dzin rtag du bsnyen byas te// bsam gtan rnam ny+dzar de bzhin tshad med dang// stong pa mtshan med rtag tu bsten byas na// ring por ma thogs 'jig rten bde gshegs 'gyur//
byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims tshogs gnas pa// des n nga la mchod pa rab mchog byas/ zad dus thamar byang chub sems gnas pa// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tu mchod//
thad dus mi bzad pa la byang chub sems dpa' gang// bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos mchog 'di bsrung ba// de dag nga yis sras te phyi dus chos skyong ba// de dag sangs rgyas bya ba steng gis
@#// yongs su gtad// mdo sde 'dzin pa'i phan yon gyi le'u ste sum cu gsum mo////kha khags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo//
ka/ bam po bcu gcig pa// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu de lta bsan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
ting de 'dzin bad 'dod pa dang/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ba dod pas mtshan ma med pa la gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs
pa 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams la mchod pa rgya cher bya ba la mngon par brtson par bya'o// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po des/ sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pas/ ting nge 'dzan 'a di 'dod pa dang/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar
'dod pas/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas shing/ las kyi rnam smin la ma rag pas/ rang gi lus dang srog gis kyang do bzhin gshags pa bzhugs pa ga/ yongs su mya ngan las 'dus

kyi ]pa dag gi mchod rten la mchod pa man par 'du bya ba rgya chen bya'o// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spras pa'i ting nge 'dzin bad yang/ skad gsang mtho zhing yid du 'ong ba dang [ ]!
bye brag tu 'a lags pa'i tshig dang yi ge rgyun chags pas snying rje chen po la dmigs pa'i sems dang ya de la byed pas/ gzhan du rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o// rab tu gdon par bya'o// bar/
par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ gzhon nu chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba dang bzhi ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di yin no// gzhan
nu gung gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rjechen po dang thabs kyis bstan pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa 'am/ yongs su mya ngan
las 'das ba dag gi de bzhin gshags pa'i mchod rten rnams la mchod pa rgya cher bya ba la brtson par gyur cing/ chos rnams kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spras pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal
pa 'di gzhan dag la rgya cher rab du sten pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo la
gnas par 'gyur te/ de chos gang la yang ma dmigs sa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba ma dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor la gnas bani/ smon lam thams cad l
gnas par 'gyur ro//gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam thams cad la gnas pani/ bdag dang sems can kun gyi smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
@#// pyad de/ tang de 'dzin 'di yang myur du 'thob cadi/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// gzhon nu rnam grangs 'dis kyang/ da ltar

gi rig par bya ste/ gzhon nu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangasamed pa/ yangs pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dpag du med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i
dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bad bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba
! bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbyang byin zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo// gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas dbyad byin des sems can grangs med dpag du med pa/ zag pa zad pa dgra bcom pa nyidal bkod de/ rab du bkod cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang/ sems na
grangs med dpag du med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog par yang rab du bkod nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dusan

'dzam bu'i gling na rgyal po dpal dbyangs zhes bya bas/ de bzhinagshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ mchod rten de bzhin gshags pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can bye ba khrag khrig/

brgya stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong byas te/ mchod rten re re la yang mar meb yin bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong btsugs so// de bzhin du mchod rten re re la yang rol mo dang/ la
stan dang me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan bye ba khrag khrig
brgya stong phrag brgyud khri bzhi stod phul lego/ gzhon nu 'di ltar rgyal po dpal dpyad kyis mchod rten de bzhin gshugs ba'i ring srel gyi snying po can la mchod pa byas nas/ byang chub sems
dpa' bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu'i byang chub sems dpa' mang po bsags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de drag thams cad la bde ba yo byad thams cad kyis mchod
pa la brtson par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang chos smra ba yin te/ spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad ba ting nge 'dzin rab du thob pa/ chags pa med
ba'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/ yang dgu pa'i yon tan gyi chos ston pa/ yongs su dag pa'i chos ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang dam pa'i pha rol phyin pa sha stag go/ gzhon nu de'i
tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor dan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin zhes bya ba yod de/ byis pa gzhon nu sku gnas pa// dang po'i lang tsho dang ldan pa/ na tshod dar la
dbab pa/ 'dod pa la rnam par ma brtsis shing/ gzhon nur tshangs pa ra spyod pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas 'bo gcig lon pa zhig yod do// gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i
thos dusan/ rgyal pa dang la dbyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag la gsol ba btab pa/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa yang dag par sdud pa/ byang chub sems
dpa'i sde snod gzungs chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa dang/ dbang dang dul ba chags pa med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpab sems dpa' chen po de dag la gsol ba

'tsha btab nas nubamo mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi stod pa can rnams kyis mdun du mar me'i yon bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag rab tu 'bar bar byas te/ 'khor gyi khyams kyang phyag
dar byas nas chag chag btab ste/ rab tu byug pa byas/ me tog mngon par bkram zhing/ mal stan sna tshogs ba ting ste/ rgyal po dpal dbyangs de btsun ma'i 'a khor dang bcas/ grong dang
yul ma 'khor dang bcas grong mir bcas pa khyim gyi nang nas byung ste/ rol mo dang/ sil snyan dang/pheg rdob pa dang/ me dog dang/ bdug pa dang/ stes dang/'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi
pa ma dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba don rnams thogs nas/ mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can rnams la mchod pa byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir btsun

mo'i 'khor dang bcas de la nga thog du dong ngo// lha dang mi'i 'khor kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir mang du tshogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bde bas byin gyis de dag mthong ba dang/ mar me yon du phul babye ba khrag

khrig brgya stomang bo dag dag tu 'bar bar byas pas de'i 'od kyis gcig du khyab ste/ lha dang mi'i skye bo mang po rnams chos nyan par tshogs par rig nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni thug pa chen pal

zhugs pa yin na/ bdag ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa zhig bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa lamachod pa ji lta bu s lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten nga
mtshar du 'gyur ba dang/ yid rangs pa dang/ drag ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur zhing/ chos kyi snang ba thob pa dang/ rgyal po dpal dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa lamachod

pa byas pa thams cad dang ldan pa 'di yang zil gyis mnan te/ rgyal po dpal dbyangs btsun mo'i 'khor dang zhom rade bar khas pa yang ngo mtshar du gyur cing yid rangs pa dang/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ mgu kha
dang yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur bar mchod par bya'o snyam m// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems chen pe bde bas byin de ltar sems dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes de/ chos nyan pa'i skye bo'i
tshogs chen pa 'dus bar rig nas/ de nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du 'dug nas/ lag pa g.yas pa ras kyis dkris te/ 'bru mar gyi nang du bcug go/ 'brumar gyi nang du
bcu gnas 'a bar bar byas so// deshas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin lhag pa'i bsam bal zhugs pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pas blun
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs shing byang chub yongs su tshol ba'i lag pa g.yas pa de ltar 'bar rang sems dad bzhin gyi mdog gyur pa med do//
gzhon nu do nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin gyi lag pa g.yas pa bsregs nas rab tu 'bar zhing mar gyur te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar bar gyur mi thog
tu de'i tshosachen ba 'di yang rab tu g.yos par gyur to// dub 'dug pa 'bar bar byas pa'i 'od dus/ mar me yon du phul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dum rnams mog
mgu bar byas par gyur to/ phyogs thams cud du yang snang ba chen po byung ngo// 'od de phyogs thams cad snang bar gyur to/ kun tu khyab par gyur pa dang/ de dga' zhing yid
bdu ba skyes nas/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yang skad 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba dang/ tshig bye brag tu 'phags pa dang// tshig
gi yi ge rgyun chags pas 'khorade dag thams cad la rgya cher go bar byed cing yang dag par rab tu bstan to// der sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha khri nyis stong chos nyan par 'dus pa de dag dga' zhing
yid bde ba skyes nas/ lha mchod pa sna tshogs byed bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo rnams kyang lha'i rol mo dag kyang byed do// rgyal po dpal dbyangs khang pa'i steng na 'dug pa/ bdag gi mi
mang pos bskor cing mdun du bdar te/btsun ma'i 'a khor gyi nangan 'dug ba/ gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang/ ldan ba yang dag par bzung bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pa bad bas byin gyi lag pa 'bar bar byas te/ 'od de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan cing lha'i 'od mi'i las 'das pas snang bar byas ba mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems so// 'di ni byang
nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pachen po thob pa yin no zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po bde bas byin la shin tu dga' ba dang/ dad pa dang/ gus pa3
bar bzhag ste/ ri mor bcas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen pos ba rtan pas/ btsun ma'i 'khor brgyad cu dang lhan cig khang ba'i steng de nas bdag nyid mchongs
te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa bde bas byin blta ba dang/ rab du dga' bar bya ba'i phyir mchongs te dong ngo/ de gus pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bsatshe de nyid la 'khor
dang bcas pa'i lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba thob bo// da lha dang/ klu dang/
gnod sbyin dad dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ nga phye chen po dag gis yongs su bzung bas// rgyal po dpal
bka dbyangs kyang 'khor dang bcas pa khru stong phrag brgyar tshang ba'i khad pa'i steng nas mchongs na/ de'i lus la gnod pa 'am/ sems la gnod pa 'am/ sems zhum par gyur pa med do//
de nas rgyal po dpal dbyangs lag pa gnyis bsgreng ste// skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig 'a di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin gyi lag pa bsregs shing rab du 'bar ba
mthong nas/ skad chen po phyung ste/ chos des btab bodo 'a di nas rgyal pad skye bo'i tshogs chen pa dang lhan cig ngu zhang mchi ma byung nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas

byon gyi mdun du 'dug go (gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin gyis rgyal po dpal dbyangs mthong ste/ mthong nas de la snas pa/ ci'i slad du rgyal po chen nga khyod skye bo'i tshogs
chen po 'di dag dang bdag gi mdun na bzhugs shing skad chen po phyung ste cho nges btab nas bshums shing ma chi ma 'byin par mdzad/ de skad ces smras ba dang/ rgyal po dpal dbyangs kyis/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smras pa// shes rab chen po bde bas byin// chos smras ba na mkhas pa yi// yan lag ma tshang reg/
nas ni// skye bo ba de dag de phyir du/ dgazi brjid phung pos 'phags pa yi// 'di lta bu yi gzugs ba de yang/ de lag nga nyams par shes nas ni bdag kyang shin tu sdug
bsngal la// khyod kyi lag pa 'bar byas pa// de yi 'od na phyogs bcur btang// khyod las byung ba'i lha rdzas kyis// mar me 'di dag mi gsal byas// sa 'di rab tu g.yos rgyu
te[;]khyod kyi sems ni zhum pa med// de nas bdag gi sems skyes pa// mkhas pa thamal mo yin snyam// bdag ni btsun mo'i 'khor bcas pa// khru ni stong phrag brgya pa yi
khang pa'i steng nas mchongs gyur na// bdag gi lus la gnod pa med// legs so ye shes ngo mtshar khyod// legs so sems kyang bla na med// ba rtson 'grus rab bam mas/
legs pa ste// bsam pa che ba legs pa yin// gang gi lag pa 'bar byas kyang// khyod la nam yang g.yo ba med// dga' zhing rangs pa skyes nas su/ phyir yang chos ni rab tu/
'chad// ji ltar zla ba nya ba dang// nam mkha'i dkyilan nyi ma bzhin// rir bar yi rgyal po ltar// grogs po de ltar shin tu mdzes// bdag kyang de bzhin mkhas pa yi// smon
lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi// lus la phangs pa rab spangs te// bdag gis srog chags don rnams bgyi// chos kyi dgab pas rangs gyur to// bdag gi dga' ba bsam mikhyab// 'di ltar yin
lag ma tshang ba// des na rab tu sngag bsngal la// lha dang klu yis mchod pa yi// bde bas byin gyis rgyal po la// mtha' yas pa ya spobs pa yis/ tshigs
su bcad pa 'di dag smras// gang la lag pamed ba yang// den yan lag mtshang yin// su la tshul khrims med ba dang// don yan lag ma tshang yin// rul pa yin lus 'di yis//
bsam gyis ma khyab sbyin pa'i gnas// 'jig rten kun gyi mchod pa'i rtan/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gis mchod// stong gsum dag ni mtha' yas pa// rin po che yis yongs bkang
ste sangs rgyas la shes tshol ba'i phyir// 'jig rten mgon la rab tu byin// 'jig rten pa yi mchod yod kyang/ su dag chos rnams stong rig nas// lus dang srog kyang gtong ba
ni mchod pa de dag bsam mi khyab// bden pa'i tshig na brjod par bgyi// rgyal po chen po bdag la gson// skye bo'i tshogs 'di thams cad kyang// tshigs bcad 'di yi don rig gis//
bdan pa gang gis sangs rgyas su// 'jig rten mchod rten bdag 'gyuran// bden pa de yis sa 'di yang// rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur cig/ tshig 'di dgan smras dang// sa yang rab
kyi tu ga yos par gyur//ngo mtshar gyuracing rmad byung ste// lha rnams bya ba rab tu dga'// lha dang mi dag dga' zhes ni// byang chub tu yang sems bskyed do// dpag med bsam
gyis ma khyab pa// thag pa mchog la gnas par gyur// dag slong bde bas byin pa yis// ji snyed kyin don byas pa// don ma zad bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas dag gi ye shes 'jug/
bden pa gang gi chos de ni// lag la zhes kyang bya bdin na// bden pa de yis sngon ltar bdag/ lag pa myur du byung bar shog/ bden pa gang gis chos de ni// bde bas byin pa yod ma yin// phyogs/
rnamAsu labatsunas yang// stong pa yin pas ma dmigs so// sgra grag 'byung bar gyur pa yang// don stong par rig par gyis// skrun brag cha lta bu ste// chos rnams de ltar shes par/
bgyi/ rtan m zhig la jigs pa med 'gyur zhing// stong pa rtogs pa khong du chud// bden pa yi ni tshig de yis// 'jig rten thams cad ge mi 'gyur// srid gsum sems can ji snyed pa//
lha rnams dang ni mi rnams kyang// thams cad mkhyen pa'i gzi brjid kyis// thams cad mnyam par gzhag par shog ja skyid lha dang ma dag gi/ 'tshe bar gyur cing cu yod pa// phyir mi
ldog pa'i gzi brjid kyis// de dag thams cad zhi bar shog/ tshigs bcad 'di dag bshad pa dang// lag pa yang na slar skyes te// bde bas byin pa de yi lus// mtshan rnams kyis
ni rnam par brgyan// lha yang bya ba phrag stong rnams// bar snang la ni 'dug nas su// da tsho me tog man+da ras// dge slong de la 'thor bar byed// mi ma yin pa'i me tog gis// 'dzam
bu'i gling bdagang bar gyur// lha mo bye ba khrag khrig rnams// glu dbyangs rol mo rab tu byed// de tshe bad bas byin pa yis// sgra 'di dag ni byung ba na// rnam 'phrul
'di ni sangs rgyas dag/ bya ba stong gis gzigs par 'gyur// rang rang gin zhing dag tu// dug slong pha dang dge slong ma// dge bsnyen ma dang dag bsnyen la// grags pa chen po go
bar mdzad// dge slong bde bas byin pa de// mkhas shing stobs kyang che ba ste// sangs rgyas kyi ni yi shus phyir// des n lag pa 'bar bar byas// da yas zhing rnams stong dag dang/
gad+ma yin bye ma snyed// mar me des ni snang byas te// sreg pa'i bskal pa byung ba ba[]na// me tog dang ni phyi ma yis// zhing rnams thamasacad gang bar gyur// sa gzhi dag nas yan chad
du pus nub tsam du gang bar gyur// rin chon me tog thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas zhing 'di gang bar gyur// bde bas byin lamachod pa'i phyir// klu rnams mu tig char pa 'babs// na
chen bkod pa tham sa cad kyis// zhing 'di rab tu brgyan par gyur// bdebs byin la mchod pa'i phyir// mu tig rin chen shin tu bkram// lhadang klu dang gnod sbyin dang// mi 'am ci dang lto 'phyur
ts+tsa bcas/ gad+ma yaM na bya ma snyad// byang chub mchog la zhugs par gyur// bya rgod phungs po'i ro la yang// sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge na// dge slong dag gi dag bdun mdun/ rgyalabasang ga'i
sgra sgrogs pa// bskal pa stong gi bar du ni// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na// nga na bde bas byin par gyur// ma pham pa na dpal dbyangs yin// dge slong bde bas byin pa na// mthong ma thag tu/
pa'i tshe// bud med dag kyang mtha' yas pa// budamed dngos po rnam par log/ mi dbang gis ni lung bstan te// de dag phyir yang ldog pa med// 'jig rten kun gyi 'dren pa ste// rang bya'i
'gyur zhes lung yang bstan// sbyangs pa'i yon tan bstan pa yi// mkhas pas mdo sde 'di thos nas// lus la phangs pa med khyad par//chos 'di rjes su bslab par bgyis// bde bas
byin gyi 'du stesum cu bzhi/ la/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems/
dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin pa de 'dod pa dang/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ dgaba'i rtsa ba rnams la nye bar gnas ni/
chos kyi sbyin pa 'am/ zang zing gi sbyin pa la brtson par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen pa des/ sbyin pa de yang sde ba bzhis yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// bzhi gang zhin
'di lta ste/ thas la mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i thabs mkhas pa de dag thob par 'gyur bar
sbyin pa 'di yi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bsngo ba dang po'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag la thabs mkhas pa thos zhing 'dzin par 'a gyub dang/
kun chub par bya ba dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog par 'gyur ba dang/ gang gis rlan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag
dang bdag rtag tu 'grogs par gyur cig ces de ltar sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba 'dani bsngo ba gnyis pa// longs spyod thob pa gang 'jig rten thams cad 'tsho bar
'gyur ba'i longs spyod thob pa de dag dang bdag phrad par gyur rug ces de ltar sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bsdu ba gsum pa'o// bdag gi lus grub pas sems
can rnams la chos kyis phan bdags pa dang/ zang zing gis phan gdags pa dang// phan gdags pa gnyis kyis phan 'dogasab ma'agyur ba'i bdag gi lus grub par gyur cig ces sbyin pa'i
dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bsde ba bzhi pa ste/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsngo ba 'di bzhis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bsngo bar bya'o// gzhan
yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chon pa rab tu byung ba yang rung/ khyim pa yang rung ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar 'dod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la g.yo med pas bsten par bya/ bsnyen par bya/ rim gror bya'o// de la g.yo
med pa de ni ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa'i dag slong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gangan bar gyur cing/ nad mi bzad pas btab pa las/ rang gi sha dang khrag gis kyang dge slong de na ba de
las bslang bar spro bar bya'o// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ting nge 'dzani 'di 'dod pa dang/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar 'dod pas/ g.yo med cing 'jigs pa med pas rang gi sha dang khrag kyang yongs su ba tang ste/ dgo slong chos smra bar na ba las bslad/
bar bya'o// gzhon nu rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gzhon nu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal ba grangs med pa bas kyang chos grangs med pa// yangs ba/ tshad med pa//
bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ dpag tu med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
pa rta'ajig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha 'do sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa khyad par du
'phags pa'i rgyal pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ gzhon nu smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa khyad du 'phags pa'i rgyal pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang/
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gang gi nyin par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de nyim ma 'das pas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pa grangs
med dpag du med pa mngon par sprul nas/ sems can tshad med pa 'dul ba byas te/ zag pa zad pa dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod/ sems can tshad med pa yang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod nas/ nyi ma de ma 'das par yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i dam pa'i chos 'kho bya ba
khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas par gyur to// gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das smon lam bsam gyis ma khyab pa khyad par du 'phags pa rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nub pa'i dus kyi tshe/ lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa na dge slong dmigs pa'i lta ba can mang po byung ste/ de dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde la mi sred mi mos shing phyi'i
zlog par byed/ spong bar byed d/ mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong dag la yang gnodapa' byad cing srog kyang gcod par byed de med pa dang bkur sti la chags pa de dag gis mdo sde 'di
ldabu 'dzin pa'i dge slong srog bcad par gyur to// gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dusan/ rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs zhes bya ba 'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba/ dam pa'i chos yongs su'adzin pa sngon gyi
smon lam phun sum tshogs pa zhig byung ste/ gzhon nu yang de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dag slong yang dag blo gros zhes bya ba ting nga ba dzan 'di 'dzin pa dang/ chos smra ba
rgyal po de'i pho brang du 'gro zhing/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/ phan par 'dod pa/ snying brtsi ba don du 'dod pa zhig byung ste/ rgyal po de yang de la rgyun ma chad par blta bas mi
ngom ste rtag tu 'dod par gyur to/ de yang bstan pa dang/ chos kyi gtam bya ba dang/ nye bar 'gro ba dang/ bsnyen bkur byab dang/ yongs su dri ba dang/ gzung ba dang/ tshig
gis gobar byed nus shing dge slong chos smrang dra/ sems can drug gi g.yo ba dang/ spyod lam dang mes pa dang/ khams dang bag chags la mkhas te/ sems can rnams kyi
dngang pa dang/ stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi rim pa shes shing/ khams dang/ bag chags la yang mkhas/ bdan pa dang mtshams sbyar ba la yang mkhas/ mtshams dpral ba dang/
tshig gi lan gtan la dbab pa la yang mkhas/ spobs pa zab sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho ga la yang mkhas/ gsang por stsa zhing bzhin khro gnyer na da pa/ sems chen por
gyur ba la gnas pa/ snying rje chen po la brtson pa/ pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mnon pa yin no// gan nu de'i tshade'i dus na/ rgyal pa yi/
shas kyi stobs kyi bu ma skyes nas lo b.ru drug lon pa/ byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes la/ bltan sdug pa/ kha dog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa yi shes ldan zhes bya ba
zhig byung ste/ de'i slob dpon ni dge slong yang dag blo gros zhes bya ba yin te/ dge ba'i chos rnams la yang dag par ston pa/ yang dag par gzeng bstod pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga'
bar byed pa/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yin no// gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dusan/ dge slong chos smra ba dang brla gnyis la/ 'brum bu me dbal nag po chen pags dka' zhing sman dkon
pa zhig byung ste/ na pa de sman pa dag gis sprangs par gyur to// de nas rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa// sras dang sras mo dang/ zham ring bar bcas
pa/ dge slong don bar rig nas rab du ngu zhing mchi ma byung ngo// bud med brgyad khrir bsus pa dang/ grong dang grong khyer gyi mi rnams su bcas pa dang/ yul 'khor dwang/ grong 'dab pa dang
yul gyi ma dang/ rtsis pa dang/ blon pa dang/ blon po chen po dang/ sgo ba dang/ 'khor rnams su bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang dge slong de na bar thosanas/ rab tu ngu zhang mchim 'byin te/ dge slong
'di 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur ta re zhes de skad 'dzarato/gzhon nu de'i tshe de u0f7adus na/ rgyal po phashes stobs la lha ma sngon gnag gi gnyen mtshams su gyur pa zhig yod de/ de rgyal/
pa'i phyi bzhin 'brang bas rmi lam du bstan pa/ rgyal po chen pa gal te dge slong dro la mi'i sha dang khrag gsar pam rul bas 'brum bu me dbal nag po 'di la byugs te mi'i sha gsar
pa ma rul ba las ro sna tshogs su g.yas byas te byin na/ dge slong 'dra nang bde las 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/ de nas rgyal ba ye shes kyi stobs mtshan mo de 'das
pa dang/ gnyid kyis log pa las sad de/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs nas/ rmilam gyi rnam pa de dag btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la bzlas te/ nga'i rmi lam 'di lta bu zhig mthong ngo

zhes bzlas nas go bar byas na/ gzhon nu de ltar bud med kyi khyim de dang rgyal po'i pho brang de nas dag slong de la rtsi de sbyin par su yang spro ba med do// rgyal po'i bu ma yi shes ldan yang rmilam

de lta bu zhig rmis nas sad pa dang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ste/ rmi lam gyi rnam pa de dag/ ma dang zham ring ma rnams la gtam byas kyang dge slong de la rtsi de sbyin par su yang sbe ba med
de nas rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan de dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ba dang/ mos pa dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas 'di lta bur brtson par byas te/ 'di
ltar bdag gis rtsig de dag bdag gi lus las bcad de/ ji skad bstan pa bzhi du khrag gsar pa dang/ sha gsar pa sbyin par bya// rgyal po'i pho brang na/
[Dm ]bdag ni thams cad kyi nang na gzhon zhing chung ste/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin la/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ye shes btsal bar chos smra ba
rgyu kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la/ bdag gi lus kyi sha dang khrag phul te/ dag spyod 'di ci nas kyang nad 'a de las sa sa par bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal po'i bu mo ye shas
ldan da rang gi gnas su song nas/ mtshon rnon po thogs te/ chos la zhugs pa'i yid kyis/ bdag gi bar lA sha bcad nas ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa gya nom par g.yos byas
nas khrag kyang thogs te/ 'phags pa de'i drung du song nas/ rgyal pa yi shes stobs kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ khrag gis 'brum bu mi dbalanag po de la byugasanas/ g.yos
legs par byas pa'i zas du dge slong de zar bcug ste/ 'grangs par byed cing legs par bstabs so/ de nas dge slong de mi shas ma rig mi dogs pas/ zas de zas so//
@#zas de thos ma thag tu dge slong de'i nad thams cad med par gyur te/ nad do thams cad kyang sos so// da yongs su gdung ba dang bral zhing bde ba dang ldan pas/ de lta de lta bur
chos bstan te/ btsun mo'i 'khor de dang/ grong pa dang/ yul ma dang/ yu lu 'khor ba 'dus pa de dag las srog chags khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu sems skyes so// dan rgyal po yi shes stobs kyis/ bdag gi bu ma la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ bu mo khyed kyis khrag 'di ga las red// oM ya sha 'di dag
kyang gang nas blangs/ bum khyod kyis kha zas bad byas pas// chos sna 'dri yang 'di ltar bde bar gyur/ sna tshogs blo dang ldan pa'i g.yos byas pa// bsad pa yin nam da ste
brnyed// bu ma khyed kyis khrag 'di ga las rnyed// des ni sdig pa'i nad las 'di thar byas// bum des ni pha yi tshig bros nas// bum yi shes ldan gyis 'di skad sa// zhum sems ma
par tshig kyang rab smras te// bdag na tsam yab khyod gsanadu gsal// lha yi bstan pa'i rmi lam dag/ bad gi ma rdzong bar gyur tre yab// sa yi bdag pa bdag la gson// yang
dag don namkhyen par madzod// lha des bdag la 'di skad ston// mi yi sha dang phrug rnams ni// dge slong 'di la sus phyin na// sdig pa'i nad las thar bar 'gyur// bdag ni mal
nas langs nas su// btsun mo'i 'khor du mchis nas ni// bdag gi da tshe rmi lam rnams// ma yi gtso la bzlas shing smAs// bran ma rnams la bdag gis bsgo/ 'di lta bu
dag su byed nus// ma yi khrag dang sha rnams ni// khu bar btsos pa g.yos byas te// zas su rab tu sbyin bya zhing/ khrag dag gis kyang phyu gnas su//
dbal nag pa'i dri bas kyang// dgo slong ji ltar thar par bya// cho ga myur du ma byas na// rtsi smanA dag ni ma byas pas// dag slong 'di nond bad yis// myur du 'chi ba'i dus byed/
'gyur// rong gi sha dang khrag stod pa// srid pa gsum na sems can gang// mkhas pa su zhig 'di ma grong nas// lus la yang na gnas par byed// btsun mo'i 'khoradu
bdag gis go bar bgyis// bud med gcig kyang sbyin zhes mi mchinas// bdag la dge slong do phangs kyang// byang chub phyir na bdag gi sha khrag btang// byang chub zhi ba mya ngan me da
tshol ba// de dag lus la mas shing rtan pamin// bdag nyid la yang rdul tsam phangs pa med// bdag nyid btang yang yid n ma dga' med// btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dra thosog
thams cad rmugs pa bzhin du gyur// bya ba de dag sbyar ba na// su yang spro bar ma gyur to// de nas bdag gis sems skyes pa// dug slong 'di la zas byin te// bdag gi sha
yang bcad nas ni/]khrag rnams kyis kyang bsku bar bya// bdag gis brla las sha bcad do// sha rnams dang ni khrag blangs nas// sha yi snag gu bdag gis bsgral// bro ba
[z/]sna tshogs g.yos legs bgyis// dag slong na ba de la ni// ma sha yin kha zas dang// khrag rnams kyis kyang phyug ba dag/ bdag gis yab kyi spyan sngar stsal// mi yi bdag po bdag gi tshe
la gsan// sa bdag ma red dganam rnyed nas// bdag gi bar los shadag bcad nas su// de bas bas chos sna 'di la stsol ba lags// bdag gi bla med byang chub don phyir du// rang gi
lus kyis don chen 'di dag bgyis// dge slong 'di yang thar bgyis ma bad med// bdag gi bsod nams dag tshad med bgyis// bu mo de la rgyal pos 'di skad smras// bum khyed ni/
ni bya ba'i phyir// ji ltar lus las rang gi sha bcad na// khyod kyi lus lan tshar ma gyur tam// rgyal po'i bu mo blo ldan 'jigs med pas// da tsho sa ba rgyal po bdag la gson/
las kyi rnam smin bsam yang de 'dra ba// de dag gsan nas tshul bzhin mkhyen par mdzod/ ]yab gcig sdig pa'i las rnams bgyis pa yis// sems can sems dmyalam
bzad ltung 'gyur te// sha med gyur nas phyir yang sha dag skye// las kyi 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab gzigs// sdig pa'i las kyis sha khrag medagyur cing// skad cig tu yang sha khrag
'byung 'gyur na// dag ba las dang mas pa de dag las// sha dang khrag rnams skye ba smos ci 'tshal// sha bcad bdag la na tsha ma mchis te/ khrag byung bdag la g.yo ba yodam
mchis// bdag gi sha rnams thams cad bcad na yang// chos kyi lus la rma dang skyon ma mchis// bdag gis chos la dga' ba mchog bskyed nas/
ka rang gi brla las sha bcad rab du stsalag/ rma dang sdug bsngal bdag la ma mchis te// bdag gi lus kyang sngon gyi bzhin du gyur// 'di'adrab yi chos sgra 'di lta bu// brgya
lam na yang 'dzam bu'i gling du 'byung/ yab cig u dum wA ra'i me tog bzhin// bskal pa bya ba mang la res 'ga' gda'// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser 'bar ba// semA
can lta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur to// de bzhin du ni chos sna de 'dra ba// lha dang ma dag mthong bas chog mi shes// skye bo skom pa dang ba'i chu 'thungs nas// skom pas gdungs pa skom pa/
med par 'gyur// de bzhin chos smra mkhas pa 'di dag kyang// chos kyi bdud rtsis srog chags srid pa sel// dge slong ma bzad n ba 'di la yang// sha dang khrag ni bdag gis rab
tu btang// chos smra ban mi dbal rab zhi ste// bdag gis sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i rim gro bgyis// mang du thos shing spyod dang ldan pa ste// ting 'dzin dam ba 'di ni 'dzin pa la/
a 'di ltar bdag gis rang gi sha btang bas// chos 'di rnams kyang bdag gis thob par shog/ ji ltar skyes rab dri zhim yid 'ong ba// dus brang dang ni tsan dan dmar po yis// dri da
00 phyogs bcu rnams su ldang ba ltar// tshes sna de yi dri yang de bzhin no// ji ltar ri rab phyogs su rab snang shing/ de kun nas mdzes pa mthong na dga' bar 'gyur// phyogs su rab
du snang zhing gsal bar bgyid// de bzhin chos skya'adi yang ri rab 'dra// ji ltar mchod rten la la zhig pa ni// skyes bu mkhas pas bcos shing slar bslang ste/ mchod rten de
la dad par brgyud pa ni// de ltar bslang ba de yang de yi rgyu/ de bzhi chos kyi mchod rten na ba yang// chos la gus pas rang gshadang ni// khrag gis byug pa dag gis thar par/
bgyis// 'dzam bu'i gling du bdug gis mar me bltam// dge slong 'di ni 'chi ba'i dus bgyisan//'dzam bu'i gling du ting 'dzin sgra yang na sems can rnams la rtag tu nub
par 'gyur// 'di gsas pas naatidi 'azhi rnams kyang thob// dag slong 'din 'jig rten kun gyi skyabs// 'jig rten mdongs pa dag la mig sbyin pa// 'dod chags dang ni khri snang
gti mug la// sman pa'i rgyal po chen po gso bar bgyid// chen por gyur par rtag tu sems gnas te// de yi spyod pa dag ni tshad ma nyid// nges pa'i don dang tshig la shin tu
bslabs// pha rol rgol ba kun gyis zil ma non// chos smra ba la rim gro mchog bgyis pas// bskal pa bye ba phragon stong du yang// bdag la phyir yang log ltung 'jigs ma
mchis// bud med dngos po bdagan phyis mi 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa//
[r/ ]gzhon nu de lta bas na shin tu dka' ba spyod pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di thos nas// chos smra ban ba la sman shin du dkon pas rim gro bya ba la rtson
zhing / rtabadag gi sha dang khrag gis kyang rim gror bya ste// than sar ma gcig tsam sbyin pas kyang// 'gro ba'i chos kyi mchod rten la rim gro bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyul 'chos kyi sngon byung ba'i gtam nges par bstan pa 'a di/ rgyu char tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan to// gang gis gad+hu'i bya
N+NaM snyed sangs rgyas zhing// rin chen bkang ste 'drin pa phul ba bas// gang gis rkang pa'i sor ma gcig byin na// de bas bsod nams mchog ba de bye brag 'phags// bu ma de ni do nas
ni 'phasogs// sangs rgyas bye ba stong dgu mthong bar gyur// kun gyi bstan pa la yang rab byung nas// ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di rab tu bzung// rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag thams
cad ni// yongs su mya ngan 'das pa phyi dusan// de ni rtag bar rab tu byung gyur te// bde gshegs srasamo kun nas nyon mongs med// mar me mdzad pa de bzhin gshegs pa yi//
bstan pa la yang tshangs bar spyod pa spyad// drar yang bud med dngos po bsgyur nas su// de tshe de na dge slong chos sbyaragyur// rtag tu dam pa'i chos yongs 'dzin pa// mi dbang ye shes
stebs na byams pa yin// mar me mdzad na chos sna der gyur te// de tshe de ni rgyal po'i bu mor gyur// lham sngon gyis snag gi gnyen gyur pa// ma dbang ye shes stobs kyi phyir 'brang zhing//
rgyal po 'i rmi lam du yang ston pa ni// mi 'khrugs spyad pa spyod tshe der gyur to// ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu 'dod pa'i phyir// g.yo skya thams cad yongs su sbangs nas su// bdag gi sha
dag dang ni khrag gis kyang// chos smra ba la ngas kyang rim gro byas// dug slongan pa na tshas gzir bde// gang dag mthong nas de tsho ngus pa yang// phyir ma ldog par de dag rab gyur to//
log par ltung ba'i sarani yong ma song// de dag rtag tu mig kyang na ba med// klad pa'inadamedan ba'i nad med do// sna yi nad med lce yi nad kyang med/ sa yang n bar nAms kyang
ma gyur to// dag slong na ba de tsho su bsten pa// de dag rtag tu kun nas mdzes par gyur// sum cu rtsa gnyis bsadanams brgya pa'i mtshan//dpal dang gzi brjid dag gis lus
kyang 'bar// de dag ngayi bstan la rab byung nas// rab tu 'jigs dus byang chub dam pa 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyang bzung nas ni// sangs rgyas bya ba stong dag mthong ba
'gyur// byang nub mchog 'di legs par bzung nas su// rtag tu rimar byas shing btung byas na// de dag skye dgu'i don chen byas nas ni// ma yi gtso bo/
kyi 'khrugs mthong bar 'gyur// du dag spyod pa bla medwab di thos nas// dga' ba zang zing medA pa 'phags pa 'thob// de dag bdag gi sngon spyad thos nas// sangs rgyas dag la
pa mchod pa rgya cher byed// dag slong mkhas pa tshul khrims ldan mthong nas// g.yo med par ni rtag tu bsnyen par bya// zhe sdang tha ba dag kyang rnam sbyangs te// dge slong chos sna rtag tu
bsnyen par gyis// gnod sems khro ba dag kyang rnam spong ba// nga yi sras pa chos skyong mchod pa gyis// bskal pa bya ba mang por lang ba dang// log par ltung zhing sdug bsngal
gyur ta ra// gcig la cig kyang gnod sems byas nas ni// de la tshul khrims thos pa skyob ma nus// bsam gtan mi skyob dgon gnas skyob minus// sbyin pa ma skyob sangs rgyas
mchod ba man// ye shes ldan gyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// dunas yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
a to pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugasanas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te
zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs
'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir kun dga' bo bdag gis stan la 'dug la/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas lan dang ru 'dod pa dris shig dang/ dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas/ ngas khyod kyis sems rangs par
bya'o[; ]de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
la skabs phyi'o// bde bar gshegs pa bdag la skabs phyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngan
sngar ston las 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
mtha' yas pa spyod pa dag/ lag pa bcad pa dang rkang pa bcad pa dang/ rna ba bcad pa dang/ sna bcad pa dang/ mig dbyung ba dang/ mgo bcad pa dang/ lus bcad pa dang
yan lag bcad bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang myong bar 'gyur zhing/ blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
kyang nyams par ma 'gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to// kun dga' bo blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rlub 'di yang dag par sgrub ban ngas sdug bsngal ji snyed myong bar gyur ba khyod kyis shas shing d dgu dran n/
ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di yongs su dri bar sems/kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na 'di la skyes bu la la zhig rkang pa nas spyi bo'i bar du 'bar bar gyur te/ rab tu
zas bcas 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa de la/ skyes bu la la zhig der nye bar 'ongs te/ 'di skad du kyi skyes bu tshur shog/ lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar/ 'dod ba'i yon
tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par rtsis shig/ dga' bar gyis shig/ yongs su spyod cig cos zer na/ kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de lus la me 'bar ba
ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par gyur te/ rtsi ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ yongs su par byed dam/ kun dga' bos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das da lta ma
lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yodas su brtag bu bzung ste/ skyes bu de lus la me 'bar ba mA zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad rung
ldan par gyur te/ rtse ba dang/ dgar ba dang/ yongs su spyod pa byed du zin kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can rnams
ngan song gsum gyis sdug bsngal bar gyur cing dbul ba dag mthong nas yid bde ba 'am/ sems dga' ba ma byung ngo// kun dga' bo byang chub soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
dug sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod ba na tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang/ tshul khrims m zhigo pa dang/ tshul khrims 'dres ma ma yin pa dang/ tshul khrims su
sder ma gyur ba dang/ tshul khrims ma 'bags pa dang/ tshul khrims ma g.yos pa dang/ tshul khrims ma slangs pa dang/ tshul khrims ma 'khrugs pa dang/ tshul khrims m yang
ba dang/ tshul khrims gzhan la ston pa ma yin pa dang/ tshul khrims m sla ba dang/ tshul khrims drang bo dang/ tshul khrims dam bcas pa bzhin du byed pa dang/ tshul khrims semag
can rnams la phan 'dog pa yin te/ de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chon po spyad pa mtha' yas pa spyod pa
de dag ni lag pa bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ rkang pa bcad pas yongs su nyams par n 'gyur/ rna ba bcad pa dang/ sna bcad pas
yongs su nyams bar ma 'gyur/ mig phyung ba dang mgo bcad pas yongs su nyams bar ma 'gyur lus dang yan lag khacad pas yongs su nyams par ma gyur te/ sdug bsngal
sna tshogs kyang ma myod la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o////'phags pa ting nge 'dzin
gyi rgyal bo'i mdo// kham pa bcu gnyis pa///kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal pa grangs
N+NaM med pa bas kyang ches grangasamed pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ gzhal du med pa// mtshungs pa med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dusan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya nga dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams
kyi ston pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i pad+ma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa/ mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo// yang de'i tshe de'i dusan/
[z ]rin po che'i pad+ma'i zla ba ma bar dag pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chu'i tshadan/ bskal pa bye ba khrag
phrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur gyur to// nyi ma thams cad la nyin re zhing yang/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog pa la
bkod do// rab tu bkod tsang yongs su mya ngan las 'dus nas/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams zag pa zad pa dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod do// rab tu bkod cing
yongs su mya ngan las 'dasanas/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag/ dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod de// yongs su mya ngan
las 'das bar gyur to// kun dga' bo de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i pad+ma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ lnga rgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur pa'i dus kyi tshe/ dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur ba na/ kun dga' bo rgyal pa

dpa' bas byin zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rgyal po dba' bas byin de la btsun mo'i 'khor na bud med brgyud khro ba'i stong yod do// bu ni stong yod do// bu mo na lnga brgya yod do// de'i tshe de'i dusan/
@#// rgyal po dang ba shA byin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan zhes bya ba yangs shing rgya che la sgo bzhi yod pa// stegrubu dang/ sgo khang dang rta bab dang/ skar khung dang/ du shu
dung khang pa dang/ khang brtsegs pa dang/ skyed mes tshal gyis brgyan cing/ rnam par bkra ba/ balcan sdug pa lha'i gnas bzhin du snang ba/ sems can grangs med/ da ga du
med pa'i gnas su gyur pa zhig yod do/ kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ mdo sde 'di lta bu dga'i skye bo mang pos skad cing/ skye bo mang pos spungs de skye bo mang po dang ma 'phrod cing
skye bo mang pos bor bar gyur te/ 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa'i dus su gyurang/gtso bamang zhang rna rus pa'i dus kyi maM/ char ma 'dab ba'i dus kyi tsa/ dus ma yin par nur
'baka pa'i dus kyi tshe/ sbrul byung ba'i dus kyi tshe/ lce 'bab pa'i dus kyi tsA/ mu ga ba byung ba'i dus/ tshe/ log par lta ba'i dus kyi tshe/ yang dag pa ma yin par lta sme dus
kyi tsho mu stegs can gyi gsang sngags yongs su tshol ba'i dus kyi tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu ba jig par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' bdun stong grong dang
grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang/ ljongs nas skrod nas/ de dag chos sna ba me tog zla mdzes dang lhan cig kun tu bzang po zhes bya
ba'i nags khrod der rten cing gnas te/ dag slong de dag la gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston te// kun dga' bro nags khrod de yang dus thams cad du snang ba'i me tog snatshogs/
dang / snyam dang/ 'khri shing dang/ 'bras bu dag dang ldan pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing dang 'dra ba/ shing sna tshogs kyis gang zhing sa'i gzhi yang gzugs dang kha dog dum dang/ sa
bon dang myu gu thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phrug dang rdo ba sna tshogs mdzes shing dreg med pa/ yangs shing matho ba dang/ gser gyi ri dgas kyis mdzes par byas shing sdug pa// grub
pa'i rig sngags 'chang dang/ dri za dang/ skyes bu 'am/ drang srong dang/ mi 'am ci dag gnas pabyad gzugs dang/ kha dog zhing rnam pa sna tshogs mang po gnas pa/ sangs rgyas du
ma bzhugs pa/ dga' tshul dang 'dra bar kun tu bzang zhing rnal 'byor dang mthun pa'i nags tshal dam pa/ kun tu bzang pod na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnal 'byor la rjes
su brtson zhing gnas par gyur to// yang kun dga' bo chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes de gcig pu dben par song nas/ nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs te/ lha'i mig rnam par dag
pa me'i las 'das pas bltas na/byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig mang po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshog sanas/ 'dir skyes te/ de dag gzungs kyi chos
khubya// kyi rnam grangs 'dimanyan pa rnyedanani/ blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ra'agyur/ gal te gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan/
ba pa ma redan/ dran med pa yang dag par rdo gas pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldeg par dag mthong ngo// de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes dran zhir shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin las
langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po ga la yodang der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag kho bo ni
'gro'i/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong 'dab dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du seng la sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o/
denas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag gis chos sna nga me tog zla mdzes la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod nags khrod 'di nas grong dang/ grong khya'adang/ grong 'dab dang/ ljongs dang/
yul 'khor dang/ rgyal ba'i pho brang 'khor du 'grob ni/ kho bo cag 'dod pa ma yin no// deci'i phyir zhen/ dag slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dung dugakhasnyen ma lhag pa'i nga
rgyal can mang po dam pa'i sa spong ba dag byung ba'i dus la bab kyis/ do dag tshe dang ldan pa'i srog gcod par gyuran ma legs so/ tshe dang ldan pa ni shin tu mdzes shing byad bzhin bzang la bltan
sdug te/ dang po la lang tsho dang ldan zhing/ na tshod dar la bab ste/ mdog ni gser btsom bzang ba 'dra/ pral ba ni dung dang/ zla ba dang/ me tog kun da'i kha dog lta bu'i mdzod smras
brgyan/ skra dang gtsug tor ni mthon mthing la lcang lor 'khyil ba yin pas/ rgyal pa 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po 'am/ de dang 'drab gzhan dag kyang phrag dogadang/ 'jungs pas non pa'i sems kyis
khyod kyi srog bcad ma legs so// de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la 'di skad du gal te kho bos bdag nyid bsrung ba byas na/ kho bos 'das pa
dang rdo ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan sazhayas kyis bstan pa bsrung bar ma 'gyur zhes zer nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bdag du 'dus shes 'di
la gnas nas su// bstan pa 'di la bsrung bar yod ma nus// ma zad phyi dus bde bar gshegs pa yi/ byang chub bstan pa bkod pa chen po yi// gang gis bdag tu 'du shes kun sngangs
shing[;]sems can 'di dag gang zag rnams dang// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro rnams dang// reg bya sbyong ba de ni bstan pa srung// bskal pa bya ba gang+ga'i bye snyed du// dang ba'i
sems kyis zas dang skom rnams dang// gdugs dang ba dan mar mi'i 'phreng ba yis// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rim gro byas// gang gis dam chos rab tu 'jigs ba dang// bde gshegs
bstan pa 'gag par 'gyur pa'i tshe// nyin mtshan du ni bslab pa gcig spyod pa// bsod nams 'di nad pas bya brag 'phags// skyes bu khyu mchog gi waM da
pa'i chos// 'jig par 'gyuratsho gang dag btang snyoms sgom// de yis rgyal ba bkur sti byas ma yin// 'dren pa dag la ri mar des ma byas/ khyod bde rang gdon gyis la/ bdag nyid
rab tu bsrung bar gyis// khyod ni rtag tu byams gnas shing// 'dul ba 'di la bag yid gyis/ ma 'dris dag gtsang dri med pa// tshul khrims drang par bsrung bar gyis/ ka
gis tshul khrims dri ma med// sangs rgyas bsngags pa bsrungs pa ni// de yis ji snyed sngon byung ba// bde gshegs thams cad ri mor byas// de yis thams cad bstabs/
pa'i pa yin// skye bo'i tshogs rnams byang nub bkod// sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag gis bstod ba yi// tshul khrims dri ma med pa sus bsrung ba// de dag gis ni sems can mang/
pa yang// soms can dmyal ba dang ni sdig las drangs// chos mchog rin chen sbyin pa sbyin par gyis// bzod pa dag kyang rtag du ngosrung gyis la/ dgon par gnas shing
ting 'dzin mkhas pa dang// 'jam zhing mnyen ba dag kyang bsgom par gyis/ rnam pa kun du rtsod pa ma byed pa// sbyad pa zhi mchog 'di la rnam par spyod// bdag ni sems
tsa can rnams kyang bskyab pa'i phyir// grong dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro bar bya// blo gros che 'chadasems can dam pa'i mchog/ drang srong da na 'gro bar byas pa drang// kha cig rkang
pa la yang 'jubar byed/ snying rdzapar yadang shing mchis zag/ mkhas pa blo gros chen po ma bzhud par// sgra'adzam yid du 'ong zhing mdzes pa yi/ shing 'di rnams la
gzigs shing rtog pa mdzod/ bdag nyid bsrung ba mdzod la ma bzhud cig/ sngon gyi stobs bcu dran pa de dag kyang// dbang po zhi zhing shin tu dus ba rnams// nags
tshal brag dang ri yi rtsar gshegs nas// byang chub dam pa dgan thugs su chud// byang chub rgyu yang spyod pa dram pa spyod// de dag bsod nams ye shes mchog dang ldan// de
dag rjes slobs nags khrod gnas par mdzod// brtul zhugs bzang nga 'di nasam bzhud cig/ lus shin tu mdzes pa'i mtshan gyis rgyan khyod kyi sku yang mthon tang pa
dog ste// gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba 'od byed pa// sa 'di kun kyang rab tu snang bar gyur// khyod kyi mdzod spu bzhin gyi smin mtshams na// shin tu mdzes pa dung dung 'dra ba'i/
a/ byang chub sems dang d+mang 'drub
de la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa// ji snyed sngon gyi bde gshegs byung ba// thams cad mkhyen cing zag pa zad pa rnams// de dag thams cad 'jig rten don
mdzad do// srid pa gsum du byang chub dam partogs// spyad pa'i dam pa byang chub rgyu spyad de// de dag bsadanams ye shes mchog dang ldan// de yi rjes bslabs byang chub sems
sgyu dpa' yang// sems can khrag khrig rnams kyi skyabs byed 'dod// drang srong mkhas la kun gyis bskor byas te// rkang pa la yang phyag 'tshalashugs phyung nas// mi zad snying
rje par ni sgra 'byin cing// nyam thag mi bde tsho des 'debs par byed/ kha cig rab tu 'gyil cing brgyal nas su// sa la ltung ba sa la bcad ' rgyud bzhin// na kyang drang
srong sems can don 'dod pa// bsod nams bsags pas de las phyi'i ma log/ drang srong chos gos lhung bzed thogs nas chesaM// ji ltar seng ge ral pa can dag bzhin// de
nAtshes kyi rang bzhin gnas pas na/ de la yon tan nyes par bya ba med// 'jig rten 'dir ni nags khrod bdag gnas pas// sems can ngan song song na ma legs shes/ dad/
ni sems can bskyabs pa'i don gyi phyir// grong khyer pho brang mchog tu song bar gyur// de nas chos sgrub me tog zla mdzes/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang
0 ljodas dang/ lul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas sems can rnams lachos bstan te/ de snga dro der 'ongs nas srog chags khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bla na med/
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog bal bkod do// da dung rgyal po'i pho brang dur ma phyin nas de mthar gyis rgyal bo'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan pa der phyin bdad
rgyal po'i 'brang 'khor rin chen ldan pa der nye bar song ste/ shing phyag sha dang/ sa la'i drung du 'dug go/ de de'i nub mo 'das pa dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang natshan ldan du zhugs
bar gyur te/ zhugs nus srog chags bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug sangs rgyas kyis chos la phyir mi ldog par bkod kyang/ da dung zas kyi byab ma byas sa// do zas bcad pa bcad
nas rgyal pa'i 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song ste/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das bar byas so// de de'i
nub ma 'dasanas/ de'i snga dro gnyis po la/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs zhag/ srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu gsum sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldeg par bkod do/
da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so// de zas gnyis ba bcad pa bcad nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang bakhor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa
dar song ste bgrod bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/ dad de'i nub mo'adasanas/ de snga drogasum pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas/
ka srog chags byab bsgyu stod phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyi rim ldog par bkodad/ da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so// de zas gsum pa bcad pa bcad nas/ rgyal
po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yodapa dar song nas/ 'greng bzhin du namtshan 'das par byas so// de de'i nub ma 'das
nas de snga dro bshi ba la/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khoran chen ldan du zhugs nas/ srog chags bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrug dgu bcu rtsa dgu/ blun med pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i byang chub
las phyir ma ldog par bkod de/ da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so// de zas bzhi pa bcad pa bcad nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
sen mo'i mchod rtan gang na yod pa der song nas/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das bar byas so// da dbyinubam 'dasanus/ da snga dolnga pa labatsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song nas/
bud med brgyad khri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod do// grong khyer de nas kyang sems can grangasamed dpag tu med pa dag blan med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bkod de/ da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so// de nyim lnga zas bcad pa bcad nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/
bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'dras par byas so// de da'i nub ma 'dasanas/ de snga dro drug pa la rgyal po'i pho brangag khor/
rin chen ldan du zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i bu steng blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de/ da dung zas kyi byang ma byas sa// de nyi ma drug sa bcad pa/
bcad nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas/ 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'dus par byas sa//
de de'i nub ma 'das nas/ de snga dro bdun pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin bskyed mos tshal du 'gro ba mthong ste/ gser gyi shing
rta la ngosan dngul/ mda' ni sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan/ 'khor lo na ba zum gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dwan bsgreng ba dang/ rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kyi rgyan pa//
shing rta'i mda' la dar gyis dkris shing ras bcos bu phrugs kyis g.yogs pa de/ bu mo gzhon nu brgyad brgyas rin po che'i tha gus gtags shing 'dren ste/ de dag byad bzhin bzang/
dazhingamadzes pa/ paldan sdug pa// kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa// byas pa rnams dga' bar byed cing tshim par byed pa ste/ mkhas pa rnams
de lani ma yin no// sprul rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyud khri bzhi stong yang zham ring mtho dman du 'gro'o/ bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyud khri bzhi stong yang zham ring mtho
dman du 'gro'o// khyim bdag shing sA la chen pa lta bu brgyad khribazhi stong yang zhamarang mtho dman du 'gro'o/ rgyal po'i bu mo lnga brgya yang rin po chab khyogs kyi nang du zhugs nas mdun thog
thag tu 'gro sde/ de dag gis dge slong d mthong ma thag du blan med pa yang dwag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldeg par gyur to// btsun mo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag drug curtsa brgyad
kyang dge slong di mthong ma thag du/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag kyang nor bu dang/ gdu bu rnams
rgyabakrol te/ lham rnams bzhag nas bla gos phrug pagacig tu bozar te/ pusamo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs nas/ dge slong de ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal
zhing 'khod do// de nas bu mo gzhon nu do dag kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul bas/ khyogs de dag las babs nas/ nor bu dang gdu bu dag bkrol te/ lham rnams
ba ]pazha gnas / bla gos phrag pa gcig du gzar te/ bus ma g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ drag slong de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
dge slong bdun byon pa'i// khyim lta bur thams cad du// 'di dag rab tu snang bar bgyis// skye bo'i tshogs kyang 'dun par 'gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang rgyun bcad cing// gti mug
dag kyang sal bar gyur// detsho zhesdang khro ba dang// phrag dog thams cad bcad par gyur// rgyal po dpa' bas byin pa yin// zham ring sras la sogs pa yang// su yang rgyal
pa ma lta ste// su yang zham 'ang mi bgyid do// ji ltar zla ba nya ban// skar ma dag gis bskor ba bzhin// rgyal po'i bu yis mdun bdar bas// dge slong 'dri yang mdzes par gyur//
ji ltar gsor gzugasar mo dag/ mkhas pas rimor bris pa dang// su la'i rgyal pa rgyas pa ltar// de bzhin dag slong mdzes par gyur// mthu chen brgya byin lha yi dbang po ni/
grong khyer ba jig ba bdag pa mig stong ldan// ri rab spyi la sum cu rtsa gsum drab ng// de bzhin dge slong byon pa 'di yang mdzes// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs pa gnas pa 'dra// rab
'phrul lha yi bun lha dbang bzhin// 'dod khams 'thab bral mchog gi lha bzhin du// dge slong byon pa 'di yang 'batu [] mdzes// nyi ma bzhin du 'a snang lhan ner bgyis// 'od zer
stong ldan mun nags rab tu sel// phyogs rnams kun tu snang pa bgyid pa ltar// de bzhin dge slong byon pa mdzes par gyur// bskal pa mthug yas rgyan/
sbyin pa byin// tshul khrims ma 'dras rtag tu bsrung ba bgyis// bzod pa mtshungs med 'jig rten kun tu bsgoms// danA mtshan gyis brgyan cing 'di ltar madzes/ 'dzag
pa'i skye bos rab bstod brtson 'grus bskyed/ bsam gtan bzhi yang zhum med sems kyis bsnyen// nyon mongs dra ba bsal cing shes rab skyed// de phyir dag slong 'jig rten
zla kun du gda'//sangs rgyas bstan pa mtshungs med sems can snying pa lci// dpa' bo 'das pas chos mchog dag kyang rab tu bshad/ ma 'ongs dus dang de bzhin da ltar byung ba yis//
chos kyi rgyal po dbang bses rnams kyi sus de lags// dge slong khyod ni mi rtag nam yang ma gyur cig/ gzugasani 'di ltar 'jig rten kun n rab du lhan// gzi brjid che zhing dbyangs
sgyu shin du snyan par gda'//rgyal ba gzi brjid shin tu lhamam snang mi bgyid// chos 'di ngaltar khyod bdaganyid kyis rab rtogs shing// sangs rgyas dag gas bka' stsal 'jig rten
a kun du rgyu// de bzhin bdagacagabud med dngos po kun sbyangs te// bdag cag thams cad dge slong 'di bzhin 'gyur bar bgyi// de dag thams cad sar bsu thal mo sbyar byas nas//
tshigs bcad 'di dag smras te gos rnams 'thor bar byed// gser gyi 'phreng ba dang bu rin chen do shal dang/ rna ba'i rgyan dang mgul gyi rgyan dag rnam mang 'thor// ji ltar 'bor 'phos/
sbyar ba'i rgyal po dag/ stobs ldan sa 'di kun la rnam par lta// sras su 'du shes dgan nye bar 'jog/ gling rnams bzhi bo 'di dag kun du 'gro/ rgyal rigs dung na tshong dpon bram
zo dong// khyim bdag mkhar gyi rgyal po bdag gi mi// de dag gcig la lhag par sdug pa med// thams cad la yang byams pa mnyam par skyed// de bzhin dge slong des pa 'di yang zhi/
gzungs dang dbang rnams la ni shin tu bslabs// byang chub yan lagastobs dang dbang po dang// yan lag brgyad ldan lam yang rnam par 'byed// mtshan ma zla ba skar tshogs dbus na yang//
ji ltar rab tu mdzes bar snang ba bzhin// ji ltar nyima'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba'i tshe// gzi brjid ldan zhing rnam par snang bgyid bzhin// dbang po zhi zhing stobs bcu ldan pa yi// sangs rgyas des/
pa kun la phyag batshul gal// de dag gnabasngags pa bskal pa rgyas// sdud par byed nus skyes bu su yang med// bskal pa bye ba stong phragamang par ni// yon tan brjod kyang zad pa yong/
med de//'jig rten rab mchog gi ni spu gcig kyang// bsngags pa dag zad par mi 'gyur ro// des na mtshungs med 'khor lo rab tu bskor// ye shes dag gi gnas kyang shin tu
[r/ ]@#// bstan// zhib cing rdul bral chos rnams bshad pa mdzad// de ni gang na'ang snang bar 'gyur ba med// dge sbyong dang 'a bram bre lha dang klu// lha gzhi bdud du
ka tshangs par bcas la sogs// sangs rgyas thums cad mkhyan pa'i yon tan gyis// rgya mtsho dgan zad par bod mi nus// gang gis thugs sras 'di 'o dramanga' ba yi/ sman
rgyal mtshungs med rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// tshigs bcad 'di dag smras nas de yi tshe// rgyal po'i bu mo gzhon nu thams cad dga'/ gser dang gser phye dag kyang 'thor bar byed//
gos rnams kyang n rab tu 'ding bar byed// gtsug ginor bu doshalamadzes pa dag/ ring thang bye ba phragan brgya ra bas// dge slong da lam ngan par g.yogs nas nii// dga' nas byang chub phyir
yang rab tu zhugs/// de nas rgyal po dpa' bas na 'di snyam du sems te/ kyam btsun mo'i 'khor 'di dag ni log par zhugs te/ skye bo'i tshogs kyang phog go snyam mo//
skye bo de dag kyang nor bu dang gdu bu bkrol lham bzhag nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ drag slong de ga la ba de logs su thul/
mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// dgaslong de byad gzugs bzang ba tsam du rgyal po dpa' bas byin byed bzhin mi bzang/ de tsam du bldan sdug pa ma yin/ de tsam du mdzes pa ma yin te/
bas/ de rgyal po'i srid kyi phyir shin tu sngas par gyur to// dge slong de'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa mthong nas shin du bros so// dge slong de rgyal po'i lam na 'dug pa'i mig tu rdul
sed pa dang/ de 'dra snyam du sems te/ dge slong 'dis chags pa'i sems kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor la bltas te/ 'dis mig gis brda byas so// de 'di snyam du sems te/ de dag
slong 'di la srog gcod par byed pa su yid snyam mo// de nas rgyal po dpa' bos byin gyi zham rang du bu steng 'brang ba de dag bsanas/ gzhon nu drag dag slong 'di sreg dang srol cig ces byas na/
gzhon nu de dag rgyal po dpa' bos byin la slar zlogag/ dag slong de'i phyir de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu dag kyang bka' mi nyan te/ bdag gcig pu gnyis su med par bzhag na/ du dge slong
'di srog dang bral bar byed pa su yod snyam mo// de nas rgyal padapa' bos byin la bsad pa'i gshadu ma dga' byed ces bya ba gdum pa btsam pa med nga/ ma rungs pa zhig yod pa de rgyal po'i
la man/ rgyal po dpa' bos cin dang ha cang yang ma ring ba zhigan 'dug go/ rgyal po dpa' bos byin gyis de mthong nas dga' mgu yid rangs te/ rab du dga' ba dang mos pa dang yid bde
ba skyes nas/ de sems 'di snyam du sems te/ dga' byed pa des dge slong 'di srog dang dbral bar byed snyam mo// de nas gsad pa'i gshed ma dga' byed rgyal po dpa' bos byin gang na 'dug
a0 @#// ba der 'ongs pa dang/ dga' byed la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod bya dag 'a cher sbyin na// dga' byed khyod dge slong 'di srog dang dbrul bran byung nus sam/
dga' byed kyis smras pa/ lhashin du rdo thog go/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ dge slong 'di srog dang dbral bar 'tshal lo// rgyal pos lcasab/ dga' byed de'i phyir de'i dus lad bab
par shesan/ mtshon rnon po thogs la dge slong 'di'i lag pa dang rkang pa chod ga/ rna ba dang sna yang chod cig/ 'dis chags pa'i sems kyis da'i btsun mo'i 'khor langasas kyis/
de'i phyir 'di'i mgakyang skam pa sa phyushig ces byas so// de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed kyis/ de'i tsha ral gri rnon po thogs nas dge slong de'i lag pa dang rkang pa bcad do//
rnab dang snayang bcad do// mig gnyis kyang phyung ngo// de nas dag slong de'i mgo dang/ rna ba dang/ rkang lag bcad ba las/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang byung/ 'o ma'i
rgyun du ma yang byung ste/ phyogs bcur bskor nas/ slar yang dge slong de'i lus kyi nang du nub bo// bcad cing bdubs pa'i 'phro nas/ dpal be'u dang/ bkra shis dang/ 'khor
lal sogs pa nang nas byung ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kund snang ngo// de nas rgyal po de skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang dong nas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen pa des/
dge slongad laman bcad gtubs shing bdug ba mthong nas/ de dag sdug bsngal zhing yid ma bde ste/ ngo mtshar du gyur nas ngu zhing cho nges btab ste/ skye sngags bton nas/ phyir
yang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan bar song ngo// de nas rgyal po dpa' bos byin zhag bdun 'das ba dang// bskyedamos tshal mchog na 'dug pa mi dga' m rtsi/ yongs
sum spyodod/ skyed mos tshal nas de 'phrog nas zhag bdun 'dus pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs pa dang/ des dag slong de rgyal po'i lam du bor
ba nas zhag bdun na yang/ lus kyi mdog ma gyurang mthong nas/ de 'dra snyam du sems te/ dag slong 'di'i lus kyi mdogam gyur pa las bltas na/ dag slong 'dun
gdon mi za bar blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa yin to/ bdag gros sems can dmyal ba chen pa'i skye bar gyur pa'i sdig pa'i las byas kyis/
bdagan myur du sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar 'gyur ro zhes de da ltar sims pa na/ steng gi bar snang las lha'i bu brgyud bris sgra skad dbyangs gcig tu snas pa/ rgyal po chen
pa 'di ni de bzhin te/ khyod ji skad zer ba ltar/ dge slong 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no zhes zer ro// bar snang las lha dag
gi sgra thosanas/ de shin tu 'jigs shing ska gnas / bag tsha zhing spu zing zhes byed de/ 'gyod bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po dpa' bos byin sdug bsngal zhang/
[Di ]yid mi bde ste/ 'gyod par gyur pas/ de tsho mo nges cher btab nas/ tshig 'di skad zer ro// rgyal po'i srid dang rgyal po'i pho brang dang/ nor bu yachen mu tig gser dbyig
spangs// bdag nyid mtshon thogs bdag nyid 'chi bar bya// bdag byis pa'i blo can las ngan ldan// dge slongame tog cha mdzes 'dir byung ba// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos
te snang bar byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang 'ongs// zla ba nya mo skar ma'i rgyal po bzhin// 'dod pa'i longs spyod ngan pas bdag dkrugs te rab tu dga' bar bud medu tshogs rnams/
dang / shing rta'i nang du zhugs te de nas song// rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongs su 'bor bar bskor// dge slong dri mchog mig bzang 'di nyidan// 'dir byon dge slong danas/
rgyu mthong nas su// bud med tshogs rnams rab tu dga' gyur cing// mes pa skyes nas gser gyi phreng ba gter// thams cadra sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar byas nas// tshigs bcad dbyangs
kyis dge slong de la bstod// rgyal bo yin klu yi dbyangs sgra rnams// de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur// de yang shing rta'inang du zhugs nas ni// rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongs
su bskor bar gyur// bde bar gshegs pa'i srasa mchog mthu che ba// dag sladri mchog mug bzang 'dir byon na// bdag gi sems ni rab tu ngan gyur te// dge slong rgyal po'i de
brang 'jug pa'itsA// bud med tshogs chen dga' ba lta mthong nas// rmongs pas de la phrag dog khro ba skyed// phyogs bzhi kun du snang bar bgyis pa na// zla ba sgra gcan zin
thar mdzes pa bzhin// dge slong rgyal bo'i pho brang 'o jug mthong nas// bud medatshogs rnams dga' zhing sgra yang 'byin// bdag gis dar ni gtums pa'i tshig smras to// bu steng
dag la da nyid khyed song la// dge slong 'di ni dum bu dum bur gyis// 'di ni nga yi dgra mchog ma rungs pa// gzhon nu thams cad manyes zhing tshul ldan te// bdag la phan sems dge
slong de la 'dud// rgyal bo 'di 'dra'i bka' bzhin bgyirami rung// de tsho bdagan mya ngananan bar gyur// dge slong shin tu tshul khrims mchog ldan pa// byams ldan pha bzhin
zhugs pa mthong nas nii// shin tu gtum pa'i sems kyis gsed dupatang// phyi dus bdaguni lhung nas mnar med sreg/ dga' byed de ni rgyal po'i lam 'di'i gnas// ma rung
las bgyi ma la sdug bsngal bskyed// bdag gi bka' bzhin de 'drar debagyis te// me tog 'a phrong brgyus 'dra ba'i dge slong gtums// nags mchog kun tu bzang pa dga' ba/
bya yis gang zhing me tog dri zhim rgyas// de na dag slong tshogs gzhan rab mang ba// bu gcig pa nam dang bral ba bzhin// dge slong bzhedas la nags su
ba gnas par mdzod// ga yi don kyang shin tu rgya mar bgyis// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir byon pa'i tshi/ dag slod shin tu snying rjer du zhing tshol// lag pa g.yas pasum
tog rgyalamtshan thogs// g.yon pa yis kyang blta sdugamadzes pa gzhan// lam yang sbyangs shing gros kyis khebs par g.yogs// dge slong bzhudus las chos mchog
bshar pad mdzod// rgyal po'i khab 'di'i khyod zhugs ring 'an yang/ dge slong rab du snying rjer nga shing tshol// rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa 'jig pa'i rtswa// khyod kyi srog
gabar chad 'gyur du dogs// ji ltar skyes bu mthu chen la la dag/ phyogs dang phyogasa mtshams rtag tu sgra grags pa// srid gsum 'adi kun thams cad zil mnan nas//
g.yang sa chen peramatshos te sar lhung ltar// de bzhin dug slong mtshan mchog rab brgyan pa// byad bzhin bzang po sa 'dir 'khyol bar gyur// me tog zlamadzes zhe sdang gtum med ba//
bdag gis sdig pa'i sems kyis dum bur blags/ me tog zla mdzes bkrongs nas sar lhung ba// chos sna 'di ni mthong nasa myur po yang// dge slong thams cad sdug bsngal gzir
gyur te// ma dga' skyes 'gyur de bzhin sems mi bde// me tog zlamadzesar yi rgyal bo ltar// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos te/ 'phreng ba brgyus pa bud med thogs ba 'dra/
'dir ni dum bu dum bur rnam par bcad// bdag gis dngos sdig shin dum bzad bgyis// mgon med mnar med gshin rje'i yul du mchi// badrir yang dge slong dum bur blags pa
yis bdag sangs rgyas rnams dang rang ngasaring// bdag gis shin tu las ngan bgyis pas na// bu dang gnyen bshes tshogs rnams skyabs mi 'gyur// blon pa dang na zham rang
bkram pa yang// de dag dmyul bar bdag song skyabs ma 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'dus dang de bzhin ma byon dang// phyogs bcu dgan gang su bzhugs pa yi// ded dpon stobs bcu nyon
mongs med pa rnams// rdo rje sdug su sku mAnga'i skyabs sumachi// der ni dag slong dum bur byas mthong nas// lha rnams rab tu snying rjeco ngas 'debs// de dag der songadge 'dun go bar
byas me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// chos skya ba ni mkhas shing rtogs pa de// mthu chen phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rab tu grags// byang chub sems dpa' gzugs
la gnas pa de// me tog zlamadzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// bskal ba mtha' yas sbyin pa sna tshogs byin// tshul khrims mi g.yo bskyod med gang srung zhing// 'jig rten kun
du mtshungs med bzod sgoms ga/ me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// bskal pa ma tha yas rtag tu brtson ldan zhing// thum med sems kyis
ba sam gtan bzhi la sgom// nyon mngos ba joms pa'i shes rab gang bsten pa// me tog zlamadzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad// lus la phangs pa thums cad rab sbyangs shing// dpa
srog la ma chags gyur nas ni// kun tu bzang po'i nags nas babs nas su// me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khaba'adir bsad//lha'i tshe de'i snying rje thos nas ni// dge slong de kun
dang shin du sdug bsngal nas// me tog zla mdzes nyes me da bsad pa la/ lta ba'i phyir yang thams cad grong du lhags// des pa de dag rgyal po'i khab 'ongs nas/ dug sbyong dum bu dum bur
byas mthong ste// nyan thag skad kyis ma bzad tshe nges 'debs// nga dag thams cad brgyal nas sa la 'gyal// dag slong dge 'dun rgyal po de la snas// tshul khrims skyon med shin tu
po sdams pa yi// dge slong 'dis ni nyes pa ci zhig byas/ 'di ni sngon gyi skye ba bsam ya sa dran// 'di ni ye shes gzungs dbang pha rol phyin/ 'di ni'i dus byas 'di dag stong par
shes D+ha 'di ni 'gro ba dag la mtshan med ston//'di ni smon lam 'du shes thams cad spangs// 'di na yid 'ong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byin// 'di na des shing dbang po rab tu zhi//
0waM/ 'di ni sngon gyi gzhas kyi ba rol phyin// 'jig rten thams cad las kyang mngon par 'phags// 'di ni sangs rgyas rab byung ye shes kyis// khyu mchog gyur cing 'jig rten rim byas/
dog cing rab rib med da 'i mig gis blta// byams pa dang ni snying rje shin tu che// 'a dod pa ngan cing btsog la sdug bsngal bskyed// mtho ris rnam par ma rung byed pa ste// 'dod pa
bsnyenan rna ba med par 'gyur// ma dag shes rab dang yang bral bar 'gyur// mi rnams 'dod pa dag ni bsten byas na// lang par 'gyur zhing pha dang ma yang gsod// 'dod pa/
bsnyen byas tshul khrims ldan pa gsod// de bas mi yis 'dod pa rnam par spangs// rgyal pas 'dod pa dag ni bsnyen byas na// sa bdag dmapa 'byor pa 'di boranas// mi
bzang sdug bsngal rtsub byed sems dmyal nas/ sems can dmyal ba 'jigs pa chen pa ra 'gro/ 'di 'dra'i dag slong mkhas pa gsod byed de// sdig pa'i las rnams rtag
du byed par 'gyur// de phyir byang chub kyi bsu 'dod ba// sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyangs bar bya// lus n sgyum gsogadang 'dra ba dang// de bzhin rnamig sna lce rig nas ni// gzug
dang sgra dang de bzhin dri mchog dang// rig bya ros rnams zhum med sems kyis gtong// sbyin pa bslabs shong tshul khrims manyam pa med// bzod pa dang ni brtson 'grusado
]bzhin te// bsam gtan sten cing shes rub pha rol song// sems can drag gis don kyang rab du byed// 'jig rten lha dang mir bcas thams cad kyang/
[Di ]byams pas rgyal ba la ni rab tu blta// de phyir migazhi mun nag gtibs gyur kyang// byang chub zhi ba nyid na 'tshang rgya 'gyur// rta dang ba glang yang thug khri rnams drang// khyogs dang sngas
ny+nyA rnams kyang ni de bzhin da/ glad pa dag dang bzhon dang dgal bdang/ grong dang yul 'khor dga' bas gtong bar byed// grong khyer dang ni rgyal srid yong gteng zhing// gser dang dngul
dad shel dang bya ru dang// de bzhin gnas dang bu dang bum dang// rang gi mgo yang gtong zhing byang nub zhugs// me tog dang ni sbos dang bdug pa dang/ dwagadugs dang rgyal mtshan
u0f09 lha'i ba dan dang// rol mo'i spyad sna tshogs thogasanas ni// dga' nas mchod pa mtshungs pa med pa byed// srid pa dag ni stong nga ra shes nas kyang// srid pa'i 'gro ba dag la dga'
mi byed// de phyir stobs bcu mtshan gyis rnam brgyan cing// phyogs bcu thams cad du yang snang bar byed// byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs la gang gnas pa// 'dod pa'i khams
! rnams dang ni gzugs kyi khams// gzugs med khams la de dag mi chags te// khams gsum dag la sdanas chags pa med// byang chub sems dapa' gzungs la gang gnas
bdag tu 'du shes sems can 'du shes med// srog tu 'du shes gang dwaga'adu shes med// tshungs par sbyod pa ma 'dres rtag tu spyad// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gdu
gnas pa// dngos por 'du shes dngos med 'du shes med// bde bar 'du shes ma bder 'du shes med// grangs su 'du shes grangs med 'du shes med// byang chub
sems dpa'i gzungs la gang gnas pa// yod par 'du shes med par 'du shes med// bud med 'du shes skyes bar 'du shosamed// grong gi 'du shos grong khyer 'du shes dad//
byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs la gang gnas pa/ yul 'khor 'du shes grong 'dab 'du shes med// 'dod chags 'du shes 'dod bral 'du shes med/ zhe sdang 'du shes snang
bral 'du shes med// gti mug 'du shes rmongs bral 'du shes med// byang rlub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas nga// nga rgyal drang rgyul bral ba'i 'du shes med// mo tshog
ma rig ma yin 'du shes med// lta dang lta ba ma yin bdu shes med// byang chub sems dbang gzungs la gang gnas pa// de dag dbang po stobs la ma chags te// byang rlub
yan lag bsam gtan chags pa med// khams gsum nyos pa thams cad rab tu spong// 'dod chags chags medazhe sdang gtum pa med// gti mug rmongs med rtag tu ngo
0 @#// med 'gyur// sangs rgyas stobs banu mthong nas bkur sti byed// blo gros ldan pa mtho ris smon mi byed// sudag gzhan las chos mchog thosanusan// de la
nam yang nem nur ma byed nga// 'bru mar gang ba'i snod bzhin dang zhing dag/ bcad dang ma bcad gzhan gyi blo yad shes// 'dza' ba byas n rjes su chags pa skye// de yang nyon/
mongs pa ni chen pa yin// zhe sdang byas na khong khro skye bar 'gyur// dgra dang 'jigs pa sdig pa rnams kyang 'byung// 'di gnyis rab tu rnam par sbyangs byas te// blo gros ldan pa
dag ni byang chub zhugs// de dgami yi khyu mchog stobs bcuran/ 'jig rten du yang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur// nang dang phyi rol dag kyang rnam sngasate// chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rab
gnas shing// tshul khrims phung de dag kyang rnam par sbyangs// ral ba med cing ma 'dren skyon yang med// nam yang de dag gin tshul khrims dag/ 'phags shing 'dris pa dag tu
mi 'gyur te// mtha' 'di dag ni gnyis pa yengs spangs nas// blo gros 'chung pa byang chub zhi rtogs 'gyur// de nas rgyal po dpa' bos byin/ dge slong gi dge 'dun
lasachos smra ba me tog cha mdzes kyi yon tan gyi bye brag chen pa yangs shing rgya che ba thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid m dga' nas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la/
tshigs su bcad pas slar snas pa// nags khrod stag de kun tu bzang po na// stong pa chen pos gang zhing 'bras bu mdzes// dus kun skye bame tog snug nga sa brgyan//
sna tshogs tha dadab rnams sgra yang 'byin// gser gyi re yang madzes shing mabro bas brgyun// mi 'am ci yi glu dbyangs snyan pa dang// rol me shin tu thabs ldan yid 'od
grig grub pa'i bu mo rtag tu gur yang byed// nagasad lha yi dga' ba'i tshul bzhin tu// gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar ba yi shing gis dkrigs// me tog rnam pa sna
tshogs tha dad bkram// ut+pal bas brgyan cing chu yang 'bab// 'di 'dra ba yi nags mchog nyams dga' ba// drang srong rtag tu gnas par mthun pa dag/ bor nas sems
can don dang phan bzhed pas// sdug ba'i phung ba bdag drung grod du byon// de ltar chos pa yon tan 'chang ba 'di// me tog zla mdzes grong khyer 'dir byon te// byon nas drag pa
baspyod pa bdag gis dkrongs 'dradakrongs pas na bdag kyang dmyal bar ltung// byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje'i stobs ldan gang// dpa' bo sems can phan phyir
'jig rtan stod/ de dag sngog bgyid bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig/ byang chub sems dpa' de skyabs bdag mchi'o// gang yang rang rgyal dgun gnyis pa na/gang gzhan
nyan thos rdzu 'phrul ldan pa ste// zag pa zad cing tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa// bdag ni sdug bsngal mnar med 'chi ba skyobs// de nas yang
[OT] bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de lta bsan kun dga' bo byang chub soms dpa' sems dpa' chen pas lus dang srog la ma chags par
bya'o[$ $]da ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo lus dang srog la chags pa'i sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rtag tu lul
