pa'i lus 'di dang// srog kyang g.yo zhing dbang med de// rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra bal// sems can gang dag zhugs pa ni// shin tum rung las byas nas// gti mug dbang song de dag ni//
sems can dmyal ba ma zad par// ma mkhas bdud kyi gzhol bas song// dbu ba rdos 'dra lus dang ni// chu yi chu bur 'dra srog la// mi gang chags par mi byed pa// de dag
shu 'gro ba mchog tu 'gro/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting
nge 'dzan 'di 'dod pa dang/ myur du blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ lus dang sreg lami blta bar bya ste/ mgo dang gos
la me 'bar ba lta bu s brtson 'grus brtsams pas// sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de/ dper na dban ba na bde bar gnas ba dang/ dgon pa dang/ nags khrod
spang te/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang/ ri khrod rnams su zhugs te/ nas sems can de
dag nyan thos kyi byang chub dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang/ blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldeg par 'gyur pa de lta bur
sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la sngon byud ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di nyid rgyacher
tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgyas par rab tu bstan to// ngas sngon sbyad pa dugan spyod pa na// batshe rgyal po dpakhra bas byin par gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang rin chen ldan zhes
bya[5]bskyedams tshol gyi saran byung bar gyur// shing rtar zhugs pas de tsho dge slong mthong// kun nas mdzes shing blton sdug pa ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go
bgos pa// phyogs rnams thams cad du yang snang bar byed// me togazla mdzes phyogs su grags pa ste// stong rje gnas par bo phan snying brtse ba// dpal dang gzi brjid dag
gros mdzes pa// sems can rnams la brtsi phyir grong du 'ongs// ngani gzugs kyang de tsam che yod pas// del dayang ba jus pa ma rungs skyes/
'dod la chags shing srod la bcings pas// 'di'i bdag gi srid las skyod snyam ste// dra yi bu rnams sbyod du tshang ba yang// shing rtaru zhugs shing zham ring mthon dman/
k+Sha 'gro[;]cod ban dungan sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// sum cu dbang phyir lha yi bu 'brang bzhin// de na nga yi bu mo lnga brgya dag/ nor bu thogs shing lhamago bstan sdus//
da mgo brgyan dang zhi lhab lhub brgyan gyis spud// de dag gser gyi dra bas shing rta badron// nga yi bud med dgazhi brgyad khri yang// gzugasamadzes shin tu blta na sdug pa dag/
rgyu shing rtar zhugs pas dge slong de mthong ste// ri rab bzhin du gzugs bzang dpal 'bar ba// mthong nas de dag par yang 'du shes bskyed// byang chub dam pa mchog du
sems bskyed de// de tsho tshangs pa'i spyod par yang dag btsud// yid du 'ong ba'i rgyun rnams de la gtor// de tshe ngan phugadeg skyes par gyur// gnod soms zhe sdang tha ba ma
zla ba zad de// dbang phyug rgyags pas bu la 'di skad byas// mdun na 'dug ba'i dge slong bsad par gyis// gzhon nu de dag nga yi tshig thos nas// shin du sdug bsngal
yid kyang mi dgar gyur// yab cig de skad kyi ni tshigam gsung/ dge slong 'di badra badragacag mi 'gums so// bskal pa bye ba gda'i bye snyed du// bdag cag lus
dang yan lag bcade btungs kyang// dge slong 'di ni 'gums par mi bgyid de// 'di ltar bdag cag byang chub sems skyes sa// rgyal ba de tsho bu yi tshig thosanas/ bros te
gsod pa'i gshod ma 'bangasal snus// nga yi btsun mo'i mdun na 'dug pa yi// dge slong 'drina myur du gsod de phul// de nas gsod pa'i gshad ma phyi bzhin 'ongs// shin tu
gdum sems dga' byed stong rnamed// 'khrumar ngar btags ral gri thogasanas su// de yis dge slong dum bu brgyud du byas// de yi lus dang yan lag bcad pa las// khrag
kyang m zag bod zer steng byung ste/ bcud pa'i 'phranase dpal be'u la khor la dag/ mtshan rnams d yi lus kyi nang du yod/ shin tu ma rungs lasanA byas nas su// bskyed
mos tshul du de yi mod la byung// dag slong me tog zla mdzes dran nas ni// dge slong de yi rtsad ma dga' bar ma gyur to// rings pa'i gzugs su myur zhing 'gyogs par na don
bdag gi rgyal po'i kyo brang song// gang du dge slong dum bu brgyad byas pa// sa phyogs daran shing rtar zhugs nas phyin// lha rnams khrag khrig mang po bar snang la// tshonges 'dabs
ba'i sgra dag de thos te// rgyal bo khyod kyis dge sdig med bgyis// shi ba phe gnas ni mnar med mi bder 'gro/ rgyal po des ni lha yi sgra thos nas// shin tu
[Di ]sdug bsngal m dga' sems skrag gyur// bdag gis me tog zlamadzes dkrongs pazhi// bdag gis sdig pa mi bzad mang po bgyis// de bzhin gshegs pa yo shas mthong yas ldan/
b+hA sangs rgya sam yi lca mchog sras po gang// dbang po bsrung shing des pad sho ba'i yid// de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis dkrongs/ de bzhin gshags pa'i chos rnams ganga'
cing zad pa'i dus la dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod// 'jig rten kun tu chos kyi sgron ma mdzad// da ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis dkrongs// 'jig rten kun n sman pa'i rgyal
gang// sems can na ba rtag tu gus byed cing// bdud rtsi dag gis bkru sman gtong ba yi// dge slong bdag gis 'dod pa'i don phyir dkrongs/ zhi cing zab la zhi ba lta dka' gi
chos rnams skye dgu dgal gang 'chad cing// byang chub snying po mchog kyang gang ston pa// dan 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis dkrongs// 'dren pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'a yin cing//
'jig rten mdongs pa'i sgron mar gyur pa ste// gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po gang 'dzin pa// don tsislad bdag gis 'dod phyir dkrongs// nyon mongs med cing rnam dag ye shes
[0f10 ]can// zhi ba rab zhi rtag tu mnyam bzhag pa// 'dod pas mdongs ba dag gis deng dkrongs te// des ni shin tu ma rungs dmyal bar ltung// sangs rgyus gang dag 'das dang de
bzhin ma byon dang// ma yi dam pa rgyal ba gang yang bzhugs pan/bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams// de dag kun la thal mo sbyar te skyabs su mchi//
'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo// bam po bcu gsum pa// dunas rgyal po dba' bas byin gyis chos sna ba ma tog cha mdzes pas de//
shi ba lus kyi mdog mgyur par sa la 'gyel cing 'dug pa mthong nas// sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bdesdu// 'gyod cing chos bar gyur nas/ de'i tshatshonges rab du char btab bo// chos skya
ba me tog zla mdzes de la yang 'di lta bur yang dag pa'i yon tan gyis bstod pa dang/ snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad de ba de dag smras so// kun tu bzang po'i rags pa'i dge 'dun
gyis khyod la rnam pa mad pa bslu ba bgyis// khyod kyi srog gi bar chad byung dur// rin chen ldan par rgyal po'i khab ma bzhud// khyod kyi dge slong dgra 'dun tshig ma bzung//
mgon po grong khyar dun tsislad byon// khyodan gang gi don du byon pa yi// don de sgron ma mdzad pa mdzad du gsol// lha rdzas mig gu sna tshogs brgyan pa yis// gzugs bzang
gzugs 'bar shing ljin mang pas dkrigs// grub pa'i rig 'dzin gnod sbyin mchog gis bsrungs// lha rnams zhugs shing bya rgyal sgra yang sgrog/ kun
tu bzang po sangs rgyas rtag zhugs pa/ nags tshul dam pa dga' ba bor nas ni// bgyi ba gang phyir khyod ni 'dir byon pa// des pa bgyi ba de deng bdag la bsrungs// khyod kyis
tshig thosazhas ni bka' bzhin bgyi// sangs rgyas sras pa bzhengs la bka' stsol cig/ kye ma dan ci bgyi lha yi lha// bdag mgon med khyod kyi skyabs su mchi// gcig pu song
gari dgas rgyal po ltar// dge slong dge 'dun mchog gi khyu bor nas// sems can mtha' yas pa la thugs bcu'i phyir// rang gi srog kyang btang ste 'dir byonan// 'dod chagasazil
non shin tu jungs pa yis// bdag gis dpa' bo dum bu dum bur bcad// 'dir ni dge slong dge 'dunamatha' dag kyang// khyod la lta bar pho brang ma lhags par// bdag ni 'jigs
skrag khyod la cig gsol pa// bde bar gsal bar gcig na mdzad par 'os// me tog zlamadzes mi 'jigs bdag stsol la// nya dus zla ba nya 'drar bzhengs su gsol// sems
can gtso bo bdag la gnang bar mdzod// chog smra khyod nizhasdang rnam par grol// da ring bdag la sna cig snang bar mdzod// nyi ma bzhin du snanga mdzad bzhengs su gsol// chos s+sa
[j] mchog ni bdag gis dkrongs bgyis te// sdig pa ma lugs bdag gis der bgyis pas// 'dis 'chi'athos ma bzad dmyal bar skye// bdag la de yi skyabs su 'gyur ba ma/ ton
mangs byed pa sdig sems cu ru rung// rgyags pas khengs pa rgyal srid ci ru rung// thams cad spangs te gcig pu 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di nas bdag gis snying po ci ma blangs/ 'dod
chags zhe sdang bcom pa rnams dag chos// snyan par gsung ba bdag thulazugs can// 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig sun 'byin mi mdzad pa// me tog zla mdzes bdag gis ci phyir dkong
kyi ma bzod dang dka' thubanor phyugs brtul zhugs bzung// kye ma gzugs dang des pa dag gi yon tan ldan// kye ma g.yo med dpal sdug spros pa mi mnga' bro// bdag cag bor nas
khyod ni gang du bzhud par mdzad// 'phags pa khyod kyi lus dang yan lag bcad pan// 'o marab du zag cing 'od zer stong dag byung// 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad shin tu ngo
mtshar gyur// ngo mtshar che ba'i rang bzhin 'dren pa bzhes su gsal// kye mam tog zla ba dul ba thugs rje can// kyi mkhyams dang snying rje'i phung po ri bo tshung// kya mchos
rnams zab ma shin tu ston pa'i mchog/ lha khyod bzhengs shig bdag la thugs rjes mdzad du gsol// kye ma zla ba nya zhalatshur spyon cig/ kye ma sa bcu legs gnas tshur spyon/
[Z ]@#// cig[;]kyi ma dpa' bo stobs bcus mngon 'phags pa// tsho la khyod dbang bdag po gang du bzhud// kyi med pa' bo tshur sbyin bdag la gsungs// khyod kyi
kyis yun ring bzod pa bsgoms pa dang// brtson 'grus thugs rjade dag gang du mchis// byams pa chen pa bzhungs las gsungs phyung cig/ kye ma shin tu mchod 'osalha yi lha// chos
cang mi gsungs ba ci slad bzhugs// mkhas pa bzhengs la budag gi khyim du bzhud// bud med tshogs la khyod kyis chos ston cig/ lha khyod lus ni bcad par mi nus te
'a lha dang lha min gnod sbyin srin pos kyang// khyod kyi lha yi lus 'di mi shigs kyis// mkhas bra khyod dang sgyu dag ma mdzad cing// lha khyod sgyu mdzad bzhugs pa ga la mngag/
byang chub sems dpa' sgyu ma mamadzes so// sgyu ma thams cad song la bzhengs su gsal// rin chen ldan po'i grong du chos shod cig/ kye ma 'phags pa me tog zla mdzes tshug/
kyi ma khams gsum 'dod chags bral ba tshur// kyi ma pha ma lta bu 'dren pa tshur/ bdag gi sems dmyal sgo ni bcad du gsol// ngan song skyes pa rnams kyis rten dang
dpung// srog chags mnar medachen par lhung ba yi// skyabasa mdzad me tog zla mdzes tshur spyon cig/ bdag gi bde 'gro'i sgo yang dbya bar gsol// mgon po khyod ni dgung
bdun bshos ma gsol// ri shig dang bzhengs bdag gi bshos gsol cig/ bdag gi bshos gsol rin chen ldan pa 'di'i// sems can du ma chos la dgod pa mdzod//
kyi ma chos mchog rtogs pa bdag gi yab// kye ma sems can rnams la khon med sems// kye mtshur sbyin bdag mdun chos ston cig/ kye ma tshur spyon khyod smon gyur grub shog
dge slong dge 'dun ri ni mgon med gyur// kye ma mdangs shing mi dran mya ngan bgyid// sems can snying po khyod ni myur bzhengs la// dge slong dge 'dun dbugs kyang 'byung ba mdzod/
kya ma 'jig rten gsum n sgron gyur pa// kyi mtshur spyon kun tu bzang por bzhud// kun tu bzang po'i nags khrod bzhud nas ni// dge slong dag la phan phyir khyod ston cig/ kye kyi
chos 'dzin yon tan rmad byung tshe// a shudame tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'// shes rab thugs rje'i spyanAn dri med ba/ kyi kya drage slong dge 'dun gzigs su gsol// tshig gi lam
dang bral ba'i gzungs de yang/ kyi kyi dge slong dag la bstan du gsol kyi kyi zla ba shar ba bzhin du ba der// me tog zla ba da ring bzhengs su gsol// kye kye rgyal sras bdag la
thugs brtse ba// 'gro ba'i dbugs 'byin mdzad pa bla na med// kye kye mtshon dang dbyugs pas btab pa bzod// bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing rab tu des// kye kyi me tog
zla mdzes thugs brtsi can// rab sbyin 'dren pa khyod ni bzhengs su gsal// kye kye khyod ni bzhi ngasal badrag la yang// mthong bar dga' ba'i gzungs rnams
la bshad du gsal// kye kye'ajig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa// shes rab kyi ni sgron ma dam pa'i mchog/ kye kyi sems can dag gi phan donal// brtson mdzad 'dran pa thugs rje'i
stobs bcu ldan// kye kyi me tog zla mdzes bzhengs su gsal// dpa' bo sems can dag gi don mdzad pa// shAkya kyi sems can dag ni phyi bdang// khrag khrig rnams kyang zhibagi/
grong du khod// kyakyi tshul khrims nor ldan blo gros che// mkhas pa bslab pa'i nor gyis shin tu phyug/ kyakyatshul khrims brtul zhugs rab gnas shing// chos kyi shing gi myu gu
mngon par dga'// kye kyi chos gos ngur smig kha bsgyur 'chang// rtag tu mngon par byung la dgrol bar mdzad// kye kye ma tIgu zla ba brtul zhugs bzang// rab sbyin dke'athub
bzang khyod bzhengs shig/ kye kyi dul ba sems can ma dul 'dul// rtag par dul ba'i gnas dang rjes su ldan// skye kyi dul ba rab dul rjes su bzhud// zhi ba dbang po rab
zhi khong nas des// kye kyi sems can nyal zhingaganyid legapa// chos kyi sgra yis rtag tu sad par mdzod// kya kyi sems can bye ba khrag khrig dag ]sad par bgyis nas theg pa
mchog la bod// kye kye sbyin pa yi ni lcang sel// brtson 'grus tha gus sbrel ba'i gru sbyar te// kye kye sems can rgya mtsho chen der ni// rab tu lhung zhing srid par dod du/
rnams// kye kyi stobs bculdan pa me tog mchog/ gnyan po gdongs 'dzin mkhas pa bzhengs su gsal// kye kyi shin tu sra ba'i grur yang na/ zhugs nas bdag dang
dag bsgral bar mdzod// kye kyi sman pa'i dam pa brtul zhugs la// shin tu spyad cid rig mdzad sman pa'i mchog/ kye kyi ye shes rnal grol pha rol phyin// dam pa'i chos
kyi rtsi dag sbyin mdzad pa/ dkyi sku 'di ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// btab pa'i sems can na ba rnams gathigs nas/ dkye kya myur du bzhengs la de dag la// chos kyi snyan rnams
shin tu stsal bar mdzod// kye kyi ye shes sman pa'i rgyal po mchog/ mtshungs med ye shes 'phags shing pha rol phyin// kye kyi nad rnams shin tu gsa mdzad cing// thugs
ge des kyang 'adza[Y/]kyi sku na ba gyur pa'i sems can khams// 'dod chags nad kyis ma lus bcom pa'i rnams// des n sems can thams cad bde ba/ rje sems can dag gi don kyang mdzad/
kyi kyis ba'agyur pa'i sems can khams// 'dod chags nad kyisam las brnyam pa rnams/ 'gyur byed kyi mkhas pa ye shes rgya cher bslabs// chos kyi rje dag shan du
'khri shing thams cad ye shes rgya mtshos chod// kye kya legs thos chos rnams 'dzin mdzad pa// rdul bral mdo sde bya ba brgya dag kyang// ga bor gyi nang du gdan
la rab zhugs la// mi mchogamakhas pa brjod bas mdzad du gsol// me tog zla ba mtshan mchog brgyan pa kye/ dpe byas bzang po brgyad cu tshangs pa kyi// dpe byad bzang po
brgyad cus lus brgyan kyi srid pa'i mtsho rga la spros ma da tshur skyes kyi// srid pa'i btson rar chud brol bzhengs shig// ye shes mchog rig tshangs pa 'drab kyi// me tog
zla ba thugs rjechan pakyi/ khyams dang snying rje skyed la bzhungs shig skye// me tog zla ba khyod la gsol ba 'debs// dag slong dge 'dun khyod kyis ma dor bar// tshur gshegs
dge 'dun yongs su bsdu ba medzod// bzhongs lazhugs khrod der yang gshegs samakyi// me tog zla babasam gtan dgyes pa mchog/ mdza' dang mamadza' mtshungs par byams
shing phan// gzungs rab tu gonus pa tshur spyon kyi// ye shes sdod pa mtshungs med khyodabazhengs shig/ rirab bzhin du mi g.yo brtan pa kyi ]/sangs rgyas sangs rgyas
sems can mnyam yid kyi// me tog zla ba brtul zhugs rdzogs pakyi// bzhengs la shing gi drung du 'tshang rgya mdzod// lha yi rnab chos kyi mchog 'tshang kyi// lha yi mig mkhas
ye shes rtogs pakyi// bzhengs te bdag la gzigs shig thugs rje can// grags pa mtha' yas bdag gAtshig gsan// 'jig rten kun la ban dang don mdzad kyi// me tog zla ba shAn
du sbyin dgyes kyi// bzhengs la myur du bdag gi ri rdzogs mdzod// khyod 'dir dum bu dum bur ma bzhugs shig/ grong 'di skyes ba bud medatshogs rnams kyang// khyod mthong thams cad
bzhin sa la 'gyel// snying rkams 'gyur ba'i mya ngan rnams kyang bgyid// thugs rdza mchog gi spyanagyis de la gzigs// gang gis slad du byams pa bsgoms pa dang// ye shes
shes rab thabs kyi stobs rnams dang// khyod kyi thugs rdzobatang snyoms dga' dra yangs/ de dgardzogs mdzod bzhengs shigam tog mdzes/ lhaklu lhaman rdzu 'phrul chen po dang
gnod sbyin srin pomi dang ma'am// snyam pa ma tog bdugs pas bkanganus// thams cad mthong bar dga' nas lhags shing 'khod// drang srong chon pa 'tshugazhi dang rtogs te//
skye dgu'i 'dod pa gnod byed gsod pa yin// yid kyin nga du 'gyur ba ngan 'gro'i rgyu// de phyir 'dod pa'i spyo ba spang bar bya// dge slong bdag gis bsad pa'i sdig galas// shin tu
ma legs ma bde byas pas na// bdagan mi bzad dmyal bamanar med 'gro/ bdag la de yi mgon skyabs byed pa med// bdagani rgyal po'i srid btang tshangs spyodagazhol// sngos
@#// dung me tog byug ba rnams kyis ni// mchod pa dam pa rnams kyang rab tu bya// shin tu mdzes bar mchod rten bdag gis bya// bu dang bu ma bud med kyis/
[Dhi ]badrag dang// blon po dang na tshod dpon de dag dang// grong ba dang ni rgyal rigs mang po rnams// de dag thams cad la ni ngas sgra ba/ a ga ru dang tsan dan shugs pa dang//
wA shin tu zhim pa'i sde sa mchog cu yod pas// myur duskyon gyi nang du khyokas chos la// dge slong 'di ni bsregs pa'i cho ga gyis// grong khyer mi kun rgyal pa'i tshig thosanas//
dbya'i skyes mchog dag kyang thogs nas phyogs bcas pa// sbos rab bzang de yid du 'ongs las byas// drar na dgo slong de yang bcu gnas su a ga ru dang tsan dan tsam pa ka/
rgyu skyes sbe ka de bzhinab tu la// me tog dang zhi phying ba byug ba dag/ shin tu bzang dang 'bru mar dag gis bsregs// de yi rus ba sgrom zhi byas par gyur// dge slong dag
gis de yang der bsregs te// rgyal bas da yi mchod rtan byas nas su// 'di la ngas ni mchod pa byas zhes zer// me tog dang ni phreng ba byug pa dag/ gdugs dang ba dran rgyal mtshan/
ra thogasanas su// rgyal pos deran sil snyan stong dag dang// bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyang len dubatsud/ nyim gcig la rgyal po dus gsum du// dge slong de yi mchod rten de
0 drung du// sdig pa sngon chad cung zad ci byas pa// de tsho dus gsum du yang shin tu 'chags// 'dre steng bye ba phrag ni dgu bar ltar/ nyes pa byas pa dag kyang rab bshags de//
phyis kyang tshul khrims dam pa maral srud/ rnam par dwagacing gtsang la dri ma med// lo stong bye ba phrag dgu bcur yang// gso sbyong dag kyang de tsha rab gsos te// dazhi
detshe bdag gi lus shig nas// mnar med ma bzad par ni dar lhung gyur/ 'dod phyir snying rjemed pa'i las byas pas// sdug bsngal mang po dag kyang myong bar gyur//
sangs rgyas bya ba stong phrag dgu bcu lnga// de tshe de dag bdag gis ma mnyes byas// la stod bye ba phragazhi dgu bcu ltar// de yi tshon nga ni long bar gyur// bskal pa bye ba khrag
khrig dugacu gnyis// sngon chad da yimag kyang bar bar gyur// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong dang/ shin tu mang bar da yi mig phyung phrogs// mgo dang rna ba dang ni rkang
lag kyang// bskal pa mtha' yasu khrag khrig bcad par gyur// bskul ba dgan bye ba khrag khrigatu// mir gyur ba dang skyebagazhan du'ong// 'khor ba'i sdugabasngal dag
sa rab tsas shing// sdug bsngal tshol ba yun ring myong ba ragyur/ sdig pa'i las rnams byas pa 'khor bzhi/ yuna'ang shin tu sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de phyir byang nub
[r]@#// zhi ba su 'dod pa// srid pa gsum du sdig pa mi bya'o// rgyal po 'a mchog gis sngon gyi las bshags kyang// sngamanyis byas rnams las de ma ra/ mi
zad gzugs kyi las rnams sdur byas pas// do shi dmyal ba mi bzad nanaramed seng// nga yi rnab de bzhin rkang lag bcad// bskal pa mtha' yas mang por snayang bcad//
wA spyod pa spyodatsa mtshon cha dbyig thogs nas// 'dabs byed nun gyisang yis migakyang phyung// byang chub phyir mgo lagalus bcad dang// bu dang chung mamag dang rang gsha/ rkang lag
dga' ba'i sems kyis yongs btang yang// sngon gyi sdig pa'i lasani zad mgyuro// kun dga' de ltar bskal ba ma tha' yas spyod// sangs rgyas dpa' sdug dpagatu med pa mthob/
byang chub spyod mchog 'di'i spyod pa na// de tsho sdug bsngal 'di dag sngon myong gyug/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs la gang gnas shing// byams spyod rta gzhu mo ga yom 'gul ba//
sangs rgyas rdul sbyangs lha yi lha mchodanas// de dganam yad ngan sad sar ma 'gro/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshon gyi go bgos pa// chos rje sangs rgyas bdag 'gyurasu 'dod pa// tshul/
khrims ma 'dres g.yo ba med par srungs// gzungs la rab gnasachos kyang bstan par gyis// dazhid rgyal po dpa' na yin// nga yi bu rnams phyi dus chos skyong ba// me tog blo
mdzes pad bla ma yin// dga' byed de ni zhi ba'i rgyal bar gyur// 'jig rten gsum pa 'gro ba'i gnyen cig pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rkang gnyis gtso bor gyur// skye dgu dka
gi donatshan mdzad nas niaM// mar me bzhin du 'dren pa mya ngan 'das// bud med tshogs dang rgyal rigs mang pa dang// khyim bdag dang ni blon po stobs chen dang// tshong dpon de bzhAn
grod pa 'amakhar gyi rgyal// thams cad stobs bcu nyon mongs med par gyur/ me tog cha mdzes kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// danas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu de lta bas na/ byang chub sepa sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pa nas bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub bde bar mngon bar
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ chos thamasacad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyidam par spros pa'i ting nga bzhi 'di nyan
par bya/ gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklags rubya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i sgoms pas mang
du bsgom par bya// gzhan la yang rgyanar yang dag par rab tu bstan dar bya'o// tshul khrims kyi phung po la yadarab tu gnas par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
[ ]@#/ de'i tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrimasu tshogs gnas shing// bdag la phan sems spyad pa gang spyod pa//
kyig mngon dga'i sangs rgyas shing du myur song nas// bzod pa de thob chos kyi rgyal par 'gyur// de phyir gnod sems med cing kun mthun gyis// thams cad rtag du yid du 'ong bar bgyis//
dpag stug sangs rgyas dpag med mthong nas ni// byang chub reg nas chos kyi bdag por bgyur// de phyir phan yon mchog 'di thosanas ni/ dge slong tshul khrims mchog dang ldan mthong/
nas mkhas pas g.yo med rtag tu bstan par bya// rid par mA thogs ting 'dzin bde thob 'gyur// gal te gter rnams dpag med tshad kyang med// na chen sna bdununor bus gang
gyur pa// de bzhin zhing rnams gang+gA'i bya ma snyed// nor bu rin po chu yis gang ba rnams// byang chub sems dpa' sbyin lames pa yis// nyin mtshan re rer sbyin pa 'di dag byin//
de bzhinapaskal pa gang+gA'i phyam snyad/ de rgyun mi 'chad par sbyin pa byin pa bas// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ting 'dzin 'di/ thos nas bde grashugs mdzod mchog 'dzin byed pa//
bsod nams phung bo des ni gang bzung ba// sbyin pa de kun de yi char mi phod// mi gang rjes su 'jun la dad pa dag/ ting 'dzin rdul bral mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni// bsod nams phung
po dpe med mchog 'di yin/ ye shesamadzod de dpag med 'byung gnasaso// ting 'dzin rdul bral kha ba 'di bzung na// byang chub sems dunga' de ni nor can 'gyur// rgya mtsho
chen po bzhin du thos pa'i gter// da la bsod nams tshad yodo yongam 'gyur// chos kyim chog rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas// shin tu rgyas byas byang chub sems dang 'a
brjod/ ting 'dzin 'di na su dag stan byed pa// de ni nam yang byang chub the tshom med// bsod nams phung po mchog dang gang ldan zhing// gang la tshadared bsam gyisam khyab pa/
'jig na slob dpon sangs rgyas rnam par 'dran// rang byung thugs rje chen pa ma gtogs bar// de yi 'og du sems can su dag kyang// stong chen 'di na bsod nams phung pa dang//
mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab ye shesakyis/ mnyam du ragyur pa nam yang yong med de// ting 'dzin 'di ni kusanas 'dzin pa dang/ klog cing yongs su nub par byed pa dang/
tshungs med sangs rgyas byang chub tshol ma gtogs// de yi ye shes mtshungs pa med par 'gyur// ting 'dzin 'di ni gzung zhing klags pa yis// bsod nams phung po ji snyed bsags/
ba yang// gzhon nu ji ste chos de gzugs yod na// 'jig rten khams mang 'dir yang shong mi 'gyur// gzhon nu de phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang// 'das dang byung ba'i de ba'an
gshegs pa dang// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'dod pa yis// ting 'dzin bden paazung zhing bklags par gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di/
ba yin te// gzhon nu nga yitshig la dad par gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa brdzun gyi tshig ma gsung// 'di 'dra'i sems can rdzun du smra ba med// sngon gyi bskal pa brgya phrag bsam
a mas su// byang chub spyad pa mchog 'di rab spyod cing// ting 'dzin 'di ni yongs su tshol ba'i phyir// ngas na bdag tu lta ba 'di sbyangs so// de phyir chos kyimadzod 'du mnyan par gyis/
'di las mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig 'byung/ 'di ni bsod nams phung po mtha' yas yang// 'dis ni sangs rgyas yeshosa myur du 'thob/ mkhas pa 'jigs med de dag gang stanang/
'di ni mdo sde kun gyi dam pa'i mdo// dge ba bsam gyis ma khyab 'byung gnas te// chos de rnams la mthar thug rnyed mi 'gyur// stong chen dwagazhi bcad cing bshig nas su// rdul gyi
tshogs rnams bgrang bar nus na yang// mdo sde brgya phrag bsam yas tshad med pa// rgyun ma chad par de stong bgrang mi nus// sangs rgyas zhing gi sems can thams cad kyi// phyin ng rgyu/
pa/ ba'i dbugasani bgrang nusakyang// ting 'dzin 'di la gnas nias gang ston pa// mdo sde de dga mthar thu gnas ma 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// 'gro bder yang sems
can gang skyed pa// de dag sems na bgrang bar nus kyang srid// rtag ston mdo sde de dag bgrang minus// rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma ci yod dang// klung dang mtshe'u dang gshong gi bye ma dag
bskal pa bye ba dag gis bgrang nus kyang// de dag 'chud nga'imado sde mtha' yas so// sangs rgyas zhing ni byi ba mang pozhu// chu yi lung pa rtag 'dug ci yod pa// brgya tshul skayi rtsa
mos bgrang nus kyang// de yi dbyangs kyi yan lag kun mi bgrang// gang mngon 'diran simasacan ci byung ba// rang gi lus la snying por ba dogs pa rnams// bskal pa bye ba mang bos
bgrang nus kyang// de dag mdo sde sgrub pa shes mi nus// phyogs bcu dgan sems can ci yod pa// srog chags kun gyi sgra skad bkranganus kyang/ de dag rtag tu mi chad ston pa yi//
mdo sde do dag bgrang bar yong ma nus// chos rnams thams cad bstan par rab shes shing/ des pa'i tshig dang bstan pa'i tshig don mkhas// gtan la bab pa'i yang drag tshul la
bslabs// blo gros yangs shing rtag dga' shes rab can// yangs pa'i don sems rab tu phye ba'i blo// bsam dang mi bsam pa yang rtag dushes// dbyangs kyi rang bzhin rgya chen thams
cad 'gi// sgra dbyangs de dag ston kyang chags mi 'gyur// thogs med de ni chos sgar brjod pa ste// 'grob kun la ston kyang chags mi 'gyur// drib nges par bstan pa rgya la mkhas// de ltar
de yis don dam rab tu rtogs// mdo sde gcig gi phyogs kyang bye ma snyed// bsamagyis mi khyab des ston chags pa med/ chags med ston pa tshig gi don la mkhas//
ka 'khor gyisazhung du de 'tshad chags mi 'gyur// ting 'dzin la legs par gang gnas pa// byang chub sems dpa' de ni g.yo bamed// chos la stobs skyed bye brag thob pas na//
b+hU srog chags bye ba mang po'i go dbyed/ ji ltar ri rab mi g.yo mi 'gul te// rlung rnams kun gyis 'gul bar mi nus pa/ de bzhin dge slong chos snamakhas pa yang// pha rol rgol
bkun gyis bskyed mi nus// steng chen gyis ni 'jig rten khams 'di na// ma gang mi g.yo bar na brjod pa rnams/ de dag rlung gi rab tu bskyod nus kyang// su drag stong pa nyid la rtag/
brtson pa// sangs rgyus gnas su nges pa de yin te// gtan la bab pa stong pa'i chos rab shes// de ni rgol ba kun gyis dkrug minus// phas kyi rgol ba dag gis mi bskyod cing//
zla sbyab thams cad kyis kyang zil mi gnon// ting ba yin zhi ba 'don bstan byas pa// ]zil gyis mnon smad pa med par 'gyur// ting 'dzin zhi ba 'din bshad byas na// da yos stong/
ltanyid rtogs pa la khong du chud// de ni chos rnams kun la nem nur med// ye shes mtha' yas dag la la khor mor gnas// ting 'dzin 'di'i bzung zhing bklags pan// stobs
dang byang chub yan lag rnyed mi dkag/ yang dag rig dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de la mngon par shes pa red mi dka'// mtha' yas yi shes rgyal ba mthong ba yang//
srid bur grub pa dgan nyidam dkag nas nigs rgyas bye ba khrag khrigabasamam khyab// ting 'dzin 'di'achang de yis mthong bar 'gyur// de ni rgyal ba de dag thams cad las// ting
'di zhi ba 'di yang thos 'gyur te// yang dag rig dang drab ng gi pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog dang ldan par 'gyur// steng chen gyi ni 'jig rten khams 'di dag/ lha rdzas
nor bu nan bzang mchog gis// 'og nas bzung ste srid pa'i rtsama'i bar/ nor bu rin chen dag gis gang gyur dang// zhing yang mtha' yas rnams mang ji snyed pa// 'dzam bu'i
nu bo'i gser bkram gad pa kun// sa yi 'og nas srid pa'i rtsa mo'i bar// thams cad rgyal ba'i mchog la sbyin pa byin/ sems can rnam pa mang po ji snyed pa// bskal pa mtha'
las mang por sbyin pa byin// sangs rgyas rnams la 'khor mor ma chud byin// byang chub 'dod par byin pa'i sbyin tshogs la// dag slong gang dag stong nyid mngon dga' zhing// stobs
bcu lazhi thal sbyar phyag 'tshalan// byang chub sems dpa' stong nyid mngon dga' la// sbyin pa'i phung po lta mas char ma yod// bsod nams ldan pa'i mi des de rud nas// sangs
rgyus byang nub mtshungs med tshol ba'i phyir// dang ba rgya cher bskyed nas sbyin byin pa// de yi dper 'di skyes bu dam pas bstan// su dag ting 'dzin dam pa'i/
ba mchog 'di las// tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad soms dga' 'an pa yang// de yi bsod nams phung pa bsags pa la// sbyin pa de kun brgya yi char ma yod/ ting 'dzin rdul
bAl zhi ba ma thos par/ khan byed byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin byin kyang// thos pas sangs rgyas ye shes myur thob ltar// du tsam sangs rgyas ye shes myur mi thob// gang gi
zhi mchog sa 'di tho bzhi s su// rdul bral ting 'dzin stong pa'i rig 'azhigo/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' dga' rtogs byed pa// des n sas rgyas ye shes myur du 'thob// gang gis
'di lta bu yi gter rnyed pa// zhing rnams m bra' yas gapa'i phyi ma nyid// de dag lha dang de bzhin mi rnams kyis// nor bu rten bo ra pa gang bar gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i ting
'dzin 'di 'thob ste// rtag du chub par byed cing mi ngoms pa// thul bar dga' zhing mdzod rnams shin dumang// nor yang mang zhing rin chen nor dang ldan// ji ltar ting 'dzin rdul bral
wi 'di thobanas// byang chub sems dpa' dga' zhing rangs bltar// rgyal srid shin tu 'byor cing rgyas thob kyang// mkhas pa de dag nam yang dgar mi 'gyug/ de dang de dag sangs
rgyas kun ma khyon kyi// chos rnams rtag tu 'an par byed pa yin// zad pa'i mthar thug dus sugyur pa'i tshe// chos kyi mdzod 'chang blo gros chen de yang// thams cad mkhyen pa'i dzod/
kyang 'chang ba yin// de dang de dag sems can byed stong dang// khrag khrig chos kyi dbyings kyi mgu bar byed// de dag tshul khrims nor ldan blo gros can/ skyes bu de dag bslab pa bzhi'i
gyi phyug/ de dang de dag tshul khrims brtul zhugs gnas// mgo dga' chos kyi sdong po'i ma gu pa/ de dag chos gos ngur smig rinache'achang// tsam nas 'byung la rtag tu dga'
bar byed// de dag sems can ban phyin mnyam pa med// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu zhugs// de dgadul ba sems can m dul 'dul// rtag par dul ba'i gnas dang
rjes su ldan/ dwade dag dul zhing rab dul rjes su song// zhi ba dbang po rab tu zhi ba yin// de dag sems can nyal ba gnyid 'phrogs pa// rtag tu chos kyi skad kyis sad par byed//
sems can dag ni sad par byas nas su/ rin chen chos bzang mchog la 'god par byed// de dang de dag sbyin pa'i bdag po yin// khor mar rtag tu gtong la brkyang pa ste/ mahA
pa de dag 'jungs dang 'grogs mi byed/ gtod pa chen po dag la rtag tu dga'// de dag sems can dbul zhing sdug bsngal rnams// mthong nas langs spyod kyis kyang tshim
ka par byed// de dag sems can bde zhing phan pa'i phyir// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtag par zhugs// de dag ye shes rtag tu bslabs pa ste//
chos kyi rda yang rgya char shin tu brdung// skye bo kun gyi phyi rtsom 'bri zhing gcod// rtag par ye shes la yang rab tu zhugs// de dag legs thos chos 'dzin rdul bral ba// 'khor
k+Sha gyi nad du stan la 'dug nas su// mkhas pa blo gros 'chang ba de dag// mdo sde bye ba brgya dag rab tu ston// de dang de dag mang du thos ba yin// thos pa 'dzin pa sangs rgyas chos rnams
tshe 'dzin// chos kyi mdzod rnams shin tu'adzin byed de// thub pa'i chos kyi gter la dga' ba yin// dadrang de dag shes rab yungs pa yin// dga' ba dag kyang rgya cher rtag tu skyed// brag
tshicing 'byung bar 'gyur ba lta dka' ba// zhi ba'i chos mchog rnams kyang rab tu ston// da drag chos dang chos min shes pa ste// des shing blo gros ldan pa chos la gnas// chos kyi rgyal srid
rab tu ston byed cing// mtshungs med chos kyi mchog la rtag tu spyod// de dag chos kyi mchog la lhur byed d// bla ma la yang ma byed par gnas// chos kyi grong khyer mchog la gnas pa/
ste blo gros rgyas pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng// de dag dregs shing rgyags pa'i sems can rnams// rtag tu bag med pa la gnas pa mthong// rab tu ma rungs logs pa'i lam
song zhing// 'khor ba'i lam la gnas pa mthong nas ni// de la byams dang snying rje rgya cher bskyed// dga' dang btang snyoms dag la'ang 'ab gnas te// de dag la ni yan lag/
brgyud ldan pa/ lan mchog zhi ba blta dka' rab tu ston// de dang de dag 'gas pas chos kyi gru// bshams nas 'khor ba'i rgyan duseng pa dag/ rgya mtsho chen por lhung zhing
khyer ba yi/ sems can mang po dag ni sgrol bar byed// byang chub yan lagastobs dang dbang nga yis// go bgos dam nga 'i chos kyi grur zhugs nas// ba rol 'gratsha bde rtag
du 'jigs med bar// khor mer sems can rnams kyang 'god par byed// de dag sman pa'i gtso bo dka' thub la// shin tu spyad pa rig byed sman pa'i mchog/ rig pa ye shes rnam
grol pha rol phyin/ dam pa'i nus kyi rtsi yang sbyin par byed// nadan rnam pa mang pos btab pa yi// sems can na ba dag kyang mthong nas su// de dag lan chos kyi bkru sman gtong//
chos rnams kyis ni da dgags par byed// de dag sa ba pha rol rgol ba 'dzin/ 'jig rten dbang de tshig gi dbang phyug ldan// shes bya kun la 'od byed blo gros 'chang/ yi
shes dam pa'i sa la rab tu gnas// dpa' bo yi shes stobs ldan stobs 'jom pa/ ye shes ldan pa dag gis yang dag bsngags// sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag
0 @#/// chos la gnas nas shes pas mgu bar byed// de dung de dag bdug pa ded dpon te/ gsal ba sems can rnams kyi skyabs 'dod pa// sems can rin chen la
tshig la rmongs gyur cing// rtag tu bdud kyi snying zhugs mthong nas ni// de dag la yang ma mchog zha zhing bad// rtag par mya ngan 'das pa rab tu ston// mkhas pa dgan ye shes lam
de yis// sems can mang po bya brgya 'dren par byed// da dang de dag gnas dang rten du 'gyur// skyabs dang mag dang sgron ma byed pa yin// 'a jigs pa rnams la ma 'jigs rang du sbyin/
skyag pa rnams kyang rtag tu dbugs 'byin byed// de dag sems can shin tu sdug bsngal dang// dmus long gyur pa 'di dag rig nas ni// yang dag tshul bslabs rin chen chos
rnams kyis// chos kyis snang bdug kyang byed par 'gyur// 'jig rten na ni bzo na chog ci yod pa// bzo bo dang sa sems can phan 'gyur zhing// gang gis sems can rtag tu
bder 'gyur ba// bzo yi rnam pa de dag shi'i tu bslabs// su dag byang nub tu ni mngon zhugs te// blo gros ldan zhing 'jig rten mig sbyin pa// bslabs pa rnams la mchog gi pha rol
phyin mkhas rab 'jig rten na yang ngo mtshar thob// sangs rgyas dag gi chos mchog thos pa yis// mtshungs pa med par doms par yong ma 'gyur// tshul khrims bzod dang ting 'dzan
pha rol phyin// zab mo yi na chos rnams shin tu thos// de dag shi ba rin chen chos rnams ni// gzhan la ston pas ngoms par mi 'gyur te// thar pa'i thabs kyi char yang rab 'bebs
shing chos kyi skyes bu dug na tshim par byed// de yi drung du sems can mang pa na// chos 'dod mkhas pa ji snyed lhags nas su// chos mchog bzang po dam pa rin bo/
drangs zhing gsal ba'i lam rnams mnyan snyan pa// de dag blo gros 'chang pas grwa rtsom bcad// chos kyis de dag shin tu mgu bar byed// tshul khrims bzod dang ting 'dzin pa
rol phyin// sems can rnams kyis bsam pa rab tu shes// ye shes ldan zhing ye shes mchog rab kyi// pha rol phyin pa sems can bsam la mkhas// sems can pha rolasems/
dang spyod pa dang// gang dag gtaman ci 'dra'i chos brjod pa// ye shes gtaman brjod la gang dag gis// sems can khrag khrig chos mchog mig thob 'gyur// de dag ye shes bye brag
pha rol phyin lam rnams kyang ni nye bar ston par byed// mkhas pa de dag gi ni sems rnams kyang/ bdud rnams bye ba stong gis yong mi shes// ji ltar nam mkha' lan bya seng ba// de yi
rjesan gang du'ang shes mi nus/ ye shes stobs ldan dul zhing rab tu zhi// zhi ba 'phags pa ye shes dag lag gnas// dpa' bo khyung mchog bdud rnams thams cad bcom// byang chub
[z ]// zhi ba mngon par 'tshang yang rgyu/ rtag du rdzu 'phrul dag gis pha rol phyin// zhing yang brgya phrag mang por 'gro bar byed// sangs rgyas mang pa bye ba khrag khrig/
ma thong// ji bzhin gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed// de yi mig kyang thogos par ma 'gyurata// phyogs bcu dag gis gzugasamang maklong bar 'gyur// ji snyed phyogs bcu yin srid pa na//
wA sems can yod dgu de dag 'dren par 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag mang par na// de dag de yi phan yon kun brjod cing// spobs pa yisan rab tu bshad mdzad kyang// sngon gyi
spyod pa'i bsngags pa zad mi nus// ting 'dza mtshungs med rdul dang bral ba'adi// skyes bu su gang 'dzin par byed pa ni// sangs rgyas dag gis nor rnams ma zad do// shin tu rgya che ya/
shes rgya mtsho bzhin// tshul khrims kyi phung po des par bstan pa 'i le'uste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// du nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la
bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngamtshan dang rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di dag dang/ gzhan yang tshad med pa
bawi 'dod pa dang/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'dod pas/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i/
ting nge 'dzan 'damanyan par bya gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklags par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ lung mnod cing kha don du khya/ nyon mongs pa med
par sgom pas bsgoms par bya gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya/ des bzod pa'i stobs bsgom par bya/ bzod pa bstan par bya/ mang du bya/ chos la don tu gzer ba dang/
chos 'dod pa dang chos yodas su 'dzin pa dang/ chos dang rjes sumathun pa'i chos la zhugs par bya'o// sangs rgyas mchod pa la mngon par brtson par bya'o// dus gnas gsum
la brtson par bya ste[]gsum gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa zad pa dang ba sad nams kyi zhing du gyur pa dang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
bskyed par bya ba'i 'jigarten gyi bde ba rig par 'dod pa'i phyir ni ma yin te/ gnas gsum pa de dag la mtsho bar brtsonapar bya'o// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis de ni
zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la don 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa la de dag tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ bskal pa
stod du ji ltar ngas sdud pa// gzhon nur gyur pa ngalas mnyon par gyis// ting 'dzin bzang po dam pa 'di tshol phyir// sangs rgyas dag ni stong phrag brgya yang mchod/ de ltar
bskal pa 'das pa bsam yas su/ zhing brgya yizhi byes ci yod pa// dper bstan de snyed 'das par gyur pa na// chos kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal po byung/ khyi
ba stong phrag drug cu mi nyung ba// rgyul ba de yi tshog sazhi byung gyur te// thams cad zag pa med cing nyon mongs zad// rnam thar brgyad la gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa// de yi dus na/
sgyu sa 'di thams cad kyang/ bde zhing 'alegs 'khrugs pa med par 'gyur// mi rnams thams cad skyed cid bde dang ldan// mi yi bde ba drag gis ba rgyas par gyur// thams
cad bsod nams stobs dang ldan pa ste// blta na sdug cing de bzhin dga' bar 'gyur// thams cad phyug cing nor mang 'byor pa ste/ lus ni lha yi bde dang ldan par gyur/ 'dus shing
brtul zhugs bzang la nyon mongs rlung/ ba byed pa'i stobs la dbakazhing byad gzugs bzang// lha yi gnas lha yi sras po bzhin// tshul khrims yon tan 'chang zhing blo gros/
ldan/ de yi dus na sa bdag byung ba na// rgyal po me tog mchog ces bya ba yin// de yi bu yad lnga brgyar tshod ba byung// dran dang ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan par gyur// rgyal
po po'i bu de yis kyang rgyal ba yi// skyed mos tshal brgya stong phrag drug cu dag thams cad me tog 'bras dus brgyano pa yod/ thugs rje ldan pa de la rab tu phulo// skyid
mos tshalan brgya stong sna tshogs dag 'chags mal stan bzhugs gnas stong rnams dang// chos gos kyang na bye ba brgya stong gis// brgyags bzhugs gnas rnams su 'ding ba byas//
de ltar rnam pa du ma stong dag dang// dge sbyong dag gi longs spyod ci snyed pa// rgyal po'i bu ni shin tu yid dang bas/ bder gshegs de la shAms cad nye bar phul// rgyal pa de yang dag
ba'i las bcu yi// lam la rab tu gnas par gyur nas su// skye bo srog chags khrag khrig brgya stong gis// mdun du bdar te 'dran pa lta bar song// me tog dag dang drug pa bdug
pa dang// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sil snyan thogs nas su// rgyal ba du la de yis mchod byas te// thal ma sbyar nas spyan sngar 'dug par gyur// lha dang mi dang lha min gnod sbyin dang/
dge slong stong yang de tsho dga' bar gyur/ rgyal ba mchod pa 'di'i lung ston tam// ma yi dbang b.lags bar chos gsung na// rgyal po'i bu de yi ni bsam pa dang// bla med sems
kyang rab byung mkhyenanas nii/ mos pa'i gnas la pha rol phyin pa yis// de la ting 'dzan zhi ba 'di bshad do// gang tshe bde bar gshegs pas gsung phyung ba// de tshanags tshal bcas pa'i
sa yang g.yos// nam mkha' lasazhim togachar yang bab/ sa la sa pa rlu brgya dag byung bar gyur// ston pa don gyi tshig la rab bslabs pas// bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dren pas lung
na// bstan te// mi yi dbang pos ting 'dzani zhi ba bshad// de yi don tshig rnams kyang ma nyan par gyis// srid pa thams cad srid pa med pa ste/// kun brtags gsog
dang smig rgyu 'dra ba yin// sgyum ji bzhin glogs dang snga'i 'dra ste// stong g.yo bdag dang sems can srog kun med// gzod gnas ni stong zhing ma 'ongs chos// song ba med cing
gnas med gnas kyis dben// sgyuma'i rang bzhin rtag du snying po med/ thams cad dag cing rnamadoganam mkha' bzhin// ma sde mi ser dkar bo ma yin te// mang na gsog gyur
sgra yaM rang bzhin yin// sems ni dban zhing sems med rang bzhin tu// skad cig yin pas thams cad sgra dang bral// bshad pa na yang yi ge 'kho ba med// ma bshad na yang
yi ge 'drer mi 'gyur// yi ge dag ni phyogs su'ang ma 'gro ste// yi ge ganganus kyang n 'ongs ma yin// yi ga sa zad zad cing 'gags pa ste// bshad par byas bsama bshad par
lham byas kyang/ yi ga 'a de dag rtag par ma zad brjod// gang gis yongs shes de'ad zad mi 'gyur// chos n stong phrag brgya dag rab brjod nas// sangs rgyas brgya stong dang ni/
gang 'das pa// chos kyang ma zad yig zad ma gyur// skye ba'ang med de da phyir ma zad pa// gang gis ma zad chos rnams rab shes pa// rtag tu mi zad pa yi chos shes
bas mdo sde brgya stong dag na bshad byas kyang// chos rnams thams cad yi ge med par shes// rgyal ba'i chos zhi gang dag rab ston la// de yang mi zad pas na ma mthong ste//
chos 'di snga nus bdagamed sems can med// de dgarab du ston kyang zad ma 'gyur// mkhas pa de tshig kun sna byed kyang// tshig gis sems n 'phrogs par mi 'gyur te// ga
rnams thams cad ro yi brag cha bzhin// da pa nam yang tshig la chags mi 'gyur/ da ni sgyu ma'i tshig gis chos ston to// tshig de thams cad de yi med la 'gags// tshig de yi
mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba// chos rnams kun kyang mtshan nyid de 'drar gyur// chos kun mtshan gzhi med cing mtshan gzhi khral// thams cad mtshan med mtshan nyid rnam par dag/ rtag tu dben/
zhing gtsang ba nam mkha' bzhin// mdor na de dag bgrangabar nyer mi 'gyur// 'dus byas 'dus ma byas kun dben pa ste// drang srong de dag lani rnam rtog med// 'gro ba kun tu 'dus
ma byas thob pas// ltab dgra las bar mor rnam par dben// gang dag 'di 'dra'i chos rnams shes pa ni// rtag du ma chagasam gtumam rmongs te// de yis sems ni ring bzhi'i
mnyam par gzhag/ dan ting 'dzin stobs can stobs dang ldan// brag phug ri dang gcong rong klung rnams su// rkyen gyis ji ltar brag cha 'byung ba ltar// de bzhin 'dus byas
'di kun rig par gyis// 'jig rten thams cad sgyu ma sbag rgyu bzhin// gang du ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad dang// yon tan chog su gyur ba shes rab stobs//
drang srod ye shes stobs kyis mngon par shes// tshigazhi thabs mkhas pa yi nges pa'i tshig/ brtags pa tsam du brtags naas brjod pa yin// 'khor ban ni mtha' ma mi rnyed de//
k+Sha gang dag sngon byung mtha'ani mtshan nyid med/ ma 'ongs dus kyadangashes par bya ba'i phyig/ las dang bya bas de ltar zhugs gyur te// rab dang tham dag tu 'ang 'byung bar 'gyur// chos rnams
rtag tu dben zhing rang bzhin stong// thams cad bdag med par yang shes par gyis// kun rdzob tu ni rgyal bas chos bshad// 'dus byas 'dus byas ma yin de ltar stes// yang
dag nyid du bdag dang ming med de// 'gro ba kun gyi mtshan nyid de 'dra'o// dge dang nag po'i las rnams mi 'jig ste// bdag gis byas ba dgan myong bar 'gyur// las kyi 'bras
du 'pho bar m 'gyur te// rgyu med par yod myong bar mi 'gyur ro// srid pa thums cad sgyum dbang med// gsog dang gsob tu gyur ba dbu ba bzhin// sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur rtagatu
stong sgra yis de bshad do dag dben dang yin// de ltar rnam par rig parlom sems med// tshul khrims la yang chags pa med pa'i sems// bzod pa'i stobs kyis cung zad mi/
rtog ste// de ltar spyod pa mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur// rgyal ba des nI tsam chos rig pa// de tsam du ni rgyal ba des bshad do/ rgyal pos rgyal ba'i chos 'dra byosanas/
'khor dang bcas pas bslab pa yang dag bzung/ rgyal po'i bu des ting 'azhi 'di mnyan nas// dga' zhing yid ra ngas tshig kyang 'di skad smra// shin tu legs par ting 'dzin de bshad/
khyod kyi zhabs la bdagazhi phyag 'tshal la// der yang srog chags stong phrag brgyad cu yang// yang dag don dam des bar bstan pa 'di// chos kyi rang bzhin bzang po 'di thos nas//
de dag mi skya ba yi bzod pa thob// skyes phu la ni skye dang 'gags pa med// de bzhin chos 'di rtag tu sn gnas dban// da ltar rab shas yongs sum 'bri ste// rgyal po'i mi skye
bzod pa thob par gyur// de tshe rgyal ba rgyal sridi rnams spangs te// rgyal ba de yi bstan la rab tu byung// rgyul po'i sras kyang lo brgya mi nyung ba// de dag kun kyang rjes su rab tu byung//
rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rab byung nas// du tshe srog chags mang po stongagazhan yang// bde bar gshegs pa'i drung du rab tu byung// rgyal ba de la chos rnams tshol bar byed/ lo brgya phrag
nyishur yongs tshang bar// rgyal ba des ni chos rnams rab tu bshad// rgyal babur bas skye bor bcas pa yis// lo yang brgya phrag nyi shur chos rnams spyad// de nas dus kyang gzhan
0 @# du gyur pa'i tshe// rgyal ba de yang yongs su mna'adas// rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'das par gyug/ de yi chos rnams kyani nyung bar gyur// da tshargyal//
ba po de yi bu yod pa// bsod nams blo gros dad cing dad bste// de yi ma du nyer 'gro dag slong yod// dusanIting 'dzazhi zhi ba 'di yang bshad/ gdan 'jam zhing mnyen par gyur ba/
wA ste srog chags brgya stong dag gis bkur sti byas// lha yang thob brgya dag phyi'i 'phreng zhing// grong du 'ongs nas bsngags pa brjod par byed// dan dran dang ldan zhing rtogs
bar ldan// brtul zhugs 'chang zhing des pa tshul khrims dga'// dbyangs kyang snyan cings rtsub 'jamakha ste// khams rnams shes pa'i dbang mchog rab du thog/ dge slong drin snyan
pa'i bodatsas bya// chos gos bya ba brgya yang rab du nyid// de yi bsod nams stobasan mi bzod bas// de tsho dag slong dag ni phrag dog skyes/ bsod nams stobs ldan gzugs kyi stobs
rnams dang// ye shes stobs dang rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang/ tshul khrims stobs dang ting 'azhi stobs rnams dang// chos kyi stobs kyis dag slong yang dag 'phags// skye bo'i
la yid du 'ong zhing bdas pa ste// dge slong dge bsnyen dang dge slong ma// rgyal ba'i bstan la sems can gang dad pa// de dag gis mchod mi bkur ba yin/ rgyal po'i dus der
yang gdabyung ga/ bsod nams blo gros rtag tu dadams te// dag slobagad pa yid 'khruga'a gnas // slob dpon de la srung ba byed du btsud// srog chags dag ni steng phrag lnga brgya/
rnams// go bgos mtshon cha ral gridabyig thogs pa// de dag gisan dge slong rtag tu bskur/ yang dag spyod pa mu meda'achadang sna/ de'i 'khor la chos rnams rab ston te// chos 'di
bdag med stong ba srog med 'chad// dmigs par lta ba bdag la chags pa rnams// de dag dag slong ci bsam phyid// su dag stong pa zhi ba mi 'dod pas// dge slong 'di'i chos min rab
ston gyis/ 'di bsadanan bsod nams 'gyur ba sogs// dge slongo dgazhi lagazha mtshon thogs 'ongs mgronas dge slong mtshon gyis ma 'jigs te// 'di la sems can skyes bu
gsod pa med// chos 'di rnams n gsog ste rtsig pa 'dra// stong pa nyid kyi chos rnams rjes sudran// dge slong don spyi bor thal sbyar to// tshig smras rgyal ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
bden pa gang gis chos 'di bstan na// mtshonacha 'di rnams me tog mnaragyur// thub batshul khrims brtul zhugs ldan pa yis// gzhan dum 'gyur tshig 'di las ma thag nags/
tshul bcas pa'i sa yad rab tu g.yos// mtshon cha de dam togaman+tar gyur// dmigs pa can dag mtshon cha thogs pa yi// dge slong de tsho lus n zhum gyur nas// tshur
yang de dang nye bar 'ongam nus// skrag cing shin tu ngomatshar n por gyur// su dag thub dbang lan dad mos shing// gang dag stong pa zhi ba 'dod pa rnams
cig dadag a la la stong brjod nas su// rasabacos brgya yis dag slad man par g.yogs// dag slong donod la byams bskyed nas// sems can su dag nga 'a sdod byed pa//
de dag phyir na byang chub bdag spyod ces// skye bo thams cad kyi yang mdun du smra// des na lo yang brgyad du ma nyung bar// steng pa rgyal ba rnams kyi mdzod bshadud// phyir rgol ba
yang dag slong stong dag byung// de dag rgyal po'i bu yis phyi'i bzlog byas// de yang de tshe yongs su banas gyur te// de yi dge slong dag kyang nyung bar 'gyur// de tsho mi snyan pa yi/
tshig thos kyang// bzod pa'i stobs las nam yang nyams ma gyur// don gzhan gyi dus su gyur pa'i m// srog chags brgyu dag ga gi yang don chen byas// bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyad
rgyurjes su dran// bsod nams blo gros dga' ba chen pa skyes// der yang ra ma rgya cher byas nas ni// dag skyong de la bsod nams blo gros sna ]/bdagagi slob dpon la ni su yis kyang
sems la ma 'thad pa zhig ma bgyis sam// des smras rgyal sras gzhon nu gsan du gsal// bzod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'byung// su yis bdag la mi snyan tshig
smras pa// de la bdagazhi byams pa rgya che yang// gang gas bskal pa stong phrag brgya dag tu// sngon gyi srid pa lazhi bzod bsgoms pa// dge slong snyan khyod de nga yin zhes// bcom/
ldan shAkya thub pas tshig brjod do// gang gis dge slong snyan 'od bsrung pa gi/ bsod nams blo gros rgyal po'i bu de ni// tshorabs steng du da yi grogs gyur to// sangs rgyas
byams bar san lung bstan to// gang gis stago ba tshogs kyi dbang phyug mchod// gang gis gnas khang bzang mchogabyas pa// gang sngon ma tog bzang zhes bya ba de/ rkang gnyis
gtso bo mi yi dbang por gyur// de ltar bskal pa mang po mtha' yas pa'i// rgyal ba dag gi dam chos ngas bzung ste// ngas sngon bzod pa'i stobs kyang yang dag bsgrubs// gzhon
nu thosanas yi rjes su slobs/zhi myu ngan 'das gyur phyi ma'i tshe// dam pa'i chos ni rnam par 'jig na// dgo slongamu stegs blo la brtson pa dag/ de dag da yi zhi ba'i chos la
spong khengs shing rgod 'gadum zhing smra rtoyache// sdig pa'igrogs po'i zas la zhugs pa dag/ chos gos lhung bzed drag la chags shing brkam// nad la gnas shing de dag chos la/
spyod de dag yid gtum zhe sdang byas mi gzo// dma' ba'i rigs dang dbul ba'irigs las// nga yi bstan pa 'di la rab byung nas// de dag zhi ba'i chos 'di spong bar byed//
bdud kyi blo yis sems can mun gtibs shing// 'dod chags dbang du song bsaman par chags// gti mug dbang gis byas pa rmongs pas na// de dag stong
ba zhiba'i chos mi 'dod// drag slong dge slong ma dang khyim pa rnams// sdig pa'i blo yis 'dzin bcug rmongs byas te// de dag dbang du rtag par song gyur pas// phyi ma'i dusal byang chub sbyong
bar byed// du yi tshig 'di gzhon nu shos nas su// dge slong dgon ba pa dag rtag tu stan// su dag stong da sha la dga' ban/ de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'di bzung ba na// su dag
ting 'dzin 'di ni 'dzazhigyur pa// de dgang yi bstan la rab byung zhing// dge slong bsnyen rdzogs gso sbyong las rnams byas// zas la mchugs mi brkam za ba yin// lus dang
srog la lta ba rang sbyong la// stong pa shin tu zhib sgam par gyis// brtson zhing rab tu brtson pa'i yid kyis kyang// ri dgas bzhin du dgon par gnas par gyis// rgyal ba
rgyudag la rtag tu mchod pa gyis// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba gnas khang gis// bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten mchod par gyis// ting 'dzin 'di na myur du thob par
'gyur// byang chub phyir na sems kyang bskyed kyis la// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi mchod rtan dag/ gser gyis brgyan cing dngul gyis bskus pa dang// rin chen sna tshogs
ma/ gzugs legs byed du nug/ byang chub phyir na yi dam bca' bgyi la// 'jig rten mchod pa bzang ba ji snyed pa// lha dang mi yi dga' bar 'gyur ba rnams// thams cad
tshol la sangs rgyas mchod pa gyis// chos nyid du yang ma dbang thams cad ltos// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na gad ba zhugs da/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa kun snang ste/
chos nyid kyis ni sangs rgyas mngon sum bzhugs// gtod pa kun la shin tu mos par gyis// tshul khrims dug par gyur cing bstan pa'i sems// bzod la dga' zhad rtagatu/
byams la dga'// chos rnams grams cad stong par shes par gyis// ma zhum ma god brtson 'grus rab bskyed la// bsam gtan dga' zhing rab du dban la mos// shes
rab rnam dag shes rab rub shesakyis// ring por mi thogs snying rje ldan par 'gyur// mi gtsang bas ni 'dod chags rtag zhigyis// bzod pa'i stobs kyis zhisdang tshar chod cig/
shes rab stobs kyis gti mug gsal bar gyis// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// lus n snying po med cing dbu ba 'dra// sdug bsngal rul ba dri da pa sgom par
gyis phung bo thams cad ga srog tu shes par gyis// ye shes bla med myur du thob par 'gyur// bdag dang skyes bu dang ni srog rnams su// sdig pa'i lta ba nam yang na 'dzin
cing / chos rnams thams cad stong par shes par gyis// bla med byang chub myur du reg par 'gyur// nad la rnags par nam yang ma byed cig bras/
ka dmasam rnyedazhu yang gdung ma byed// bstod dang smad ba dag gis ma g.yo bar/ ri rab bzhin du rab du ma 'gul gyis// gus pa skyed la chos rnams btsal ba'agyis//
zla thos nas de tshod yad myong bar gyis// rgyal ba kun gyi spyod yul gnasagyis dang// bde ba can gyi zhing du myur du 'gro// 'gro ba kun la sems kyang mnyam gyis la// sdug dang
mi sdug pa yi sems ma byed// rnyed dang snyan pa dag ni ma tshol// myur du sangs rgyas thub pa'i dbang par 'gyur// yon tan gang thos sems can dad 'gyur zhing// sangs rgyas
yon tan dag la mas skyed ga/ yang dag yon tan nges pa'i tshig rnams kyis// sangs rgyas yon tan rtag du bshad par gyis/ rtag tu slob dpon dang ni pha dang ma// de bzhin 'gro ba
kun l gus par gyis/ nga rgyal dag gi dbang du ma'agro shig/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams thob par 'gyur// 'du'adza dag ni ma lus rnam spangs nas// rtag tu dben pa/
la yang dga' bar gyis/ des shing brtul shugs bzang la rtag tu zhi// bdag la phan zhing sems can gzhan la ban// byams pa dang zhi snying rje sgom par gyis// dga' dang btang
snyoms la yang rtag mes gyis// rtag tu rgyal ba'i bstan pa rjes su ltos// 'jig rten du yang myur du ban byed 'gyur// sdig pa'i grog de nam yang ma sten ba// grogs po gang dag
rgya chasten par gyis// su dag ston pa zhi ba 'di 'dod pa// de dag byang chub mchog la zhugs pa yin// nyan thos sar ni nam yang ma slob cig/ de yi spyod la'ang dga' bar/
ma byed cig sangs rgyas yon tan drag la sems ma btang// myur du sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang par 'gyur// bden tshig dam pa rtag du smra bar gyis// brdzun rnams dngan rtsub
mo'i tshig ma s+sa/ rtag tu 'jam zhing dga' ba sna bar gyis// 'jig rten slob dpon dag gi gsung thob 'gyur// lus dang srog la chags par ma byed cig/ gzhan la smad cing
bdag la bstod ma byed// bdag gi yon tan yang dag sgrubagyis la/ de gzhan gyi spyod pa dag la btang snyoms gyis// rnam thar stong la rtag tu dga' bar gyis/ 'gro ba rnams su smon
par ma byed cig/ mtshan ma thams cad ma lus rnam par sbyong// rtag tu mtshan ma med la gnas par gyis// dusa kun tu ni mtha' yang rnam par spong// rtag dang chad la gnas par
mgyur cig/ thams cad rkyen las gyur bar rtag rig gyis// de ltar byas n ston pa ji bzhin 'gyur// 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnams la dga' ba spangs// zhe sdang tha ba drim rnam sngangs shing
gti mug mun ba thams cad rnam bsal na// zhu bar dga' ba'i mi yi seng ge r 'gyur// rtag par mi rtag par yang rtag tu ltas// srid pa kun gyi sdug bsngal
bde 'grol zhing// bdag dang gtsang lam gtsang bdag med par// bsgom par byas n ni yi dwabang por 'gyur// 'jig rten sgron mdzad rgyal ba rnams kyis ni// gang la tshul bzhin
chos rnams rab bstan pa// de yi sa bdudakyi stobs rnams bcom nas su// blon med pa'i byang chub yangs pa 'thob// yon tan ji snyed ngas bshad thob byas te// nyes pa brgya
dag ngasan gang bstan pa// rnam par sbyang san slob par byed pan// gzhon nu de tsho 'dir yang sangs rgyas 'gyur/ snyan pa'i bod kyi le'u ste sum cu brgyud pa'o/
bam po bcu bzhi pa// de nas yang bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur ba la bka' stsal pa/ da lta bsan gzhon nu lus kyi sdom bas bsdam par
bya'o/ zhes gzhon nu de ltar bslab par bya// gzhon nu de la lus kyi sdom pa gang zhin/ lus kyi sdom ba gang dang ldan pas ]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams
chad la chags pa med par 'gyur ba de ni lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ gzhon nu lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dbang chen bo skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
gnyis thob par 'gyur ba de ni lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob par 'gyur ba/
da na lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs bcu thob pa dang/ mi 'jig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob par 'gyur pa 'di ni lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i sgra
gsum 'gro ba ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum 'thob par 'gyur pa 'dri na gzhon/
nu lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa tshangs pa'i gnas pachen po bzhi 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
byams pa chen po dang/ snying rjen pa dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen pa dang/ tshungs ba'i gnas pa chen po 'di bzhi 'thob par 'gyur pa 'di ni gzhonanu lus kyi sdom pa
zhes bya'o// lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa so so yang dag par rig bab bzhi 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag
par rig pa dang/ chos so sold dag par rig pa dang/ nges pa'i tshig go sa yang dag par rig pa dang/ stobs ba so so yang dag bar 'ug pa dang/
so so yang dag bar rig pa 'di bzhi 'thob par 'gyur pa 'di ni gzhon nu lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'a thob ste/ sum cu rtsa bdun gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhidang/
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ byang nub kyi phyogs kyi
rnyos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag thob par 'gyur dag dan lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// lus kyi sdom pa gang dung ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying chen
bo la gnas pa'i shob pa dang/ btang snyoms chen po la gnas pa 'thob pa dang/ bden pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'thob pa dang/ rab tu dben pa'i chos rnams 'thob par gyur pa de ni gzhon
nu lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gzhon nu lus kyi sdom ba gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog gcod pa spong bar 'gyur ba dang ma byin len
ba dang/ mi tshangs par spyod pa dang/ rdzun du smra ba dang/ phra ma'i tshig dang/ tshig rtsub mo dang/ khyal pa sla ba dang/ brnab sems dang/ gnod sems dang/ log par lta ba dang/ slob
la g.yo byed pa dang/ tshad la g.yo byed pa dang/ nor la g.yo byed pa dang/ bzung ba dang/ bcing ba dang/ bca'o kha dang/ brdag pa dang/ bsdigs pa dang/ bcad pa dang/ dbug pa dang/
zhe la gnon pa dang/ rgyags pa dang/ ser sham sbrangs par 'gyur ba drang/ lag pa rgod pa dang/ rkang par rgod pa dang/ rkang lag ma bsdams pa dang/ de'i lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi
gnas ngan len spangs shing tA la'i mgo bcad pa bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi skye ba'i chos can du 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu de'i lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// gzhon nu de lta bas na/ rnam
grangs 'das kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gzhon nu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusano/ bskal pa grangasamed pa bas kyang ches grangs pa/ yangs pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi
khyab pa de'i tshe de'i dusan/ ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan ba/ bde bar gshegs/
pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ gzhon nu de'i
[t#/ de'i dusan/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ngos rgyas pa'i cha'i tshadaka lo bya ba phrag drug cu/
[D] gyur to// dgrwa bcom pa bye ba phrag drug cu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun byung// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pa'i chos yodas su 'dzin pa yang dpag tu med pa byung ngo//
gzhon nu de'i tshod 'i dusan rgyal khyad par sems zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rgyal po khyad par sems de srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i drud du
'ongs// khongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la'an gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do// rgyal po
khyad par sems phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byed do// de nas ye shes snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ rgyal pa khyad par sems 'khor dang bcas pa lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las lus kyi sdom pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor
'jug pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan to// ji ltar bar snang nam mkha' rnam dag ste// shin tu dag cing rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// de bzhin lus
ka kyi sdom pa dag pa yang// dbyangs kyis bstan pas nam yang nus ma 'gyur// lus kyi sdom pa 'dri na dben zhing stod// 'di 'dra gnyis pa lus kyi tshan nyid de/
mtshan nyid med par bar snang bzhin/ lus kyi sdom pa de yi mtshan nyid bshad// sdom pa'i mtshan nyid de 'dra'asus shes/ de la sdom pa'i m yang med mi 'gyur// mi
'jug de yi spyod yul ga la yin// zag bamed na skye ba med// gzugs dang longs spyod lan srid bskyodazhes// 'dod pa dag la ston pasam nus te/ srid pa dag gis
nyos pa mi shes pas// lus kyi sdom 'don shes mi nus// zag med stong pa dag gis rab shas pa// de la skye kham yang yod ma 'gyur// dgra bcom pa ya chos zhi 'dra
ste mu stegs can gyis shes par sla ma yin// gang dag khams gsum kun la yid skug cing// 'dod pa'i longs spyod la yang 'dod mi bskyed// rgyal bo'i srid dang longs spyod
yong mi 'dod// de dgalus kyi sdom pa 'di badrashes// lus kyi sdom pa 'din don cis bya/ dgon sgra yis bstan par minus te// 'di 'dra'i chos kyi tshulani gang nas ba// de ni/
snyeg pa 'di la gnas pa yin// don la zhugs la ngasan zhabastan to// mkhas pa su dgadon gyi tshul la mos// don med rnam spangs don la gnas ba rnams// de dag sdom la
rtag tu gnas pa yis// rgyul ba'i bstan la don du gang brjod dang// ji lta bur ni don yin rnam rig ste// don tshul rang bzhin gang gis shes pa ni/
cig lus kyi sdom pa la yang gnas shes bya// gang gis bdagamod gsog dang stong nyid dang// mtshan ma med ba rnam par rig gyur pa// de la nam yang sdom pa medamigyur/
'di ltar dis na yang drag dus la bslabs// dngos po dag drados med gang rig ga/ da ni das po dag la yong ma gos// dngos po kun lanam yang mIrtags ba//
danAmtshan med ting 'dzin rig par 'gyur// ngo bo nyid stong rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ bdag med chos rnams de yis rnam rigan// dolanam yang sdom pa medami 'gyur/ ]
'di ltar dusani yang dag des par rtogs// gang gis phung lnga rnams stong bar shes// rang bzhin stong zhing bdag med riganan// lus kyi las gang yang dag spyod byed pa// dol
nam yang sdom pa med na 'gyur// mtshan ma dag la 'dzin cingam bsdams te// khor mor bdag tu 'du shes rab gnas pa// gzugs la chags par gyur pa'i skye bo dag/ ma
bsdams pa yi 'dod chags rab tu ldang// gang rnams yang dag mtha' la bslabs gyur cing// stong pa rtogs par rig pa nges kha dag/ sdoma med gang gis ngan 'gror 'gro ba yi// 'dod
chags de la nam yang sdang ba med// ji ltar rab dgazhi chen po la// grog ma kun gyis g.yos shing 'gul mi nus/ de bzhin mkhas pa yang dag tshul bslabs pa// lha yi
gzugs kyis kyang ni dam g.yos// nam mkha' lan ri mor brinus shing// lag pas nam mkha'i gzung du rung gyur kyang// 'dod chags zhe sdang bdud rnams bye ba yis//
da la rnam par bskyod par yong mi nus// la las brag cha dga' bzunganus shing// nu yi steng na rdo yang ' phyol gyurakyang// lus kyi sdom pa 'di 'dra susu bslabs pas// dmi/
bsam pa dag kyang bltar mi nus// 'jig rten kun n sgrumangaji snyed pa// bzung ste bsgom du bzhugs par zhus gyur kyang/ lus kyi rtsom pa'i gnas dang mi gnas pa// sus kyang
rnam par rig par byed mi nus// sngon las sgra bsgrags glog rnams rgyu ba dang// nyi ma'i 'khor las 'od zer bzung nus kyang// lus kyi sdom pa 'di la sus bslabs pa// de yi rang
bzhin shes par nus ma 'gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir ldang ba ni// rgyu dang su yis bzung bar nus gyur kyang// lus kyi sderma pa 'di la gang gnas pa// de yi lus ni
mas kyang shes ma nus// srog chagasakun gyi spyod yul de ma yin// sems sdom gang la mkhas pa de gnas shing// spyod yul gang gnas lus kyi sdom pa ni/ 'jig rten
chos kyis ma gos nam mkha' bzhin// phyogs bzhi nam ma kha la la ni rgyu ba yi// srog chags kun rjes so sor lta' nus kyang// de yi lus dang sems kyi//
spyod yul la// tshad gzung bar n su'anganus pa med// lus kyi sdom pa 'di la gnas pa yi// nyon mongs rnam mang thams cad med par 'gyur// de yi nyon mongs lte ba rab du phrad/
'di ltar des ni lus kyi sdom pa bslabs// de la mtshon chu dang mes mi tshugag/ de ltar de'i lus ni gzung du med// den zhi ba rab zhi ting 'tsho gnas// 'di ltar des n/
lus kyi sdom pa bslabs// da ltar gnas pa 'jigs med skrag pa med// de la 'brug sems mi skye phrag dog med// lus kyi sdom pa 'di 'dra sus bslabs pa// de ni
gtse ba kun las thar pa yin// dug dang mtshon gyis nAms kyang ma 'jigs shing// mo dang chu yi nang na'ang 'jigs pa med// lus kyi sdom pa 'di 'dra sus bslabs pa// de
ni gtsob kun las thar pa yin// chom rkun g.yon can sdig pa byed pa dang// sbrul gdugs nang du song yang 'jigs pa med// 'di ltar de ni bdag tu 'du shes med// bdu shas
rnam par grol la 'jigs mi 'gyur// 'jigs las rnam par grol ba skrag mi skye// skrag pa med la g.yo bam bltung ste// mi g.yo ba la skrag pa ga' yod// de ni bdud rnams
0 bye bas bskyod mi nus// chos rnams sems pa rnams la 'an pa'i phyir// sdom pa gang spyod bshad cing rab bstan pa/ 'di 'dra'i lus kyi ston pa sus bslabs pa// dbu
bdud rnams bya bas bskyod mi nus// chos rnams kun la ye shes thogs pa med// dpe byad bzang par brgyud yongs su tshang// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi ra ma dag/ sngog
bar gnas la rted par dka' mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam gyis khyab cing/ tshod kyang med par rtogs par su 'dod pa// 'di 'dra'i lus kyi sdom pa des slobs shig/
'jig rten thams cad kyi yang mchod rten 'gyur// sangs rgyas stobs na stobs bcu bsam ma phyag/ drang srong chen po'i chos 'adi gang 'dod pa// des ni lus kyi sdom pa 'di 'dra
slobs// gang slob de la stobs rnams rnyed ma dka'// 'di 'dra'ilus kyi sdom la gang slob pa// sangs rgyas nosan ma 'dres bco brgyad do// rgyal ba gda'/ rab tu gnas
pa yang// de dag de la rnyed par dka' ma 'gyur// 'di 'dra'i lus kyi sdom pa grang slob pa// drang srong chen po'i byang chub yan lag bdun// sas yang dag rig dang rdzu
'phrul rkang// dal de dag rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang bsam gtan dang// rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams gang bshad pa/ bde ba'i rnam rtog
'ad @#// rab tu dben pa yang// sdom par gnas pa lan snying gi dka'// lus kyi sdom pa la ni gang gnas pa// snying rje'i gnas dang btang snyom sa klob bar 'gyur// dang zhin
spyod pa 'jug pa byams pa 'i mchog/ 'gro ba kun la'ang phan pa'i sems su 'gyur/ dran pa nyer gzhag yang dag spong ba dang// drang srong chen po'i dbang lnga stobs lta dang//
'phags pa'i lam mchog yan lag brgyad pa yang// lus kyi sdom par gnas la red mdaka'// gzhan yang dram pas nags rgyas chos rnams na/ bsam gyis mi khyab gang la
tshud med pa// lus kyi sdom pa 'di 'drasus bslabs ba/ de la thams cad rnyed par dka' ma 'gyur// 'di 'dra'i lus kyi sdom pa thos nas ni// rgyal po glang mchog khyad par thob gyur
da dga' ba mtshungs med rangs shing mgu ba skyes// rgyal ba de yi bstan la rang du byung// rab tu dbyung lo yang bye brag bcur// tshangs par spyod mchog gtsang ma spyad par gyug/
lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phan pa'i phyir// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la yang bsgom pa byas/ tshangs pa'i gnas la shin tu bsgom byas pas// sangs rgyas bye ba brgyud mthong bar
gyur de las lhag par gang+gA'i byam snyed/ de ni tshangs spyod mchog bad rab tu spyad// thams cad kyi yang bastan par rab byungaste// tshangs bar spyod pa bzang zhing dag par spyad
mang du thos shing sbubs par ldan pa yi// dge slong chos snab lunga mchog tu gyur// lus kyi sdom ba 'dazhi ra ba shes// tshul khrims mu la tshul khrims skyon med 'gyur// tshul/
khrims rnam dag tshul khrims 'dres pa med// 'phags pa'i tshul khrims zag pa med la gnas// de tshe rgyal po glanga mchog khyad par sems/ gzhon nu gzhan zhig yin par
sems gyur na// da ni gzhan zhig yin par mi blta ste// ngan spyad pa spyod tshe der gyur to// de phyir gzhon nu nga yi rjes slobs la/ lus kyi sdom pa 'di la gnas pa
srog chags bya ba gzhan la'ang rab ston pa// ring por ma thogs ji bzhin nga 'drar 'gyur/ danas yang bcom ldan 'dras kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka'
stsal pa// gzhon nu de lta bsan/ lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya zhes gzhon nu de ltar khyod kyis bslabs par bya'o/ decaba'i zhen/ gzhon nu lus kyi spyod pa yangs
su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chon po ni sems can dmyal ba dag la mi 'jigs/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang na song dag gis 'jigs
bar mi 'gyur ro// nus ma 'jigs/mes ma 'jigs/ ngug dang/ mtshon dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang drod dang/ bol glang dang/ glang khyu ba dang/mi dang mi ma yin/
pa dag gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// gzhon nu lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ stong gsum gyi steng nan
du/ po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gamathil du bzhag ste/ ta la gcig tsam mam/ ta la gnyis tsam mam/ ta la gsum tsam mam/ tA la bzhi tsam mam/ ta la lta tsamamamag
tu la drug tsam mam/ tul bdun tsam du steng du 'a phen to// ji tsam du 'dod pa de tsam du rang 'ben to// gzhan yang gzhon nu lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems da pa'i
sems dpa' chen po ni myu 'phrulagyi cho 'phrul mchog gi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/ da rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par smin gam par dag pa'i bsod nams yongs su bzung zhing dben pas/
[ ]dwaban par gyur te/ thams cad du rjes su song zhing de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas zag pamed pa bsod nams yongs su rdzogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i
mig du gyur pa yin a de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de la rdzu 'phrul gang zhen/ gang 'grub pa dang/ smon pa dang/ 'byor pa dang/ yongs su rdzogs pa bden rdzu 'phrul
zhes bya'o// de la rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ rdza'aphrul gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam bamang ba myang bar byed pa yin te/
gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur// mang par gyur nas gcig du gyur// snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar yang 'gyur// rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gror ba la yang thad kar 'gro/
ri la yang mi brogs par 'gro/ nam mkha' la yang 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no// sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang/ byi'u zul byed de/ dperan nu la bya ba bzhi'o
chu la langam nub por 'gro ste/ dper na su'i phung po chen po' bya ba bzhin/ du ba 'thul bar yud byed/ 'bar ba'i yang byadagu dperan ma'i phud pa chen po bzhin no// bdag
gi lus las chu'i rgyun chen po khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'byin te/ dper na sprin tshan pa bzhin no// chu'i rgyun de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bsregs shing
rab tu tshig ste/ mes rab tu 'bar zhing 'bar ba gcig tu gyur ba zhi bar byed de// zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu chab/ 'di ltar gzi brjid cha ba lang lug
par 'dzin cing kun tu nyug par byed do// tshangs pa'i 'jig rtan gyi bar du sems can rnams la lus kyis dbang bsgyur ro/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsung sa// sa la po'u zul byed cing steng byung byed// chu dga' yang thogs pa med par 'gro/ bya bzhin nam mkha'i ngos la 'gro bar byed/
rdzu 'phrul gyisan dung bsgrul 'khur bar byed// ji ltar bar snang lan rlung ma thogs// sngon gyi phung po mang po 'gro ba ltar// de bzhin rnal 'byor pa yang
nam mkha' la// rlung dang sprin bzhin dun thogs med 'gro/ shing rnams me yis tshig tsong 'bar bdagra/ byang glub sems dpa' mkhas pa de mthong nas/ des na rang gi
lus las chu byung ste// bya ba nyidakyi zhing du zhi bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa 'dug bzhin du// nyi zla lan 'gu nga sa yongs su 'dzan// des ni tshangs pa'i
wA'ajig rten nyer rol nas// tshangs pa bya ba dag la chos sten byed// gang tshe de na chos ston 'dod gyur na// stong gsum chen po des na gobar byed// 'dod na de ni zhing mang bye
ba yang// srog chags bye ba mang po chos rnams ston de nas yang bcom ldan akyis/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta pas na/ lus
kyi spyod pa yongs sudag bar khra'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslabs par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhin/ gzhon lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po ni lha'i rna ba'i khams kyi sgra rnams lha dang mi'i dang/ sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams kyi dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi
[e/ ]sgra nye ba'am rgyang dang po yang thos so// gzhan yang gzhon nu lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslabs par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzhon/
nulus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stan la 'dug bzhin du lha'i sna sna'i dbang pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
gyi khams na lha'i yid du 'ongs pa'i chos kyi dri ji snyed yod pa nye ba'ang rung rgyung ring po'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad chor ro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon
nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bsazhu/ lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya'o ]zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslabs par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/
gzhon nu lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dwapa' po ni sems can la rol dang gang zag b.rol gyi sems kyi ma par rtog pa dang/ spyod pa sems kyis
yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems kyang/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/
'dod chags dang bral pa'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rang du shes sa// gongam bzhin du sbyar te/ zhe sdang dang bcas
pa dang/ zhe sdang dang bral ba dang/ gti mug dang bral ba dang/ srid par bcas pa dang/ sred pa dang bral ba dang/ len par bcas ba dang/ len pa dang bral
[r ]ba dang/ bsdus pa dang/ g.yengs pa dang/ log pa dang/ ma log pa dang/ nu par gyur pa dang/ chen por gyur bas yin pa dang/ 'od gsal ba dang/ 'od gsal bas
yin pa dang tshod dang bcas pa dang/ tshad med pa dang/ blan yod pa dang/ blan med pa dang/ mnyam par gzhag pa dang/ mnyam par bzhag pa ma yin pa dang/ ma bar grol
ba dang/ rnam par grol ba ma yin pa dang/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyang/ 'o na mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes go/nyon
mongs pa med pa'i sems kyang nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gzhon nu lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
zla dpa' chen po ni sngon gyi gnas rnam pa dum dran te/ skye ba gcig kyang rjes su dran/ gnyis dang/ gsum dang/ bzhi dang [ ]lnga dang/ brgyudang/ nyi shu dang/ sum cu dang/ bzhi
ba/ dbcu dang/ lnga bcu dang/ skye ba brgya yang rjes su dran no// skye ba stong dang/ skye ba brgya stong dang/ skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar du yang rjes su dran n// sdud pa'i
bskal pa dang/ 'byung ba'i bskal pa yang rjes su dran no// sdud pa dang 'byung ba'i bskal 'du ma'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/ bskal pa yang rjes su dran no/ bskal pa
brgyudang/ bskal ba stong dang/ bskal pa bats+tsha stong dang/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// sngon gyi mtha' khyab bdu yang rjes su drano// bdag
sngan chagam zhig tu skyes te/ ming 'di zhes bya/ rusazhi 'di zhes bya/ rigs na 'dizhis bya kha rdug ni badri 'dra/ zasani 'di lta bu zhig zu 'omo bzhi ba de 'dra/ tshe na 'di'i
zhig grub/ kun 'adi srid cig tu gnas/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal nA'adi lta bu zhig myong/ don sashi'[W]nas chagam zhig tu skyes te/ de nas yang shi 'phos na byang 'dir skyes
se zhes ma pa dang bcas pa dang/ yul phyogs dang bcas pa dang/ gzhi ci las gyur pa dang pas bar sngon gyi nas rnam pa du ma yang dag par rdzas sushazhi/ gzhon nu lus kyi
spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dang/ kha dog bzang
ba dang kha dog ngan pa dang/ bde 'gror song ba dang/ ngan 'gror song ba dang/ na pa dang/ bzang po dang/ bzang 'gror 'gro ba dang/ ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i sems nadams lasabazhin du
nye bar 'gro ba dag kyang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sems can 'di rnams na lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis nyes par sbyod pa/
ka dang ldan/ yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan te/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa log par lta ba dag log par lta ba yang dgapala'adzinapa'irgyus/lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'grorasems
can dmyal ba rnams su skyes sa// sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyailegs par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan yid kyis legs par spyod ba dang ldan
de 'phags pa rnams la mi bskur ba yang dag par lta ba dag yang dag bal bung ba'i rgyus/lus zhi gnas shi ba'i 'og du bdu 'gror mtho risakyi 'jig rten du lha'i 'jig rten du lha'i nang du
skyes so// des na de ltar lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'dus pas/ sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang/ skye ba dwang/ kha dog bzang ba dang/ kha dog ngan pa dang/ bde gro
[0f7c]da ba dang/ ngan 'gror song ba dang/ ngan pa dang/ bzang dang bzang 'gror 'gro bdang/ ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i sems can las bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
rab tu shes go/ ga zhon nu lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis gad cung zad shes
00 par bya ba dang/ blta bar bya ba dang/ mnyan par bya ba dang/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang/ rnam par 'phrul par bya ba de h+phams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba/
bzhin du rab tu shes so// thos so/ mthong ngo/ rtogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// byang chub sems
dang skyob pa yi// mngon par shes pa'i rim pa bstan/ ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas na// byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya// de dag rna ba rnam sbyong ste// lha yi
rna ba bsamami khyab// sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad pa yi// chos rnams de yi thos par 'gyur// stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khams dag na// lha yi dri rnams
ji snyed yod pa kun// lha yi sna yis ji ltar 'dug bzhin du// byung chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de snom byed/ 'dod chags bcas dang 'dod chags med pa dang// zhe sdang bas
dang zhe sdang bral ba dang// gti mug bcas dang gti mug bral ba yi// sems rnams srog chags kun gyis rab tu shes// bskal pa bye ba stong du ni// gang du de dag sngon
gnas pa// sngon gyi gnas rnams rab tu shes// dudag la ni thogs pa med// de dag mig kyang rnam sbyong ste// blo na med pa lha yi mig/ des na sems can skye ba dang//
ka @#// 'chi ba de dag rab du mthong// skad cig gcig dang ldan pa yi// shes rab kyi ni tshe rabs kun// chos rnams la ni shes bya ba// ci yod pa'i ng
yang dag shes de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na/ ngag gi sdom pas bsdam par bya'o/
zhes khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// gzhon zhu de la ngag gi sdom pa gang zhen/ ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma ba drug
cu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsungs dbyangs sgrogs pa med pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba de na gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o// ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa tshogibatsun pa thob par 'gyur ba de'i/ gzhon nu dag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o// ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'a thob par 'gyur ba de ni/ gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o// ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas/ byung
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob bar 'gyur ba den/ gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o// ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems
