[0f7c]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bzlob pa dang/ mi 'a jigs pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargyad thob par 'gyur ba de ni//
gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems druba'achan po rnam par krar pa'i sgo gsum 'thob ste/ gsum gang zhizhu//
'di lta ste stong ba nyid dang/ mtshan mumed pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'dagasum 'thob bar gyur ba de ni/ gzhon nu dag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o//
ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po bzhi 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhenu/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa chen po dang/
snying rje chen po dang dga' ba chen pa dang/ btang snyoms chen po dang tshangs pa'i gzhas pa chen po 'di bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni/ gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o// ngag
gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'athob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don sas yang dag par rig
ba dang/ chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ des pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sa so yang dag par rig pa 'di bzhi 'thob
par 'gyur ba de ni/ gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o// ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'thob ste/ sum cu rtsa bdun gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag ba khazhidang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang
dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu bdun pa 'di dag/
'thob par 'gyur ba de ni/ gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ dgagi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po song rjen po la gnas pa 'thob
ba dang/ gtang snyoms chen po la gnas pa 'thob pa dang/ bde ba rnam par rtogs pa'i thob pa dang/ rab tu dben pa'i chos rnams thob par 'gyur ba de'i/ gzhon nu ngag gi sngon
sgrub zhes byago gzhan yang gzhonan ngagag sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog gcod pa spong bar 'gyur ba dang/ ma byin par len pa dang/
mi tshangs par spyod pa dang/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ pha ma'i tshig dang/ tshig rtsub po dang/ khyal par sgrub pas par 'gyur ba dang/ pha ma dang slob dpon dag la mi bden pa'i tshig/
[zok ]mi 'byin pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun lami smod dang/ tshig gzhan la'ang gang nges pa dang ldan pa'i tshig de dag byang chub sems dpas sngangasapa yin te/ tshig de dag
kyang brag cha lta bur shes so// sprul pa lta bu dang/ smig rgyu lta bu dang/ mig yar lta bu dang/ sgyum lta bur 'jug par byed do// de lta bur gyur pas tshigade la mi dmigasami rtog/
rlom sems su mi byed mi lta/ mngon bar chags par mi byed do// gzhonan de ni ngag gi sdom pa zhes go/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyurang
la bka' sul pa/ gzhon zhu de lta bas na/ ngag ga spyod pa yongs su dag par bya'o zhes gzhon nu de ltar khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// gzhon nu ngag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song thams cad kyis mi 'jigs shing/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad
dang mngon par shes pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur te/ gzhon nu de na ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste// ngag gi sdum pa gang dang ldan pa yis// byang chub
sems dpa' de 'ang chos kun la// thogs pa med par gdonami za bar 'gyur// da ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/ ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams// da ni yan lag drug/
tsu mtshungs ldan pa// thogs med bsam las sas rgya sa dbyungs thob pa// da ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya// ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams/ 3/
stobs bcu dang ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams thab 'grub// da ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes pya// ngag gi sdom pa gang gi blo ldan rnams// gang
sngar 'dilas drasan brjod pa yi// sangs rgyas chos kyang thams cad thob 'gyur ba// den ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya// gag sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams// gnas ba dang/
so so yang dag rig/ zhi tu rmad byung chos n bsam yas 'gro ba/ de'i ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya// ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams// dran pa nyer gzhag yang dag spyob
ba dang// de bzhin rdzu 'phrul rkang dang dbang stobs 'thob// den ngag gi sdom pa dazhes bya/ ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams// btang snyoms chen po 'jigs pa med
pa dang// snying rjecan padag pa'i gnas pa 'thob// dan ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/ ngag gi sdom pa gang gis bloldan rnams// bde ba'i rnam rtog rnam par dag pa dang// da bzhin
rnam rtog rab dben zhi ba 'thob// de na ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya// ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams// brdzun dag dang ni 'phramatshigamis khyal pa'i tshogi dang tshig/
[rz, ]rtsub mi skya ba// de'i ngag gi sdom pa de yis khyu// ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams// nam yang dam pa'i chos la sbyong mi byed// sangs rgyas dge 'dun dag kyang ma sbyong
ba rten ngag gi sdom pa de shes bya// ngag gi sdom gang gis blo ldan rnams// pha dang ma dang slob da pon dag gi yang// mdun du ma bdun tshig rnams mi smra ba// dran ngag gis/
sdom pa de zhes bya// ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams// tshig gzhan gang dag skyon dang ldan pa rnams// de dag ma lus par yang spongabar gyur/ dazhingagagi sdom pa de zhes
bya drag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams// tshig rnams kyang n khrag cha 'dra pa dang// rmi lam lta bur 'jigs pa med par 'jug/ dan ngag gi sdom pa de shes bya/ ngag sdom

kha grang rgus blo ldan rnams//bdag med gso mid g.yo ba'i skyes bya/rkyen las skyes ba rmi lam sku pa bzhin// tshig la byang chu sems dpa' gang 'jug pa// dag ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/ 'gog pa rtag du rmi lam ji
bzhin te// mya ngan 'das pa'i ng rmi lam rang bzhin du// tshig la byung chub sems dpa' gang 'jug pa// den ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/ tshig ni gang yang rnyed bar mi 'gyur te//
rtog par mi byed rlom sems dam byed// nam yang mi lta chags par mi byed de// de ni ngag gi sdom pa de shes bya// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ zla 'od gzhon nur
gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bsan/ yid kyi sdom pas bsdams par bya'o zhes khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// yid kyi sdom pa gang
dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chon pa sangs rgyas kyi chos 'jigs pa med pa rnams dang/ mi 'khrugs pa'i sems rnam par grol ba'athob par

'gyur pa de na gnod med kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o//yid kyi sdom pa gangadang ldabs byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur pa dani/ gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa
zhes bya'o// yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bar ba'i bye brag dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'thob par 'gyur pa de/ gzhon
chu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo yan lag drugachu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs bun
sum tshog sab 'thob par gyur pa dazhi/ gzhonan yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig btsun pa 'thob
par 'gyur pa de ni/ gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas/ byang nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'thob/
par 'gyur pa de ni/ gzhon yid kyi sdom pa zhes byag yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpe byad bzang po brgyud cu bzlob par
'gyur pa dazhi/ gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'thob pa dang/
'jigs pa ba zhidang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ba co brgyud 'thob par bgyur ba de ni/ gzhon nu yid kyi sem pa zhes bya'o/ yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems/
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum 'a thob ste/ gsum gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ rnam par
mthar pa'i sgol de gsum 'thob par 'gyur bden/ gzhonanu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i gnas pa
chen po bzhi 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du lta ste/ byams da chen pa dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ dga'i pa chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen dang/ tshangs pa'i gnasalache mtho 'di
pa zhi 'thob par 'gyur ba dani/ gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' mas dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa ba'i thob
ste bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ na so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sa sa sa yang dag bar rig pa dang/ nges pa'i tshigs su yang dag par rig pa dang/
[On ]sbobs pa sa sa yang dag par rig pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa 'di bzhi 'a thob par 'gyur pa de ni/ gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas//
wA byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'thob pa dang/ yang dag par steng ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stabs
lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dani/ gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan
pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen pa la gnas pa 'a thob pa dang/ btang snyoms chen po la gnas pa 'thob pa dang/ bde ba rnam par rtog pa'i thob
ba dang/ rab tu dben pa'i chos rnams 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni/ gzhonan yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// yid kyi sdom ba gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
chan pa phan par 'dod pa dang spyod pa dang/ 'jug pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni/ gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya ba de na yid
kyi sdom pa gangadang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa log par lta ba spangs pa'i phyir/ log par lta ba dang 'grogs par ma khyad// brnab sems spangs pa'i phyir/
brnab sems dang 'grogs par mi byed/ gnod sems sdus pa'i phyir gnod sems drang 'grogs par ma byed/ le'atsho sngangs pa'i phyir le lo'i sems dang 'grogs par ma phyid/ blam rnamAg
pa ma dang slob dpon dag la g.ya' sems mi skyed/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi sems ma skyed cing de dag dang 'grogs par mi byed/ byang chub sems kyang ma gtong/ lhag
nga sems kyang 'khrugs par mi byed ching/ gzhan yang nyes pa dang ldan pa'i yid kyi rtog pa de dag thams rud byang chub sems dpa'i rab du skyong zhing de dag dang ma 'grogs te/ don
gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/ 5da de'ang sgyum lta bu 'o zhes bya ba la 'jug go/ rmi lam lta bu 'o zhes bya ba dang/ smig rgyu lta bu 'o zhes bya ba dang sprul pa lta bu 'o zhes
bya ba dang/ mig yor lta bu 'o zhes bya ba la 'jug ste/ gang nas kyang m 'ongs ba dang gang du'ang ma 'gro bar 'jug go/ bde ba la rmi lam lta bur 'jug go/ rmi lam lta bur mi rtag bar
'jug go/ rmi lam lta bur bdag med par 'jugago/ rmi lam lta bur srog med par 'jug go/ rmi lam lta bur stong par 'jugaste/ yid de yang ma dmigs ma rtog/ rlom sems
ka @#/ su mi byed ma lta/ mngon par mi chags te/ gzhon nu de na yid kyi sdom pa zhes byago/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur/
[n ]ba la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu de lta bas na yid kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya'o zhes/ gzhon nu de ltar khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ gzhon nu yod
kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mi khom pa thams cad rnam par spong zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsamagyis ma khyab pa'i ng 'thob par
'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad las kyang sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa thams cad dang/ mi 'khrugs pa'i sems rnam par grol ba 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni/ gzhon
nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// yid kyi sdom pa dag ni ngas bshad kyis/ g.yab
bamed pa'i yid kyis thams cad nyon// ji ste myur du 'tshang rgya 'dod na yang// nga lasazos nas de lanan tan byos// yid kyi sdom pa gang gis mkhas pa dang/ mchog tu rab zhi
rgya cha mgayo ba// rgyal chos bsam yas rmad du byung ba 'a thob// 'di ni yid kyi sdom pa dag par brjod// yid kyi sdom pa gang gis mkhas pa dag/ sems kyang rnam grol
rtag tu mi g.yo 'thob// de bzhin rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin mchog/ 'di'i yid kyi sdom pa dag par brjod// mkhas pa gang gis nye bar spyod pa yi// 'od zer don chen byed pa sgrub
par byed// gang gis yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs thob pa/ don yid kyi sdom pa rnam dag brjod/ yid kyi sdom pa gang gis mkhas padog/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams
myur thob 'gyur// stobs b.rusangs rgyas yon tan ma lus thob/ dun yid kyi sdom pa mchog tu brjod// yid kyi sdom pa gang gis mkhas pa dag/ so so yang dag rig dang mi
'jigs dang// yon tan mchog tu rmad byung bsam yas 'thob// dani yid kyi sdom pa mchog tu brjod/ yid kyi sdom pa gang gis mkhas pa dag/ dran pa nye bar gzhag dang rdzu 'phrul
rkang yad dug sbyong dang dbang stobs lnga 'thob pa// de ni yid kyi sdem pa mchogatu brjod// yid kyi sdom pa gang gis mkhas ba dag dwatshangs pa'i gnas bzhi ma lus de bzhi te//
steng nyid mtshan mad smonamedasgro'athob pa/ dun yid kyi sdom pa'i mchog tu brjod// yid kyi sdom pa dag dang gang ldan ba// snying rje'i gnas dang btang snyoms chen pa dang//
spyod 'jug byams pa chen po zhi ba 'thob// srid pa kun la den ban sems 'gyur// yid kyi sdom pa gang gis mkhas pa dag/ byang chub yan lag bdun yang myur thob cing/
lam mchog yan lag brgyad pa de bzhin te// dan yid kyi sdom pa mchog tu brjod/ yid kyi sdom pa gang gis mkhas pa dag/ btang snyoms che la gnas pa
[n ]dam pa dang// snying rje gnas mchog drim med pa 'thob// de ni yid kyi sdom pa mchog tu brjod// yid kyi sdom pa gang gis mkhas pa dag/ bde ba'i rnam rtog zhi ba dag pa'i yid//
yon tan phyug pas rab tu dben thob ba// dran yid kyi sdom pa mchog tu brjod// yid kyi sdom pa gang ldan mkhas pa dag/ leg pa'i lta ba ngan dang ma 'grogs shing/ gnod sems
brnab sems skyed dam byed pa// de ni yid kyi sdom pa mchogatu brjod/ yid kyi sdom pa gang ldan makhas pa dug/ skad cig tsam yang tshul 'chos mi byed cing// bla ma la
yang g.yo rgyu ma skyed de// de ni yid kyi sdom pa mchogatu brjod// yid kyi sdom pa gang ldan mkhas pa dag/ 'dod chags zhe sdang yid ni skye mi byed/ de bzhin gang du'ang gti
mugami skyed de// de nas yid kyi sdom pa'i mchog tu brjod// yid kyi sdom pa gang ldan mkhas pa dag/ byang chub las na sems kyang ma gtong zhing/ lhag pa'i bsam pa
dag kyang 'khrugs mi byed// don yod kyi sdom pa mchog ga tu brjod/ yid kyi sdom pa gang ldan mkhas pa dag/ yid kyi nyes pa mang po ji snyed gshen// kun dang lhan cig
0 gzhas pa ram byed pa// de ni yid kyi sdom pa mchog tu brjod// yid la sgyu ma lta bur 'jug byed de// rmi lam 'dra zhing de bzhin smig sgyu badra// rtag tu mig yor gyi mtshan nyid/
da ni yidra kyi sdom pa/ mchog tu brjod// bde ba'i rmi lam lta bur 'jug byed d de bzhin ma rtag steng par thar zug man// yid la de ltar mkhas pa 'jug par byed// de
na yid kyi sdom pa mchog tu brjod/ yid la srog dung sems can med par 'jug/ rkyen las byung ba 'galum bskor ba bzhin/ ga las ma 'ongs gang du mi 'gro ste//
drin yid kyi sdom pa/ mchog tu brjod/ yid de gang na'ang nye bar mdamig shing/ rtog pa med par rlom sems ma byed de// de yang m lta mngon par zhen ma byed/ de ni yid
kyi sdom ba mchog tu brjod// don dam bdabarmi lam 'dra ba dang// mya ngan 'das pa rmi lama mtshungs par 'jug gang gis mkhas pa de ltar 'jug pa yang// de ni
yid kyi sdom pa mchog tu brjod// 'bags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po bco lnga ba ste tha ma'o//// gzhon nu
de la las yongs su dag pa ni 'di lta ste/ srid pa gsum rmi lam lta bur mthong nas/ de la 'dod chags dang bral ba skyed de// gzhon nu 'di ni las yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o//
@#// gzhon nu de la dmigs pa las yang dag par 'da' ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung pa dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams sgyu ma lta bur rig nas/ 'di dag/
'dor pa ste/ 'di ni yang dwag bur 'dab ba zhes bya'o// de la phung po yongs su shes pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ phung pa rnams la smig rgyu lta bur 'jug pa'o// de la khamA
mnyam pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khams rnams sprul ba lta bur nges par spang ba'o// de la skye mched sel ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ skyomachad mig yar lta bur nges par
tshesbyong ba'o// de la sred pa sbyong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos h+phams cad la ma lta ba'o// de la skye ba med pa mngon sum du byed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams
]cad ma dmigs pa'o// de la bya ba la 'jug pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus las byung ba'i sdugabasngal chud mi za ba'o// de la rgyu bstan pa gang zhun/ 'di lta ste
phung nga brag cha lta bur mngon par grub pa'o// de la 'bras bu chud mi za ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ las kyi 'bras bu rmi lam lta bur chud mi za ba'o// de la chos mthong ba
gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ma mthong ba'o// de la lam sgom pa gang zhi na/'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mi dmigs par bsgom pa'o// de la de bzhin
gshags pa dang phrad pa gang zhin/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bslab pa sgrub pa'o// de la shes rab rno ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad skye ba med par
bzod ba'o// de la sems can gyi rjes su 'jug pa shas pa gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i ye shes so// de la chos shes pa gang 'an/
de lta ste/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o// de la so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi tshul yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs
pa'o de la yi ge rab tu dbye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags gsum sbyor bar shes pa dang/ rnam pa dang rnam pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// de la dngos po las yang dag
bar 'da' ba gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ dngos po med par rtogs pa'o// de la dbyangs shes pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brag cha lta bur shes pa'o// de la mchog tu dga' ba 'thob pa gang
zhen 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mi dmigs shing 'gyur ba dang sdug bsngal sdang ba dang khur bor bgo/ de la chos kyi dga' ba myong ba gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ gdams par bya ba/
dang mgu bar bya ba mgatong ba dang/ rang githeg pa'i legs pa mthong ba'o// de la gnas pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rtogs pa'o/ de la drang po gang zhe na/
'di lta ste/ spyod lam bcos pa med pa'o// de la bzhin khro gnyer med pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang med pa'o// de la dge ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste//
'grogs na bde ba'o// da lamanyan pa gang zhin/ 'deltaste/ pha rol la phan pa'i dngos po'o// dal gsong por smra ba gang zhu na/ 'di lta ste tshur shog legs par 'ongs so/
zhes byas pa dang myur du ldang ba'o// de la blam la gus ba gang zhazhu/ 'di lta ste/ blam la 'jigs shing dag ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa// de la bla ma la srid zhubyed
ba gang zhan/ 'ardo ltaste/ bla ma la rim gro dang g.yog bya ba'o// de la skye bas chog shes pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ skye ba thams cad la chags pa med pa'o// de la dkar bo'i
chos kyisamangams ba gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dkar po'ichos thams cad yongasasu tshol zhing dge ba gang yin zhes tshol ba'o// de la 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
rgyu na song gis chog shes pa dang/ tshul 'chos pa med pa dang/ kha gsag med pa dang/ thob kyis 'jal bamed pa dang/ rnyed pas rnyed pa la 'dod pa med pa'o// del dgon par gnas pa mi
gtong ba gang shin/'di lta ste/ dge ba'ichos rnams la bskyon pa mi 'dor zhing bas mthag nas mal la mngon par dga' ba dang/ nags stug po dang[ ]gcong rong dang/ phugadang/ sman shong du
mngon par dga' ba dang/ chos kyi dga' ba myong bar byed pa dang/ khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang ma 'dra ba dang/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshigs su bcad pa la ma chags pa dang/
srid pa stong ba dang/ bsam gtan gyi dga' ba myong ba ste/ 'di'i dgon pa la gnas pa mi gtong ba zhes bya'o// de la sa la gnas ba shes pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi
'bras bu rnam par bzhag pa shes pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyis rnam par gzhag pa shes pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnam par bzhag pa shes pa'o// de la dran pa ma nyams pa/
gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong pa dang/ bdag med pa yid la byed pa'o// de la phung nga la mkhas pa'i shes pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ phung po dang
khams dang/ skya mchod rab tu dbyab yang shes shing de lami dmogs pa'o// de la mngon par shes pa mngon sum du byed pa gang zhan/'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi zlobab
dang rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'khrul pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa sel bgang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang/ gti mug sdong ba'ode la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
ba 'gas nga ra 'jom pa shes pa gang zhan/'di lta ste/ sngon gyi byis pa'i spyod pa la smad pa dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma 'dod pa// dal khyad par du 'gro ba gang
zhin 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig bsgrub pa'o/ de la sgom pa'i rgyu mthun pa gang zhe na//
'di lta ste/ rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro bslangs pa'o// de la ltung ba las 'byin pa la mkhas bu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ so so g+har pa dang/ 'dul ba sdom pa'o// de la
yongasatu dkris ba ga zlog ba gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ nyes pa bshags pa dang/ phyis sdom pa'i las dge ba'o// dwal rjes su chags pa sbyong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khams
gsum gyi srid pa'i khri zhing thams cad yang dag par brjom pa dang/ dgaba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa dang/ dag ba'i chos skyes pa rnams chud mi za bar byago dalasrid pa las
yang dag par badra ba gang zhan/ 'di lta ste ]khams la mi dmigs shing/ yi da lam byed pa'o// dal skya badran pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi gnas shes pa'o// de la las kyi rnam
par smin dpalanemanar med pa gang shan/ 'di lta ste chadapa dang/ rtag pa rnam par sbyong ba'o// de la chos sems pa gang yin/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems pago/ dal
thos pa yongs su tshol ba gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi snod dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sde snodadang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kun 'dzin cing sgom pa'o// de la ye shes rno ba ngan/
'di lta ste/ rmi lam lta bur ma skyes pa shes pa'o// de la ye shes la sred pa gang zhe na/ blta ste/ ye shes yongs su 'tshol ba'o// de la ye shes khong du chud pa gang zhe na/ dalta/
ste blanam du pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub mngon par sgrub pa'o/ de la rang shesakyi sa gabazhin/ 'dilta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas so// de la 'di lta bu'i
sems gang shazhu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma gtong ba'o// de la mi g.yo ba gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa dag gis mi 'phrogs pa'o// de la mi sgul ba gang zhan/ lta ste
mtshan ma thams cad yid la ma byed pa'o// de la phyir ma ldog pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug ma 'jigs pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan n bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
rnams rgyun mi 'chad par mthong ba'o// de la dag pa'i chos phun sumatshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa'o// de la sdig pa
las la smod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdom ba dang sdig pa rnams gabodamanas ma skyes pa 'o// de la nyon mongs pa ma 'byung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa dang/ srid pa'i sred pa
dang khro ba ma skyed pa'o// de la bslabs pa yongs su mi gtong ba gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang/ sangs rgyas la rimar byed pa'o// de la ting
de 'dzin rnam bar gzhag pa gang zhazha/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams skye ba dang 'jig ba med pa la mkhas pa dang/ sems rtse gcig bko del/
sems can gyis bsam pa shes pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes ba'i ye shes so// de la skye ba khyad par shes pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ 'grob lnga rnam
sh+tsa bar gzhag pa shes pa'o// dal ye shes mtha' yas pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i btso lhunakyi grub pa shes pa'o// de la tshig gi mtshams sbyar ba
shes ba ga zhan/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po ngag shes pa'o// de la khyim gyi gnas yongs su spangs pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang sems dapan zhing mngon par byung
ba'o de la khams gsum la mngon bar ma dga' ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khams gsum yang dag pa ji lta babazhin du mthong ba'o// de la sems ma gong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
sems yongs su mgatong ba dang/ mnyam par bzhag dra yangs su ma gtong ba'o// de la chos rnams la mngon par michags pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sdug pa thams cad stong ba/
ba/ dal dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa gang zhen/ 'dilta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su srung ba dang/ mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'o// de la chos srung ba gang zhan/'dirti
ste sangs rgyas kyi chos lasnodapa rnams chos dang mthun pasatshar gcod pa'o// de la las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ khrel yod pas sdig pa'i las
rnams sbyong ba dang/ dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pa'o// de la 'dul ba la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin gyi ltung ba dang/ ltub ma
yin pa shes pa dang/ bcas pa'i ltung ba dang/ ltung ba ma yin pa shes pa'o// de la rtsod pa rnam par zhib gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dus pa rnam par sbyangs pa'o// de la'athab/
ba med pa dang/ rtsod pa med pa gang zhen/'di lta ste/ 'jig rten pa'i gtam mi 'dod pa'o// da la bzod pa'i sa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang sems la gnod pa babod par
byed pa'o// de la bzod pa yang dag par 'dzin pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol gyis danadu smras pa dang/ na du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam rnams btang snyoms su 'jogacing bzod
pam 'bral ba'o// de la chos rab tu 'byed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skyemachod rnams rab tu dbya ba dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang
pa'i phyogs rab tu dbya ba dang/ de dgam dmigs pa'o// de la rnam bar gtan la dbab pa lamakhas pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad brjod du med pa'o/ 'dularab tu dbya ba
ka she sa pa bzhin/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad rnam par gzhag pa la des par rtog pago/ de la chos kyi tshig bsgrub pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/
'di lta ste/ chos rnams yang dgapa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa'o/ da ladon dang donam yin pa dris pa bsgrub pa la mkhas pa'i gsab gangazhin/ bdelta ste/ chos rnams 'bazhi
rgyu gyis blang ba dang gzhag bamed pa'o/ dalastanagyimatha'ashas rang gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ rgyu shes pa'o// dal phyama'i mthu shes pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ rgyun shes pa// del
dus gsum mnyam pa nyid shes pa gang zha'adi lta ste/ chos thams cad thadad du bya ba med pa'i dngos po'i lugs kyi chos nyid do// de la 'a khor gsum yod su dag pa'i shes pa gang yin/ bltas
'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing yid la mi byed pa'o// de la sems gnas pa gangashin/ 'di lta ste/ sems ma dmigs pa'o// dal
las rnam par gzhag pa gang yin/ 'di lta ste/ lus la zhugs pa rjes su dran pa'o// de la spyod lam srung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang 'dabaslad pa med pa'o// de la spyod lam ma ba khrugs
ba gang zhin/ 'di lta ste de dag ba mi spyoms pa'o// de la spyod lam rnam par ma rtogs pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sdig pa 'dod pa dang bral ba'o// de la dbang po dang ba gang zhe na/ di lta ste/
chos la zhugs pa'i yid la byed pa dang/ rigs par skya ba dang/ dus shes pa dang/ yang dag pa ji lta ba'i chos rnams yang dag par rab tu ston pa'o// de la 'jigarten shes pa gang zhen/ 'di lta
ste par 'gro ba dang phyir 'ong ba rab tu shes pa'o// de la lhag par gtong ba gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dngos pa rnamasum sbed pa dang/ ser sna med pa'o// dal lag brkyang ba gang zhan/ 'dil/
sto (bgad pa'i ngang tshul can no// de lasems 'dzin pa gang zhin 'delta ste/ dad pa rnyog pa med pa// de la khrel yod pa gang yin/ 'di lta ste/ mu chor mi smra bgo/ de la dotshags/
ba gang zhan/ 'di lta ste mngon du gyur ba'o// de la midag ba'i sems smad pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ byis pa'i chos rtogs ba dang de dag dang ma 'grogs pa'o// de la sbyangs ba mi gtong ba
gang zhan/'di lta ste/ yi dam la brtan pa'o// de la spyod pa yang dag par 'dzin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spyod pa la rtul ba bskyed pa'o// de la dga' ba yang dgabar spyod ba gang zhen/
'di lta ste/ dge ba'i las kyi phan yon lasems pa'o// de la tham dag gi stan 'ding zhing ldang bgang shan/ 'di lta ste/ nga rgyal bcom zhing snyoms lasamadabu'o/ dalar rgyalatshar gacod
pa gabazhin/ 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid rjes sum dmigs shing rtsom pa med pa'o// de la sems rab tu bzung ba gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dkar po'i chos chud mi za bar shes pago/ dal sems sngo
bar khyabagang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus chudam zabar shes pa'o// de la donas se yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bden pa yang dag pa dzilta/
ka ba bzhin du rtogs pa yi shes so// dal yeshos khong du chud pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams khong du chud pa'o// de la mi shes pa dang bral
bgang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ chos yang dag pa ji ltab bzhin la sgro 'dogs pa dang bral ba'o// de la sems kyi 'jug ba shes pas/nga zhen/ da lta ste/ skye ba dang 'jig pa med pa shes pago/ de
lazas sgrub pa la mkhas pa gangashen/ 'di ltaste/ shes rab rno ba'o// de la sgra brjod pa shes pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ chos yang dag pa jilta ba bzhin du rab tu bstan pa'o// de la rnam par
gzhag pa shes pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa shes pa'o// de la don rnam par satan la dbab pa gang zhe na/ 'dilta ste/ 'du byed kyi phung po chad pa'o// da laganod

pa rnam par sbyong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srid pa ma yang dag par 'da' ba dang/ gzhan dugakyang srid pa las yang dag par 'da' ba la badzud pa'o// de la skyes bu dam pa la bsten pa gang zhe na/'di
lta ste sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral dgo/ de la skyes bu dam pa dang 'grogs pa gang shon/'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ nyan thos la
[z]bsten pa'o// de la skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa rnam par sbyong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dmigs pa can dang/ le na rnam par sbyong ba'o// de la bsam gtan ma na ba gang zhe na/'ad/
lta ste 'dod pa'i tshoram rnam par sbyong ba dang/ bsam gtan ma gtong zhing dga' ba mi 'dor ba'o// de la bsam gtan la ma chags pa gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ khams gsum las yod
dag par 'da' bar mes pa dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba lames pa dang/ gong du shes rab kyi snang ba la mos pa'o// de la mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul pa gang zhe na/
'di lta ste mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas nias sangs rgyas kyi chos shes par dka'ab rnams gzhan la yang dag par rab tu ston pa'o// de la ming gi brda gangazhen/ 'di lta ste/ yongs su ma
grub pa rnams ming gis khong du chud pa'o// de la btags pa'i klu snyad gapazhin/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad do// de la btags pa 'joms pa gang zhan/ bdaltaste/ brjod par shes pa'o//
da la 'khor ba las ldog pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba nyis pa las sor rtog pa'o// de la rnyed pa mi 'dod pa gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par 'dod pa nyungabag/ de la rnyed pa dang
bkur ste mi len pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gdung ba med pa dang/ sdig pa 'dod pa dang bral ba'o/ da labasngags pa ma yin pas zhum bar mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ phung bo dang khams
[@] ]/la yongs su rtogs pa shes pa'o// de la yang dag par bsngags pa ma len pa gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba ma snyems pa dang/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti la bar
chad du rig pa'o// de la bkur sti la btang snyoms su byed pa gangazhin/'di lta ste/ las kyi rnam par smin pa rtogs pa'o// de la bsti stang med pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ba gan gzhon/ 'di
lta ste rnal 'byor ma gtong bago/ de la smad pas mi 'khrugs pa gang zhan/ 'dilta ste/ 'jig rten gyi chos la so sor rtog pa'o// de la bstod pa la btang snyoms su byed pa gang zhe na/
'di lta ste/ dgu ba'i chos tshol zhing 'byung ba'o// de la rnyed pa med kyang sems 'gong ba med ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gis byas pa'i chos rnams la so sor rtog pa'o// de la khyim pa dang

ma ston pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing ci yang rnam par sbyong ba'o// de la rab tuphyung ba dang mi sten pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rigs pa yongs su spong ba dang/ rigs pa yongs su tshol ba'o/

rgyud la spyod yul ma yin pa rnam par sbyong ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ sgrib pa lnga rnam par skyong ba'o// del spyod yul la rab tu spyod pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom 'o

de la chog phun sumatshogs pa dang zhin/'di lta ste/ pha rol rjes su bsrung ba'o// de la cho ga ma yin pa rnam par spong ba gang zhen/ 'di lta ste// bdag gi dag ba'i chos rjes su srung bgo/ de la rigs
ba sun pa'i m byed pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ shes kyi kha rnam par skyong ba'o// de la bstan pa bsrung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos yongs su btsal ba bskyab pa dang/ chos kyi rjes su mthun/
pa'i chos kyi nan tan no// de la smra ba nyung ba gang zhen ]'di lta ste/ zhi gnas thob pa'o// de la mnyen pa gang shin 'di lta ste/ lhag mthong thob pa'o// de la tshig gi lan lamakhas pa gang zhin
'di lta ste/ lan dang/ yang na shes pa'o// de la phasakyi rgol ba tshar gcod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang/ rnam par gzhag par
byed pa dang/ klan katshol ba tshar gcod pa'o// de la dus su 'gro ba gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dus shes pa'o/ de la so so'i skye bo la yid mi rton pa gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ byis pa'i chos la skyon
du lta ba'o// de la sdug bsngal ba rnams la bskrus pa med pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'o// de la sdug bsngal pa rnams lanor rab tu sbyin la
gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing gi sbyin pa'o// de la dbul po rnams la mi smad pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ pa rol la snying brtse ba'i blo// de la tshul khrims 'chal pa
rnams la snying brtsa ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol ltung ba las dbyung zhing tshul khrims la rab tu 'god ba'o// de la phan pa'i dngos po gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan la phan pa byed ngago
@#// de la snying rje ba'i glo gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyis ma 'ongs ba'i sdug bsngal la lta'o// de lachos kyis phan gdags pa bzhin/'di lta ste/ gzhan dag yang
dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos la gzung ba'o// de la zang zing yongs su gtong ba gangashun/ 'dolta ste dbang po yongs su gtong ba dang/ gzhan la zang zing gis phan 'dogs pa'o// dal
sogs pa'i gnasamed pa gabasha na/'di lta ste/ zang zing la smod pa dang/ srung ba'i nyes pa mthong ba'o// de la tshul khrims bsngags pa gabazhin/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims yongs su
rigs pa'o// de la 'chal pa'i tshul khrims la smad pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa khong du chud pa'o/ de la tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dag la g.yo/
med par ston pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa larnyed par dka' ba'i 'du shos su shesas// de la yod pa thams cad gatong bgabazhin/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa dge ba'o//
de la lhag pa'i bsam bas mgron duganyer ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol la bde ba 'dod pa'o// del skyas pa bzhin byed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa dgra ba phun sumatshogs pa/
de la rgyun mchad par brten bkur byed pa gabazhin/ 'di lta ste/ dge bag nga yin zhes tshol zhing 'dribako dal dga' ba myong bgang zhan 'di lta ste/ khong du chud pa'i shes pa dang lung gshes
pa'o de la dpe shes pa gang zhe na/'dilta ste/ 'dra ba shes pa dang/ gdams pa shes pa'o// de la sngon byung ba la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ skye badran pa dang/ thos pamang ba'o//

dal dag pa'i rtsa ba sngon du ba gro ba gang zhin/'di lta ste/ byang chub la shin tu 'dun pa dang/ gzhan dag kyang spyobar byed pago/ de la thabs mkhas pa gang shon/ 'di lta ste/ so sor 'chags pa dang/
rjes su yi rang ba dang/ gsol ba 'debs pa dang/ dag ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo bal mkhas pa'o// de la mtshan ma phreng ba gabazhin/ 'di lta ste/ chos rnams rmi lam lta bur rtogs nas/ dngos po/
rnam par 'jig pa'o// de la 'du shes zlog pa gang zhin 'di lta ste/ phyin ci log 'den pa'o// de la dngos po'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med par shes pa'o// de la
mdo sde mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ ga ba dang/ ma dge ba'i chos yang dag pa ji ltakha rnams da ba dang rtogs pa brjod pas yang dgang na 'batu ston pa'o// de'aban
pa rnam par gtan la dbab pa gang shin/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par shes pa 'gog pa dang/ ming dang gzugs ma skye ba'o// de la rnam par grol ba mngon sum du byed pa gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ rdo lta
bu'i ting nge 'dzin las ma g.yo ba dang ma 'khrug pa'o// de la gcig tu brjod pa gang zhen 'di lta ste/ mu stegs can gyi gnas smad pa dang/ ma skyabar shes pa'o// da lami'ajigasang
thob pagang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas chos rnams rtogs shing stobs bskyed pa'o// de la tshul khrims kyi gnas gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi sdom pa dang/ so
[Di ]sor thar pa'i sdom pa'o// de la snyoms par 'jug pa la 'jug pa gang zhan/ dilta ste/ khams gsum la 'dod chags dang bral ba'o/ de la shes rab thob pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ nus pa
shes pa dang mi dmags pa'o/ dal gcig pur dga' kha gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ bdu 'a'i nyes pa rnam par slong ba dang/ chos dkar po mi gtong bgo/ de la shes kyi kha chung ngus chog shes pa
gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ ngan ngon gyis mgu ba'o// dal sems la rtog pa med pa gabazhin ]'dolta ste/ sgrib pa rnams rnam par gnon pa'o// de la ltar byas pa rnam par sbyong ba
gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ dmigs pa'i lta ba rnam par spong ba'o// del gzungs thob pa gang yin/ 'di lta ste/ chos ji ltar mthong ba rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chags bamed par rab tu ston
pa'i de la ye shes snang ba gang zhen/ 'dulta ste/ rang bzhin la 'jug pa 'o// de la gnas pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi gnas sa// de la gzhigang zhe na/'di lta ste/ sems
ba/ kyigazhi'o/ de la rten gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ dad dal rten ba'o// de la nan tan gang na 'di lta ste/ lamtshan n tanano// de la rgyu gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ marig pa 'khor ba'i rgyu'o/ del
[s/]rig pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs pa ni thar pa'i rigs pa'o/ de la tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srid pa rab tu sngangs pa'o// de la sgo gang yin/ 'di lta ste/ nyes pa spangs bgo/ del
lam gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong nga drang bdagamed pa shes bgo/ de la sa gang yin/ 'di lta ste/ smon pa med pa'i sa bcu'o// de la skyes kha
dang bral ba gang zhin/ 'alta ste/ skye pa bcad pago/ de la ye shes kyi sa gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ rmongs pamed pa// dal mi shes pa sngangs pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/
gtimug sngangs pa'o// de la ya shos gnas pa/ gang zhan 'di lta ste/ mi gnas pa'o// del rnal 'byor spyod pa'is gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams
sgom pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yulo gang zhan/'dilta ste/ rol tu phyin pa drug go/ de la skyes bu dam pa stan pa ga zhan 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas la bsten pa'o// del skyes bu/
dam pas yin pa smras pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ mu stags can dmigs par lta ba rnams rnam par slong ba'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs ragang shun/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi stod/
la gnas panas rang bzhin shes bas thar pa'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi sa gang zhan/'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad thob pa'o// de la mkhas pas rjes su yi rang ba gang zhen 'di lta ste/
[s/ ]@#/ 'das pa dang/ ma na ba dang/ da ltar byung ba'isas rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ nyan thos dag gis rjes su yi rang ba'o// de la byis pa dag gis sngangs pa gang zhan//
[n ]da lta ste/ byis pa thams cad kyis rig par dku ba'o// de la nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyis shes par dka' bgang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyis chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// de lazhu
rgyu stegs can gyis pa yin pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor pa dag gis lag pa'i nga rgyal la// de la byang chub sems dpa' dag gis yongasasugazung ba gang zhin/'di lta ste/ rnyed par dka'
ba dang ri chen por gyur ba'o/ de la stobs bcu dag gis khong du chud pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dka' ba'i tshul gyis sa// dal lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba gang zhan/ 'di lta ste// bde bzhug
cad thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/ dul tshangs pa dag gis phyag bya ba gang yin/ 'di lta ste thar pa thams cad thob par byed pa'i tshul gyisas// de la klo rnams kyis phyag bya ba gzhan 'di lta ste/
bag chags thams cad gacod pa'i phyir ro// de la gnod sbyin dag gis rjes su yi rang bar byabagang zhen/ ltaste/ na 'gro thams cad kyilamagacod pa'i phyir ro// de la ma 'am rudagags

phyag bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste// thar pa'i rang du bde ba thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de la lto 'phye chen po dag gis rab tu bsngags ba gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba gcod pa'i phyir ro//
de la bya chub sems dpa' dag gis bsgom par bya ba gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa ye shas thob par byed ba'i phyir ro// de la mkhas pa dag gis kun chub par bya ba ga bzhi
na 'di ltaste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pa bya ba'i phyir// da lanor bla na med pa gang na/ 'di ltaste/ lha dang mi'i skya dag phun sum tshogs pazlob par byed pa dang/ thar ba thob par byed pa'i
phyi'o// de la sbyin pa zang zing med pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa 'phyir ro/ de la rna ba rnams kyi rtsa gzhan/ 'di lta ste/'dod chagasadang zhe sdang dang/ gtitshugs

tuzhi ba'abyed pa'i phyiro//dal mdzod shes pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ bsgom pa'i phyir ro// de la skyobs pa mi zad pa gang zhan/'di lta ste/ yang dag pa ji ltab bzhin du shes pa dang mthong ba'i phyi'o/ de
lamya ngan dang bral ba gabazhin/ 'di lta ste/ gnod pa dang/ sdug bsngal de med par rtogs shing 'byung bdang/ sngagabasngal bag med bar shes pa'i phyir go/ dal khamasagasum yongs su shes pa
gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spyam dang rmi lam lta bur rtogs pa'o// de la pha rol tu 'gro ba dag gagazisagangashin/ 'dulta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su mya ngan las 'od bar 'dod pa dag mi rtag

ba dang/ sdug bsngal bdang/ stong nyid du bsgom pa'i phyir ro// dalachu bo'i nang du song ba dag ga gru gzhan/ 'di lta ste/ mya ngan las 'da' ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ de lasnyan pa 'dod pa dag gi grags/
[r ]@#// pa gshen 'di lta ste/ chos rgya chen po thob par byed par bya ba'i phyir ro// de la sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rtsi'i sbyin
bdag tugyur ba'i phyir ro/ de lad bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis snyan pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ yon tan dang bde ba thams cad dang thar pa'i sbyin bdag tu gyur ba'i phyir ro// dul stobs bcu dag gis
tsho bstod pa gang zhenA/ 'di lta ste/ chos rin po che rnyed par dka' ba'i sbyin bdag tu gyur pa'i phyir ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan zhin 'di lta ste/ chos 'di la bslabs tA'i
phyi'o// de la snying rje can dug gi btang snyoms gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas pa'i phyir ro// de la byams pas zhe sdangazhi ba gang zhan/ 'dalta ste/ gnyan por gyur pa'i phyir
ro/ de la theg pa chen pa pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa gang yin/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa thums cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro// dul seng ga'i sgra sgrogs pa dag gi

nAn tan gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi mchog dang chos kyi dam pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de la sangs rgyas kyi ye shesakyi lam gang zhen/ bdi lta ste/ dgaba'i chos thams cad thob par byed ng/
phyi'o// de la chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya gang shon/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol nas tshu rol rtogs pa'i phyir ro// de la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesam 'phrogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/mi
dgaba'i chos thams cad spong bar 'gyur ba dang/ dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa dang/ thar pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bskyed mos tshalagang zhen/
'di lta ste/ bdag gi bdeb dang dga' ba dang/ mgu ba thams cad kyis sems can thams cad kyi bde ba sgrub pa'i phyir ro// de la bdud kyi sde rnams 'jig par byed pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ stobs
thams cad yongs su sgrub pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro// dal bde bar 'gro ba'i rigab gang zhen/ 'dat+ta ste/ gtsib thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// de la don
grub ba rnams kyi don gang zhan/'di lta ste/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad yongs su grub pa'i phyir ro// dal dgra'inang du song ba'i skyabs gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dmigs pa can
thams cad dang/ log par lta ba rnams la bam par byed par gyur ba'o// de la chos dang ldan pas mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chos dang ldan pas mu stegs
can tshar gcod pa'o/ da lami 'jigs pa'i bden pa'i rnam pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad yongs su brtag pa dang/ phyir brtag pa gzhon pa'i phyir ro// de la stobs rnams yang dag btsal

gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ ma 'ogapa'i tshul gyis so// dol sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi snga ltas gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dkar po'i chos thams cad klob ba'abyed pa'i bgo/ de'abargyan/
[a/@]// gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par byed pa'i phyir ro// de la thar pa 'dod pa dag gi dga' ba gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ thog ma dang dbusadang

thamar dag pa'i phyir// de la bu'i thu'od g gi dga' ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha'i nor/ sangs rgyas kyi nor myong ba thob par byed pa'i phyir ro// de la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rdzogs pa gang zhe na/'di
lta ste/ dkar po'i chos thams cad rjes su srung ba dang/ dkar po'i chos thams cad gzhan ma yin par gsab thob par bya pa'i phyir ro// de la nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
ma yin pa gzhan/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa rgya chen po yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro// de la sems rnam par dag pa gang zhenA/'di lta ste/ dri ma thams cad yon
tshe sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// de la lus yongs su dag pa gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i phyir ro// de la rnam par thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/'di lta

ste mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang/ bdag med pa dang zhi bar so sor rtog pa yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro/ de la 'dod chags kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa gang shes 'di lta ste/ma'ani
a ba'i gzhas yas su grub pa'i phyir ro// de la zhe sdang dang bral ba gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa chen po yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro// de lagati mug gis ma yin pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/chos
kha00yang dag pa nyid yongs su grub pa'i phyir ro// de la ye shes 'byung ba gzhin/ 'di ltaste/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgongs pa shes pa thams cad skye ba'i phyir ro// de
larig pa skye ba gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ tshulabazhin yid la byed pa thams cad yongs su grub pa'i phyir ro// de la ma rig pa sbyong ba gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ tshul bzhin mayin ba yodal byed bdung

bralabar 'gyur ba'o// de la rnam par grol ba'i snying pas ngoms pa gangazhin/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i tshig nyid yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro// de la ting nge 'dzin gyi stong par byed pa dgagamagu ba gang zhan/

'di lta ste/ bad pa dang dga' kha'i bde ba thams cad dang/ sems rtsegacig yongs su 'grub pa'i phyir ro// de la mthong ba 'dod pa rnams kyi mig gapa na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid lta ba'i phyir ro// de las
par 'phrul par 'dod pa rnams kyi mngon par shes pa gang zhen/'di lta ste/ sgrib pa med pa dang 'dod bar 'gyur ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro/ de la mngon par bsgrubs par 'dod pa rnams kyi 'phrul gang
zhin 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la mi rtog pa'i shes ba sgrib pa med pa'i phyir ro// de la thos par 'dod pa rnams kyi gzungs gzhan/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad myun las 'das pa dmanyam

pa'i phyir ro// de la dran pa ma nyams pa gapalen/ 'di lta ste/ mya ngan las 'das par dmigs pa rang bzhin gyis rnam par zhi ba'iphyira'o// de la sangs rgyas rnams kyibyin gyis brlab pa gangashen/'di lta ste/
[s/ ]@#// mtha' yas pa yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro// de la mgon po rnams kyis thabs mkhas pa gabazhin/'dilta ste/ thams cad bde ba dang legs par 'groba'i phyir ro// de
[Di ]la phra mo gang zhen/'di lta ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa la dmigs pa rnam par zhiba'i phyir ro// de la shes par dka' ba gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ so sor rig bar daka' ba'i phyi'o// de la
ts+tsha ma brtson pa rnams kyis rig par dka' ba gang zhan 'di lta ste/ sngon ma thob pa'i phyir ro// de la yi ge rnams ldog pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ tshig gi lam thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir// du
la sgra shes par dka' ba gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bsam gyisam khyab pa'i phyir ro// de la mkhas ba dag gi yongs su shes pa gang zhe na/'diltaste/ rin po che don ched 'i phyi'o// de
la sa pa dag gis shes pa gapazhan/ 'di lta ste/ bkur sti kun shes pa'i phyir ro// de la 'dod pa chung bas rtogs pa gang zhan/ 'dilta ste/ bkur stis ma skyed pa'i phyir ro// de la brtson 'grus
brtsams pa rnams kyis gzungab ga bzhi 'di lta ste/ brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i phyir ro// de la dran pa can gyis bcangs pa gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ byas pa chud mi za ba'i phyir ro// de la bsngagabastsal

ba zod bo gzhin/'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug spong bar 'gyur pa'i phyi'o/ dal chos ma skye ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par shes pa thams cad 'gogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/
[ne ]dal brtan pa gcig gang zhin/'di lta ste/ srid pa'i 'gro ba dang 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'i gnas thams cad dka' pa las ba rmi lam lta bu 'o zhes chos thams cad mngaskyed pa'i phyir ro// 'din
tshig sum brgya pa 'di rnams rgyus par bstan pa rig par bya ste/ gzhon zhu 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dgagasungs so// sangs rgyas chos ni rgya che ste// tshul yang rgyar bstan pa yin// chos rnams rgya char bstan pas na// yon tan rgya chen thob par

'gyur// ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che bas// chos kyi mtshan nyid de bzhan te// zhe chen 'od zer rgya cher gang// de phyir shin tu rgyas shes bya// sems can spyod pa rgya che ste// de dag bstan pa'i ng rgya che'o// lung gi don yang

rgya che bas// de phyir shin tu rgyas shes bya// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin nges pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na/ sems can

dpagatumed pa dag gis/ blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub phyir ma ldogabagyur to// semA
nadang ga tu med pa dag rang byang chub du sems skyes sa// sems can dpag tumed padag dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba la sems skyes so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtan gyi khams 'di
yang rnam pa drugatugayas rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gularab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg ba khrags rab tu 'khrug
kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ chem chem rab tu chem chem kun tu rab duchem chem/ 'ur 'ur rung dur bur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur bur/ shar phyogs dma'ananub phyogs mtho/nub phyogs dma'an
shar phyogasamatho// byang phyogasadama'an lho phyogs mtho// lho phyogs dma'an byang phyogs mtho/ mtha' dman dbus mtho// dbus dma'an mtha' mkhro ste// 'jig rten du snang ba dwapag tu med pa

dag byung bar gyur to// lha'i sgos kyi char chen po yang mngon par bab bo// lhadag kyang me tog gi char chen po gtong ng// lha'isil snyan brgya stong dag kyang steng gi bar snang la brdung ngo/ lha'i na bza' dgukyang
steng gi nam mkha' la g.yob cing tshig 'di skad ces zer ro// gang gis snying rje chen pa la 'jug pa 'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sems rnyan de dag nyid pa legs par rnyed pa yan te/
sems can de dag sangs rgyas mang po labasnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro// gang gachos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos par bagyur zhing/ thos
nas kyang yi gar 'dri ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ nyon mongs pa med par sgom pas bsgom pa dang/ mang du byed pa dang/ gzhan la yang rgya cher
yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro/ dad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun/
dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'du khyod kyis zung shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis gu/ gzhan la yang rgya che gang dag khang las ston cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das latshadad
ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mang ci lags/ jiltar gazung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'/
bo mdo sde 'di snying rjes chen pa la 'jug pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin cas bya bar zung shig/ kun dga' bos gsal pa//
bcom ldan 'dus chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis bzung lags sa// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ zla'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/
'khor bzhi pa dag slong dang/ dag slongam dang/ dag bsnyen dang dag bsnyen ma da dag dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu du ma drag dang/ lha dang ma dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas
ba'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i tade de 'dzin ji snyed ba rdzogs so//
rgya gar mkhasapeshA len dra bo d+hadang/ zhu chen gyi le tshapa ban d+hed+haram tAhAl sa bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcosazhas gtan la phab pa'o//
ga @#// rgya gar skad du/ an+d+ha ban ya nAmad+ham parlaya/ bod skad du don rnam par nges pa zhes byaba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
zla 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ shar phyogs kyi kun dka'ar ba 'dags 'dzin gyi ma'i khang pa na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dag slong

gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gacig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sprin ltar thabacing snyan la rgya che ba'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis dag slong rnams la bka' stsalapa/ dgaslong dag khyed
la chos bshad par bya ste/ tshangs par spyod pa dang/ thog mdugab/ bar du dge ba/ thamar dgab/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po ]ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag
pa yongs su byang ba/ 'di lta ste/ don rnam par ngesang zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu bshad par byas/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid lazung shig dang bshad do// dag
slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltanyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasas dedag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de ladag slong dag don rnam par

tsa bdes pa zhes bya ba'i chos kya rnam grangs degang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga dang/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dang/ khams pa myobargyad dang/ skye mchedabcu gnyis dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i/
lan las/ bcuganyis pa dang/ 'phags pa'ibaden pa bzhidang/ dpad pa nyi shu rtsaganyis dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dngalam bzhi dang/ ti de' dzin bsgom pa bzhi
dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par sbyang pa bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad dang/ dbugs rngub pa dang/ 'byung ba dran ba rnam pa bcu drug dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i yan lag bzhi dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcudang/ mi'ajigs pa bzhi dang
sa sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ste dag slong dag 'dazhi don rnam
par nges pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdor bstan pa'o// dge slong dag de la phung pa la gang zhazhu/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi phung pa dang/ tshor ba'i phung po dang/ 'du shes kyi phung bo dang/ 'du

byed kyi phung pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste/ dge slong dag 'di dag na bung pa lnga'o// dag slong dag de la nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung
@#// podang tshor ba nye bar len pa'i phung po dang/ dushes nye bar len pa'i phung po dang/ 'du byed bar len pa'i phung podang/ rnam pa gsar ba len pa'i phung po ste/ dge slong dag 'di dagazhi/
ka/bar len pa'i phung po lngago dge slong dag de la khams pa co brgyad gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ ga gi khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ rna ba'i khams
ts+tsha dang sgra'i khams dang/ rna pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ sna'i khams dang/ dri'i khams dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'khams dang/ lce'i khams dang/ ro'i khams dang//
lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ lus kyi khams dang/ reg bya'i khams dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ yid kyi khams dang/ chos kyi khams dang/ yid kyi rnam bal
shes pa'i khams te/ dge slong dga' di bzhi khams bcobargyad ces bya'o// dge slong dag de la skya mched bcuganyis gang zhazhu/ 'di lta ste/ mig nang gi skye mched dang/ gzugs phyi'i skye mched
dang rna ba nang gi skya mchodadang/ sgra phyi'i skye mched dang/ snang gi skyomachod dang/ dri phyi'i mched dang/ lcenang gi skyamachod dang/ rophyi'i skyemachadadang/ lus nang gi skumachodadang//

reg bya phyi'i skyamachod dang/ yid nangagi skyo mched dang/ chos phyi'i skyamachodadang/ dge slong dag 'di dgazhi mchod btsuganyis so// dge slong dag de la rtag cing 'brel par 'byung bayan lag bcu gnyis pa
tha gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma'amed pa rgyan gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyisa rnam par shes pa// rnam par shos pa'i rkyen gyisaming dang gzugs/ ming dgazugs kyi rgyan gyis skyamachod
drug mched drugagargyal gyis regang/ rig pa'i rkyen gyis chos ba/ chor bkyin gyis srad pa/ srid pashagyisalenapa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa kun eskyab/ skyobaskyon gyis rga shadang
mya zhadang smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba'ashig 'byung bar 'gyuyo/ ma ragi
ba 'gag pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag ming gzugs 'gags pas skyo mad drug 'gag/ mched
drug 'gags pas legs bgag/ legs 'gags pas/ chor pa bdag/ chor ba 'gags pas/ sridapa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas/ len pa bgag/ len pa 'gags pas/ sridab
'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas/ skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas/ rgashi dang/ chu ngan dang/ sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ midam bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams
gagangar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di'aba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro// de lamarig pagang zhen/ 'di lta sta/ sngon gyisatha' mashis pa dang/ a'i mtha' mi shes pa dang
sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' ma shes pa dang/ nang mi shes pa dang/ phyi mi shes pa dang/ nang dang phyi mi shes pa dang/ las mishes pa dang/ rnam par smin pa mi shes pa dang/ ]
ka las dang rnam par smin pa mi shes pa dang/ legs par byas pa'i lasami shes pa dang/ nyes par byas pa'i lasams pa dang/ legs par byas pa dang/ nyes par byas pa'i lasam shes pa dang//

rgyu rgyum shes pa dang/ 'bras bu mi shes pa dang/ rgyud 'bras bu mi shes pa dang/ rgyu las byung ba'i chos rnams mi shes pa dang/ rtenacing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams mi shes pa dang/ saargyas mi
shes pa dang/ chos mashes pa dang/ dge 'dun mi shes pa dang/ sdug bsngal mishes pa dang/ kun 'byung ba mi shes pa dang/ 'gog pa mi shes pa dang/ lam shes pa dang/
! dge ba dang/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams mi shes pa dang/ khazham tho ba dang bcas pa dang/ khanam tho ba med pa dang/ bstan par bya ba dang/ bstanapar bya ba mayin pa'i chos rnams mi shes
pa dang/ reg pa 'i skye mched drug de dgayang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mi shes pa dang/ ma mthong ba dang/ khong dus rnyed pa dang/ mngon pa mi rtogs pa dang/ mun pa dang/ kun tu
rmongs ba dang/ ma rig pa'i mun ngate/ 'dinam rig pa zhes bya'o// ma rig pa'i nagyis 'dubyed rnams zhes bya ba la/ 'du byed rnams gang zhe na/ 'du byed gsum ste/ lus kyi
'du byed dang/ ngag gi 'du byed dang/ yid kyi 'du byed do/ lus kyi 'du byed rnams gang zhe na/ dbugs rngub pa dang/ 'byung ba ste/ lus 'di ni las las byung/ lus l rtenapa//
lus dang 'brel pa/ lus la 'bebs pa 'jug pa ste/ de'i phyir dbugs rngub pa dang/ byung bdag lus kyil du byed rnams zhes bya// ngag gi 'du zlumasagang zhazha/ rnam par rtag rnam par dpyad
nas tshig sna'i/ rnam par ma brtags pa ma yin/ rnam par ma dpyad pa ma yin te/ de'i phyi'i rnam par rtog pa dang/ rnam par dpyod pa'i gag du byed ces bya'o/ yid kyi 'du byed rnamAgazhen/
chags pa'i soms pa gang yin pa dang/ zhe sdangagasams pa gang yin pa dang/ gtamug gi sems pa gang yin pa ste/ chos de'i soms lasaphyungab/ sems la rten pa/ soms dang 'brelakha/
soms la rten nas 'jug bas/ de'i phyir sams pa na yod kyi 'du byed ces bya ste/dge slong dag 'di dag na 'du byed rnams zhes bya'o// 'du byed kyi rgyan gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba la/ rnam par
shes pa gang zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ mig rnam par shes pa dang/ rnaba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa
dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ste/ 'di dag ni rnam par shes pa'i chogs drug go/ rnam par shes pa'i skyon gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba la/ ming dang
gzugs gang zhe na/ming ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi ste/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa ste/ 'di mi
ka gzugs gang zhin/ gzugagang ciyang rung ste/ de thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag ste/ sa'i khams dang/ chu'i khams dang/ ma'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams so/ sa'i
khams gang zhen/ gang lci ba dngas brtsub pa'o// chu khams gangazhin/ gang gsher ba dang brgyan pa'o// mo'i khams gang zhen/ gang tshong dang/ yongs su smin par byed pa'o// rlung
gi khams gang zhen/ gang bskum pa dang/ slong ba dang/ yang zhing g.yo bgo/ gzugs 'di dang snga ma'i ming de gnyis gcig tu bsdus te/ ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o// ming dang gzugs
kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya bal/ skya mched drug gang zhe na/ mig gi skye mched dang/ rna ba'i skye mched dang/ sna'i skye mched dang/ lce'i skye mched dang/ las kyi sku mchod dang/
yid kyi skye mched dang/ 'di na skye mched drug ces bya'o// mchodangug rgyan gyis reg pa zhes bya bal/ rig pa gang zhe na/ rig pa'i chogs drug ste/ mig gi 'dus te theg pa dang/
rnab dang/ sA dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba la/ chor ba gang zhe na// tshor ba'i chogs drug ste/ drugagang zhen/
tsa miben de 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal b dang/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bdepa yang ma yin pa dang/ de bzhin du na ba dang/ sna dang lce dang lus dang//

yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa'o/ tshorab 'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes byab la/ srid pa gang zhen/ srid pa'i
tshogs drug ste/ drugagang zhen/ gzugs la srid pa dang/ sgra la srid pa dang/ dril sred pa dang/ rol srid pa dang/ rig bya la sridapa dang/ chos la srid pa'o// srid pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya ba
la/ len pa gang zhe na/ len pa bzhi sgyu/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'dod pa'i len pa dang/ lta ba'i len pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs kyi len pa dang/ bdag tu smra ba len pa'o//
len pa'i rgyan gyis srid pa zhes bya ba la/ srid pa gang zhe na/ srid pa gsum mo// gsum gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i srid pa dang/ gzugs kyi srid pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i srid/
pa'o de la 'dod pa'i srid pa gang zhe na/ 'ogagi soms can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa nas nyo bar bzung ste/ gzhan 'phrul da bang byed kyi lha rnams kyi bar 'di ni 'dod pa'i srad pa zhes bya'o/
gzugs kyi srid pa gang zhe na/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams nas nye bar bzung ste/ 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar 'di ni/ gzugs kyi sridipa zhes bya'o// gzugs med pa'i srid pa gang
ka/ zhen nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye ba 'gro ba lha rnams nas nyabar bzung// 'du shes med 'du shes mdaman skyonached du lta bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi bar

[DTI ]'di ni/ gzugs med pa 'i srid pa zhes bya'o// srid pa'i rgyan gyis skye ba zhes bya ba la/ skye ba gang zhan/ gang sems can de dang sems can gyis ris de dang de dag tu skye ba dang/ rdzogs par skye bdang/

ts+tsa 'jug pa dang/ mngon par 'grub pa dang/ phung po rnams 'byung ba dang// skye mched rnams rab tu thob ba dang/ srog gi dbang po 'byung ba dang/ ris mthun pa dang phrad pa ste/ 'di ni skya ba zhos
bya'o// skye ba'i rkyen gyis shu zhis bya ba la/ rgyas pa gang zhen/ spyi thar ba dang/ sku skya ba dang/ gnyer ma mang ba dang/ 'khogs pa dang/ shom kha dang/ skur te gdung rten ltar dgu ba dang/
sku ngar ngar por gyur cing dbugs rgyu ba'i lus su gyur pa dang/ lus s ba lta bu s gang ba dang/ lus mdun du dgu ba dang/ 'khar ba la rten pa dang/ dbang po rnams yongs su sAn pa dang//
yongs su zhugs pa dang/ 'du khyed rnams rnyings pa dang/ shag shig por gyur pa dang/ blong ba dang/ zhan pa dang/ nyams pa dang/ yongs su nyams ba sta 'din srib zhes bya'o// 'chi ba
gang zhen/ gangasems can de dang/ de dag sems can gyis rigs de dang de dag nas 'chab dang/ 'pho ba dang/ zhag pa dang/ ma rtag par 'gyur ba dang/ 'chi ba 'i dus byed pa dad/ tshe
nyams pa dang/ drod nyams pa dang/ srog gi dbang po 'gags pa dang/ phung bo rnams 'dor ba 'din 'che ba zhes bya ba ste/ 'chi ba 'di dang snga ma'i rna ba de gnyis ga cig tu bsdus nas/
da sha zhes bya ste/ dag slong dag de na rten chung 'brel par 'byung pa yan lag bcu gnyis zhes bya'o// de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi gang zhen/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/
sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ spug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o// sdug
bsngal 'phags pa 'a bden pa gang zhe na/ skyo ba'i sdug bsal dang/ skaba'i sdug bsngal dang/ na ba'i sdug bstsal dang/ 'chib 'a sdug bsngal dang/ sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang/
mi sdug pa dang phud pa'i sdug bsngal dang/ gang 'dod po btsal te ma rnyed pa de yang sdug bsngal lo// mdor snyes na nye bar len pa'i phung bo lnga bo dag ni sdug bsngal yin te/ 'di ni sdug bsngal
'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhen/ gang 'di yang 'byung ba'i sred pa dang/ dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa dang/ do dang de mngon
par dgaga' ba ste/ 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal 'gogs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhen/gang yang 'byung ba'isrid bdang/ dga' ba'i 'dod
chags dad ldan pa dang/ de dang der mngon par dga' ba de nyid ma lus par spangs pa dang/ nges par spangs pa dang/ byang bar 'gyur ba dang/ zad pa dang/ 'dod chags dang
bral ba dang/ 'gog pa dang rnam par zhi ba dang/ nub ba ste/ 'danosdug bsal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'alam 'bags pa'i 'den ba gang
zhenA 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa ste/'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ngag dang/ yang dog pa'i las kyi ma 'a dang/ yang dag
pa'i 'tsho ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzan te/ 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i 'adon pa zhes bya ste/ 'di

dag na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhashis bya'o// dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ mag gi dbang po dang/ rna pa'i dbang po dang/ sna'i dbang po dang/ lce'i dbang po dang/ lus kyi dbang po dang/ yid kyi
dbang po dang/ pho' dbang po dang/ mo'i dbang po dad/ srog ga dbang po dang/ sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang/ bde ba'i dbang po dang/ yad bde ba'i dbang po dang/ mad na bde ba'i dbang po dang/

pa btang snyoms kyi deb da po dang/ dad pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa ni dbang po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dpa da po dang/ shes rab kyi dbang po dang/ ma shes ba kun shes
par khyed ba'i dbang po dang kun sheg pa 'a dbang po dang// kun shes pa dad ldan pa'i dbang po ste/ dge slong dag 'dirig na dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis so// de la bsam gtan bzhi gang zhe na/ dge/
slong dag 'di la dge slong rnams 'dod pa dag las dben kha/ sdig pa ma dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa// dbyod pa dang bcas pa/ dbenab las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde/
can bsam gtan dad bo rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang/ de rtog pa dang/ dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dag pa ste/ sems kyi rgyud cig tu gyur pas rtog med pa/ dpyod pa med pa//
ting de'adzan las skyes bu'i dga' ba dang bde datsan bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te mkhas gnas pa dang/ de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas/btang snyoms la gnas gang dran
pa dang shes bzhin tshan man te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags ba rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas ba btudasnyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' bamed pa bsam gtan
gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang/ de bde ba yang sangs te/ sn gnas sdug bsngal yang sbyangs shing 'di bde ba dang/ yid mi bde ba lang nub bas/ bde ba lang ma lan/ sdug bsngal
ma dam man pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa// bsam gtan bzhi bo rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa ste/ dge slong dag 'di dgan bsam gtan bzhi'o/ de latshangs pa'i gnas pa/
[t? ]@#// bzhi gang zhe na/ dge slong dag 'di la dge slong gis byams pa dang ldan pa 'dis mas khonamadapa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ mdas bar rgya chen por gyur pa//
ma gnyis pa tshad med pa// shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te/ khyab par byas nas/ rdzogs pa byas te gnas shang/ de bzhin du gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ de bzhin du
glo bzhi pa dang/ bla dang/ 'og dang/ tad kar rnam pa lcams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di thams cad du byams pa dwang ldan pa'i sams khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod ba med pa/ yangs pa rgya
chen por gyur pa/ ma gas/ tshad med pa// shan tu bsgoms pas mos de khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang/ de bzhin du sud dzad ng ldan pa dang/ dga' ba dad ldan pa dang/
btang soms dad ldan pa 'asams khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs ba rgya chen por gyur pa/ ma gnyis pa/ tshad med pa// shin tu bsgoms pas mos par byas s/
khyab par byas te/ rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa ste// 'di na tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'o// da la lam bzhi gang zhen/ mngon par shes pa khul la dka' ba'i lam la nga yod/
mngon par shes pa myur la dka' ba'i lam yang yod/ mngon par shes ba khul la sla ba'i lam yang yod/ mngon par shes pa rgyud la sla ba'i lam yang yod do// de la mdonapar shes babul
la dka' ba'i lam gang zhen/ 'di la kha cig rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags kya shas che ba yin/ zhesdang ga shas che ba ni/ gti mug ga shas che ba yin te de la 'dod chags kyis shas che bas//
'dod chags las byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ mde ma bde brgyun mi 'chad par myong/ zhe sdang ga shas che bas/zhe sdod las byung ba 'asdul bsngal dang/ yade ma bde ba rgyunas 'chad par myong/ de
gti mug ga shas che bas/ gtiug las byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ ya?di ma bde ba rgyun 'chad par myong ba/ zag pa rnams zad par bya ba la/ de'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang po lnga po
'di dag bu la ba dang/ zhan pa dang/ mardzob dang/ myur bar 'jug pa ma yin no// lnga grong zhin/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa'i dbang po dang//
tang 'dzin gyi dbang po dang/ shes rab kyi dbang po'o// de 'jig rten las 'dus pa'i dbang po lnga po 'di dag phul ba dang/ zhan pa dang/ mnob dang/ ma myur ba 'a bu'i 'di lta ste/ zag pa
rnams zad par bya ba la/ bar chad med pa'i ting du 'dzin la reg pa bul ba nyid de/ 'dan mngon par shes pa bul la dka' ba'i lam mo// de la mngon par shes pa rgyur la dka' ba ni lam gang zhen/
'di la kha cig rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags kyashas che ba yin/ zhe sdang gis shas che ba yani/ gti mug gi shas che ba yin te/ de 'dod chags kyi shas che bas 'dod chags las byung ba'i
ku@#// sag bsal dang/ yad ma bde ba rgyan ma'achad par myong/ zhe sdang ga shas che bas zhe sdang las byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ yid mi bde ba rgyun ma'achad pa'i med/ gtaM ]
ba mug shas che bas gti mug las byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ yid ma bde ba rgyun ma 'chad par myong yang de'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang po lnga po 'di dag che ra dang/ rnob dang/ myur bar
'jug pa yin no// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di ltaste/ dad pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa'i dbang po dang/ ting nge 'dzan gyi dbang po dang/ shes rab kyi dbang po'o//
de'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang po lnga po 'di dag che ba dang/ rno ba dang/ myur bar 'jug pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ zag pa rnams zad par bya ba'i bar chad med pa'i ting de 'dzan lareg pa myur ba/
nyid de/ 'ad ni mngon par shes pa skyur la dka' ba'i lam mo// de la mngon par shes pa bul las ba'i lam gang zhe na/ 'di la kha cig rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags kyi shas chung ba dang/ zhi/
sdang ga shas chung ba dang/ gti mug goshisachung ba yin te/ 'dod chags kyi shas chung bas 'dod chags las byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ yid ma bde ba rgyun ma chad par myong ba ma yin/ zhesrung
gi shas chung bas zhe sdang las byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ yod mi bde ba rgyun ma 'chad par myong ba ma yin/ gti mug gi shas chung bas gti mug las byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ yad mi bde
ba rgyan mi 'chad par myong ba ma yin yang de'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang po lnga po 'di dag bul ba dang/ zhan pa dang// ma rno ba dang/ myur bar 'jug pa ma yin no// lnga gang zhe na/'di ltas
dad pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa'i dbang po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang// shes rab kyi dbang po'o// de 'jigo rten las 'das pa'i dbang po lnga po 'di dag bul/

ba dang/ zhan pa dang/ ma rmo ba dang/ 'jug pa ma myur bau0f8bphyir/ 'dalta ste/ zag pa rnams khrod par bya ba la bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rag pa bul ba nyid de/'di ni mngon par shes pa bul la sla
ba'i lam mo// de la mngon par shis pa sgyur la sla ba'i lam gang zhen/ 'di la kha cig rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags kyi shas chung ba yani/ zhe sdang gshas chung ba yin/ gti mug gshas chung ba yin te/

de 'dod chags kyashas chud bas 'dod chags las byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ yid ma bde ba rgyunam 'chad par myong ba ma yin/ zhe sdang gi shas chung bas/ zhe sdang las byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ yod/
ma bde ba rgyun ma 'chad par myong ba ma yani/ gti mug gi shasachung bas/ gti mug las byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ yid mi bde ba rgyun ma 'chad par yang myong ba ma yin la/ de'i 'jig rten las
'das pa'i dbang po lnga po 'di dag kyang/ che ba dang/ rno ba dang// myur bar 'jug pa yin no// lnga gang zhen/ 'di lta sta/ dad po'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa'i
[sf]@#// dbang po dang/ ting nge 'dzin kyi dbang po dang/ shes rab kyi dbang po'o// de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang po de dag che ba dang/ rno ba dang/ myur bar 'jug pa'i phyir 'ad lta

ka sta zag pa rnams zad par bya ba la/ bar chadamadapa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg pa myur ba nyid du/ 'di ni mngon par shes pa myur la sla ba'i lam ste/ 'di dugan las bzhi'i// de la ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa
rgyu/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge slong dag tang nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun tu bstan te/ bsoms shing mang du byas na/ 'dod chags slong bar 'gyur ba yang yod/ ting de 'dzin sgom pa kun tu bstan ta/ bsgoms shab
mang du byas na/ mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur pa yang yod/ ting de 'dzin sgom pa kun tu bstan te/ bsgroms shang mang du byas na/ ye shes mthong ba thob par 'gyur ba yang yod/
dang de 'dzin sgom pa kun tu bstan te/ bsgoms shang mang du byas na/ shes rab 'thob par 'gyur ba yad yod do// de la ting de 'dzin sgom pa kun tu bstan te/ bsgoms shung mang du byas na/
'dod chags song bar 'gyur ba gang zhen/ dge slong dag 'di la dge slong dgon pan 'dug kyad rung/ shing drung na 'dug kyang rung/ khang stongan 'dug kyang rung// lus 'di nyidi la 'og gi rkang
mah+phal yan chad sku dang/ klad pa la khrug gi bar dum gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa jil ba bzhani so sor rtogs ste/ lus 'di la yod pa na skyi dang/ kha spu dang/ so dang/
san mo dang/ rdul dang/ dram dang/ bags ba dang/ sha dang/ rus pa dang/ rgyus pa dang/ rtsadang/ mkhal ma dang/ sAng dang/ glo ba dang/ mchin pa dang/ so ba dang/ sku
long ka dang/ rgyus dang/ gnyen dang/ lhad bu dang/ mar pa dang/ phyisi dang/ mchim dang/ rdul dang/ der snyabs dang/ mchil ma dang/ zhag dang/ chu sar dang/ rkang dang/
tshal dang/ rnag dang/ bad kan dang/ mkhris pa dang/ khrag dang/ klad pa dang/ klad rgyas dang/ gcan dang/ ma gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshog sakyi gang bar yang dag pa dzalta ba bzhin so sor rtog
go/ dge slong dag 'di lta ste dper na/ 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ 'bras sa lu dang/ 'bras dang/ nas dang/ gro dang/ mon srin le'u dang/ mon sran spyi lu dang/ rgyusran
dang 'bras nus ba dang/ sran chung dang/ mon srananag chu dang/ til dang/ 'bras drus ba dang/ yungs kar gyis gang ba'i sbyang zhag kha gnyis phye ba de la mig dang ldan pa'i ma
zhig gas blug sa so sor brtags na/ 'di dag na 'brasasA lu'o// 'di dag na 'bras so// 'di dag nanas so// 'di dag ni gro no// 'di dag ni mon sran sre'u'o// 'di dag ni tshon sran/
snga'u'o// 'di dag ni rgya sranano// 'di dag na 'brasan sra ba'o// 'di dag ni sran chung ngo// 'di dag ni mon phran nag gu'o// 'di dag na til lo// 'di dag na 'bras drus ba'o// 'di dag
spya// na yungs dkar ro zhes bya bar shes so// dge slong dag de bzhin du/ dge slong dgon ban 'dug kyang rung/ shang drung na 'dug kyang rung/ khang stongan 'dug kyang rung//
lus 'du nyid la 'og ga rkang many+dzal yan chad/ klad pa la zug ga bar du sam bzhin du klad pa dang/ kAr rgyas dang/ gcin dang/ mi gtsang ba rnam pa su tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta
spyi ba zhan du so sor rtogs/ 'dan ting nge 'dzin sgom pa kun tu bstan te/ bsgoms shing mong du byas na/ 'dod chags sbyong bar 'gyur pa'o// dge slong dag de la ting nge 'dzin sgom pa kun tu
bstan te/ bsoms shaji mang du byas n maslong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba gang zhen/ dge slong dag 'di la dge slong dgon kun 'dus kyang rung/ shing drungan 'dug kyang rung/ khang
song na 'dug kyang rung/ dben pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bas rang lus lus 'ad nyid gnyen par byed/ yongs su gnyen par byed/ yongs su khyab par byed/ yongs su
tshim par byed/ kun tu rgyas par byed pa sa/ 'di lta sa/ dben pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bas de'i rang gi nang gi lus thams cad la ma khyab pa 'am/ khyab par
ma gyur pa med do// dge slong dag 'di lta sa dbor na/ me tog ut+pa la 'am/ pad+ma 'am/ ku mudwa 'am/ pad+ma dkar po lang rung// chunas skyes ba chur byadeb de dag thams cad na/
bsal ba 'a chus mnyen par byas pa yongs su khyab par byas pa/ yongs su tshan pa khyas la/ kun tu rgyas par byas pa dag go/ dge slong dag de bzhin du dge slong dgon pa na 'dug kyang rung
shing drung na 'dug kyang rung/ khang stong na 'dug kyang rung ste/ tung de 'dzin las skyes ba'i dga' ba dang bde bas rang ga nang gi lus 'di mnyen par byed/ yongs su mnyen par byed/ yongs su
khyab par byed/ yongs su tshan pa ra byed/ kun tu rgyas par byed de/ 'dawa// ting nge 'dzin las myos pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde bas de'i nang gi lus thams cad la ma khyab pa 'am/ khyung
bar ma gyur pa med de/ 'dan ting nge 'dzani sgom pa kun tu bstan to/ bsgoms shing mang du byas na/ mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba'o// dge slong dag de la ting nge 'dzin
sgom pa kun tu bstan te/ bsgoms shang mang du byas na/ ye shes mthong ba thob par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ dge slong dag 'di la dge slong gis snang bu'i 'du shes shan tu legs par bzung
legs par yid la byas/legs par reg par byas legs par rtogs par byas/de nyin mo'i 'du shes 'ashani du gnas nas/de snang ba de sems la sgom// na mo ji lta bar mtshan mo yang de bzhin/

mtshan mo ji lta bar nyin mo yang de bzhin/ sngar ji lta bar phyis kyad de bzhin/ phyis ji lta bar sngar yang de bzhin/ 'og tu ji lta bar stong du yad de bzhin/stong du ji lta bar 'og tu yang de bzhin te/
da ltar phye zhing kun tu bskor ba med pa'i sems kyis nyin mo'a'adushes la shan tu gnas te/ desnang ba de sems la sgomamo// dge slong dag 'di lta ste dparan/sos ka' zla/

kyi ba kra ma la/nam mkha' la sngon med nyid sprin dang bral ba'i nyin mo sIm gung la snang ba yongs su dag cing/ yongs su dkar la 'od gsal te/mun pa ma yin no// dge slong dag de bzhin du dge slong gis snang
pa'i 'du shes shan tu legs por bzung/ lags par yid la byas/ lags par reg par byas/ legs par rtogs par byas te/ nyin mo'i 'du shes la shin tu gnas nas/ de snang ba de sems la
sgom te/ rgan mo ji lta bar mtshan mo yang de bzhin/ mtshan mo ji lta bar nyin mo yang de bzhin/ star ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin/ phyis ja lta bar sngar yod de bzhin 'og ji lta bar song yang da
bzhin/ snang du ji lta bar 'og tu yang de bzhinA te/ de ltar phye zhadi kun nas bskor ba med pa 'i sems kyis nyin mo'i 'du shes shin tu gnas nas/ de snang ba de sems la sgom pa ste 'di ni ting
de 'dzin sgom pa kun tu bsten te/ bsgoms shing mad du byas na/ ye shes mthong pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de la ting nge 'dzin sgom pa kun tu bsten te/ bsgoms shang mang du byas na/
! shes rab thob par 'gyur ba dang zhen/ dge slong 'di lta ste/ dge slong dag dgon pa na 'dug kyang rung/ shing drung na 'dug kyang rung/ khang stong na 'dug kyang rung/ bde ba yang yangs te/
sn gnas sdug bsngal yang sangs shadi/ yid bde ba dang/ yad ma bde ba yang nub pas/ sdug bsngal yang med bde ba yang mad de/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/bsam gtan bzha ba yongs
su rdzogs par byas nas gnas te/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin sgom pa kun tu bastan te/ bsgoms shaji mang du byas na/ shes rab 'thob par 'gyur ba ste// dge slong dag 'di dag na ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa
bzhi'i// dge slong 'di dag de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhan/ dge slong dag 'di la dge slong brnyan bshes bzhin can/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi brnab sems dang/
